52a4('bum): 'di la ni bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba'i nyon mongs pa yang spangs pa mang ngo // 'di la ni bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba'i spangs pa myed do// zhes bka' stsal da/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor
52a5('bum): bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba'i nyon mongs pa'i yang ma yin/ mod kyi/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams la 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug gi lus kyi rnam pa dang / ngag gi rnam pa yong ngo // 
52a6('bum): de dag gi chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba de ni byis pa so so'i skye bo kun dang / thun mong yang gnod par 'gyur ba ma yin te/ de ni de bzhin gshi gas pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la
52a7('bum): thams cad du thams cad/ rnam pa thams cad kyi thams cad du myi 'byung zhing myi gnas so// de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor kyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsolang to// bcom ldan 'das gal te lam
52a8('bum): yang ma mchis la/ mya ngan las 'das pa yang ma mchis na/ 'o na ci'i slad du 'di ni rgyun tu zhugs pa'o// 'di ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba'o// 'di ni phyir myi 'ong ba'o// 'di ni dgra bcom pa'o// 'di ni rang sangs rgyas so/ 
52b1('bum): 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'o// 'di ni de bzhin gshegs dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas so zhes bshad do// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor
52b2('bum): rgyu nad tu zhugs pa dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang / phyir mi 'ong ba dang / dgra bcom pa dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dang / de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dge/ 
52b3('bum): par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas zhes bya ba de dag thams cad kyang 'dus ma byas kyis rab tu phye ba'o// gsol da pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags kang 'dus ma byas de 'di ni rgyun tu zhugs pa'o// 'di ni lan cig
52b4('bum): phyir 'ong ba'o// 'di ni phyir myi 'ong ba'o// 'di ni dgra bcom che pa'o// 'di ni rang sangs rgyas so// 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' da sems dpa' chen po'o// 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom
52b5('bum): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas zhes bgyi bar rab tu 'byed pa ma mchis sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal da pa rab 'byor nga 'dus ma byas ni rab tu phyed pa myed mod kyi/ 'o nad kyang
52b6('bum): tshig tshad mar byas shing brjod de/ don dam par ni rab tu dbye bar myi nus so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de la tshig gi lam gi gdags pa myed de/ 'on kyang gang dang gang gis mtha' mchod pa de dang de dag la phyi ma'i mtha'
52b7('bum): gdags pa yin te/ rab 'byorang chos thams cad rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong pa la sngon gi mtha' yang myi dmyigs na/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang dmyigs par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod de gnas myed/ rab 'byor seMs
52b8('bum): can de dag chos rnams rang gi mtshan nyid gis stong par myi shes pos de dag la 'di skad du 'di ni sngon gi mtha' zhes bya'o// 'di ni phyi ma'i mtha'o zhe/ zhes bya'o zhes bstand te/ rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong pa'i chos
53a1('bum): thams cad la sngon gi mtha' 'am/ phyi ma'i mtha' dmyigs su myed do// rab 'byor de ltar chos thams cad rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad par bya ste ga
53a2('bum): rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong pa'i chos thams cad la spyad de nang ngam phyi'i chos sam/ 'dus byas sam/ nyan thos kyi chos sam// rang sangs rgyas kyi chos sam/ sangs rgyas kyi chos gang la yang mngon par
53a3('bum): chags par myi 'gyur ba'o// de skad ces bka' stsol pa dang / de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu
53a4('bum): phyi nang pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zhes bgyi ba ci'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zhes bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor shes rab kyi
53a5('bum): pha rol tu phyind pa 'di ni chos thams cad kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i dam pa thob pa yin te// de'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa zhes bya'o// rab 'byorang gzhan yang shes rab kyi pha
53a6('bum): rol tu phyind pa 'dis nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dang / de bzhin gshegs dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyi pha
53a7('bum): rol tu phyin par gyurapa/ pha rol tu phyind pa/ pha rol tu phyind par gyur pas/ de'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zhes bya'o// rab 'byor de gzhan yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
53a8('bum): pa 'dis chos thams cad kyi chog gi tshul phyed de chos de dag kun la'ang 'khor ba ma dmyigs pas ngo'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nang pa zhes bya'o// rab 'byor nga gzhan yang shes rab kyi pha rol/ 
53b1('bum): tu phyinang pa 'dir de bzhin nyid kyang chung yang dag pa'i mtha' yang chung / chos kyi dbyings kyang chung de/ de'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya'o// rab 'byor nga gzhan yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu
53b2('bum): phyinang pa 'di ni chos gang gis kyang ldan pa 'am myi ldan pa 'am/ snyan du yod pa'am/ bsta nang du myed pa'am/ thogs pa dang bcas pa 'am/ thogs pa med pa ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha
53b3('bum): rol tu phyinang pa 'di ni gzugs myed pa/ bstanang du myed pa/ mtshan nyid myed par mtshan nyid gcig pa'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di ni chos thams cad gi spobs pa thams cad dang
53b4('bum): snang ba thams cad dbaskyed pa ste/ rab 'byor nga shes rab kyi pha roladu tu phyind pa ni bdud dam bdud kyi ris kyi lha rnams sam/ gang zag nga nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa nas/ mu stegs can gan/ 
53b5('bum): gri bar dang / sdig pa'i grogs po rnams kyis myi chong myi 'phrogs ba ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di la gcad par myi nus so// de ci'i phyir
53b6('bum): zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi byer/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di la de dag thams cad dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos
53b7('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di'i don la spyad par bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab mo 'di'i don la spyod pas/ myi rtag pa'i don la
53b8('bum): spyad par bya'o// sdug bsngal ba'i don la spyad par bya'o// bdag med pa'i don la spyad par bya'o// sdug bsngal shes pa'i don la spyad par bya'o// kun 'byung ba shes pa'i don dang / 'gog pa shes pa'i don dang / lam shes
54a1('bum): pa'i don la spyad par bya'o// zag pa shes pa'i don dang / myi skye ba shes pa'i don dang / chos shes pa'i don dang / rje su 'gro ba shes pa'i don dang / kun rdzob shes pa'i don dang / yongasu rtog pa shes pa'i don// 
54a2('bum): dang / sgra ji bzhin shes pa'i don dal spyad par bya'o// rab 'byor de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i don la spyad par bya'o// gsol pa bcom ldan 'das gal te shes
54a3('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab mo 'di'i don dang / don la lags pa myi dmyigs na/ 'o na ci ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i don za mo 'di la spyod pas 'di ltar spyad pa
54a4('bum): byabya ste/ 'dod chags bdag gi don ce 'am/ don ma yin zhes spyad par myi bya'o// zhe sdang bdag gi don ce 'am/ don ma yin zhes spyad par myi bya'o// gti mug bdag gi don ce 'am/ don ma yin zhes spyad par myi bya'o// 
54a5('bum): 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug bdag gi don ce'am don ma yin zhes spyad par myi bya'o// log par lta ba bdag gi don ce 'am/ don ma yin zhes spyad par myi bya'o// lta bar gyur pa thas
54a6('bum): cad bdag gi don ce 'am/ don ma yin zhes spyad par myi bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug gi de bzhin nyid ni gang la yang don du myi byed/ don ma yin par myi byed do// 
54a7('bum): lta ba'i rnam pa dag gi de bzhin nyid ni gang la yang don du myi byed de// don ma yin par myi byed do// gzugs bdag gi don ces spyad par myi bya'o// gzugs bdag gi don ma yin zhes spyad par myi bya'o// pha rol
54a8('bum): tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa bdag gi don ces spyad par myi bya'o/ rnam par shes pa bdag gi don ces ma yin zhes spyad par myi bya'o// skye mched dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel/ 
54b1('bum): bar 'byung ba bdag gi don ces spyad par myi bya'o// rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba bdag gi don ma yin zhes spyad par myi bya'o// pha rol tu phyinang pa thams cad dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang / byang chub kyi phyog
54b2('bum): kyi chos sum bcu rtsa bdun bdag gi don ces spyad par myi bya'o// byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum bcu rtsa bdun bdag gi don ma yin zhes spyad par myi bya'o// 'phags pa'i bden pa dang / bsam gtan dang / tshad myed
54b3('bum): pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mtho rang gis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa dang / mngon par
54b4('bum): shes pa dang / ting nge 'dzind dang / gzungs gi sgo dag gi / don ces spyad par myi bya'o// gzungs gi sgo bdag gi don ma yin zhe/ spyad par myi bya'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang / myi 'an
54b5('bum): pa dang / soso yang dag par rig pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad bdag gi don ces spyad par myi bya'o// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad bdag gi don ma yin zhes spyad par
54b6('bum): myi bya'o// bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi bar du bdag gi don ces spyad par myi bya'o// bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi bar du bdag gi don ma yin zhes spyad par myi bya'o// 
54b7('bum): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor de ni 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas
54b8('bum): nas/ chos gang don du bya ba 'am/ don myed par bya ba de lta bu gang yang ma dmyig so// rab 'byor gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa rnams skyes kyang rung / de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ma skyes kyang rung ste/ chos
55a1('bum): rnams kyi chos nyid dang / chos kyi gnas nyid ni gnas pa chos kyi dbyings kyi gnas pa ste/ don gang pa yang don kyang myi byed / don ma yin par yang myi byed do// rab 'byor de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sa
55a2('bum): dpa' chen pos don dang don ma yin pa spangs te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyad par bya'o// gsol pa bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang la yang don kyang myi bgyid ka/ don ma
55a3('bum): lags pa yang myi bgyid pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba// rab 'byor da de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ni 'dus byas dang 'dus ma byas kyi chos nyid gang yang myi byed de/ de'i phyir shes
55a4('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ni gang la yang don du byed pa yang ma yin/ 'od ma yin par yang ma yin no// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'o na 'dus dam bgyis pa sangs rgyas dang / sangs rgyas kyi nyan thos 'phags
55a5('bum): pa thams cad drod ma lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal da ba/ 'dus ma byas ni sangs rgyas dang / sangs rgyas kyi nyan thos 'phags pa thams cad kyi don yin te/ phan pa 'am/ gnod
55a6('bum): par nye bar gnas pa ma yin to// rab 'byor de 'di lta ste dper na/ nam mkha'i de bzhin nyid ni gang la yang phan pa 'am/ gnod par nye bar gnas pa ma yin no// rab 'byor de de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' ses da
55a7('bum): chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang phan pa 'am/ gnod par nye bar gnas pa ma yin no// gsol pa bcom ldan 'das 'o na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'dus ma bgyis kyi shes rab kyi pha
55a8('bum): rol tu phyin pa la bslabs shing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par myi byed dam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
55b1('bum): chen po ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab mo 'di la bslabs shing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid thob par byed de/ gnyis kyi tshul gis ma yin no// gsol pa bcom ldan 'das ci lags
55b2('bum): gnyisu ma mchis pa'i chos/ gnyisu ma mchis pa'i chos thob bgyid dam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// ma yin no// gsol pa 'o na gnyis gi chos shig gi gnyis kyi chos thob par bgyid pa lags sam/ 
55b3('bum): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal da pa/ ma yino// gsol pa 'o na ji ltar thob par 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ nam gnyis kyi chos sam/ gnyi su myed pa'i chos kyang myi dmyigs pa na thob par
55b4('bum): 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ myi dmyigs pa ni thob pa ste/ de ni dmyigs pas kyang thob par myi 'gyur/ myi dmyigs pas kyang thob par myi 'gyur ro// // shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa stong phrag nyi shu lnga pa las/ 
55b5('bum): de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor kyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di ska da ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das shes kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ni zab po/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems
55b6('bum): dpa' chen po gang bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i chub tu zhugs pa yang dka' ba bgyid pa ste/ sems can zhes bgyi ba 'am/ sems can du bdags pa ni gang yang myi dmyigs na/ de dag ni sems can
55b7('bum): rnams gi slad du bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhug so// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste dper na skyes bu la la zhig nam mkha' gzhi mchis pa la ljang bu bskyed par 'tshal ba de bzhin/ 
56a1('bum): du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyang / sems can rnams gi slad du rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid thob par 'tshalo// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor da de de
56a2('bum): bzhin no// de de bzhin na te/ byang chub sems dpa' chen po gang sems can rnams kyi dos phyir/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par 'jug pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du
56a3('bum): mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ sems can rnams sems can du 'dzin pa las yongasu 'grel ba ni dka' ba byed pa'o// rab 'byor nga 'di lta ste dper na/ skyes bu la la zhig ldang du skyed par 'dod la/ skyes bu
56a4('bum): des ljang bu de'i rtsa ba ma dmyigs/ yal ga dang / sdong bu dang / lo ma dang / me tog dang / 'bras bu ma dmyigs par ljang bu de'i sdong bu bskyed de/ dus dus su chus bran zhing de'i sdong bu de rim gis yal ga phun su
56a5('bum): tshogs par 'gyur/ lo ma phun sum tshogs par 'gyur/ me tog phun sum tshogs par 'gyur/ 'bras bu phun sum tshogs par gyur padz+ra/ dang / de ljang bu de'i 'dab ma la spyod pa dang / me tog la spyad pa dang
56a6('bum): 'bras bu la spyod pa de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems chen pas kyang sems can rnams kyi phyir/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par 'jug ste/ de dag rims kyis pha rol tu
56a7('bum): phyi nang pa drug la spyod cing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed de/ de lo ma dang / me tog dang / 'bras bu bltar sems can thams cad nye bar 'chi bar 'gyur ro// rab 'byor 'di la lo ma ni byang chub seMs/ 
56a8('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po la brtend cing sems can rnams ngan song gsum las yongs su 'grol ba'o// me tog ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la rten cing / rgyal rigs che zhing mtho ba dang / dri nI
56b1('bum): rigs che zhing mtho ba dang / khyim bdag gi rigs che zhing mtho bar skye ba dang / rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lhar skye ba dang / sum bcu rtsa gsum dang / mtshe ma dang / dga' ldan dang / 'phrul de dga' dang / gzhan 'phrul da/ 
56b2('bum): dbang byed dang / tshangs ris dang / tshangs lnga nye phan dang / tshangs pa kun 'khor dang / tshangs chen dang / snang ba dang / chung snang dang / chang myed snang ba dang / kun snang dang ba dang / dge ba dang / chung dge dang / tshad med dge ba dang / 
56b3('bum): dge rgyas dang / che ba dang / chung che dang / tshad myed che ba dang / 'bras bu che ba dang / myi che ba dang / myi gdung ba dang / shi nad tu mthong ba dang / gya non snang ba dang / 'og min dang / nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched dang / rnam shes
56b4('bum): mtha' yas skye mched dang / cung zad myed pa'i skye mched dang / 'du shes med 'du shes med myin skye mched kyi lhar skye'o// 'bras bu ni byang chub semadas dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
56b5('bum): nyid thob nas/ sems can de dag rgyu nang tu zhugs pa'i 'bras/ bu la rab tu dgod pa dang / land cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / rang byang chub la rab tu 'god pa dang / 
56b6('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de nyid la rtend cing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ba dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob nas de dag kyang sems can thams cad 'bras bu nye bar
56b7('bum): 'tsho ba bzhin nye bar 'tsho bar 'gyur ba dang / de la gang gis yon phul ba de dag gis kyang rim gis 'di lta ste/ nyan thos gi theg pa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa 'am/ theg pa chen po 'am/ theg pa gsum po 'di dag
56b8('bum): gis yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa dang / bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang brgya bar 'gyur yang / de la sems can du yang myi 'dagos pa/ sems can du gdags pa yang myed pa/ 
57a1('bum): sems can de dag kyang sems can du 'dzind pa las yongasu 'grel pa ste/ rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod kyang
57a2('bum): gang gi don du bdag gis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par bya'o// zhes bya ba'i sems can nam/ sems can du bdags pa gang yang myi dmyig so// rab 'byor kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das
57a3('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni de bzhin gshegs pa nyid du rig par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la rten na/ sems can dmyal
57a4('bum): ba thams cad rgyund cad par 'gyur ro// byol song gi skye gnas thams cad dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten thams chad rgyun chad para'agyur ro// myi khom pa dang / ngan song thams cad rgyund chad par
57a5('bum): 'gyur ro// dngul po thams cad rgyu nad chad par 'gyur ro// lam gi rgyud dma' ba thams cad rgyun chad par 'gyur ro// 'dod pa'i khams thas cad rgyu nang chad par 'gyur ro// gzugs kyi khams thams cad
57a6('bum): rgyun chad par 'gyur ro// gzugs med pa'i khams thams cad rgyun chad par 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal dpa/ rab 'byor de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpal
57a7('bum): chen po ni de bzhin gshegs pa nyid du rig par bya'o// rab 'byor dgil te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po myed na/ 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / dkar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi/ bla na med/ 
57a8('bum): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyang yod bar myi 'gyur// rang sangs rgyas rnams kyang 'jig rten du 'byung bar myi 'gyur ro// dgra bcom pa rnams dang / phyir myi 'ong ba rnams dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams dang / rgyun tu
57b1('bum): zhugs pa rnams kyang 'jig rten du 'byung bar myi 'gyur ro// sems can dmyal ba thams cad rgyun chad par myi 'gyur ro// byol song gi skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten thams cad rgyun chad par myi 'gyur/ 'dod pa'i khas
57b2('bum): thams cad kyang rgyun chad par myi 'gyur/ gzugs kyi khams thams cad dang / gzugs myed pa'i khams thams cad kyang rgyunang chad par myi 'gyuraro// rab 'byor de bas na gang 'di skad du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen no// 
57b3('bum): ni de bzhin gshegs pa nyid du rig par bya'o zhes zer ba ni rab 'byor de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni de bzhin gshegs pa nyid du rig par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor de de
57b4('bum): bzhin nyid gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa gshegs par bdags pa dang / de bzhin nyid gang gis rang sangs rgyas su gdags pa dang / de bzhin nyid gang gis 'phags pa thams cad du bdags pa dang / de bzhin nyid gang gis
57b5('bum): gzugs su gdags pa dang / de bzhin nyid gang gis tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes par bdags pa dang / de bzhin nyid gang gis skye mched dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel
57b6('bum): par 'byung bar gdags pa dang / de bzhin nyid gang gis pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos su bcu brtsa bdun bdugs pa dang / de bzhin nyid gang gis 'phags pa'i bden
57b7('bum): pa dang / bsam gtan dang / tshad myed pa dang / gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smond pa myed pa dang / mngon par shes pa dang / ting nge 'dzind dang / 
57b8('bum): gzungs kyi sgo rnams su gdags pa dang / de bzhin nyid gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / myi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa dang / sas rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad du gdags pa de dag
57b9('bum): yod da na shes rna rkyen pad kyi ga du/ de shin dag gis sa kyi sa dang tshus mas kyi tshom kyi ra chags
58a1('bum): thams cad kyang de kho na bzhin te/ de bas na de bzhin nyid ces bya'o// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni de bzhin nyid de la bslab parwa shing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed
58a2('bum): pas/ de'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa zhes bya ste/ rab 'byor rnam grangs des na de bzhini nyid tshad mar byas te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni de bzhin gshegs pa nyid du rig par bya'o// rab 'byor/ 
58a3('bum): de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos de bzhin nyid kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la slab par bya ste/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni de bzhin nyid kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu
58a4('bum): phyind pa la bslabs shing / chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid la bslabs pa'o// chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid la bslabs/ shing / chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid yongasu rdzogs par byed// 
58a5('bum): chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid yongasu rdzogs par byas shing / chos thas cad kyi de bzhin nyid la dbang du 'gyur ba thob par byed do// chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid la dbang du 'gyur ba thob par byas
58a6('bum): shing / sems can thams cad kyi dbang po la mkhas par byed do// dbang po la mkhas par byas shing / dbang po yongasu bskang ba la mkhas par thob par byed do// dbang po yongasasu bskang ba la mkhas pa thob par byas shing / 
58a7('bum): sems can rjes kyi las rang gi las rang gis byas pa shes par byed do// sems can rnams kyi rang las shes par byas shing / smond pa'i ye shes yongasu rdzogs par byed do// smon pa'i ye shes yongasu rdzogs par
58a8('bum): byas shing / dus gsum du ye shes rnam par dag par byed do// dus gsum du ye shes rnam par dag par byas shing / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pas/ sems can gi don cing sangs rgyas kyi zhing
58b1('bum): yongasu dag par byed do// sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byas shing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid thob par byed do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid byas shing / chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ro// chos kyi 'khor/ 
58b2('bum): lo bskor cing / sems can rnams theg pa gsum la rab tu 'god do// sems can rnams theg pa gsum la rab tu 'god nas/ phung po lhag ma ma lus pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyingasu yongasu mya ngan las 'da'o// 
58b3('bum): rab 'byor de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos yon tan dang / legs pa thams cad mthong nas/ bdag gis kyang bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par bya'o// gzhan yang bla na
58b4('bum): myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bzhug par bya'o// rab 'byor gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab mo 'di snyam du bstan pa
58b5('bum): 'di la spyod pa 'di dag ni lha dang myi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyi phyag bgyi bar 'os pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ byang chub
58b6('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu/ phyi nad pa zab mo ji skad du bstand pa 'di la spyad pa de dag ni/ lha dang / myi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gis phyag bya bar 'os te
58b7('bum): gsol pa bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems dang po bskyed pa dang ldan pa/ sems can thams cad kyi don du bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'chang
58b8('bum): rgya bar 'tshal ba de'i bsod nams ji tsam zhig tu 'phel bar 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsayang ba/ rab 'byor gal te stong gsum gi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gi khams kyi sems can ji snyed pa de dag
58b9('bum): thams cad nyan thos kyi sa la gnas par 'gyur/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sa la gnas par gyur na/ sems can de dag gi bsod nams mang du 'phel lam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mang ngo // bde bar gsheg
59a1('bum): pa mang ngo/ bcom ldan 'das kyis tshad ma mchis so// bde bar gshegs pa tshad ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor stong gsum gi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gi khas
59a2('bum): kyi sems can thams cad nyan thos kyi theg pa pa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa par gyur pa de dag gi bsod nams des/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems dang po skyed pa dang ldan pa'i bsod nas lus/ 
59a3('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems dang po skyed pa dang / ldan pa'i bsod nams kyi tshogs de la ni/ stong gsuM gi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gi khams kyi sems can thams cad kyi theg pa 'am/ rang sa des
59a4('bum): rgyas kyi theg pa par gyur pa de dag gi bsod nas des/ brgya'i char yang nye bar myi 'gro'o// stong gi cha dang / brgya phrag stong gi cha dang / bye ba'i cha dang / bye ba brgya'i cha dang / bye ba sdong gi cha dang / bye ba brgya phrag stong gi chadang
59a5('bum): bye ba khrig khrig brgya phrag stong gi char yang nye bar myi 'gro'o// grangs dang / cha dang / bgrang ba dang / rgyur yang myi bzod do// de ci'i/ phyir zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' las byung ba ni gang zag nyon thos
59a6('bum): rang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa rnams te/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas las byung ba ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rjes ma yin no// stong gsuM gi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gi khas
59a7('bum): kyi sems can thams cad nyan thos kyi theg pa pa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa par gyur pa lta zhog gi/ gal te stong gsu gi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can dag thams cad nyan thos kyi yon tan
59a8('bum): dadri lngan par gyur kyang de dag gi so nams des/ byang chub sems dpa' sems nga sa bskyed pa'i sod nams kyi brgya'i char mang nye bar myi 'gro'o// snying gi ma dang / brgya phrag stong gi dang / bye n+ya blag stong gis
59b1('bum): yang nye bar myi 'gro'o// dpe' dang rgyu'i char yang nye bar myi bzod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' las byung ba ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi yon tan rnams te/ nyen thos dang / rang sangs rgyas
59b2('bum): las byung ba ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ma yin no// stong gsu gi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can thams cad dang nyan thos kyi yon tan dang / ldan par gyur pa 'am/ rang sangs
59b3('bum): rgyas kyi yon tan dang / ldan par gyur pa lta zhog gi/ gal te stong gsum gi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gi khams gi sems can de dag thams cad dkar po rnam par mthong ba'i sa la gnas par gyur kyang / de de'i bsod nas
59b4('bum): des/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dang po bskyed pa'i bsod nas/ kyi brgya'i char yang nye bar myi 'gro'o// stong gi cha dang / brgya phrag stong gi cha dang / bye ba khrag khrig brgya phrag stong gi bar gi char yang ne
59b5('bum): bar myi 'gro'o// dpe' dang rgyu'i bar du yang myi bzod do// de ci 'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' las byung ba ni dkar po rno par mthong ba'i sa las gnas pa rnams te/ kar po rnam par mthong ba'i
59b6('bum): sa la byung ba ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ma yin no// stong gsum gi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gi khams kyi sems can thams cad dkar po rnam par mthong ba'i sa la gnas par gyu rad pa lta
59b7('bum): zhog gi/ gal te stong gsum gi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gi khams kyi sems can de dag thams cad rigs kyi sa la gnas par gyur kyang / de dag gi bsod nams des/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dang po skyed bri/ 
59b8('bum): bsod nams kyi brgya'i char yang nye bar myi 'gro'o// stong gi cha dang / brgya phrag stong gi cha dang / bye ba khrag khrig brgya phrag stong gi char yang nye bar myi 'gro'o// dpe' dang rgyur char yang nye bar myi 'gro'o// stong gi cha dang / brgya phrag
59b9('bum): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' las byung ba ni rigs kyi sa la gnas pa rnams te/ rigs kyi sa la gnas pa ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ma yin no// stong gsum gi stong chen po'i 'jig
60a1('bum): rten gi khams kyi sems can thams cad rigs kyi sa la gnas par gyur pa lta zhog gi/ gal te stong gsum gi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gi khams kyi sems can thams cad brgyad pa'i sa la gnas
60a2('bum): par gyur kyang de dag gi bsod nams des/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dang po bskyed pa'i bsod nams kyi brgya'i char yang nye bar myi 'gro'o// stong gi cha dang / brgya phrag stong gi cha dang / bye ba khrig khrig brgya phrag stong
60a3('bum): gi bar gi char yang nye bar myi 'gro'o// dpe' dang rgyu'i bar du myi bzod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' las byung ba ni brgyad pa'i sa la gnas pa rnams te/ brgyad pa'i sa las byung ba ni byang chub sems dpa'/ 
60a4('bum): sems dpa' chen po rnams ma yin no// stong gsum gi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gi khams gi sems can thams cad brgyad pa'i sa la gnas da par gyur pa lta zhag gi// gal te stong gsum gi stong chen po'i
60a5('bum): 'jig rten gi khams kyi sems can de dag thams cad mthong ba'i// sa la gnas par gyur kyang de dag gi bsod nams des/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dang po bskyed pa na sod nams kyi brgya'i char yang
60a6('bum): nye bar myi 'gro'o// stong gi cha dang / brgya stong gi cha dang / bye ba khrig khrig brgya phrag stong gi bar gi char yang nye bar myi 'gro'o// dpa' dang rgyu'i bar du yang myi bzod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' las
60a7('bum): byung ba ni mthong ba'i sa la gnas pa rnams te/ mthong ba'i sa las byung ba ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ma yin no// stong gsum gi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gi khams kyi sems can thams cad
60a8('bum): mthong ba'i sa la gnas par gyur pa lta zhog gi// gal te stong gsum gi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gi khams kyi sems can de dag thams cad bsrabs pa'i sa la gnas par gyur kyang / de dag gi bsod nams nges
60b1('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dang po bskyed pa nas bsod nams kyi brgya'i char yang nye bar myi 'gro'o// stong gi cha dang / brgya phrag stong gi cha dang / bye ba khrag khrig brgya phrag stong gi bar gi char yang nye bar myi 'gro'o// dpe'
60b2('bum): dang rgyu'i bar du yang myi bzod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa'i las byung ba ni bsrabs pa'i sa la gnas pa rnams te/ bsrabs pa'i sa las byung ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ma yin no// 
60b3('bum): stong gsum gi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gi khams kyi sems can thams cad bsrabs pa'i sa la gnas par gyur pa lta zhog gi/ gal te stong gsum gi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can thams cad 'dod chags
60b4('bum): rang bral ba'i sa la gnas par gyur kyang de dag gi bsod nams des byang chub sems dpa' sems dang po bskyed pa'i bsod nams kyi brgya'i char yang nye bar myi 'gro'o// stong gi cha dang / brgya phrag srong gi cha dang / 
60b5('bum): bye ba khrag khrig brgya phrag stong gi cha dang nye bar myi 'gro'o// dpe' dang rgyu'i bar du yang myi bzod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' las byung ba ni 'dod chags dang bral ba'i sa la gnas pa rnams te/ 'dod
60b6('bum): chags dang bral ba'i sa las byung ba ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ma yin no// stong gsum gi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gi khams kyi sems can thams cad 'dod chags dang bral ba'i sa la gnas par gyur pa
60b7('bum): lha zhog gi/ gal te stong gsum gi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can thams cad byas pa rtogs pa'i sa la gnas par gyur kyang de dag gi bsod nams des/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dang po bskyed pa'i bsod nas/ 
60b8('bum): kyi brgya'i char yang nye bar phyi 'gro'o// steng gi cha dang / brgya phrag stong gi cha dang / bye ba khrag khrig brgya phrag stong gi bar gyi char yang nye bar myi 'gro'o// dpe' dang rgyu'i bar du yang myi bzong ngo // de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa'
61a1('bum): las byung ba ni byas pa rtogs pa'i sa la gnas pa nas te byas pa rtogs pa'i sa las byung ba ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ma yin no// stong gsum gi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gi khams
61a2('bum): kyisems can thams cad byas pa rtogs pa'i sa la gnas par gyur pa lta zhog gi// gal te stong gsum gi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can de dag thams cad rang sangs rgyas kyis la gnas par gyur kyang / 
61a3('bum): de dag gi bsod nams des/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dang po bskyed pa'i bsod nams kyi brgya'i char yang nye bar myi 'gro'o// gaslong gi cha dang / brgya phrag stong gi cha dang / bye ba khrag khrig brgya phrag stong gi bar gi char yang
61a4('bum): nye bar myi 'gro'o// dpe' dang rgyu'i bar du yang myi bzod do// de ci'iphyir zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' las byung ba'i rang sangs rgyas rjes te ra yang / rang sangs rgyas las byung ba ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
61a5('bum): chen po rnams ma yin no// stong gsum gi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gi khams kyi sems can thas cad rang sangs rgyas kyi sa la gnas par gyur pa lta zhog gi// gal te stong gsum gi stong chen po'i
61a6('bum): 'jig rten gi khams kyi sems can de dag thams cad byang chub sems dpa'i bskyon med par zhugs par gyur kyang de dag gi bsod nams des/ byang chub sems dpa' byang chub tu zhugs pa'i bsod nas kyi brgya'i char yang nye
61a7('bum): kyi grog/ gaslong gi sa dang / 'argya phrag srong gis dang / khye ba phrag khrig rgya drug slong gi par gi char yang nye ba myi 'gro'o// dpe m+bu'i bar du yang mi 'dod // stong gsum gi song chen po'i 'jig rten gi khams
61a8('bum): kyimamasacam sa cad byang chu mes sa nga'i phyi byed pa zugs par gyur ba zhon ga gi gang de gang gsus gi ning chen po'i 'ag nigi 'angs kyisems cand dag mas cad byang chub mas tu zhugs par chus
61b1('bum): de dag gi bsod nams des de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi bsod nams kyi brgya'i char yang nye bar myi 'gro'o// stong gi cha dang / brgya phrag stong gi cha dang / bye ba khrag khrig brgya phrag s+ho/ 
61b2('bum): gi cha dang nye bar mi 'gro'o// grangs su yang myi bzod/ char yang mi bzod ka bgrang bar yang myi bzung rgyur yang myi bzod do// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems dang po
61b3('bum): bskyed pa nas ci yid la bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yid la bya'o// gso la pa / bcom ldan 'das rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi dngos po ji lta bu zhig mchis
61b4('bum): dmyigs pa ji lta bu zhig mchis dbang sgyur ba ji lta bu zhig mchis/ rnam pa ji lta bu zhig mchis/ mtshan nyid ji lta bu zhig mchis/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor nga gang yang 'di snyam du rnam pa thos
61b5('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid ces bya ba ni dngos po myed po'o// mtshan nyid med pa mtshan nyid myed pas/ skye ba med pa/ 'byung ba skyed pa ste/ rab 'byor/ gang yang 'di snyam du rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi dmyigs/ 
61b6('bum): ba ji lta bug dbang ni ji lta bu/ rnam pa ji lta bu/ mtshan nyid ji lta bu zhes zer ba ni/ rab 'byorang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi dmyigs pa ni myed pa/ dbang ni dran pa/ rnam pa ni zhi ba ga mtshan nyid ni mtsha
61b7('bum): nyid med pa yin te// rab 'byor 'di ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi dmyigs pa'o// 'di ni dbang sgyur ba'o// 'di ni rnam pa'o// 'di ni mtshan nyid do// gsol ba ga bcom ldan 'das ji lags/ rnam pa thams cad khyen
61b8('bum): panyid 'bal rig dngos po mchis pa lags sam ma lags kyi gzugs kyang dngos rna mchis ldag lags sa mig tshor ba dang / 'du shes dag 'du byed dag rnam par shes pa yang dngos po ma mchis pa lags pa skye mched dang khams dang / 
62a1('bum): garten cing 'brel par 'byung ba yang dngos po ma mchis pa lags pa pha ro lang tu phyin pa thams cad dang sa stong pa nyid thams cad dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum bcu rtsa bdun yang dngos po ma mchis pa lags
62a2('bum): 'phags pa'i bden pa dang / bsam gtan dang / tshang med pa dang / gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / rnam par thar brgyad dang / mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan myedan
62a3('bum): pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs kyi sgo dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang / myi 'jigs pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams
62a4('bum): kyang dngos po ma mchis pa lags/ byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / dga' ba chen po dang / btan snyoms chen po yang dngos po ma mchis pa lags/ 'dus byas kyi khams dang / 'dus ma byas kyi khams kyang
62a5('bum): dngos po ma mchis pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal dpa / rab 'byor rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang dngos po ma mchis pa'o/ gzugs dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par
62a6('bum): shes pa yang dngos po myed pa'o// skye mched dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba yang dngos po myed pa'o// pha rol tu phyind pa thams cad dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum bcu rtsa bdun yang
62a7('bum): ngos po skyem du'o// 'phags pa'i bden pa dang / bsam gtan dang / tshang med pa dang / gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gis gnas pa'i sems par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong brjid
62a8('bum): dang mnon skyed pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa dang / ting nga'i dzid dang / gsungs kyi sgong / de bani gzhigs pa'i dongs bcu dang / byi la gas pa dang / sos yang dag par rig pa dang / sangs rgyas kyichos kyi
62b1('bum): 'dres pa rnams kyang dngos myed pa'o// byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / dga' ba chen po dang / btang snyoms chen po yang dngos po myed pa'o// 'dus byas dang / 'dus ma byas kyi khams kyang dngos po myed pa'o// de ci'i phyir
62b2('bum): zhe na/ rab 'byor de ni 'di ltar rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid la ngo bo nyid med de/ rab 'byor da gang la ngo bo nyid myed pa de ni dngos po myed pa'o// gsol pa bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma mchis pa/ 
62b3('bum): lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de 'dus pa'i ngo bo nyid myed de/ gang la 'dus pa'i ngo bo nyid med pa ni dngos po myed pa'o// rab 'byor de rnam grangs des na chos thams cad ni dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid do// 
62b4('bum): rab 'byor nga 'di ltar yang chos thams cad ni stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid do// chos thams cad ni mtshan ma myed pa'i ngo bo nyid do// chos thams cadad ni smand pa myed pa'i ngo bo nyid do// rab 'byor nga 'di ltar yang chos
62b5('bum): thams cad ni de bzhin nyid kyi ngo bo nyid do// chos thams cad ni yang dag nye ba'i mtha'i ngo bo nyid do// chos thams cad ni chos kyi dbyings kyi ngo bo nyid do// rab 'byor nga rnam grangs nges kyang 'di ltar chos thams
62b6('bum): cad ni dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid du rig par bya'o// gsol pa bcom ldan 'das gal te de ltar chos thams cad ni dngos po ma mchis pa'i ngo bo nyid lags na/ 'o na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems dang po
62b7('bum): bskyed pa thabs gang dang ldan pas/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod cing sangs rgyas kyi zhing yong su dag pa dang / sems can yongasu sbyind par bgyid pa lags/ chul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang / bzod pa'i pha ro/ 
62b8('bum): tu phyind pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rolab tu phyind pa dang / bsam gau tan gi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / sangs rgyas kyi zhing yong su dag pa dang / sems can rnams yong su smin par
63a1('bum): bgyid pa lags/ bas gtan dang po dang / bsam gtan gnyis pa dang / bsam gtan gsum pa dang / bsam gtan bzhi pa la spyod cing sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa dang / sems can rnams yongasu/ 
63a2('bum): su sbyin par bgyid pa lags/ byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / dga' ba dang / btang snyoms la spyod cing sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa dang / sems can rnams yongs su sbyin par bgyid pa lags / na mkha'
63a3('bum): mtha' yas skye mched dang / rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched dang / da cung zad myed pa'i skye mched dang / 'du shes myed 'du shes myed myin skye mched la spyod cing sangs rgyas kyi zhing yong su dag pa dang / sems can rnams yongasu
63a4('bum): sbyinang par bgyod pa lags/ nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / byin stong pa nyid dang / dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du/ spyod cing sangs rgyas kyi zhing yong su dag pa dang / sems can nas
63a5('bum): maungasu sbyin par gyid pa lags/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang / yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul dgi rkang pa dang / dang po dang / tshangs dang phyi chub kyi yan lag dang / 'phags pa'i las yan lag brgyad pa la spyod
63a6('bum): kyi sug pa dag sems nanas yos su sbyi gyi lags pa'i yin sa sa gan / myeng nga / gdu bye 'i sa pas sa du / rnams
63a7('bum): m+b+ha kyis ga pa'i ma la jug pa sa/ da g-i ma sa myed pa dang / thos mye ga smon gas pa dang / 'i nang / gan nga / zhe ga gas
63b1('bum): sems can rnams yong su smin par bgyid pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de de ltar chos thams cad dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid du yong su 'dris par byed cing sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa dang
63b2('bum): sems can yong su sbyin par byed pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag dang / sems can de dag kyang dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid du shes pa de nyid byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i thabs mkhas pa ste/ khyeng chub sems dpa' sa
63b3('bum): dpa' chen po de ni sbyind pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod cing byang chub sems la yongs su 'dris par byed do// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyinang
63b4('bum): pa dang / bsam gtan gi pha rol tu phyind pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod cing / byang chub kyi lam yongasasu 'dris par byed do// nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / dngos po myed
63b5('bum): pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar la spyod cing / byang chub kyi lam la yod su 'dris par byed do// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang / yang dag par spong dra ba dang / rdzu 'phrulang gi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub
63b6('bum): kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la spyod cing / byang chub kyi lam la yong su 'dris par byed do// 'phags pa'i bden pa dang / bsam gtan dang / tshad myed pa dang / gzugs
63b7('bum): myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / rna bar tha rad pa dang / mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / stong pa nyid dang ka mtshan ma myed pa dang / smond pa myed pa dang / mngon par shes pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs
63b8('bum): gi sgo dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang / myi 'jigs pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams la spyod cing / byang chub kyi lam la yongasasu 'dris par byed do// rnam pa thams cad/ 
64a1('bum): mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar la spyod pa cing / byang chub kyi lam su yong su 'dris par byed do// byang chub kyi lam de yang dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi bar du shes te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni pha
64a2('bum): ni rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang ldan par gyur tam/ myi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / soso yang dag parar/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyan
64a3('bum): dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan par ma gyur pa de'i bar du/ byang chub kyi lam de la yongasu 'dris par byed do// rab 'byor de de ni byang chub sems dpa'i lam ste/ lam de la
64a4('bum): gnas shing pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad yong su rdzogs par byed do// pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad yongasu rdzogs par byas pas/ skad cig cig dang ldan pa'i shes rab kyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyuraro// 
64a5('bum): de'i tshe de'i ngag chags kyis mtshams sbyor ba'i nyon mongs pa thams de cad kyang myi skye bar spangs pas yongasu spang bar 'gyur te/ de sangs rgyas da kyi spyan gis stong gsum gi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gi khas la
64a6('bum): rnam par lta na dngos po myed par myi dmyigs na/ dngos po yod paralta smos kyang ci smos so// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' pa rgya chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ sbyin pa yongasu
64a7('bum): btong ste/ de ltar sbyin pa yongs su gtong yang myi rgong mtshan mar myi byed de/ dngos po yong pa 'am/ dngos po myed par yang yid la yang myi byed do// lend par yang myi rtog mtshan sa myi byed nga/ dngos po yod pa 'am / ngos
64a8('bum): po myed par yang yid la myi byed do// gtong ba la myi rtog mtshan mar myi byed de// dngos po yod pa 'am dngos po myed par yang yid la myi byed do// byang chub sems de yang myi dmyigs te/ mtshan mar myi byed g.yul du myi byed ga yun
64b1('bum): dag par rjesu myi mthong ngo // shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ tshul khrims kyi la bsrung / bzod pa bsgom// brtson 'grus rtsom/ bsam gtan snyoms par byed/ shes rab bsgom ste/ de ltar shes ra
64b2('bum): sgom par myi rtag mtshan mar yang myi byed do// dngos po yod pa 'om/ dngos po myed par yid la myi byed do// gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind sgom pa de la yang myi rtog mtshan mar mye byed de// dngos po yod pa 'am/ dngos po/ 
64b3('bum): skyed par yang yid la myi byed do// sems can gang gi don du shes rab de la yang sgom pa de dag la yang myi rtog mtshan mar myi byed do// dngos po yod pa 'am dngos po myed par yid la myi byed de/ gnang stong pa nyid dang / dngos po myed/ 
64b4('bum): pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang / yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrulang gi rkang pa dang / dbang po dbang po dang / stobs dang / sa byang chub kyi yan lag dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan
64b5('bum): lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa dang / bsam gtan ste dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / rnam par thard pa dang / mthard kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug
64b6('bum): pa dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa dang / mngon par shes pa dang / ting nge 'dzind dang / gzungs kyi sgo dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang / myi 'jigs pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa dang / 
64b7('bum): sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa dang / rna ba thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid de la myi rtog mtshan mar myi byed// dngos po yod pa 'am dngos po myed par yid la myi byed do// 
64b8('bum): bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi bar du yang myi rtog mtshan mar myi byed// dngos po yod pa 'am dngos po skyed par yang yid la myi byed de// gang mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar dang / gang mngon par rdzog
65a1('bum): par 'tshang rgya bar bya ba dang / gang gis mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bya ba de la yang myi rtog mtshan mar myi byed de// dngos po yod pa 'am dngos po myed par yang yid la myi byed do// de ci'i phyir
65a2('bum): zhe na/ 'di ltar chos thams cad ni dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid de/ de dag sangs rgyas rnams kyis kyang ma mdzad/ rang sangs rgyas rnams kyis dang / nyan thos rnaMs kyis kyang ma byas te/ chos thams cad byed pa po myed pa/ 
65a3('bum): byed pa po dang bral ba'o// rab 'byor kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta lags na chos rnams kyi chos nyid dang bral ba lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// rab 'byor de de bzhin no// 
65a4('bum): de de bzhin te/ rab 'byor de chos rnams ni chos rnams dang bral ba'o// gsol pa bcom ldan 'das gal te de ltar chos rnams chos rnaMs nyid dang bral ba lags na/ ji ltar chos kyis chos la dngos po/ 
65a5('bum): mchis zhes bgyi ba 'am/ dngos po ma mchis zhes bgyi bar yongasu 'tshal bar 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das dngos po ma mchis pa'i chos kyis dngos po ma mchis pa'i chos yongasasu 'tshal bar myi rung ste
65a6('bum): dngos po ma mchis pa'i chos kyis kyang ngos po ma mchis pa'i chos yongs su 'tshal bar myi rung ngo // dngos po mchis pa'i chos kyis kyang dngos po mchis pa'i chos 'tshal bar myi rung ngo // dngos po ma mchis pa'i chos kyis
65a7('bum): kyang dngos po ma mchis pa'i chos 'tshal bar myi rung ngo // de ltar chos thams cad yongasu 'tshal par ma mchis pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la dngos po mchis pa 'chis/ dngos po ma mchis par ses
65a8('bum): par yang ga la 'gyur// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ 'jig rten gi kun rdzob nye bar bzung bas dngos po yod
65b1('bum): ces bya ba 'am/ dngos po myed ces bya ba 'am/ dngos po myed ces bya bar ston to// don dam par ni ma yin no// gsol pa bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ 'jig rten gi kun rdzob kyang gzhan zhig la don dam pa yang gzhan
65b2('bum): zhig lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'jig rten gi khams kun rdzob kyang gzhan zhig yin zhes bya ba yang myed de/ 'jig rten gi kun rdzob kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de nyid/ don dam pa'i
65b3('bum): de bzhin nyid yin yang de la sems can de dag phyin ci log tu gyur pas/ de bzhin nyid de myi shes myi mthong ste/ de dag gi don du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jig rten gi kun rdzob kyis dngos po yod ces bya
65b4('bum): ba 'am/ dngos po myed ces bya bar brjod do// rab 'byor 'di ltar yang sems can gang ji snyed cig/ phung po lnga la dngos po yod pa'i 'du shes su gyur te/ dngos po myed pa'i myi shes pa de dag gi don du chos rnams rab tu ring
65b5('bum): ba nye bar bzung ste/ dngos po myed par ji ltar shes par 'gyur zhes te/ de skad du brjod do// rab 'byor de byang chub sems dpa' sos/ dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la de ltar spyad par
65b6('bum): bya'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa stong phrag nyi shu lnga pa las/ le'u lnga bcu rtsa bzhi pa'o// dum bu bzhi pa'o// bam po lnga pa'o// 
65b7('bum): de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byord kyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i spyod pa byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa zhes bgyi na/ de skad du byang chub seMs
65b8('bum): dpa'i spyod pa zhes bgyi ba de/ gang gi tshig bla dgas lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor nga byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa// byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa zhes bya ba ni/ de byang chub kyi don tu
66a1('bum): spyad pas na/ de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa zhes bya'o// gsol da pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang la spyod pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'/ 
66a2('bum): sul ba/ gzugaso stong zhes bya bar spyod de/ ci nas kyang rdo rnam pa gnyisu myi 'gyur ba de ltar spyod do// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa stong zhes bya bar spyod de/ ci nas kyang blo rnab
66a3('bum): gnyis su myi 'gyur ba de ltar spyod do// skye mched dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba stong zhes bya bar spyod de/ ci nas kyang blo rnam pa gnyis su myi 'gyur ba de ltar spyod do// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang // 
66a4('bum): tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyinod pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang / bsam gtan gi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
66a5('bum): pa stong zhes bya bar spyod/ nang stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi bar du stong pa zhes bya bar spyod/ bsam gtan dang po dang / bsam gtan gnyis pa dang / bsam gtan gsum pa dang / 
66a6('bum): bsam gtan bzhi po dang / byams pa dang / snying rje dang / dga' ba dang / btang snyoms dang / nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched dang / rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched dang / cung zad myed pa'i skye mched dang / 'du shes myed
66a7('bum): 'du shes myed myin skye mched stong pa zhes bya bar spyod/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang / yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrulang gi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / 'phags pa'i lam yin/ 
66a8('bum): lag brgyad pa stong pa zhes bya bar spyod/ 'phags pa'i bden pa dang / bsas gtan dang / chad med pa dang / gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / rnam par thar pa dang / mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par gyu/ 
66b1('bum): ba dgu dang / stong pa nyid ting dzin dang / mtshan ma myed pa'i ting nge 'dzind dang / smon pa myed pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / mngon par shes pa dang / ting nge 'dzind dang / gzungs gi sgo dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang / myi 'jigs
66b2('bum): pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams stong pa zhes bya bar spyod/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du stong pa zhes bya bar spyod/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongasasu dag par bya ba dang / 
66b3('bum): sems can yong su sbyind par bya bar dang / spobs pa dang / yi ge mngon par sgrub pa stong zhes bya bar spyod/ yi ge la 'jug pa dang / yi ge med pa la 'jug pa dang/ stong po zhes bya bar spyod/ gzugs stong pa zhes bya bar
66b4('bum): spyod/ 'dus byas kyi khams dang / 'dus ma byas kyi khams stong pa zhes bya bar spyod de/ ci nas kyang blo rnam pa gnyis myi 'gyur ba de ltar nga spyod do// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
66b5('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod pa ni/ byang chub tu spyod pa yin te/ de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa zhes bya'o// de skad ces bka' stsal pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor kyis bco
66b6('bum): ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas sangs rgyas zhes bgyi na/ sangs rgyas zhes bgyi ba de gang gi tshig bla dgas logs/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' su yang pa/ rab 'byor yang
66b7('bum): dge pa'i don nas sa rgyas zhes gyi ste/ rab kya daya di na ras yang dag pa'i chos mngon par rdzogs par 'angs rgyas pas/ de phyi sangs rgyas zhes bya'o// yang dag pa'i don ma tu rtogs pas kyi de
66b8('bum): sangs rgyas zhes bya'o// rab 'byor yang 'di ltar yang des chos thams cad ji lta ba bzhin du mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pas// de'i phyir sangs rgyas zhes bya'o// rab 'byor kyis gsol pa// bcom ldan 'das
67a1('bum): byang chub ces bgyi na/ byang chub ces bgyi ba de gang gi tshig bla dgas lags// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor byang chub ces bya ba de ni stong pa nyid kyi tshig bla dag so/ de ni de bzhin
67a2('bum): nyid kyi tshig bla dgas so// de ni mngon pa de bzhin nyid dang / bzhin ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings nyid dang / chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos skyon myed pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i
67a3('bum): mtha'i tshig bla dgas so// rab 'byor de yang 'di ltar byang chub sems ces bya ba ni de bzhin nyid/ ma nor nga ba de bzhin nyid gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid/ rnam pa bzhin du mi 'gyur ste/ de'i phyir
67a4('bum): byang chub ces bya'o// rab 'byor de 'di ltar yang / 'di lta ste/ byang chub ces bya ba 'di ni/ mying dang mtshan ma tsam ste/ de'i phyir byang chub ces bya'o// rab 'byor de yang 'di ltar yang
67a5('bum): dag pa'i don ni// byang chub ces don to// rab 'byor yang 'di ltar de ni sangs rgyas me de ni chos thams cad mying dang mtshan matsam du rtogs par byed po ste/ de'i phyir byang chub ces bya'o// 
67a6('bum): rab 'byor yang 'di ltar dbyer myed pa'i don ni byang chub kyi don do// rab 'byor yang 'di ltar de ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi byang chub ste/ de'i phyir byang chub ces bya'o// rab 'byor yang 'di ltar don
67a7('bum): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pas na/ de'i phyir byang chub ces bya'o// gsol dpa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang byang chub 'dis
67a8('bum): spyod pa dang / pha rol tu phyind pa drug la spyod pa dang / stong pa nyid thams cad la spyod pa dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum bcu rtsa bdun la spyod pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa dang / bsam gtan dang / 
67b1('bum): tshad myed pa dang / gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / rnam par thar brgyad dang / mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smond pa myed
67b2('bum): ba dang / mngon par shes pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs kyi sgo dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang / myi 'jigs pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa la
67b3('bum): spyod pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar la spyod pa'i dge' ba'i rtsa ba de gang dang gang tshogs su 'gyur ba dang / 'grib pa 'am/ 'gong ba dang / 'phel ba'am/ skye ba'am/ 'gag pa 'am/ 
67b4('bum): kun nas nyon mongs pa 'am/ rnam par byang bar 'gyur / lags bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor nga byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang byang chub 'di la
67b5('bum): spyod pa dang / pha rol tu phyind pa drug la spyod pa dang stong pa nyid thams cad la spyod pa dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos/ sum bcu rtsa bdun la spyod pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden
67b6('bum): ba dang / bsam gtan dang / chad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / rnam par thard pa dang / mthar kyis gan sa pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / stong pa nyid dang
67b7('bum): mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa dang / mngon par shes pa dang / ting nge 'dzind dang / gzungs gi sgo dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang / myi 'jigs pa dang / so so yang dag par rig
67b8('bum): ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa la spyod pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar la spyod pa de la/ chos gang yang tshogs su 'gyur ba dang / 'grib pa dang / 'gong pa dang / 'phel ba dang / 
68a1('bum): skye ba 'am/ 'gag pa 'am/ kun nas nyon mongs pa 'am/ rnam par byang bar 'gyur ba gang yang myed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rolapa/ 
68a2('bum): tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i/ byang chub sems dpa' ni chos gang yang tshogs su 'gyur ba 'am/ 'grib par 'gyur ba 'am/ 'gong bar 'gyur ba 'am/ 'phel nga bar bya ba 'am/ skye bar bya ba 'am/ 'gag par bya ba
68a3('bum): 'am/ kun nas nyon mongs par bya ba 'am/ rnam par byang bar bya ba'i phyir de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis nye bar gnas pa ma yin no// gsol da pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ltar gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
68a4('bum): bo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i byang chub kyi chos gang yang tshogs su 'gyur ba 'am/ 'grib par 'gyur ba 'am/ 'gong bar bgyi ba 'am/ 'phel bar bgyi ba 'am/ skye bar bgyi ba 'am/ 'gag par
68a5('bum): bgyi ba 'am/ kun nas nyon mongs par bgyi ba 'am/ rnam par byang bar bgyi ba'i slad du dmyigs pa'i tshul gis nye bar gnas pa ma lags/ na/ bcom ldan 'das 'o na ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' ses
68a6('bum): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ ji ltar sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su 'dzind par gyurd/ ji ltar tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / 
68a7('bum): brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang / bsam gtan gi pha rol tu phyind pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur ba/ ji ltar nang stong pa nyid la spyod par 'gyur/ ji ltar dngos po myed pa'i ngog
68a8('bum): nyid kyi bar la spyod par 'gyur// ji ltar dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang / yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul dgi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa
68b1('bum): la spyod par 'gyur/ ji ltar 'phags pa'i bden pa dang / bsam gtan dang / chad myed pa dang / gzugs skyed pa'i snyoms par 'dug pa dang / rnam par tharang pa dang / mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa
68b2('bum): dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma skyed pa dang / ston pa myed pa dang / mngon par shes pa dang / ting nge 'dzind dang / gzungs gi sgom skyed par 'gyur/ ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang / myi 'jigs pa dang
68b3('bum): sposo yang dag par rig pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa la spyod par 'gyur/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpa'i sa bcu la spyod par 'gyur// ji ltar nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyis las 'du' bar 'gyur
68b4('bum): ji ltar byang chub sems dpa'i skyon ma mchis par 'jug par 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsam ba/ rab 'byor byang chub sas dadapa' sems dpa' chen po la ni gnyis su spyod pa'i dri myed de/ 
68b5('bum): rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni gnyis kyis sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la myi spyod do// gnyis kyis tshul khris kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzang ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / 
68b6('bum): brtson 'grus kyi pha rol su phyind pa dang / bsam gtan ga pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha ro ldang du phyin pa la myi spyod do/ sa kyis nang stong pa nyid la myi spyod do// gnyis kyis dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid
68b7('bum): kyi bar la myi spyod do// gnyis kyis dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang / yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrulang gi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la
68b8('bum): myi spyod do// gnyis gis 'phags pa'i bden pa dang / bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / rno bar thar pa dang / mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / 
69a1('bum): stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smond pa myed pa dang / mngon par shes pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / gzugs kyi sgo // gnyis kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang / myi 'dzin
69a2('bum): pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa la spyod do// gnyis kyis rna ba thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar la myi spyod do// gsol pa bcom ldan 'das gal te de ltar gnyis kyis
69a3('bum): sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa la myi spyod do// gnyis gis tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa la dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang / bsam gtan gi pha rol
69a4('bum): tu phyind pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gnyis kyis stong pa nyid thams cad dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum bcu rtsa bdun la myi spyod do// gnyis kyis 'phags pa'i
69a5('bum): bden pa dang / bas gtan dang / chad med pa dang / gzugs myeng pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / rnam par thar pa dang / mthar kyis gnas par snyoms par 'jug pa dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / 
69a6('bum): smond pa myed pa dang / mngon par shes pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs kyi sgo la mi spyod/ gnyis kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang / myi 'jigs pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres
69a7('bum): bal myi spyod/ gnyis kyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar la myi spyod na/ 'o na de ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dge ba'i rtsa ba mang po rnam par 'phel bar 'gyur bas/ sems dang po skyed pa nas s+ho/ 
69a8('bum): bar bzung ste/ sems slad ma skyed pa'i bar du dge ba'i rtsa ba mang pos rnam par 'phel bar 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor su gang gnyis la spyod pa de dag ni dge ba'i rtsa ba rnam par 'phel bar myi 'gyur/ 
69b1('bum): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor dbyis pa so so'i skye bo thams cad ni gnyis la rten pa ste/ de dag ni dge ba'i rtsa bas rnam par myi 'phel lo// byang chub sems dpa' ses dpa' chen po ni gnyis la myi spyod do// de ni sems dngos
69b2('bum): skyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/ sems phyi ma bskyed pa'i bar du dge ba'i rtsa bas rnam par 'phel te/ de ni lha dang / myi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gis myi dge ba'i rtsa ba gang gis nyams smras pa/ nyin thos kyi sa 'am/ rang
69b3('bum): sangs rgyas kyisar ltung bar 'gyur ba 'am/ myi dga' ba'i chos gzhag gis yong su 'phrogs par gyur cing / de dag gis yong su 'phrogs pas/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod na/ dge ba'i rtsa ba mang pos rna par myi 'phel ba dang / 
69b4('bum): tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa/ dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gi pha rol tu phyi ngan pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod na// dge ba'i rtsa ba ma
69b5('bum): bos rna bar myi 'phel ba dang / nang stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / dngos po med / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar la spyod na/ dge ba'i rtsa ba mang pos rna bar myi 'phel ba dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang / yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul
69b6('bum): ginang pa dang / bang po dang / stongs dang / byang chub kyi sanas ga dang / 'phags pa'i la yan ma gargya pa la spyod no// deg pa'i rtsa ba mang pos rnapa myi 'phel ba dang / 'bag pa'i bden pa dang / khas tan dang / chad med pa dang / gzugs myed pa rnam
69b7('bum): yang 'jug pa dang / rna bar thar pa dang / mthar kyis gnas pa'i smos par 'jug pa dang / slong pa nyid dang mtsham myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa dang / mngon par shes pa dang / ting nge 'idzin dang / gzungs gi sno / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stongs dang / mi rigs pa
69b8('bum): saso yang dag par rig pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos 'dres pa la spyod na dge ba'i rtsa ba mang pos rje bar tI phel ba dang / rna ba thas cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar la spyod na/ rke ba'i rtsa ba mang pos rna bar myi 'phel ba de ltar nyes smad par myi nuso// sa khyor byang chub seMs dang seMs rab chen kha gas
70a1('bum): marang ba la spyad bar bya'o// gsol dang / bcom lda 'das ci lags/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' rjen thos ngan pa'i rnarnams kyi drang du shes rab kyi romang tu phyi dang / 
70a2('bum): ga smras mengs pa sems pa chen pa dag 'dzus kyi shes pa kyi pong khyod pa
70a3('bum): dge po'i rtse brnams kyi phyir yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la myi spyod do// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la bsnyen bkur ma byas/ dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su rdzogs par ma byas/ dge ba'i bshes
70a4('bum): gnyen rnams yong su ma bzung bar/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen da pa nyid thob par mi nus so// grasol pa bcom ldan 'das/ ji ltar sangs rgyas bcom
70a5('bum): ldan 'das rnams la bsnyen bkur bgyis pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa bas yongs su bzung ba dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen gis yongasum bzung ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ 
70a6('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid thob par 'gyur ba lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/ 
70a7('bum): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la bsnyen bkur byed/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag mdo dang dbyangs kyis bsnyad pa dang / lung du bstand pa dang / tshigs su bcad pa dang / ched du brjod pa dang / gleng bzhi dang / 
70a8('bum): 'dri lUr+ya 'drasa? pra dAd+ba k+Sha sgres dra'i rAb s+yA dAng D+ha shAn+didA tu r+b+hasgo byA drung tA rgyos rgyud du byung ba dang Tu n+dog+sas pU byAd+d+ho pa rang / d+hAr+N+Nan+ma lpA prAb+da b+h+ra d+hAs+yAn+d+ha pA g+hang+tha n+ti grA sa?ng+yas klu de dgra thAm+ba sA ts+tshad smongas+ya 'ad+d+hi nAd t+yo/ yongasu bzung nas
70a9('bum): gri'i semase dpe'i sas si pe'i chen pos sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'dis la bstan po kri ba rgya slon dag pa'i rnga nas gnyin lo ba~M sa~M ni bair bgyis kyang rje mi 'i thems cing mo khyin de pa nya dbab par bya'i gyu
70b1('bum): dag par rig pa la bskyed pa la bskyed pas/ de'i tshe rnam par 'phos kyang chos de dag rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi rab tu thob par gyur kyi bar du nam yang chud za bar myi 'gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom
70b2('bum): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag gis yongasasu bzung nas/ nam yang ngan song dang / myi khom par skye bar myi 'gyur ro// dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag gis kyang
70b3('bum): lus yongs su dag pa yong su 'dzin to// lus de dag gis kyang sangs rgyas kyi zhing yong su dag par byed do// sems can rnams yongasu sbyinang par byeda'o// de dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag gis yongasu bzung / 
70b4('bum): bas kyang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rna mas dang / byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams dang / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang kyi theg pa pa'i legs pa ston pa de dag dang / 
70b5('bum): nam du yang bral bar myi 'gyur ro// rab 'byor 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod pas/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la bsnyen bkur bar bya'o// dge
70b6('bum): ba'i rtsa ba rnams bskyed par bya'o// dge' ba'i bshes gnyen rnams la bsten par bya'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa stong phrag nyi shu lnga pa lasale'u lnga bcu rtsa lnga pa'o// 
70b7('bum): de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor kyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams
71a1('bum): la bsnyen bkur myi bgyid/ dge ba'i rtsa ba yong su rdzogs par myi bgyid la/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen gis kyang yongasu ma bzung bar gyur nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams/ 
71a2('bum): cad mkhyend pa nyid thob par myi 'gyur ram/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang gas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la bsnyen bkur ma byas/ dge ba'i
71a3('bum): rtsa ba yongasu rdzogs par ma byas pa la/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen gis yongasu ma bzung bar / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ba nyid do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la bsnyen bkur yang byas
71a4('bum): dge ba'i rtsa ba yang yongasu rdzogs par byas/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen la yang bsnyen pa yang byas kyang / da dung rnam pa thams cad ma da khye nad pa nyid thob par myo nus na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams/ 
71a5('bum): la bsnyen bkur ma byas/ dge ba'i rtsa ba yong su rdzogs par ma/ byas// dge ba'i bshes gnyen la bsnyen bkur ma byas pa rnams/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ba lta ci smos te/ de na
71a6('bum): gnas myedado// rab 'byor de de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byang chub sems dpa'i mying bden pa la gnas par 'dod pa dang / myur du bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par
71a7('bum): 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pas/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la bsnyen bkur bya'o// dge ba'i rtsa ba mang po bskyed par bya'o// dge ba'i bshes gnyen la bsten par bya'o// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci'i sring
71a8('bum): du byang chu sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la bstan bkur bgyis pa dge ba'i bzhes gnyen pa bsten par bgyis kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par myi 'gyur/ 
71b1('bum): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de ni thabs mkhas pa dang myi ldan pa'i phyir te/ des sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag las thabs de thob par ma gyur pa'i phyir/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de lta bu yang ma bskyed/ 
71b2('bum): gang de la thabs ston pa'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen de lta bu dag la yang ma bsten par/ de ltar thob par myi 'gyur ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thabs mkhas pa gang dang
71b3('bum): ldan pas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ba'i thabs mkhas pa de gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems dang po bskyed nas/ 
71b4('bum): nye bar bzung ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams dang / nyan thos dang / 
71b5('bum): myi dang myi ma yin par gyur pa rag la/ sbyin pa yongasasu gtong ste/ de rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba// de lta ldan pas/ sbyin pa yang sbyin pa'i 'du shesu myi 'gyur/ len pa
71b6('bum): yang len pa'i 'du shes su myi 'gyur/ gtong ba la yang gtong ba'i 'du shes su myi 'gyur ro// de ni 'di ltar chos thams cad rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong par shes shing / thams cad myed na pa dang / ma byung ba dang / yongs su ma
71b7('bum): rdzogs pa dang / mngon par ma grub par mthong zhing chos rnams kyi mtshan nyid la 'jug na yang chos thams cad ni nus pa gang yang myed pa'o zhes bya bar 'du byed myed pa'i mtshan nyid kyis 'jug pa ste/ de thabs mkhas pa de dang ldan
71b8('bum): pas na/ dge ba'i rtsa bas rnam par 'phel bar/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod de/ de sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod cing / sems can rnams yongasu sbyinang par byed/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yong su dag par byed kyang
72a1('bum): gzhan du ni sems can thams cad yongasu bsgrub pa dang / sems can yongs su sbyin par bya ba'i phyir/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ma rtogs par/ sbyin pa'i 'bras bu gang 'khor bar yongasu sud/ 
72a2('bum): par bya ba de lta bu'i 'bras bu la smon pa myed do// / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa stong phrag nyi shu lnga pa las/ le'u lnga bcu rtsa drug pa'o// 
72a3('bum): rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/ 
72a4('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la byangs tshul khrims srung ste/ de la 'dod chags kyi sems sgrib par phyi 'gyur/ zhe sdang sgrib par myi 'gyur/ gti mug sgrib par myi 'gyur/ bag la nyam
72a5('bum): bsgrib par myi 'gyur/ kun nas ldang ba sgrib par myi 'gru te/ myi ga pa'i chos gzhan byang chub kyi gegs su 'gyur ba 'di la ste ser snga'am/ tshul khrims ngan pa'am/ 'khrug pa'i semamasan
72a6('bum): le lo'i sems sam/ brtson 'grus chung ba'i sems sam/ g.yeng ba'i sems sam/ shes rab 'chal ba'i sems sam nga rgyal lam/ brnyas pa 'am/ che ba'i nga rgyal lam/ nga ring
72a7('bum): rgyal lam/ nyan thos kyi sems sam/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sems dag kyang sgrib par myi 'gyur/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor de ni 'di ltar chos thams cad rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong par shes shing / chos
72a8('bum): thams cad myed pa dang / ma byung ba dang / yongs su ma rdzogs pa dang / mngon par ma grub par mthong ste/ chos rnams kyi chos kyi mtshan nyid la 'jug na yang / chos thams cad ni nus pa gang yang myed pa'o zhes
72b1('bum): bya bar 'du byed pa'i mtshan nyid kyis 'jug pa ste/ de thabs mkhas pa de lta bu dang ldan pas na/ dge ba'i rtsa ba rnam par 'phel bas tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod de/ de tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa la spyod cing
72b2('bum): sems can rnams yongasu sbyind par byed/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yong su dag par byed kyang / gzhan du ni sems can thams cad yongasu bskyab pa dang / sems can yongasu sbyin par bya ba'i phyir/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu/ 
72b3('bum): phyind pa la spyod pa ma gtogs par/ tshul khrims kyi 'ang/ sa bu gang 'khor ba las yongs su spyad par bya ba de lta bu'i 'bras bu la so/ dran pa myed do// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems
72b4('bum): dpa' chen po/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa 'itshe/ sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/ rnam pa tham/ sa cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la byas pas bzod pa bsgom
72b5('bum): ste/ de la 'dod chags kyi sems sgrib par myi 'gyur/ zhe sdang sgrub par myi 'gyur/ gti mug sgrib par myi 'gyur/ bag la nyal sgrib par myi 'gyur/ kun nas ldang ba sgrib par myi 'gyur te/ myi dge ba'i chos gzhan
72b6('bum): byang chub kyi gegasu gyur pa 'di lta ste/ ser sA dang / tshul khrims ngan pa 'am/ 'khrug pa'i sems sam/ le lo'i sems sam/ brtson 'grus chung ba'i sems sam g.yeng ba'i sems sam/ shes rab 'chal ba'i seMs
72b7('bum): sam/ nga rgyal gi sems lam/ brnyas pa 'am/ che ba'i nga rgyal lam/ nga'i nga rgyal lam/ nyan thos kyi sems sam/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sems dag kyang sgrib par myi 'gyu ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byorang
72b8('bum): de ni 'di ltar chos thams cad rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong par shes shing chos thams cad myed pa dang / ma byung ba dang / yong su ma rdzogs pa dang / mngon par ma grub par mthong ste/ chos rnams kyi chos kyi mtshan nyid la 'jug na
73a1('bum): yang chos thams cad ni nus pa gang yang myed pa'o zhes bya bar 'du byed myed pa'i mtshan nyid kyis 'jug pa ste/ de thabs mkhas pa de lta bu dang ldan pas ma/ dge ba'i rtsa bas rnam par 'phel bar bzod
73a2('bum): ba'i pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod de de bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod cing / sems can rnams yongasu sbyin par byed/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed kyang / sems can yongasu bskyang ba dang / 
73a3('bum): sems can rnams yongasu sbyinang par bya ba'i phyir/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa ma gtogs par bzod pa'i pha ro lad tu phyind pa'abras bu gang 'khor bar yongasu spyad par bye ba de lta bu'i 'bras bu
73a4('bum): la smon pa myed do// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/ 
73a5('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas brtson 'grus rtsom ste/ de 'dod chags kyi sems sgrib par myi/ 'gyur/ zhe sdang sgrib par myi 'gyur/ gti mug sgrib
73a6('bum): par myi 'gyur/ bag la nyal ba sgrib par myi 'gyur/ kun nas ldang ba sgrib par myi 'gyur/ dge ba'i chos gzhan byang chub kyi gegs su 'gyur ba 'di lta ste/ DAser sna 'am/ tshul khrims ngan pa 'am
73a7('bum): 'khrug pa'i sems sam/ le lo'i sems sam// brtson 'grus chung ba'i sems sam/ g.yeng ba'i sems sam/ shes rab 'chal pa'i sems sam/ nga rgyal lam banasA pa 'am/ che ba'i nga rgyal lam/ 
73a8('bum): nga ri nga rgyal lam/ nyan thos kyi sems sam/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sems ngag kyang sgrib par myi 'gyuraro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor de de ni 'di ltar chos thams cad rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong par shes shing / 
73b1('bum): chos thams cad myed pa dang / ma byung ba dang / yongs su ma rdzogs pa dang / mngon par ma grub par mthong ste/ chos rnams kyi chos nyid kyi mtshan nyid la 'jug na yang / chos thams cad ni nus pa gang yang myed pa'o zhes/ 
73b2('bum): khya bar 'du byed myed pa'i mtshan nyid kyis 'jug ste/ de thabs mkhas pa de lta bu dang ldan pas na/ dge ba'i rtsa bas rnam pa 'phel bar brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin bu ma spyong do// de brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu/ 
73b3('bum): byin pa la spyod cing / sems can yongasu sbyin par byed/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongasu dag par byed kyang gzhan dun/ sems can thams cad yongs su bsgrub pa dang / sems cin yongasu sbyin par bya ba'i phyir/ bcom drun
73b4('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa ma rtogs par/ brtson 'grus kyi/ bras bu gang 'khor bar yongasu spyad par bya ba de'i 'bras bu la smon pa myed rab 'byor nga gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems
73b5('bum): dpa' chen po/ bsam tan gi pha rol tu phyinang pa la spyod pa'i sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ bsam tan rnams la
73b6('bum): rnams par 'jug se de dag la 'dod chags kyi sems sgrib par gyi 'gyur/ zhe sang gi sems sgrib par gyi 'gyur/ gti mug gi sems sgrib par gyi mabu ro/ khrag 'tshal ba sgrib par gyi 'gyur/ gan ras yang bsri
73b7('bum): par myi 'gyur te myi dge pa'i chos gzhan byang chub kyi gegs su 'gyur ba 'di la ste/ ser snga'am tshul khrims ngan pa'am/ 'khrug pa'i sems sa su le lo'i sems sam/ brtson 'grus chung ba'i sems sam/ 
73b8('bum): g.yeng ba'i sems sam shes rab 'argyal ba'i sems sas su nga rgyal lam/ brnyas pa'am/ che ba'i rabasang rgyal lam/ ngaring rgyal lam/ nyan thos kyi sems sarba/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sems ngag kyang sgrib par
74a1('bum): myi 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di ltar chos thams cad rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong par shes shing / chos thams cad myed pa dang / ma byung ba dang / yong su ma rdzogs pa dang / mngon par ma grub par/ 
74a2('bum): mthong ste/ chos rnams kyi chos nyid kyi mtshan nyid la 'jug na yang / chos thams cad ni nus pa gang yang myong // zhes bya bar 'du byed pa'i mtshan nyid kyis 'jug ste/ de thabs mkhas pa de lta bu dang ldan pas na/ dge ba'i rtsa bas
74a3('bum): rnam par 'phel bas/ bsam rten gi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod de/ de bsam tan gi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod cing / sems can rnams yong su smin par byed/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yong su dag par byed kyang / gzhan du na
74a4('bum): sems can thams cad yongs su bskyab pa dang / sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir/ bsamartan gi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa ma rtogs par bsam tan gi 'bras bu gang 'khor bar yongs su
74a5('bum): spyad par bya ba de lta bu'i 'bras bu la smon pa myed// rab 'byor gnan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/ 
74a6('bum): rnam pa mas cad byen pa'i dang ldan pa'i 'di 'a byung sa shes rab banom ste/ de la 'dod chags kyi sems sgrib par gyi 'gyur/ nisang sgri par gyi 'gyur/ gti drug sgripa par 'gyur/ bag la bsgrib par gyi
74b1('bum): 'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor de ni 'di ltar chos thams cad rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong par shes shing / chos thams cad myed pa dang / ma byung ba dang / yongasu ma rdzogs pa dang / mngon par ma grub par mthong ste/ chos rnams kyi chos kyi mtshan
74b2('bum): nyid la 'jug na yang / chos thams cad ni nus pa gang yang myed pa'o zhes bya bar 'du byed myed pa'i mtshan nyid kyis 'jug ste/ de thabs mkhas pa de lta bu dang ldan pas na dge ba'i thabs rnam par 'phel bar shes rab kyi
