74b3('bum): rol tu phyind pa la spyod de/ de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'o// sems can rnams yongs su sbyinang par byed/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongasu dag par byed kyang gzhan du na sems can thams cad yongasu bskya
74b4('bum): ba dang / sems can rnams yongasu smind par bya ba'i phyir shes rab kyi phra rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ma rtogs par shes rab kyi 'bras bu gang 'khor bar yongs su spyad par bya ba de lta bu'i 'bras bu smon pa myed pa'o// 
74b5('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa stong phrag nyi shu lnga pa las// / le'u lnga bcu rtsa bdun pa'o// / rab 'byor nga gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' ses
74b6('bum): dpa' chen po/ bsam tan dang po la snyoms par 'jug pa dang / bsam tan gnyis pa la snyoms par 'jug pa dang / bsam rten gsum pa la snyoms par 'jug pa dang / bsam nyan bzhi pa la snyoms par 'jug pa
74b7('bum): dang / tshad myed pa dang / gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa la snyoms par 'jug kyang / de dag gi rnam par smin pa yong su myi 'dzin to// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar de ni thabs mkhas pa dang ldan pa yin te/ thabs
74b8('bum): mkhas pa dang ldan pa des bsam rten dang / tshad myed pa dang / gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gi rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong par shes so// myed pa dang / ma byung ba dang / yongs su ma rdzogs pa dang / mngon par
75a1('bum): ma grub par sheso// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/ thabs mkhas pa dang ldan pas mthong ba dang / bsgom byas spang ba'i
75a2('bum): lam la spyod kyang / rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob par myi byed/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid thob par myi byed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar de ni chos
75a3('bum): thams cad rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong bar shes chos thams cad med pa dang / ma byung ba dang / yong su ma rdzogs pa dang / mngon par ma grub par shes te/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos de dag la spyod cing / nyar thos kyis dang / 
75a4('bum): rang sangs rgyas kyi sa las yongasu 'das te/ rab 'byor de 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i myi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa'o// rab 'byor de gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes/ 
75a5('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam par tha rad pa brgya da la snyoms par 'jug pa/ mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'a// drug pa dgu la snyoms par 'jug kyang / rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu
75a6('bum): thos par myi byed/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid dang / rang byang chub thob par myi byed de ci'i phyir zhen/ 'di ltar de na chos thams cad rang gi mtshan nyid kyis
75a7('bum): song bar ni'o// chos bams sa skyed pa dang / ma byung bar gso chos thams cad stong panyid yong su ma rdzogs pa shes so// chos thams pad mngon par mgrub par shes so// rab 'byor gzha yang byang chub sems da'
75a8('bum): dpa' chen po de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la yongs su 'dris par byed/ mI 'jigs pa bzhi dang / soso yang dag par rig pa bzhil 'dris par byed/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la yongasu 'dris par byed/ 
75b1('bum): byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po la yong su 'dris par byed kyang / nam sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par ma gyur kyang / sems can rnams yongasu sbyin par ma gyur gyi bar du/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid tho
75b2('bum): par myi byed// rab 'byor de de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod par bya'o// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de lta bu'i chos
75b3('bum): zab mo dag kyang spyod kyang / rnam par smin pa yong su myi 'dzin pa ni blo dam pa lagaso// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang de lta bu
75b4('bum): 'i chos zab mo dag la spyod cing / rnam par sbyin pa yongasu myi 'dzin pa ni blo ngas pa dang ldan pa'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor de ni 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ngob
75b5('bum): nyid las myi g.yo'o// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'adz+ra gang las myi g.yo ba lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dngos po myed pa las myi g.yo ba yin te/ rab 'byor dgang yang / 
75b6('bum): 'di skad du ngo bo nyid gang las myi g.yo zhes zer ba ni/ gzugs kyi ngo bo nyid las myi g.yo'o// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa'i ngo bo nyid las myi g.yor 'o// skye mched dang / khams dang / 
75b7('bum): rten cing 'dral bar 'gyur ba'i ngo bo nyid las myi g.yo'o// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i ngo bo nyid las myi g.yo'o// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol
75b8('bum): tu phyin pa dang / bsam tan gi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ngo bo nyid las myi g.yo'o// nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid las myi g.yo'o dngos po myed
76a1('bum): pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi bar stong pa nyid kyi bar du ngo bo nyid las myi g.yo'o// bras ma tan dang / tshad myed pa dang / gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i ngo bo nyid las myi g.yo'o// dran pa nye bar
76a2('bum): gzhag pa dang / yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i ngo bo nyid las myi g.yo'o// 
76a3('bum): 'phags pa'i bden pa'i ngo bo nyid las myi g.yo'o// stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin dang / mtshan ma myed pa'i ting nge 'dzind dang / smon pa myed pa'i ting nge 'dzin kyi ngo bo nyid las myi g.yo'o// rnam par thar pa
76a4('bum): brgyad dang / mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / mngon par shes pa dang / ting 'dzin dang / gzungs kyi sgo'i ngo bo nyid las myi g.yo'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang
76a5('bum): myi 'jigs pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa dang / sa// ngas rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa'i ngo bo nyid las myi g.yo'o// byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po'i ngo bo nyid las myi g.yo'o// de ci'i phyir/ 
76a6('bum): zhe na/ rab 'byor de ni 'di ltar chos 'di dag gi ngo bo nyid gang yin pa de ni dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid/ rab 'byor dngos po myed pa ni dngos po myed pa'i mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar myi nus so// gsol pa/ bcom
76a7('bum): ldan 'das ci lags/ dngos po mamachis pas dngos po ma mchis pa mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bgyi bar nus sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ni ma yin no// gsol pa 'on
76a8('bum): dngos po ma mchis pas dngos po ma mchis pa mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar nus sam bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor nga de ni ma yin no// gsol pa 'o na dngos po ma mchis sam/ dngos po
76b1('bum): mchos pa mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bgyi bar nus sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsa la pa/ rab 'byor de ni ma yin no// gsolang pa 'o na dngos po ma mchis pas dngos po ma mchis pa mngon par/ 
76b2('bum): rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bgyi bar nus sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ni ma yin no// gsol pa bcom ldan 'das 'on gal te de ltar dngos po ma mchis pas dngos po ma mchis pa mngon
76b3('bum): bar rtogs par myi 'gyur / dngos po ma mchis pas kyang ngos po mchis pa mngon par rtogs par myi 'gyur/ dngos po mchis pas kyang dngos po mchis pa mngon par rtogs par myi 'gyur/ dngos po ma mchis
76b4('bum): kyang dngos po mya mchis pa mngon par rdzogs par myi 'gyur na rkang bcom ldan 'das de'i slad du thob pa ma mchis shing mngon par rtogs pa ma mchis pa 'am/ gcig tu myi 'gyur ram/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
76b5('bum): sAlang pa/ mngon par rtogs pa ni yod myed pa ni ma yin te/ bzhi pos mngon par bsgrub pa de lta bus ni ma yin// gso/ lang pa bcom ldan 'das 'o na mngon par rtogs par 'gyur ba jil bu
76b6('bum): zhig mchis/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsalang pa/ gang la dngos po yang myed pa yang myed dngos po myed pa yang ma yin pa de lta bu ni mngon por rtogs pa ste/ de la spyod pa de dag kyang myed pas spros pa myed cing spros pa/ 
76b7('bum): myed pa dang bral ba ni mngon par rtogs pa'o// gsol pa bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpal chen po'i spros pa gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gzugs rtag ces bya ba 'am/ myi rtag ces
76b8('bum): bya ba ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i spros pa'o// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa rtag ces bya ba 'am myi rtag ces bya ba ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i spros pa'o// 
77a1('bum): gzugs bde zhes bya ba 'am/ sdug sngal zhes bya ba ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i spros pa'o// tshor ba dang 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa bde zhes bya ba 'am/ 
77a2('bum): sdug sngal zhes bya ba ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i spros pa'o// gzugs bdag ces bya ba'am/ bdag myed ces bya ba ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i spros pa'o// tshor
77a3('bum): ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa bdag ces bya ba dang / bdag myed ces bya ba ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i spros pa'o// gzugs zhi zhes bya ba 'am/ ma zhi
77a4('bum): zhes bya ba ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i spros dpa'o/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam pa/ dar shes pa zhi zhes bya ba'am/ ma zhi zhes bya ba ni byang chub
77a5('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i spros pa'o// gzugs yongasu shes pa dang / yongasu shes par bya ba ma yin zhes bya ba ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i spros pa'o// tshor ba
77a6('bum): dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa yongasu shes par bya ba dang / yongs su shes par bya ba ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i spros pa'o// skye mched dang / khams dang / rten
77a7('bum): cing 'brel bar 'byung ba rtag ces bya ba'am/ myi rtag ces bya ba'am/ bde zhes bya ba 'am/ sug sAl zhes bya ba dang / bdag ces bya ba dang / bdag myed ces bya ba dang / zhe zhes bya ba dang / ma ni zhes bya ba dang / 
77a8('bum): yongasu shes par bya ba dang / yongasu shes par bya ba ma yin zhes bya ba ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i spros pa'o// sdug sngal yongasu shes par bya'o zhes bya ba ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni
77b1('bum): so ro// na chu mas ma bya shis bya dang / 'dog pa nga tu ts+tsha sa bya ba dang / ramasam par bya nas bya ba byang chub sems dpa se mdapa chen pam lda ro// rol tu na pa / 
77b2('bum): srung bar bya nas bya ba ni byang chungs pa dada'i sems pa chen pa 'askos pa'o// nang song ba'i bsgom par bya'o zhes bya ba ni/ byed chub sems dpa sems dpa' chen pa nus par// ma po myed pa
77b3('bum): myong nga gro bar du thams par byar na byung cing chubasem pa sa pa dzin gyi gyula'o// na par gzhag pa zhid dang / yang das pa songan pa'i dang / rdzams gan pa dang / 
77b4('bum): nga po lnga dang / yongs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun da dang / 'dags pa'i las yan lag brgyad pa bsgom par bya'o zhes bya ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa 'a rtson pa'i smos pa'o// 
77b5('bum): ba'i bden pa pan dang / bsam nyan pani dang / tshang myed pa rno te dang / gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa
77b6('bum): dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa dang / mngon par shes pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs kyi sgo bsgom par bya'o zhes bya ba ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdom
77b7('bum): ba'o// d+hung tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu shes pa dang / mthong bas pal ste/ de las 'da' bar bya'o zhes bya ba ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i spros pa'o// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir myi'ong
77b8('bum): ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa dang / rang byang chub shes pa dang / mthong bas blta ste/ de las 'da' bar bya'o zhes bya ba ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i spros pa'o// byang chub sems dpa'i sa bcu yongasu
78a1('bum): rdzogs par bya'o zhes bya ba ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i spros pa'o// byang chub sems dpa'i skyon myed par 'jug par bya'o// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i spros pa'o// sangs/ 
78a2('bum): rgyas kyi zhing yongasu dag par bya'o// zhes bya ba dang / sems can rnams yongasu sbyin par bya'o zhes bya ba ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i spros pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu bskyed par bya'o zhes bya ba dang / 
78a3('bum): myi 'jigs pa bzhi bskyed par bya'o zhes bya ba dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi bskyed par bya'o zhes bya ba dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po bskyed par bya'o zhes bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco skyed
78a4('bum): bar bya'o zhes bya ba ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i spros pa'o// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par bya'o zhes bya ba ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i spros pa'o// bag chags kyi
78a5('bum): mtshams sbyor ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad spang bar bya'o// ne/ sa bya ba ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i spros pa'o// do rje/ sa na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po// shes rab
78a6('bum): kyi sa ro khong du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gzugs dag pa dang / mu~M tag ces bya bar myi sgri ba 'gro bar myi byed// bde ba dang sdug sngal zhes bya ba dang / bdag dang bdag srid ces bya ba dang / ni ba dang ma ni zhes bya ba ni/ yongs
78a7('bum): sa pa bya dadu/ gas par byabs yi shes byar gyi pa bar bye / tshor ba dang jushes dang / 'a bye nga / yu pa shes pa cag cis bya ma byed ga ces bya sa yini nas byar
78a8('bum): bar byed // 'de ba dang drug pa zhes bya ba dang / bladag byed ces bya ba dang / ba zhizhis bya ba dang / 'angs sugs par bya ba dang / songs dugs par bya pa 'i zhes byapang gyi sgo 'tho byeng ngo // skye ched/ 
78b1('bum): dang / ma ma dang / rten cing 'brel bapar byung zhag pa dang / byita ga ces bya ba 'ang / bde nas kyang mug snga la zhes bya dang / bdag nga bdag byed sa bya ba dang / nib dang / ma zhi zhes bya ba dang / yong su shes par bya ba dang / 
78b2('bum): yongasu shes par bya ba ma yin zhes bya bar myi spro ba 'phro bar myi byed do// pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum bcu rtsa bdun rtag pa dang / mye tog ces bya ba dang / 
78b3('bum): bde zhes bya ba dang / sngag sAl zhes bya ba dang / byadag myed ces bya ba dang / zhi ba dang / ma zhi zhes bya ba dang / yongs su shes par bya ba dang / yongs su shes par bya ba ma yin zhes bya bar myi spro ba 'phro bar myi byed do// 'phagra/ 
78b4('bum): pa'i bden pa dang / bsam rtan dang / chang myed pa dang / gzugs kyi dzad pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar kyis gang nas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang mtshan
78b5('bum): ma myed pa dang / smon ba myed pa dang / mngon par shes pa dang / ting 'dzin dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams bsgom par bya'o zhes bya bar myi slo bar myi byeng// rkyen tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang / lan cig phyir/ 
78b6('bum): 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa dang / rang byang chub shes pa dang / mthong bas blta ste/ de las 'da' bar bya'o zhes bya bar myi spro ba 'phro bar myi byed do// byang chub sems dpa' sa
78b7('bum): bcu yongs su rdzogs par bya'o zhes bya bar myi spro ba 'gro bar myi byed do// byang chub sems dpa'i skyon myed par 'jug par bya'o zhes bya bar myi spro ba 'phro bar myi byed do// sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongasasu dag par bya'o zhes bya ba dang / 
78b8('bum): sems can rnams yongasu sbyin par bya'o zhes bya bar myi spro ba 'phro bar myi byed do// de bzhini gshegs pa'i stobs bcu bskyed par bya'o zhes bya bar myi spro ba 'gro bar myi byed do// myi 'jigs pa bzhi bskyed par bya'o zhes bya bar myi slo ba 'an
79a1('bum): bar myi byed do// so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi bskyed par bya'o zhes bya bar myi spro ba 'phro bar myi byed do// byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po bskyed par bya'o zhes bya bar myi spro ba 'phro bar myi byed/ 
79a2('bum): sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad bskyed par bya'o zhes bya bar myi spro 'phro bar myi byed do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do// zhes bya bar myi spro ba 'phro bar mya byed/ bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor
79a3('bum): ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad spang bar bya'o zhes bya ba myi spro ba 'phro bar myi byed// de ci'i phyir zhes/ ngo bo nyid ni ngo bo nyid 'phro bar myi byed/ dngos po myed pa yang dngos po myed pa 'phro bar myi byed/ ngo bo nyid dang dngos po myed par
79a4('bum): ma rtogs par chos gzhan gang 'phro bar byed pa 'am/ gang da la 'phro bar bya ba de lta bu gang yang myeng / rab 'byor de lta bas na gzugs da ni spror myed pa'o// tshor ba dang 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam
79a5('bum): par shes pa ni spror myed pa'o// skye mched dang khams dang rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba ni spror myed pa'o// pha rol tu phyind pa tham sa cad dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang / byang chub kyi phyogs
79a6('bum): kyi chos sum bcu rtsa bdun ni spror myed pa'o// 'phags pa'i bden pa dang / bsam rten dang / tshad myed pa dang / gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms
79a7('bum): par 'jug pa dang / stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa dang / mngon par shes pa dang / ting 'dzin dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams ni spror myed pa'o// rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu ni spror myed pa'o// 
79a8('bum): lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa ni sgor byed pa'o// ra byang chub ni snor myed pa'o// byang chub sems dpa'i sarnams ni spod myeng pa'o// byang chub sams dpa'i slong
79b1('bum): myed pa ni sprod myed pa'o// sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongasu spyon par bya ba ni spror myed pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / myi 'jigs pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa/ 
79b2('bum): bco brgyad ni slod byed pa'o// rnam pa thams sad sa khyen pa nyid smor byed pa'o// bgacags kyi mtshams sbyor ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad srung ba ni snor byed pa'o// rab 'byor do lang byang chub sems
79b3('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen pos spyor myed pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad par bya'o// rab 'byor nga 'di sar yang gzugs la rngo nying myong// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par zhes
79b4('bum): pa la ngo bo nyid myed/ skye mched dang / khams dang rten cing 'bral bar 'byung ba la ngo bo nyid myeng/ pha rol tu phyind pa thams cad dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang / byang chub kyi phyogs su bcu
79b5('bum): rtsa bdun la ngo bo nyid myed / 'phags pa'i bden pa dang bsam rten dang / tshad myed pa dang / gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / rnam par thar pa brgya dang / mthar kyis
79b6('bum): gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang smon pa myed pa dang / mngon par shes pa dang / ti 'dzin dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams la ngo bo nyid myed do// rdzun
79b7('bum): tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la ngo bo nyid meng// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid la ngo bo nyid myed do// rang byang chub la ngo bo nyid myong // byang chub
79b8('bum): la ngo bo nyid myed do// byang chub sems dpa'i sa rnams la ngo bo nyid myeng// byang chub sems dpa'i skyon myed pa la ngo bo nyid myed/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongasasu dag par bya ba dang / sems can rnams yongs
80a1('bum): myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / rnam par thar pa dang / mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / stong pa nyid da mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa dang / mngon par shes pa dang / 
80a2('bum): ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs kyi ston snor myed pa'o// d+hun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu ni sgor myed pa'o// lan cig phyir 'ong bu'i 'bras bu dang / phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras dang / dgra bcom pa nyid ni smor myed pa
80a3('bum): 'o// rang byang chub ni spror myed pa'o// byang chub sems dpa'i sa rnams ni smor myed pa'o// byang chub sems dpa'i skyon myeng ba ni spror myed pa'i/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yong su dag par bya ba dang / sems can yongasu
80a4('bum): smin par bya ba ni smad myong ba'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang / myi 'dzegs pa dang / sos yang dag par rig pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dros pa rnams ni sprir myed pa'o// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
80b1('bum): baniding sngor byed pa'o// rab 'byor de lar byang chu ba sems dpa'i sems dpa' chen po zhes rab kyis romang tu byin pa la spong ba ma/ byang chub sems dpa'i sgon byed pa la 'jug go// gsol pa/ bam ldang 'das gam nyid mtshan
80b2('bum): gangal yang ngo bo nyid daphyogs su mchis ra// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nyan thos kyi shul tam/ rang sangs rgyas kyi shul tam rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi shul tam/ chos gang gis byang chub sems dpa'i skyon ma mchis
80b3('bum): ra 'dag par 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsa la dang/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' chen pan/ nyan thos kyi 'am gas byang chub sems dpa'i skyon byed par 'jug/ rang sangs rgyas kyi lam gis byang chub sems dpa
80b4('bum): sems dpa' chen po'i skyon myed par 'jug/ byang chub sems da pa' sems dpa' chen po ni yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi lam gi das byang chub sems dpa'i skyon myed par 'jug/ rab 'byor 'di ltar byang chub
80b5('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni lam thams cad la bslabs ni nga/ byang chub sems dpa'i skyon myed par 'jug/ 'di lta ste dper na/ brgya nga pa'i chos thams cad bslabs shing yang dag pa'i skyon myed par 'jug ste/ 
80b6('bum): nam 'bras bu lam ma thub kyi bar du 'bras bu thob par myi byeng // rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang thams cad bsgrubs shing / byang chub sems dpa'i skyon myed par 'jug ste/ nam de rjel bu'i ting
80b7('bum): 'dzin thob par 'gyur gi bar du rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par myi byed// de ting nge 'dzin de thob ma thag tu skad cig dang ldan pa'i shes rab kyis/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byeda'o// gsol pa bcom ldan 'das gal te/ 
80b8('bum): de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos su lang thams cad yong su rdzogs par bgyis te/ byang chub sems dpa' skyon ma mchis par 'jug par bgyin/ bcom ldan 'das 'di par brgyad pa'i bul kyang gzhan/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i
81a1('bum): shul kyang gzhan/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i shul kyang gzhan/ phyir myi 'ong ba'i shul kyang gzhan/ dgra bcom pa'i shul kyang gzhan/ rang sangs rgyas kyi shug zhan/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
81a2('bum): dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi bul kyang gzhan te/ bcom ldan 'das gal te shul de dag gzhan ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shul thams cad yong su rdzogs par bgyis te/ byang chub sems
81a3('bum): dpa'i skyon ma mchis par 'jug par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shul thams kyang yongasu rdzogs par bgyi na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag brgyad
81a4('bum): pa phrul bsgrubs shing brgyad par myi 'gyur tapa/ mthong ba'i la bsgrubs shing rgyun tu zhugs par myi 'gyur tam/ brnam pa'i tshul bsgrubs shing ldan cig phyir 'ong bar zhugs pa'am/ lan cig phyir 'o
81a5('bum): par gyi 'gyur tam/ byad kyi'ong bar zugs pa ma/ myi 'o bar gyi 'gyur tam/ dgra bcom par myi 'gyur tam/ rang bangs kyi sa kyi nul bsgrug shing / sangs rgyas tshu 'gyur tam/ 
81a6('bum): mas kyang chu ma pa sems pa 'am / gyu ma ga // 
81b1('bum): bcom pa 'as des byang chub sems dpa' sengs dang chen pa 'thus bangs pa sa su rdzogs par bgyis zhing / byang chub sems dpa'i skyon ma mchis par 'jug par 'gyur ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ston ma mchis dang / 
81b2('bum): rlung nas/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ba par 'gyur ba dang / bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad song bar 'gyur ba ji ltar 'tshal bar bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' sal dab / rab 'byor da / 
81b3('bum): baning no// de de bzhin te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' cher po brgyad par gyur te/ rgyun tu rnags pa'i 'bras bu thob pa'am/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob pa'am/ phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob pa 'am/ 
81b4('bum): dgra bcom pa nyid thob pa'am/ rang byang chub thob par gyur na ma'i/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyon myed par 'dug pa'i gnas dang skabs myed/ de ni gnas ma yin// byang chub sems dpa'i skyon myed pa ma
81b5('bum): chung bar yang rnam thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par gyu rang pa'i gnas myong / rab 'byor 'on kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/ pha rol tu phyin
81b6('bum): ba drug la spyod pa'i tshe/ shes pa dang mthong bas sa brgyad las yongasu 'das te/ brgyad gang zhe na/ dkar po rnam par mthong ba'i sa dang / rigs kyis dang / brgyad pa'i sa dang / mthong ba'i dang / srabs pa'i sa dang / 'dod
81b7('bum): chags dang bral ba'i sa dang / byas pa rtogs pa'i sa dang / rang bya sangs rgyas kyi ste/ sa stonang pa brgyad po 'di dag las shes pa dang / mthong bas 'das nas lam ga rnam pa shes pa nyid kyis/ byang chub sems dpa'i skyon myed par 'jug
81b8('bum): byang chub sems dpa'i skyon myed par 'jugs nas/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes kyis/ bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad rab tu spong ngo // rab 'byor de la brgyad pa'i ye shes gang yin pa de yang
82a1('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bzod pa dang / rgun tu zhugs pa'i ye shes dang / DA spong ba gang yin pa de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bzod pa/ lan cig phyir 'ong bzhi
82a2('bum): ye shes dang / spong ba gang yin pa de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bzod pa/ phyir myi 'ong ba'i ye shes dang / spong ba gang yin pa de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dgra bcom pa'i ye shes/ 
82a3('bum): dang / spong ba gang yin pa de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyinang pa rang sangs rgyas kyi ye shes dang / spong ba gang yin pa de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bzod pa chen po/ 
82a4('bum): ste de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi lam yongasu rdzogs par byas shing / lam gi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi ye shes kyis byang chub sems dpa'i skyon myed par 'jug go// 
82a5('bum): byang chub sems dpa'i skyon myed par zhugs nas/ rnam pa thams cad/ mkhyend pa nyid kyis bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad rab tu spong ngo // rab 'byor de de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' ses
82a6('bum): dpa' chen po'i lam yongasu rdzogs par byas nas/ bla na myed pa yang de ga par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas shing // 'bras bu ltar sems can thams cad kyi nye bar 'tsho bar 'gyur ro// bam po drug pa
82a7('bum): bam po drug pa// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das gang nyan thos kyi thul dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi phul de dag las lam gyi rnam pa shes/ 
82a8('bum): padang / ma par dag par sdub par byas/ des lam girnas pa shes pa nyi rnam par dag pa ni nam pa gang dang gang / mtshan ma gang dang / gang gas lam du nga ba dag dang / chus dag pa mtshan ma dadag kyang chubs
82b1('bum): sems dpa' chen pos mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bya ba dang / mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ ci nas kyang gzhan gis shes par 'gyur ba dang / bstan pa dang bshad pa dang / gdags pa dang / rnam par dgod pa ste/ de la
82b2('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sgra brnyan lta bur shes par bya ba'i don du sgra skad dang brdar bya ba gang gis stong gsum gi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gi kham su go bar 'gyur ba lta bu'i sgra skad dang / brda' thams cad brjod par
82b3('bum): bya/ yongasu bzung bar bya ste rab 'byorang rnam grangs des na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos lam thams cad yongasu rdzogs par bya'o// lam thams cad shes shing yongasu rdzogs par byas nas/ sems can thams cad kyi bsam
82b4('bum): pa rig par bya ste/ sems can dmyal ba'i sems can rnams kyis sems can dmyal ba'i lam shes par bya'o// rgyu shes par bya'o// 'bras bu shes par bya'o// des sems can dmyal ba'i lam zlog par bya ste/ rgyu las kyang zlog par bya
82b5('bum): ste/ 'bras bu las kyang ldog par bya'o// byol song gi ste gnas kyis mas can rnams kyi byol song gi skye gnas kyi lam shes par bya'o// rgyu shes pa dar bya'o 'bras bu shes par bya'o// des byamo song gi skye gnas brjod
82b6('bum): par bya ste/ sbrulas kyang bzlog par bya'o// 'bras bu las kyang bzlog par bya'o// gshin rje'i 'jig rten gi sems can rnams kyi sems gshin rje'i 'jig rten dgi lus par bya'o// rgyu shes par bya'o// 'bras bu
82b7('bum): shes par bya'o// des kyang gshin rje'i 'jig rten gi lam zlog par bya ste/ rgyu las bzlog par bya'o// 'bras bu las kyang bzlog par bya'o// myi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin
82b8('bum): dang / mya ding lha dang / tshangs pa dmas kyi lam shes par bya'o// rgyu shes par bya'o// 'bras bu shes par bya'o// kun snang ba'i lha rnams dang / dge ba'i lha rnams dang / 'bras bu che ba'i lha rnams dang / 'du shes myong
84a1('bum): pa'i sems can rnams dang / myin ba'i la rnams dang / myi gdung ba'i lha rnams dang / shin tu mthong ba'i lha rnams dang / gyanom snang ba'i ma rnams dang / 'og myod gi lha rnams kyis lar shes par bya'o// 
84a2('bum): rgyu shes par bya'o// 'bras bu shes par bya'o// nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams dang / rnam par shes mnga' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams dang / cung zad myed pa'i skye mched kyi lha rnams dang / 'du shes myed
84a3('bum): 'dugs myed myin skye mched kyi lha rnams kyi lam shes par bya'o// rgyu shes par bya'o// dran panye bar gzhag pa rnams shes par bya'o// yang dag par spong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / 
84a4('bum): stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa shes para'o// rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum dang / bsam tan nga bzhi dang / tshad myed pa bzhi dang / gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par
84a5('bum): 'jug pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / maHnyer gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu shes par bya'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / myi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / 
84a6('bum): so so yang dag par rig pa pa'i dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang / byams pa chen po dang / sing rje chen po zhes par bya'o// lam de dag gis kyang sems can rnams gang rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras chu
84a7('bum): la bkod par bya ba de dag ni/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la bkod/ gang lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la bkod par bya ba de dag ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bul bkod/ gang phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la dgo
84a8('bum): par bya ba dgan phyir gyi 'ong ba'i 'dus bu la bkod/ gang ngas gi rnam pashes pa nyid gad par bya ba de dag ni dgra com pa nyid la bkod / ngabyang chub pa bkod par bya ba de dag ni nga byang chub la dgang / rab 'byor de'i
84b1('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lam gi rnam pa shes pa nyid do// de dag la bslabs shing byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can rnams kyi bsam pa la 'jug go// sems can rnams kyi bsam pa la zhugs
84b2('bum): nas de bzhin du chos ston to// des chos bstan pa de yang 'bras bu myed par myi 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar de bzhin nyid kyi dbang po shes par bya ba'i phyir te/ de ni sems can rnams lam dang / lam ma yin pa dang / 
84b3('bum): 'chi 'pho dang / skye ba dang rab tu sheso// rab 'byor nga byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa de ltar spyad par bya ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'dir ni byang chub kyi phyogs gang byang chub kyi phyog
84b4('bum): gang la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bslab par bya'o/ 'am/ nyan thos kyis bslab par bya ba 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyis ba/ slab par bya ba'i chos thams cad gang yid ma 'dus pa myed pa'o// 
84b5('bum): gsol pa bcom ldan 'das gal te de ltar byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos gang lags pa dang / byang chub gang lags pa'i chos de dag thams cad ldan pa yang ma lags/ myi ldan pa yang ma lags/ gzugs ma
84b6('bum): mchis pa bstan du ma mchis pa/ thogs pa ma mchis pa ste/ 'di ltar mtshan nyid gcig ni ji ltar byang chub kyi chos rnams byang chub sgrub par byagyur ba lags/ ldan pa yang ma lags/ myi ldan pa yang ma lags// gzug
84b7('bum): ma mchis shing bstan du ma mchis/ thogs pa ma mchis/ 'di ltar mtshan nyid ma mchis par mtshan nyid gcig pa ni/ chos gang la yang bsgrub pa 'am/ 'jig par bgyid pa ma mchis// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ 
84b8('bum): dper na nam mkha' ni chos gang la yang bsgrub pa 'am/ 'jig par myi bgyid// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong pa'i chos ni chos gang la yang bsgrub pa 'am/ 'jig par bgyid pa ma mchis// bco ldan 'das
85a1('bum): kyis bka' stsalang ba/ rab 'byor de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong pa'i chos gang la yang bsgrub pa'am 'jig par bgyid pa ma mchis rab 'byor sems can gang rang gi mtshan nyid/ 
85a2('bum): kyis stong pa'i chos myi shes pa de dag gi don du 'di skad du 'di dag ni/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos byang chub thob par byed pa'o zhes bshad kyis/ rab 'byor de ni 'di ltar gzugs gang yin pa dang / tshor ba dang 'du shes
85a3('bum): dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa gang yin pa dang / skye mched dang khams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba gang yin pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa gang yin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol/ 
85a4('bum): tu phyi nang pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa dang / brtson la grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam rtan gi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / dang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa gang yin pa dang / nang
85a5('bum): stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / phyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid sgo pa nyid kyi bar du gang yin pa dang / bsam tan dang po gang / 
85a6('bum): yin pa dang / bsam rtan gnyis pa dang / bsam tan gsum pa dang / bsam rten bzhi pa dang / byams pa gang yin pa dang / snying rje gang yin pa dang / dga' ba dang / btang snyoms gang yin pa
85a7('bum): dang / nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa gang yin pa dang / rnam zhes mtha' yas skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa dang / cung zad myed pa'i skye mched kyi snyoms par 'ju/ 
85a8('bum): pa dang / 'du shes myed 'du shes myed myini skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa gang yin pa dang pa dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi gang yin pa dang / yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gnang ba dang / dbang po dang
85b1('bum): stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa gang yin pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / 
85b2('bum): mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / ting 'dzin dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams gang yin pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / myi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang
85b3('bum): dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du gang yin pa'i chos de dag
85b4('bum): thams cad ni chos dang 'dul ba 'di la/ ldan pa yang ma yin/ myi ldan pa yang ma yin/ gzugs myed pa/ bstan du myed pa/ thog/ das pa myed pa ste/ 'di ltar mtshan nyid myed par mtshan
85b5('bum): nyid gcig kyang / de dag de bzhin gshegs pas/ sems ca / na rnams bzod par bya ba'i don du 'jig rten gi tha snyad kyis de skad du brjod de/ don dam par ni ma yin no// de dag thams
85b6('bum): yang la byung chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes pa dang / mthong bas bslab par bya ste/ jis pa bzhin du shes pa dang / mthong bas bslabs nas/ chos pa la ni mngor dubya'o// lam ni mngon du
85b7('bum): kyi bya'o// de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos chos gang mi shes pa dang / mthong bas bslabs te mngon du bya/ chos gang 'i ni mngon du mi bya zhen/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas chos rnams ni zhes pa
85b8('bum): rang mthong bas bslabs te mngon du myi bya'o// rnam pa thams cad ma khyen pa nyid kyi ye shes kyis chos thams cad rnam pa mas cad mngon du bya ste/ rab 'byor dede yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos 'jagra/ 
86a1('bum): pa'i chos 'dul ba shes rab kyi pha rolang tu byin dpa la bslab par bya'o// gsol ba// bcom ldan 'das 'bags pa'i chos dang / 'dul ba 'phags pa'i chos dang / 'dul ba zhes bgyi ba de cican
86a2('bum): gis na ga'aphags pa'i chos dang 'dul ba zhes byagyi bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'asal pa/ rab 'byor 'di la nyan pas rnams dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
86a3('bum): chen po rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa dag bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni 'dod chags dang ldan pa yang sa yin/ bral ba yang ma yin/ desang dang ldan pa yang ma yin/ bral ba yang
86a4('bum): gti mug dang ldan pa yang ma yin/ bral ba yang ma yin/ 'jig chog su lta ba dang / ldan pa yin/ bral ba yang ma yin/ dathe tsom dang ldan pa yang ma yin/ bral ba yang ma yin/ chus
86a5('bum): khrims dang / brtul shugs snyems pa dang ldan pa/ yang ma yin// bral ba yang ma yin/ 'dod chags dang / gnod sems dang ldan pa yang ma yin/ bral ba yang ma yin/ 
86a6('bum): gzugs dang gzugs myed pa'o 'dod chags dang ldan pa yin/ gzugs bral ba yang ma yin/ ma rig pa dang ldan pa yang ma yin/ bral ba yang ma yin/ nga rgyal dang / rgod pa dang
86a7('bum): ldan pa yang ma yin/ bral ba yang ma yin/ bsam tan dang po dang ldan pa yang ma yin/ bral ba yang ma yin/ bsam rten gnyis pa dang ldan pa yang ma yin/ bral ba yang ma yin/ bsam
86a8('bum): gtan gsum pa dang ldan pa yang ma yin/ bral ba yang ma yin/ bsam tan bzhi pa dang / ldan pa yang ma yin/ byams pa dang ldan pa yang ma yin/ bral ba yang ma yin sa ca snying rje dang ldan pa yang
86b1('bum): ma yin/ bral ba yang ma yin/ dga' ba dang ldan pa yang ma yin/ bral ba yang ma yin/ btang snyoms dang ldan pa yang ma yin/ bral ba yang ma yin/ nam mkha' mtha' yas skye
86b2('bum): mched la snyoms par 'jug pa dang ldan pa yang ma yin/ bral ba yang ma yin/ rma shes mtha' yas skye mched la snyoms par 'jug pa dang cung zad myed pa'i skye mched la snyoms par 'jug pa dang
86b3('bum): 'du shes myed 'du shes myed myin skye mched la snyoms par 'jug pa dang ldan pa yang ma yin/ bral ba yang ma yin/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang / yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gi rkang pa dang / 
86b4('bum): dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan na lag dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang ldan pa yang ma yin/ bral ba yang ma yin/ 'phags pa'i bden pa dang / bsam
86b5('bum): dz+nyAn gi dang / tshad myed pa dang / gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / rnam par thar pa dang / mthar kyis gnas parasnyoms par 'jug pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid
86b6('bum): dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / gzug smod pa myed pa dang / mngon par shes pa dang / ting 'dzin dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang ldan pa yang ma yin/ bral ba yang ma yin/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams
86b7('bum): dang / myi 'jigs pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang / byams pa chen po dang / sring rje chen po dang mun pa gang yin/ bral ba yang ma yin/ 'dus
86b8('bum): byas kyi mas dang / 'dus pa byas kyi 'ams dang ldan pa yang ma yin// bral ba yang ma yin de bye de dag ni 'phags pa zhes byaste/ 'di dag ni dag gi chos dang / 'dul ba yin ngas/ de phyir 'gas
87a1('bum): pa cos 'jum zhe 'o/ byor nan/ ngan 'disar chos de dag thams cad gzugs byed pa/ bstan du med pa/ thogs pa myed pa/ 'di ltar mtshan ma byed pa/ mtshan ning ga ci
87a2('bum): bste/ de dag ni gzugs byed pa'o// gzugs myed par ldan pa yang ma yin dral ba yang sa yin no/ bstan du myed pa/ bstan du myed pa dang ldan pa yang ma yin / bral ba yang ma yin// thogs
87a3('bum): bamyed pa dang / thogs pa skyed par ldan pa yangs yin rnal pa yangs yo'o// mtshan nyid byed pa dang / mtshan nyi myed par ldan pa ma yin/ bral ba yang ma yin no// rab 'byor 'din pa
87a4('bum): chung sems dpa' sems dpa' cher po rnangs kyi gzugs myed pa bstan du byed pa/ thogs pa myed pa/ mtshan nyid myed par mtshan nyid ga cig pa'i pha rol tu phyinang pa ste/ de la byang chub sems
87a5('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bslab par bya'o// dag dayang/ spangs nas chos kyi mtshan nyid gang yang myigs par myi 'gyu ro// ri ba 'byor kyis gsolang ba bcom ldan 'das 'on gzum
87a6('bum): kyi mtshan nyid la bslabs par myi 'gyir 'am/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa'i mtshan nyid la bslab par myi bgyi'am/ skye mched dang / khams dang / rten cing
87a7('bum): 'brel par 'byung ba'i mtshan nyid la bslab par bgyi 'am/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyinang pa'i mtshan nyid la bslab par myi bgyi 'am/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa dang / 
87a8('bum): brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang / bsam rten gi pha rol tu phyind pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la bslab par myi bgyi'am/ nang stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid la bslab par myi bgyi 'am/ dngos
87b1('bum): lo myod ba'i dbo so nyid kyi bar gi mtshan nyid la bslab par bgyi'am/ bsam tan dang po'i mtshan dadi la bslab par myi bgyi'am/ bsam tan gnyis pa dang / bsas tan bani ba rimatshan nyid la gsum pa dang / bas/ 
87b2('bum): ngan bzhi pa'i tshan nyidi la bslab par myi bgyi'am / byams pa chen po'i mtshan nyid la bslab par myi bgyi'am/ snying rje chen po dang / dga' chen po dang / btang snyoms chen po'i mtshan nyid la bslab par myi bgyi 'am
87b3('bum): nam mkha' mtha' las skyes ched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa dang / rnam shes mtha' las skye mched kyi rnamos par 'dug pa dang / rung zad byed pa'i skye mched kyi snyomos par 'jug pa dang / 'dugs byed 'dusas
87b4('bum): myed smin pa'i skye mched la snyoms par 'jug pa'i mtshan nyid la rnga bslab par myi bgyi'am/ dran pa nye bar gnag pa rnams kyi mtshan nyid la bslab par myi bgyi'am/ yang dag par spong ba dang / 
87b5('bum): rdzu 'phrul gi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang // byang chub kyi yan lag dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgya da pa'i mtshan nyid la bslab par myi bgyi 'am/ stong pa
87b6('bum): nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / ston pa myed pa'iting nge 'dzind dang / rnam par thar pa dang / mthar kyis gan sa pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / mngon par shes
87b7('bum): ba dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi mtshan nyid la bslab par myi bgyi'am/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang / myi 'jigs pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa dang / sangs
88a1('bum): rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi mtshan nyid la bslab par mi byagyi'am/ byams pa chen po'i mtshan nyid la bslab par myi bgyi'am/ snying rje chen po'i mtshan nyid la bslab par myi gyi
88a2('bum): 'am/ sdug sngal 'phags pa'i bden pa'i mtshan nyid la bslab par myi bgyi/ kun 'byung ba dang / 'gog pa dang / lam 'phags pa'i bden pa'i mtshan nyid la bslab par myi bgyi 'am/ rten cing
88a3('bum): 'brel bar 'byung ba lus dang mthun pa dang phyi mthun pa'i mtshan nyid la bslab par myi bgyi'am/ 'dus byas kyi khams kyi mtshan nyid la bsra par myi bgyi'am/ 'dus ma byas kyi khams kyi mtshan
88a4('bum): nyid la bslab par myi bgyi 'am/ bcom ldan 'dasagal te chos 'di dag gi mtshan nyid la bslab par myi bgyi'am/ btsu ma ldan 'das ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
88a5('bum): chen pos chos thams cad kyi mtshan nyid dang / 'dus byas kyi mtshan nyid la bslabs te/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyis las 'da' bar 'gyur/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyis las 'das
88a6('bum): nas/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpa'i skyon ma mchis par 'jug par 'gyur/ byang chub sems dpa'i skyon ma mchis pa lam zhugs ma/ ji ltar rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma thob na/ ji ltar chos kyi 'khor
88a7('bum): lo bskor bar bgyi/ chos kyi 'khor lo bskor na ji ltar nyan thos kyi theg pa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa 'am/ theg pa chen pos sems can rnams 'khor ba las grol bar 'gyur/ bcom ldan
88b1('bum): 'das kyis bka' stsalang pa/ rab 'byor dgal te chos la la zhig la mtshan dadi yin na ning bzhin byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos mtshan nyid de la bslab par yang 'gyur na/ chos thas
88b2('bum): cang la mtshan nying myed cing gzung du byed / bstan du myed/ thogs paskyed pa ste/ 'di ltar mtshan nyid myed par mtshan nyid gcig pas na/ de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'i sems dpa
88b3('bum): chen pos mtshan nyid la yang bslab par myi byed/ mtshan nyid myed pa la yang bslab par myi bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sngon chad mtshan nyid myed par 'jug gyur pa'am/ phyis mtshan nyid yong bar 'gyur
88b4('bum): ba ma yin gyi/ rab 'byor chos 'di dag ni sngon chad kyang chen nyid myed la/ dkar kyang mtshan nyid myed pas so/ de phyir byang / chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos mtshan nyid la yang badran
88b5('bum): bar myi bya mtshan nyid med pa la yang bslab par myi bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams byung yang rung / de bzhin gshe gas pa rnams ma byung yang rung ste/ mtshan nyid med pa'i dbyings
88b6('bum): 'di ni de bzhin gnas pa'o// gsol pa bcom ldan 'das gal te de ltar chos thams cad la mtshan nyid ma mchis zhing mtshan nyid tha dad pa ma lags mtshan nyid gcig pa ma lags na ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen de/ 
88b7('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa ma mchis par 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa ma mchis par ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyis las 'das mi mo
89a1('bum): nyam thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sa las ma 'das pa ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bya ba smras dpa'i skyom ma mchis par 'jug par myi nus so/ byang chub
89a2('bum): sems dpa'i skyon ma mchis par ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos myi zla ba'i chos la bzod pa bskyed par myi nus / myi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa ma bskyed par ni ga mngon par gas
89a3('bum): bsgrub par mnu po byang chub sams pa'i mngon pa nas bsgrubs po'on/ rangs rgyor kyi 'ang yongs su dag par 'gro ba dang / sems camo yongs su sbyin par bgyi bar myi du ma sangs rgyas kyi pa
89a4('bum): yongs su dag pa dang / sems can yong su sbyin par ma bi dbus par ni/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par myi nus da rnam pa thams cad thob par ma tho myos par ni/ chos kyi 'khor
89a5('bum): lo bskor bar myi nu so// chos kyi 'khor lo mo skor b.rasems can rnams rgyun tu zhugs pa la dgod par myi nus / lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir myi 'ong ba
89a6('bum): 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid la dgod par myi nuso rang byang chub la dgod par myi nus so// bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la dgod par myi nusaso// sems can rnams sbyin
89a7('bum): pa las byung ba'i bsod nams bgyi ba'i dngos po la dgod par myi nu so da// tshul khrims las byung ba'i bzod nams bgyi ba'i dngos po dang / bsgom pa las byung ba'i bsod nam bgyi ba'i dngos po la dgod par
89a8('bum): myi nus so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de de de bzhin no// de bzhin te/ rab 'byor da chos thams cad ni mtshan nyid myed pa ste/ mtshan nyid pa dad pa yang ma yin na mtshan nyid
89b1('bum): gcig pa yang ma yin no// gsol da pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ltar chos thams cad mtshan nyid ma mchis na/ ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa sgom par 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'/ 
89b2('bum): sprul dpag rab 'byor dbyang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa sgom pa ni tha dad pa yang ma yin/ mtshan nyid gcig pa yang ma yin te/ rab 'byor dmatshan nyid
89b3('bum): myed pa sgom pa ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// gsol pa/ ji ltar na mtshan na mtsha nyid ma mchis pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol
89b4('bum): tu phyind pa sgom par 'gyur// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal da pa/ chos thams cad rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol de ra tu phyind pa bsgom pa'o// gso
89b5('bum): khang pa bcom ldan 'das de ji ltar chos thams cad rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa sgom nye pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal dpa
89b6('bum): gzugs rnam par bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa bsgom pa'o// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin dpang
89b7('bum): bsgom pa'o// myig rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi phapha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa'o// rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid rnam par rnam par bsgom pa ni shes rab
89b8('bum): pha rol tu phyin dpa bsgom pa'o// gzugs rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa'o// sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg dang / chos rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni// shes
90a1('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa'o// myig gi rnam nas pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni ga shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa sgom pa'o// rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang / sna'i rna bar shas/ 
90a2('bum): bru~M dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// myig gi 'dus te reg pa rnam par
90a3('bum): sgom pa bsgom pa rdzags rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa'o// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lce 'dus te reg pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa
90a4('bum): rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa'o// myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa'o
90a5('bum): rnga ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i reg pa'i rkye nad kyis tshor ba dang sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rgyan kyis tshor ba dang / lce'i 'dus reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba dang / lus kyi 'dus te res
90a6('bum): ma'i rgyun kyis tshor ba dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyenadu kyis tshor ba dang / rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa'o// sa'i khas rnams par bsgom
90a7('bum): pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rolud tu phyind pa sgom pa'o// chu'i khams dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams dang / nam mkha'i khams dang / rnam par shes pa'i khams rdza bar bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes/ 
90a8('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa'o// rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa'o// ma rig parda bar bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi
90b1('bum): rom tu phyind pa bsgom pa'o// 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa dang / myong dang gzugs dang / skye mcha drug drang / dag pa dang / tshor ba dang / sred pa dang / len pa dang / srid pa dang / skye ba dang / rga gi rnam par rlom/ 
90b2('bum): lasam pa ni gas rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa'o// drang ba rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa'o// dor ba rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol
90b3('bum): phyi nang pa sgom pa'o// bsam gtan dang po rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa sgom pa'o// bsam gtan gnyis pa dang / bsam gtan gsum pa dang / bsam gtan bzhi brda
90b4('bum): bar sdom pa sgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa sgomatho/ byams pa rnam par sgom pa sgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin dpa sgom pa'o// snying rje dang dga' ba dang / btang snyoms rnam
90b5('bum): rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin dpa sgom pa'o// nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa rnam par sgom pa sgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang
90b6('bum): ba sgom pa'o// rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa dang / cung zad myed pa'i skye mched kyi skye mched kyi sems par 'jug pa dang / 'du shes myed 'du shes myed myin skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug
90b7('bum): ba rnam par sgom pa sgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa sgom pa'o// sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa rnam par sgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgom pa'o// chos rjes su dran pa dang / dge 'dun rje su dran
90b8('bum): kha dang / tshul khrims rjes su dran pa dang / gtong ba rjes su dran pa dang / lA rje su dran pa dang / du skyon rjes su dran pa dang / dbugs phyi nang du rgyu ba rjes su rdza su dran pa dang / 'che ba rje su dran pa dang / lus kyi rnam pa
91a1('bum): gardzas su drang ba rnam par rnam pa dag par byab yang du byed pa rnam par byurtog pa'i 'dugs rnam par sdom pa sgom pajigs ras kyil rab du byed pa gas pa 'asug
91a2('bum): shas rnam par sdom pa sdom pa ni dang / bdag myang ba'i 'du gas dang / myi stug pa'i 'dun sa dang / dngos po myed pa'i 'du shes dang / bdag gi 'du nas dang / sems can kyi 'dugs dang / smra ba'i 'du
91a3('bum): shes dang / gso pa'i 'du shes dang / skyes bu'i 'du shes dang / gang zag gi 'du shes dang / shed can gyi 'du shes dang / shed bdag gi 'du shes dang / byed pa po'i 'du shes dang / tshor ba po'i 'du shes pa
91a4('bum): shes pa po'i 'du shes dang / mthong ba po'i 'du shes dang / rnam par bsgom pa sgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa sgom pa'o// rtag pa'i 'du shes rnam par sdom pa sgom pa ni
91a5('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa sgom pa'o// bde ba'i 'du/ dang / sdug pa'i 'du shes dang / bdag gi 'du shes rnam par sgom pa sgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa sgom
91a6('bum): pa'o// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnam par sgom pa sgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa sgom pa'o// yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub
91a7('bum): kyi yan lag dang / 'phags pa'i lam sdom pa rnam par sgom pa tshigs rab kyi pha rol tu pha rol tu phyind pa sgom pa'o// stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma byed pa dang na smon dpa myed pa rnam par sgom pa
91a8('bum): rnam pa nigs rab kyi pha rolal tu phyin da pa bsgom pa'o// rnam par tha ra sa brgyad dang / mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnam par sgom pa sgom pa ni nas rab kyi pha rol du phyinang pa rnaman
91b1('bum): rtog pa dang bcas dpyod pa dang bas pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rtog pa myed pa dpyod pa myeng ba'i ting pa'ang ma rnam par sgom la rnam pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgom pa'o// skrag sa 'bas
91b2('bum): pa'i bden pa rnam par sdom pa sdom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgom pa'o// kun 'byung 'phags pa'i bangan pa dang / 'gag pa 'phags pa'i bden pa dang / las 'phags pa'i ban pa rnam pa
91b3('bum): sgom pa sdom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin dpa sgom pa'o// sdug bsngal shes pa dang / kun 'byung shes pa dang / 'gog pa shes pa dang / lam shes pa rnam par sgom pa sgom pa migs rab kyi pha rol
91b4('bum): tu phyin pa la sgom pa'o// zad pa shes pa rnam par sgom pa sdom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa sdom pa'o// myi skye ba shes pa dang chos shes pa dang / rje su 'gro bags pa dang / kun rdzob
91b5('bum): shes pa dang / 'gris pa shes pa dang / sgra ji bzhin shes pa rnam par sgom pa sdom pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa sgom pa'o// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par
91b6('bum): sgom pa sbom po rje/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgra pa'o// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang / 
91b7('bum): bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol du phyinang pa rnam par sgom pa sgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa sgom pa'o// nang stong pa nyid rnam par sgom pa sgom pa ni
91b8('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin dpa sgom pa'o// phyi stong pa nyid dang / dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo sa nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du rnam par sgom pa sgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa sgom pa'o// 
92a1('bum): mngon pa shes pa drug rnam par sgom pa sgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang sgom parjod gting nga 'dzin thams cad rnam par sgom pa sgom pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa sgom pa'o// 
92a2('bum): gzungs kyi sgothams cad rnam par sgom pa sbom po mi shes rab kyi pha rol ba tu phyin pa sgom pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / myi 'jigs pa pa'i dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / 
92a3('bum): sangs rgyas kyi chos pa 'dres pa bcwo brgyad rnam par sgom pa sgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rolal tu phyin pa sgom pa'o// snying rje chen po rnam par sdom pa sdom pa ni gas rab kyi pha rol du phyind pa sgom pa'o// 
92a4('bum): rgyud du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu rnam par sgom pa mi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgom pa'o// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu/ dang / phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid dang
92a5('bum): rnam par sgom pa sgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin/ pa sgom pa'o// rang byang chub rnam par sgom pa sbom pa ni shesarab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa sgom pa'o// rnam pa thams cad
92a6('bum): mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du rnam par sgom pa sbom po ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin dpa sgom pa'o// bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs pa rnam par sgom sgom pa ni shes rab
92a7('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa sgom pa'o// rab 'byor dkyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das gzugs rnam par sgom pa sgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa sgom pa'o// ji ltar tshor ba dang 'du shes pa
92a8('bum): 'du byed dang / rnam par shes rnam par shes pa rnam par sgom pa sgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa sgom pa'o// lags// ji ltar skye mched dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung rnam pa
92b1('bum): sgom pa sgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgom pa lags// ji ltar na blang ba dang dor ba rnam par sgom pa sgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol du phyind pa sgom pa lags// ji ltam na bsam gtan dang
92b2('bum): dang / gabrasam gtan gnyis pa dang / bsam gtan gsum pa dang / bsam gtan ban pa dang / byams pa dang / snying rje dang / dga' ba dang / btang snyoms dang / nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi snyoms pa
92b3('bum): 'jug pa dang / rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa dang / cung zad myed pa'i skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa dang / 'du shes myed 'du shes myed myin skye mchod kyi snyoms par lun
92b4('bum): pa rnam par sgom pa sgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinadapa sgom lags// ji ltar na sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa dang / chos rjes su dran pa dang / dge 'dun rjes su dran pa dang / tshul khrims
92b5('bum): rjesu dran pa dang / gtong ba rje su dran pa dang / lha rje su dz+dza/ na pa dang / skyo ba rje su dran pa dang / dbugs phyi nang du rgyu brje su dran pa dang / 'chi ba rje su dran pa dang / lus kyi rnam pa
92b6('bum): rjesu dran pa rnam par bsgom pa sgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa sgom pa lags// ji ltar na myi rtag pa'i 'du shes dang / sdug bsngal ba'i 'du shes dang / bdag myed pa'i 'du shes dang / skye
92b7('bum): sdug pa'i 'du shes dang / dngos po myed pa'i 'du shes dang / bdag gi 'du shes dang / sems can gi 'du shes dang / srog gi 'du shes dang / skye ba'i 'du shes dang / gas pa'i 'du shes dang / skyes du
92b8('bum): 'du shes dang / gang zag gi 'du shes dang / shad can gi 'du shes dang / shed bdag gi 'du shes dang / byed pa po'i 'du shes dang / tshor ba po'i 'du shes dang / shes pa po'i 'du shes dang / mthong ba'i
93a1('bum): 'du shes rnam par sgom pa sgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa sgom pa lags// ji ltar na brtag pa'i 'du shes dang / bde ba'i 'du shes dang / sdug pa'i 'du shes dang / bdag gi
93a2('bum): 'du shes rnam par sgom pa sgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa sgom pa lags// byang chub sems dpa'i sa rnams rnam par sgom pa sgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa sgom pa lags/ ji ltar na
93a3('bum): nang stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa'i ting nge 'dzind dang / rnam par tha rad pa brgyad dang / mtha rad kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnam par sgom pa sgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha
93a4('bum): rol tu phyind pa sgom pa lags/ ji ltar na rtog pa dang / bcas dpyod dang bcas pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rtog pa myed pa dpyod pa myed pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rtog pa dang myed cing dpyod pa
93a5('bum): myed pa'i ting nge 'dzin rnam par sgom pa sgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa sgom pa lags// ji ltar na sdug sngal 'phags pa'i bden pa dang / kun 'byung 'phags pa'i bden pa dang / 
93a6('bum): 'go ga pa 'phags pa'i bden pa dang / lam 'phags pa'i bden pa dang / sdug bsngal shes pa dang / kun 'byung shes pa dang / 'gog pa shes pa dang / lam shes pa dang / zad pa shes pa dang / myi skye ba
93a7('bum): shes pa dang / chos shes pa dang / rjes su 'gro ba shes pa dang / kun rdzob shes pa dang / 'dris pa shes pa dang / spyi rnga bzhin shes pa dang / rnam par sgom pa sgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgo ba laH
93a8('bum): ji ltar na pha rol tu phyind pa thams cad dang / stong pa nyid thams da dang rnam par sgom pa sgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa sgom pa lags// ji ltar na mngon par shes drug dang / ting nge 'dzin zas
93b1('bum): cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / myi 'jigs pa ba'i dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad dang / byas
93b2('bum): pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po sgom pa rnam par sgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa sgom pa lags// ji ltar ma rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir myi 'ong
93b3('bum): ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid dang / rang byang chub dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi bar dang / ji ltar na bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs pa rnam par thar sgom
93b4('bum): pa sgom pa shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa sgom pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la
93b5('bum): spyod pa'i tshe/ gzugs dngos po yod ces bya bar myi sgom mo/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam pa/ shes pa dngos po yod ces bya bar myi sgom mo// skye mched dang / 
93b6('bum): khams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dngos po yod ces bya bar myi sgom mo// blang ba dang dor ba dngos po yod ces bya bar myi sgom mo// bsam gtan dang po dang / bsam gtan
93b7('bum): gnyis pa dang / bsam gtan gsum pa dang / bsam gtan bzhi pa dang / byams pa dang / snying rje dang / dga' ba dang / btang snyoms dang / nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa dang
93b8('bum): rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa dang / cung zad myed pa'i skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa dang / 'du shes myed 'du shes myed myin skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa dngos po yod ces
94a1('bum): bya bar myi sgom mo// sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa dang / chos rje su dran pa dang / dge 'dun rjes su dran pa dang / tshul khrims rjes su dran pa dang / gtong ba rje su dran pa dran pa dang / khA rjes
94a2('bum): dran pa dang / skyo ba rje su dran pa dang / dbugs phyi nang du rgyu ba rjes su dran pa dang / 'chi ba rjes su dran pa dang / lus kyi rna ba rjes su dran pa dngos po yod ces bya bar myi sgom mo// myi rtag pa'i 'du she
94a3('bum): dang / sdug bsngal gi 'du shes dang / bdag myed pa'i 'du shes dang / myi sdug pa'i 'du shes dang / dngos po myed pa'i 'du shes dang / bdag gi 'du shes dang / seMs can gi 'du shes dang / srog gi 'du
94a4('bum): dang / skye ba'i 'du shes dang / gso ba'i 'du shes dang / skyes bu'i 'du shes dang / gang zag gi 'du shes dang / shed can gi/ 'du shes dang / shed bdag gi 'du shes dang / byed pa'i 'du shes
94a5('bum): dang tshor ba po'i 'du shes dang / shes bI ra 'du shes/ dang / mthong ba po'i 'du shes dngos po yid ces bya bar myi sgom mo// myi rtag pa'i 'du shes dang / bde ba'i 'du shes dang / sdug pa'i
94a6('bum): 'du shes dang / bdag gi 'du shes dngos po yod ces bya bar myi sgom mo// byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams dngos po yod ces bya bar myi sgo mo// stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed kyi
94a7('bum): ting nge 'dzinang dang / rnam par tha rad pa brgyad dang / mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dngos po yod ces bya ba mya sgomo// rtog pa dang bcas dpyod pa dang bcas pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / 
94a8('bum): rtog pa myed la dpyod pa myed pa'i ting nge 'dzind dang / rtog pa myed cing dpyod pa myed pa'i ting nge 'dzin dngos po yod ces bya bar myi sgom mo// sdug bsngal 'phags pa'i bden pa dang / kun 'byung ba 'phags pa
94b1('bum): bden pa dang 'gog pa 'phags pa'i bden pa dang / lam 'phags pa'i bden pa dang / sdug bsngal shes pa dang / kun 'byung ba shes pa dang / 'gog pa shes pa dang / kham shes pa dang / zad pa shes pa dang
94b2('bum): myi skye ba shes pa dang / chos shes pa dang / rjes su 'gro ba shes pa dang / kun rdzob shes pa dang / 'dris pa shes pa dang / sgra ji bzhin shes pa dngos po yod ces bya bar myi sgom mo// pha ro lang du phyind pa thams cad dang / 
94b3('bum): stong pa nyid thams cad dngos po yod ces bya bar myi sgomo/ mngon pa rishes pa drug dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de banon gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / myi 'jigs pa
94b4('bum): bani dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dngos po yod ces bya bar myi sgo mo// rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras
94b5('bum): bu dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bya dang / phyir myi'o// ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid dang / rang byang chub dang / rnabathos cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar dang / bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor/ 
94b6('bum): ba'i nyon mongs pa thos cad spong ba dngos po yod ces bya bar myi sdo mo// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor dngos po'i 'du shes can du shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa bsgom par byed do// dngos po'i 'du shes can la
94b7('bum): bsam gtan gi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rold tu phyind pa dang / bsgom pa myon
94b8('bum): dngos po'i 'du shes can la bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba'i nyon mongs pa thas cad spong ba'i bar du myed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar de dngos po la 'di ni bdag go zhes bya bar mtha' gnyis la chags te/ sbyin
95a1('bum): pa dang tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / bsam gtan dang / shes rab dang / bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba'i nyon mongs pa thas cad spang ba'i bar la 'di ni bdag go zhes bya ba'i mtha' gnyis
95a2('bum): la chags par gyur de pas// gang mtha' gnyis la chags par gyur pa de la ni tha rad pa myed de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor dngos po'i 'du shes can la ni sbyin pa myed/ tshul khrims kyang myed/ bzod pa yong myed/ brtson
95a3('bum): 'grus kyang myed/ bsam gtan kyang myed/ shes rab kyang myed/ bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba'i nyon mongs pa thas cad spang ba'i bar du yong su shes pa myed na de ba rad par gyur da ba lta ga las 'ong // gsold pa bcom ldan
95a4('bum): 'das dngos po ma mchis pa zhes bgyi ba ci lags/ dngos po ma mchis pa zhes bgyi ba ci lags// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de gnyis ni dngos po myed pa'o// myi gnyis pa ni dngos po myed pa'o// 
95a5('bum): gsol dpo bcom ldan 'das gnyis zhes bgyi ba ji lta bu lags bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal du pa/ rab 'byor de gzugs/ kyi 'du shes ni gnyis// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed pa/ 
95a6('bum): rna bar shes pa'i 'du shes ni gnyis// skye mched dang / khas dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i 'du shes ni gnyis// blang ba dang dor ba 'du shes ni gnyis so// bas gtan dang po dang / bas gtan
95a7('bum): gnyis pa dang / bsam gtan gsum pa dang / bsam gtan bzhi pa dang / byams pa dang / sing rje dang / dga' ba dang / btang snyoms dang / nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa dang / na shes
95a8('bum): mes skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa dang / cung zad myed pa'i skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa dang / 'du shes myed 'du shes myed myin skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa'i 'du shes ni gnyiso// sangs rgyas rje
95b1('bum): su dran pa dang / chos rje su dran pa dang / dge 'dun rjes su dran pa dang / tshul khrims rje su dran pa dang / gtong ba rjes su dran pa dang / lha rjes su dran pa dang / skyo ba rjes su dran pa dang / dbugs phyi nang du rgyu/ 
95b2('bum): rjes su dran pa dang / 'chi ba rje su dran pa dang / lus kyi rna pa rje su dran pa'i 'du shes ni gnyis so// myi chug pa'i 'du shes dang / sdug bsngal gyi su 'du shes dang / bdag skyed pa'i 'du shes dang / myi blu na/ 
95b3('bum): dngos po myed pa'i 'dugs dang / bdag gi 'du shes dang rnams can gi 'du shes dang / srog gi 'du shes dang / skye ba'i 'dugs dang / gso ba'i 'du shes dang / skyes bu'i 'dugs dang / gang zag gi
95b4('bum): gas dang // shed can go 'dushes dang / shad bdag gi 'dug/ dang / byed pa po'i 'du shes dang / tshor ba po'i 'du shes dang / shes pa po'i 'du shes dang / mthong ba po'i 'du shes kyi 'du shes ni ga ni
95b5('bum): rtag pa'i 'dugs dang / bde ba'i 'du shes dang / sdug par 'du shes dang / bdag gi 'du shes dang / byang chub kyi phyogs rjes kyi 'du shes ni gnyi so// stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa
95b6('bum): byung ba'i ting nge 'dzind dang / rna par tha rad pa brgyad dang / mthar da kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu'i 'dugs ni gnyis so// rtog pa dang bcas dpyod pa dang bcas pa'i ting nge 'dzind dang / rtog par mye pa
95b7('bum): dpyod pa myed pa'i ting nge 'dzind dang / rtog pa myed pa'i dpyod tsam gi ting te 'dzinang gi 'du shes ni gnyis// sdug bsngal ba 'phags pa'i breden pa dang / kun 'byung ba 'phags pa'i bden pa dang / 'gog pa 'phags pa'i byed
95b8('bum): pa dang / lam 'phags pa'i bden pa dang / sdug bsngal shes pa dang / kun 'byung shes pa dang / 'gog pa shes pa dang / lam shes pa dang / zad pa shes pa dang / myi skye ba shes pa dang / chos shes pa dang / rjes su 'gro ba
97a1('bum): 6// shes pa dang / kun rdzob shes pa dang / 'dris pa shes pa dang / sgra ji bzhin shes pa'i 'du shes ni gnyiso// pha rol tu phyind pa thas cad dang / stong pa nyid thas cad kyi 'du shes ni gnyis// mngon par shes pa
97a2('bum): drug pa dang / ting nge 'dzind thas cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thas cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / namyi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyan
97a3('bum): dang byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po'i 'du shes ni gnyiso// rgyun tu zhugs pa dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang / phyir myi 'ong ba dang / dgra bcom pa nyid dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / sangs rgyas kyi 'du shes ni gnyis
97a4('bum): 'dus byas kyi khas kyi 'du shes dang / 'dus ma byas kyi khas/ kyi khams kyi 'du shes ni gnyis so// rab 'byor de de ltar de snyed du 'du shes dang bcas pa thos cad dang / de snyed du 'du shes myed pa de dag
97a5('bum): zas cad ni gnyis ste/ ci tsam du gnyis pa de tsam du dngos pa ci tsam du 'khor ba de tsam du sems can rjes skye ba dang / rga ba da di na pa dang / 'chi ba dang / mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang
97a6('bum): sdug bsngal ba dang / yid myi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa las yong su myi 'grol lo// 'du shes thos cad yid la myi byed pa de ni gnyis su myed pa ste// rab 'byor de rnam grangs des kyang 'di ltar gnyis kyi 'dugs can
97a7('bum): sbyin pa myed pa dang / tshul khrims myed pa dang / bzod pa myed pa dang / brtson 'grus myed pa dang / bsam gtan myed pa dang / shes rab myed pa dang / lam myed pa dang / thob pa myed pa dang / mngon par rtogs pa myed par
97a8('bum): rig par rig par bya'o// rab 'byor kyi 'du shes la ni chung ngu ma mthun pa'i bzod pa yang myed na// gzugs yongs su shes par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rna bar shes pa yongs su
97b1('bum): shes par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod// skye mched dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba yongs su shes par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod// brang ba dang dor ba yongs su shes par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod// skye mched dang

97b6('bum): pa dang / 'chi ba rje su dran pa dang / lus kyi rna ba rje su dran pa yo// ngas su shes par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod// myi rtag pa'i 'du shes dang / sdug bsngal gi 'du shes dang / dngos po myed pa'i 'du shes dang
97b7('bum): bdag gi 'du shes dang / sems can gi 'du shes dang / srog gi 'du shes dang / skye ba'i 'du shes dang / gso ba'i 'du shes dang / gang zag gi 'du shes dang / shed can gi 'du shes dang / shed bdag gi 'du shes dang / 
97b8('bum): byed pa po'i 'du shes dang / tshor ba po'i 'du shes dang / shes pa po'i 'du shes dang / mthong ba po'i 'du shes yong su shes par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod// rtag pa'i 'du shes dang / bde ba'i 'du shes dang / sdug bI
97b9('bum): 'du shes dang / bdag gi 'du shes yongs su shes par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod// byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos chos yongs su gas par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod// stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa phyongs
98a1('bum): ngi nge 'dzind dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu yong su shes par 'gyur ba lnga ga la yod// rtog pa dang bcas dpyod pa dang bcas pa'i ting nge 'dzind das
98a2('bum): rtog pa dang bcas myed pa'i dpyod pa tsam gi ting nge 'dzind dang / rtog pa myed cing dpyod pa myed pa'i ting nge 'dzin yongasu shes par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod// sdug bsngal 'phags pa'i bden pa dang / kun 'byung ba 'phags pa'i

98a6('bum): yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'das pa rnaMs dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po yong su shes par 'argyurab lta ga la yod// rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang / lam
98a7('bum): phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid dang / rang byang chub dang / rnam pa thas cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du yong su shes par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod// gang la lam bsgom pa myed pa de
98a8('bum): rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yang lta ga la yod// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid dang / rang byang chub dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi bar yang ga
98a9('bum): yod/ bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba'i nyon mongs pa thas cad spangs pa yang lta ga la yod// / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa stong phrag nyi shu lnga pa las/ le'u lnga bcu rtsa brgyad po// du du bzhi pa pa po bdun pa ma
98b1('bum): de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor kyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsolar to// bcom ldan 'das gal te de ltar dngos po'i 'du shes can la/ mthun pa'i bzod pa yang ma mchis pas/ thob po lta ga la mchis
98b2('bum): ma mchis/ mngon par rtogs pa lta ga la ma mchis te mchis na ci lags/ bcom ldan 'das dngos po ma mchis pa'i 'du shes can la/ mthun pa'i bzod pa'am dkar po rje par mthong ba'i sa dang / rigs kyis dang / 
98b3('bum): brgyad pa'i sa dang / mthong ba'i sa dang / bsrabs pa'i sa dang / 'dod chags dang bral ba'i sa dang / byams pa rtogs pa'i sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sa 'am/ bya sems dpa'i sa 'am/ lam bsgom pa gangs/ 
98b4('bum): brten cing / nyon mongs pa gang gis bsgribs pas/ byang chub sa sa dpa' gang skyon ma mchis par chud par myi 'gyur ba dang / byang chub seMs dpa'i skyon ma mchis par chud pas/ rnab thas cang mkhyend pa nyid
98b5('bum): thob par myi 'gyur ba dang / rnam pa thas cad mkhyend pa nyid ma thib pas/ bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad myi spro sgrib pa nyan thos dang ldan pa 'am// rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i
98b6('bum): nyon mongs pa thams cad de dag spong bar 'gyur ba'i lam mchis sam/ bcom ldan 'das gal te chos skye bar 'gyur ba gang yang skye bar ma mchis na/ ji ltar chos de dag thams cad kyi skye bar rnam thas cad mkhyen pa
98b7('bum): nyidi thob par 'gyur// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal da pa// rab 'byor de de bzhin no// de bzhin te/ dngos po myed pa'i 'du shes can la mthun pa'i bzod pa myed do// mngon rtogs pa'i sa myed do// dkar po rna par mthong
98b8('bum): ba'i sa myed do// rigs kyis myed do brgyad pa'i sa skyed do// mthong ba'i sa myod do// bsregs pa'i sa myod ngo/ 'dod chags dang dral ba'i sa byed do// byas pa rtogs pa'i sa byed do// rang sangs rgyas kyis byed do// byang du
99a1('bum): sems dpa'i sa myed do// sangs rgyas kyi sa myed do// lam sgom pa gang la rten cing nyon mongs pa gang gis bsgribs pas byang chub sems dpa'i skyon myed par myi 'gyur ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i skyon myed
99a2('bum): par ma chud pas rnam pa thas cad mkhyend pa nyid thob par myi 'gyur ba dang / rna ba thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma thob pas bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba'i nyon mongs pa thas cad myi spong ba'i sgrib pa/ nyan thos dang ldan pa
99a3('bum): rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i nyon mongs pa'i steng de dag spong bar 'gyur ba'i lam myed do// gsol dpa bcom ldan 'das ci lags// byang chub seMs dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod
99a4('bum): pa'i tshe/ dngos po mchis par 'du shes pa dang / dngos po ma mchis par 'du shes pa mchis so/ gzug su 'du shes pa dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes par 'du shes pa dang / skye mched dang

99a6('bum): mug du 'du shes pa dang / gti mug spang bar 'du shes pa dang / ma rig par 'du shes pa dang / ma rig pa spang bar 'du shes pa dang / 'du skye nga du 'du shes pa dang / 'du byed spang bar 'du shes pa dang / rna bar shes/ 
99a7('bum): pabapar 'du shes pa dang / rnam par shes pa spang bar 'du shes pa dang / mying dang gzugs su 'du shes pa dang / mying dang gzugs spang bar 'dugs pa dang / skye mched drug du 'dushes pa dang / skye mched drug spang bar 'du shes
99a8('bum): pa da rig par 'jugs pa dang / reg pa snang bar 'dugs pa dang / tshor bar 'dugs pa dang / tshor ba gang par 'dugs pa dang / sred pa 'dugs pa dang / grod pa sang ci badzugs pa dang min par 'dugs par na me
99b1('bum): mang ba 'dugs pa dang / srid par 'dugs pa dang / srid pa spang bar 'dugs pa dang / skye bar 'du shes pa dang / skye ba spang bar 'dushes pa dang / rga shing 'du shes pa dang / rga gi spang bar 'dugs pa dang / mya ngan dang / 
99b2('bum): snosngags 'don par 'du shes pa dang / mya ngan dang smre sngags 'don pa spang bar 'du shes pa dang / sdug bsngal du 'du shes/ sdug bsngal kun gas pa spang bar 'dushes pa dang / kun 'thung bar 'dugs pa dang / kun 'thub
99b3('bum): nga ba marmugs pa dang / 'gog par 'bregs pa dang / 'gog par mngon par 'dugs pa dang / lem du spang bar 'dugs pa dang / las bsgom par 'dugs pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'dugs pa'o/ 
99b4('bum): gcags kyi mtshams sbyor ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad snang 'i bar dumachis sa bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' sdug pa rab 'byor/ da da ni myed do// rab 'byor dbyang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' ma
99b5('bum): bo nigs rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ chos gang yang dngos po yod par 'du shes pa dang / dngos po myed par 'du shes pa myed do// gang la dngos po ya 'dushes pa dang / dngos po myed par 'dus
99b6('bum): de nyid ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mthun pa'i bzod pa'o// gang la dngos po yod par 'du shes pa dang / dngos po myed par 'du shes pa myed pa ni lam bsgom pa'o// gang la dngos po yod par 'du shes pa dang / 
99b7('bum): dngos po myed par 'dushes pa myed pa de nyid ni 'bras bu'o// rab 'byor dbyang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lam ni dngos po myed pa ste/ mngon par rtogs pa yang dngos po myed pa ste/ rab 'byor dede ltar rnam grangs
99b8('bum): kyang 'di ltar chos thams cad ni dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid lags na/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pas chos thas cad dngos po ma mchis pa'i ngo bo nyid du mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par gyur te/ 
100a1('bum): de dag mngo par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pas / chos thams cad la mngar sbyar ba'i yul la mnga' rnyed par gyur// de sad ces bka' stsal bya dang / gso yod pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis ma dang / 
100a2('bum): spyan pa cu 'byor la 'di ska ces bka' stsam to// ra 'byor nga 'di sa sngon byang chutha mams papa'i spyad pa spyong sa na/ pha rol tu phyind pa drug la spong ba'i ma// 'dod pas dben byin ci mya dran mo tsam
100a3('bum): 'dod pa/ rtog pa dang bcas dpyod pa dang bcas dben pa las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang / bad ba can bsam gtan dang po la nye sgrungs te gnas so// bsam gtan bani pa sa nye bar bsgrubs te gnas par rgyu
100a4('bum): 'on kyang bsam gtan de dag dang / bsam gtan gi yan lag de dag gi mtshan ma bzung ste/ bsam gtan de dag gi nyon mongs par myi 'gyur na/ bsam gtan gi ro myong bar ma gyur// bsam gtan du dmyigs pa/ 
100a5('bum): ma gyur te/ de ltar nangs bsam gtan de de dag gi pa yongs su dag pa la mnyam par gzhag go// de ngas bsam gtan de dag/ la rnam par smyind par byas nas/ lha'i myig shes pa rnam pa tha dad
100a6('bum): pa mngon pa du bya ba'i phyir sems gzhol bar bya/ lha rdzab mngon du bya ba'i phyir/ sems gzhol bar bya/ pha rol gi sems gas pa mngon du bya ba'i phyir/ sems gzhol bar byan sngon gi gnas rjesu
100a7('bum): dran pa'i shes pa mngon du bya ba'i phyir sems gzhol bar bya ste/ lha'i myig gis shes rab mngon du bya ba'i phyir/ sems gnas bya/ 'on kyang ngas mngon par shes pa mngon du bya ba'i phyiram mtshan mar bzung kyi
100a8('bum): mngon pa shes pa de dag gis shes par ma gyur de/ myong bar ma gyur ni dmyigs par ma gyur da te/ mngon par shes pa lnga po de ga ni nam mkha' sa zung yang dag pa rje su dran pas naman par gnag sa ste
100b1('bum): de lta ngas skad cig gcig dang ldan pa'i shes rab kyis blan myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ 'di ni sdug bsngal lon 'di ni sdug bsngal kun 'byung na
