122b4('bum): kyis yongasu shes par byas shing / de bzhin du chos ston to// / de sngon gi gnas rjes su dran pa'i shes pas/ seMs can de dag gi dge ba'i rtsa rnaMs yongs su shes par byas shing / yang seMs can de
122b5('bum): dag la dge ba'i rtsa ba yang dag par stond to// yang dag par sku lo// yang dag par gzeng stod do// yang dag par dga' bar byed do// de zag pa zad pades te/ zag pa zad pa shes pa des seMs can rnaMs theg
122b6('bum): pa gsu la rab tu 'god do// rab 'byor nga byang chub seMs dpa' so sa dpa' chen po de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nang pa la spyod pa'i tshe// chos thas cad mtshan ma myed pa dang / byed pa myed pa dang / dmyigs su myed pa dang / 
122b7('bum): 'byung ba myed pa dang / mngon par 'du bya ba myed pa la mtshan ma dang bral ba'i seMs kyis bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa yongs su rdzogs par byeda'o// byang chub sems dpa' seMs dpa' chen po de ni shes rab kyi pha
122b8('bum): rolang tu phyind pa la spyod cing thabs mkhas pas seMs can rnaMs yongasu smin par byed do// sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed do// de sos can rnaMs yongs su smin par byas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su
122b9('bum): dag par bya na/ seMs can rna mams cad mkhyen pa nyid la spyad/ rna ba thas
123a1('bum): mkhyen pa nyid yong su rdzogs par byas te/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'chang rgya'o// bla ma myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzog
123a2('bum): par sangs rgyas nas chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ro// chos kyi 'khor lo bskor nas/ sems can rnaMs theg pa gsum gis 'khor ba las yongasu 'brel to// rab 'byor de de ltar na byang chub seMs dpa' sos/ 
123a3('bum): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ chos bas cang mtshan ma myed pa dang / byed pa myed pa dang / dmyigs su myed pa dang / 'byung ba myed pa dang / mngon par 'du bya ba myed pa la bzod pam
123a4('bum): pha rol tu phyind pa yongs su rdzogs pa yin no// rab 'byor/ ji ltar na byang chub seMs dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ chos thos cad mtshan ma myed pa dang
123a5('bum): byed pa myed pa dang / dmyigs su myed pa dang / mngon par 'du bya ba myed pa la mtshan ma dang bral ba'i sems kyis/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa yin zhen
123a6('bum): rab 'byor nga 'di la byang chub sems dpa' ses dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ chos thas cad mtshan ma myed pa dang / smond pa myed pa dang / dmyigs su myed pa dang / 'thung ngo
123a7('bum): myed pa dang / mngon par 'du bya ba myed pa la mtshan ma dang bral ba'i sems kyis/ sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/ lus kyi brtson 'grus dang ldan pa yin/ sems kyi brtson 'grus dang
123a8('bum): ldan pa yin te/ de lus kyi brtson 'grus dang ldan pa yin/ bsam gtan dang po la nye bar sgrubs te gan so// bas gtan gnyis pa dang / bsam gtan gsu pa dang / bsam gtan bzhi pa dang nye bar
123a9('bum): bzung gyi gan so// de bas gtan bzhi pa mnyaM pa gzhag cing rdzu 'gyul kan bdum nyas su myong bar bye'o// ma dang tha ba'i ma du sna lan pa byu zhi
123b1('bum): tshangs pa'i 'jig rten gi bar du dbang sbyar te/ de'i lus kyi brtson 'grus de lta bu dang ldan pas/ rdzu 'phrul gi rna ba des phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gi khams tshad myed pa grangs myed dpag tu myed pa dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
123b2('bum): gang ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyeng ba dang / chos stond pa de dag tu song zhing / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la na bza' dang / bsod snyoms dang / gzims cha dang / snyun gyi rkye nad sman dang / yo byad mang pos bsnyen bkur
123b3('bum): byed de/ na bza' dang / bsod snyoms dang / gzims cha dang / snyun gyi rkyend sman dang / yo byad mang po dag gis kyang ni bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i bar du zad pa
123b4('bum): myi 'gyur to// byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nasakyang gos dang / bsod snyoms dang / mal cha dang / nad kyi rkye nang rtsi dang / yo byad mang pos lha dang / myi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig
123b5('bum): rten bde bar 'gyur ro// yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas kyang ring srel la ring sem kyi mchod pa mang po 'byung bar 'gyur ro// rdzu 'phrulamangon par 'du byed pa de nyid kyis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
123b6('bum): de dag gi drung du song zhing / chos nyan te/ ci skad du thos pa de yang bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu na yang chung za bar myi 'gyur ro// rdzab thams cad mkhyend pa nyid la spyod cing sems can rdzas kyang yongs su
123b7('bum): smi nad par byed/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su 'dzind to// rab 'byor de de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ chos thas cad mtshan ma myed pa dang / byed pa myed
123b8('bum): pa dang / dmyig su myed pa dang / 'byung ba myed pa dang / mngon par 'du bya ba myed pa la mtshan ma dang bral ba'i lus kyi brtson 'grus dang ldan pa yin/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do// rab
124a1('bum): 'byor de ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos thams cad mtshan ma myed pa dang / byed pa myed pa dang / dmyigs su myed pa dang / 'byung ba myed pa dang / mngon par 'du bya ba myed pa la sos kyi brtson
124a2('bum): 'grus 'phags pa zag pa myed pa lam gi yan lag khongs su chud pa dang ldan pas brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa yin zhe na// rab 'byor da 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa
124a3('bum): chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa la spyod pa'i chos thas cad mtshan ma myed pa dang / byed pa myed pa dang / dmyigs su myong ba dang / 'byung ba myed pa dang / mngon par 'du bya ba myed pa la mtshan ma dang bral ba'i sems
124a4('bum): kyis sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/ sems kyi brtso na 'grus dang ldan pas/ lus kyi las myi dge ba'i skabs myi 'byed dedag gi las mi dge ba'i skabs myi 'byed/ yid kyi las myi dge ri'i/ 
124a5('bum): skabs myi 'byed de// rtag ces bya ba'am/ myi rtag ces bya ba'i bde zhes bya ba 'am/ sdug bsngal zhes bya ba 'am/ bdag yod ce sa bya ba 'am/ bdag myed ces bya ba 'am/ zhi zhes bya ba'am/ 
124a6('bum): ma zhi zhes bya ba 'am/ dge zhes bya ba 'am/ myi dge zhes bya ba 'am/ 'jig rten pa zhes bya ba 'am/ 'jig rten las 'das pa zhes bya ba 'am/ nyon mongs pa dang bcas pa zhes bya ba 'am/ nyon mongs pa myed pa zhes
124a7('bum): bya ba 'am/ kha na ma tho dang bcas pa zhes bya ba dang / kha na ma tho ba myed pa zhes bya ba dang / zag pa dang bcas pa zhes bya ba 'am/ kun nas nyon mongs pa zhes bya ba 'am/ rna bar byang ba zhes bya ba 'am/ 'dus byas zhe
124a8('bum): bya ba 'am/ 'dus ma byas zhes bya bar snyems par med do// 'dod pa'i khams so/ gzugs kyi khams so// gzugs myed pa'i khas so// zag pa dang bcas pa'i khas sam/ zag pa myed pa'i khams sam/ bsam
124b1('bum): gtan dang po 'am/ bsam gtan gnyis pa 'am/ bsam gtan gsum pa 'am/ bsam gtan bzhi pa dang / byams pa 'am/ snying rje'am/ dga' ba 'am/ btang snyoms sam/ nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched dang
124b2('bum): rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched dam/ cung zad myed pa'i skye mched dam/ 'du shes myed 'du shes myed myin skye mched dam// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa 'am/ tshul khrims kyi pha rold tu phyind pa 'am/ bzod pa'i
124b3('bum): pha rol tu phyind pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'am/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'am/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zhes bya ba 'am/ nang stong pa nyid ces bya ba dang / dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid
124b4('bum): stong pa nyid kyi bar raM/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnas sam/ yang dag dpar spong ba rnams ma/ rdzu 'phrul gi rkang pa rnams/ dbang po rnams/ stobs rnaMs so// byang chub kyi yan lag rnams/ 'phags pa'i
124b5('bum): lam yan lag brgyad pa 'am/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams sabasam gtan rnas so// tshad myed pa rnas so// gzugs myed pa'i snyom sa par 'jug pa rnams so// rnam par tha rad pa rnaMs so// mtharang/ 
124b6('bum): kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnaMs so// stong pa nyid dam/ mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa dang / mngon par shes pa 'am/ ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnaMs so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs so/ 
124b7('bum): 'jigs pa rnas so// so so yang dag par rig pa rnas so// byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnaMs la yang rtag ces bya ba 'am/ myi rtag ces bya ba 'am/ bde zhes bya ba 'am/ sdug
124b8('bum): bsngal zhes bya ba 'am/ bdag ces bya ba 'am/ bdag myed ces bya ba 'am/ zhi zhes bya ba 'am/ ma zhi zhes bya ba 'am/ dge zhes bya ba 'am/ myi dge zhes bya ba 'am/ 'jig rten pa ces bya ba 'am/ 'jig rten las 'das pa/ 
125a1('bum): zhes bya ba 'am/ nyon mongs pa dang bcas zhes bya ba 'am/ nyon mongs pa myed ces bya ba 'am/ kha na ma tho dang bcas zhes bya ba 'am/ zag pa dang bcas pa zhes bya ba 'am/ zag pa myed ces bya ba 'am/ kun nas/ 
125a2('bum): nyon mongs zhes pa zhes bya ba 'am/ rnam par byang ba zhes bya ba 'am/ 'dus byas ces bya ba 'am/ 'dus ma byas ces bya bar snyems pa myed do// rgyu nad tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bur snyems par myed do// lan cig phyir 'ong
125a3('bum): 'bras bu 'am/ phyir myi 'ong ba'i/ dgra bcom pa nyid dang / rang byang chub bam/ byang sems dpa' nyid dam/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu snyems pa myed do// rgyun tu zhugs pa zhes bya ba 'am/ lan cig
125a4('bum): phyir 'ong ba'i zhes bya ba dang / phyir myi 'ong ba zhes bya ba 'am/ dgra bcom zhes bya ba 'am/ rang sangs rgyas zhes bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba dang / sangs rgyas zhes bya bar snyams pa myed do/ 
125a5('bum): sems can 'di dag ni mthong ba'i lam gyis brjod pa/ 'di dag ni srabs pa'i sas brjod pa/ 'di dag ni dam pa ma yin pa'i cha can gri brjod pa/ 'di dag ni bla ma'i cha can gis brjod pa/ 'di dag ni rang sangs
125a6('bum): rgyas nyid kyis brjod pa/ 'di dag ni lam gi rna pa shes pa nyid kyis brjod pa/ 'di dag ni rna ba thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyis brjod pa zhes bya bar snyams par myed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ni de ltar de dag la ngo bo nyid gang
125a7('bum): yin pa brjod par bya ba'i ngo bo nyid de// sems las byung ba'i brtson 'grus/ de lta bu dang ldan pas mngon tu gyur pa kyang / sems can nas kyi don byed de// sems can de dag kyang myi dmyigaso// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu
125a8('bum): phyi nad pa yongs su rdzogs par byed de/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa de yang myi dmyigaso// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyang yongs su rdzogs par byed de// sangs rgyas kyi chos de dag kyang myi dmyigs so// 
125b1('bum): sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed de sangs rgyas kyi zhing de yang myi dmyigs so// de sems kyi brtson 'grus de lta bu dang ldan pas dge ba'i chos thams cad yong su 'dzind kyang de la chags pa myed de/ 
125b2('bum): chags pa myed pa rnas kyi don byed cing / sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro zhing // 'jig rten gi khams nas 'jig rten gi khas su 'gro ste/ rdzu 'phrul da dang / cho 'phrul gang dang gang gis rna par 'phrul
125b3('bum): par 'dod pa'i rdzu 'phrul dang cho 'phrul de dang des rna bar 'phrul te/ me tog gi char 'bab pa 'am/ spos kyi ngang 'gyed pa 'am/ 'brug gi sgra bsgrags pa 'am/ klu rol dang sil snyan gi sgra bsgrags pa dang / sa
125b4('bum): skyob pa dang / snang ba bstand pa dang / rin po che sna bdun 'gro 'jig rten gi khams bstand pas rna bar 'phrul te/ gang dang gang du gang dang gang sems can rnas kyi don du gyur pa de dag kyang bdag gi lus la
125b5('bum): 'gyed de/ sems can rnaMs kyi don du bar 'ga' bdag rgya/ dade/ bar 'gyu dag dri zhim po 'gyed de/ bar 'ga' srog gcod/ pa myed pa'i mchod sbyin chen po byed do// bar 'ga' sems can mar
125b6('bum): yas pa la ma yin pa nas 'don te/ srog gcod pa las zlogo// ma byin par lend pa dang / 'dod pas log pas g.yem pa dang / phra ma smra ba dang / zhe gcod pa'i tshig dang / brdzun du smra ba dang / tshig khyal pa dang / 
125b7('bum): chags ses dang / gnod sems dang / log par lta bas yongasu 'grel te/ la lin sbyin pas phan 'dog so// la la ni tshul khrims kyis phan 'dog so// la la'i don du ni yan lag dang nying lag yongasu gtong // la lin
125b8('bum): don du ni bu dang chung ma yong su gtong // la la'i don du ni rgyal srid kyang yong su gtong // la la'i don tu ni bdag yongasu gtong ste// de ltar thabs gang dang gang gi sos can rnaMs kyi don du 'gyur ba'i thabs des sems
126a1('bum): can rnams kyi don byed do// rab 'byor de de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ chos thams cad mtshan ma myed pa dang / byed pa myed pa dang
126a2('bum): dmyigs su myed pa dang / 'byung ba myed pa dang / mngon par 'du bya ba myed pa la sems kyi brtson 'grus dang ldan pas/ brtson 'grus gi pha rol tu phyind pa yongasasu rdzogs par byed do// rab 'byor da ji ltar na byang chub seMs
126a3('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ chos thams cad mtshan ma myed pa dang / byed pa myed pa dang / dmig su myed pa dang / 'byung ba myed pa dang / mngon par 'du bya ba myed pa la bas
126a4('bum): gtan gi pha rold tu phyind pa yongasasu rdzogs par byed pa yin zhe na/ rab 'byor de 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ chos thams cad mtshan ma myed pa
126a5('bum): dang byed pa dang / dmyig su myed pa dang / 'byung ba myed pa dang / mngon pa'adu bya ba myed pa la mtshan ma dang bral ba'i sems kyis/ sems dang / dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste bas gtan gyi pha rol
126a6('bum): tu phyind pa la gnas shing / de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzinam gtogs par ting nge 'dzind gzhan thams cad yongasu rdzogs par byed do// de 'dod pas dben sdig to myi dge ba'i chos kyis
126a7('bum): dben pa/ rtog pa dang bcas pa dpyod pa dang bcas pa/ dben pa las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang bde rab can bsam gtan dang po la nye bar sgrubs te gnaso// bsam gtan gnyis pa dang / bas gtan gsum pa dang / bas
126a8('bum): gtan bzhi pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnaso// de byams pa dang ldan pa'i sems dang / snying rje dang ldan pa'i sems dang / dga' ba dang ldan pa'i sems dang / btang snyoms dang ldan pa'i sems dang / 'jig rten gi
126b1('bum): dbyings kyis klas pa/ nam mkha'i mthas gdugs pa thams cad rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du rgyas par bgrang zhing nye bar bsgrubs te gnaso// nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched dang / rdo shes mtha' yas
126b2('bum): skye mched dang / cung zad myed pa'i skye mched dang / 'du shes myed 'du shes myin skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnaso// ting nge 'dzinang gi pha rol tu phyind pa de la gnas shing / rnam par thard pa brgyad la lugs dang
126b3('bum): mthun pa dang / lugs dang myi mthun par snyoms par 'jug cing rnam par ldang ngo // mtha rad kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzind dang / mtshan ma myed pa'i ting nge 'dzin/ 
126b4('bum): dang / sprond pa myed pa'i ting nge 'dzinang lnga nye bar bsgrubs te gnas/ bar chad myed pa'i ting nge 'a dzind la nye bar bsgrubs te gnaso// glog/ lta bu'i ting nge 'dzind dang / yang dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang
126b5('bum): rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge dzin la nye bar bsgrubs te gnaso// ting nge 'dzin do gi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di la gnas shing lami ga rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi ye shes kyis/ lam gi rna pa shes pa nyid kyi khongs su chud
126b6('bum): ting nge 'dzinang pas cad khongs su chud par byas shing / dkar po rnam par mthong ba'i sa las 'da'o// dkar po rnam par mthong ba'i sa las 'das nas/ rigs kyis dang / brgyad pa'i sa dang / mthong ba'i sa dang / 
126b7('bum): bsrabs pa'i sa dang / 'dod chags dang bral ba'i sa dang / byas pa gtogs pa'i sa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sa las 'da'o// byang chub sems dpa'i skyon myed par bzhugs nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su
126b8('bum): rdzogs par byed do// des de dag la spyod cing rna ba thas cad mkhyend pa nyid ma thob kyi bar du 'bras bu bar ma dor thob par byed do// ting nge 'dzinang gi pha rol tu phyind pa la gnas shing mngon par shes pa rnams yong su
127a1('bum): rdzogs par byas shing / sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcom ldan 'das rjes la bsnyen bkur byed cing / sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro ste// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la dge ba'i
127a2('bum): rtsa ba gang gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par 'gyur ba dang / sems can rnams yongasu smyin par 'gyur ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed de// 'jig rten gi khams nas 'jig rten gi khams su 'gro zhing sems
127a3('bum): can rdzas kyi don byed do// de la sems can la la ni sbyin pas yong su sdud do// la la ni tshul khrims kyis yongs su sdud // la la ni ting nge 'dzind kyis yongs su sdud // la la ni shes rab kyis yongs su
127a4('bum): sdud do// la la ni rna par grol bas yongs su sdud do// la la ni rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i yongasu sdud do// la la ni rgyu nang tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la rab tu gzhog go// lan cig phyir 'ong ba
127a5('bum): 'bras bu dang / phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid dang / la rab tu gzhog gro// la li na rang byang chub la rab tu ga zho go// la la ni bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
127a6('bum): byang chub la rab tu gzhog go// de de ltar dge ba'i chos gang dang / gang gis sems can rnams mthong bar 'gyur ba de dang de la sbya / de ting nge 'dzind kyi pha rol du phyind pa 'di la gnas shis
127a7('bum): gzungs kyi sgo thams cad mngon par bsgrub po// so so yang dag por rig pa bzhi rab tu thob bo// rnam par sbyin pa las byung ba'i mngon par shes pa rdzas thob pa yin te/ de nam yang las dang nyon mongs ni
127a8('bum): dbang gis mi'i mngal du skye bar myi 'gyur ro// nam yang 'dod pa la bstend par myi 'gyur ro// sems can rnams yongasasu smind par bya ba'i don du nga/ skye ba yongs su myi 'dzind pa gang yang myed de// skye ba'i
127a9('bum): nyes pas kyang gos kyang bar myi 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar des gang la sgyu ma lta bu'i chos thas cad cad rab tu ma thong / rab tu rig rab tu rtogs pas ma/ de sgyu ma lta bu'i 'du shes thas cad rig par
127b1('bum): byas zhing sems can thams cad kyi don tu byed do// des sgyu ma lta bu'i 'du byed thams cad rab tu rig pas/ sems can rnams la snying rje chen po bskyed de// kye ma sems can 'di dag ni chos thams cad sku/ 
127b2('bum): mas rdul 'khor ba dang sdug bsngal mang po nyams su myong bar 'gyur ba yin na// bdag gis 'di dag nas ni gan sdug bsngal thams cad nye ba pa'i pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i la dgod par 'gyur zhes
127b3('bum): sring rje chen po bskyed de// de la yang sems can dam sems can du gdags par yang dmyig su myed de// de chos thams cad ma dmyigs pa nas/ 'jig te gi bstang nye bar ba'azung ste/ dmyigasu myed pa de/ 
127b4('bum): nyid ma sems cad rnaMs 'god de// don dam par mim yin no// de ting nge 'dzin gi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di la gnas shing / bsam gtan dang / rna bar tha rang pa dang / ting nge 'dzin
127b5('bum): dang snyoms par 'jug pa thams cad la spyod de// bla na med yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi bar du nam yang ting nge 'dzinang gi pha rol
127b6('bum): tu phyind pa dang bral bar myi 'gyur ro// de ting nge 'dzi nang gi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di la gnas shing lam gi rna ba shes pa nyid kyis/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid mngon par bsgrub ste/ de la garma
127b7('bum): nas bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba'i nyon mongs pa thas cad rab tu spong ngo // bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba'i thams cad rab tu spangs nas/ bdag gi don kyang byed gzhan gi don kyang byed de/ des bdag
127b8('bum): dang gzhan gi don byas nas/ lha dang myi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gi rim gro'i gnas su gyu rang pa yin te// rab 'byor de de ltar na byang chub seMs dpa' seMs dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol
127b9('bum): tu phyin pa la spyong pa'i cha/ chos pas cad mo chen ma myed pa dang ni byed pa myed pa dadra/ dmyig su myed pa dang / 'azung ba myeng pa dang / mngon par 'du bya myed pa la mtshan ma dang bral bI sos kyis ting nge 'dzinang gi pha rol tu phyind pa yam
128a1('bum): su rdzogs par byed do// rab 'byor de ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ chos thams cad mtshan ma myed pa dang / byed pa myed gas
128a2('bum): dmyig su myed pa dang / 'byung ba myed pa dang / mngon par 'du bya myed pa la mtshan ma bral ba'i sems kyis/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa yin zhe na/ rab 'byor
128a3('bum): 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ chos thams cad mtshan ma myed pa dang / byed pa myed pa dang / dmyigs su myed pa dang / 'byung ba myed pa dang / 
128a4('bum): mngon par 'du bya ba myed pa la sems dang po bskyed pa nas// nye bar bzung ste/ mtshan ma dang bral ba'i sems kyis yang dag/ pa dang yongs su grub pa'i chos gang yang yang dag par rje su mthong
128a5('bum): ba myed de/ gzugs kyi yang dag pa dang grub pa yang dag pa rjes su myi mthong / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rna bar shes pa'i yang dag pa dang yongs su grub pa yang dag par rje su myi
128a6('bum): mthong ngo // des gzugs kyi yang dag pa dang yongasu grub pa yang dag par rjes su ma mthong / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rdza bar shes pa'i skye ba yang dag par rjes su ma mthong bas/ 
128a7('bum): gzugs kyi skye ba yang dag par rjes su myi mthong / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rna bar shes pa'i skye ba yang dag par rje su myi mthong ngo // des gzugs kyi skye ba yang dag par rjes su mthong
128a8('bum): tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa'i skye ba yang dag par rjes su ma mthong bas/ gzugs kyi cho ga skye ba'i sgo yang dag par rje su myi mthong / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed da
128b1('bum): rnam par shes pa'i skye ba'i sgo yang dag par rjes su myi mthong ngo // des gzugs kyi skye ba'i sgo yang dag par rje su ma mthong / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa'i skye ba'i sgo yang
128b2('bum): dag par rje su ma mthong bas/ gzugs kyi tshogs yang dag par rjes su myi mthong / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa'i cho gas yang dag par rjes su myi mthong ste/ gsob nyid dang
128b3('bum): gsog nyid du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo // des rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi yang dag pa dang yongs su grub pa yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo // des rdo ba thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi skye
128b4('bum): ba yang dag par rje su ma mthong bas/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi skye ba'i sgo yang dag par rjes su myi mthong // des rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi skye ba'i sgo yang dag par rje su ma mthong bas
128b5('bum): rnam pa zas cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi tshogs yang dag pararjes su myi mthong ste/ gsob nyid dang / gsog nyid du yang dang / dpar rjes su myi mthong ngo // de de ltar rtogs pa'i tshe/ gzugs kyi/ 
128b6('bum): rang bzhin myi dmyigaso// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rna bar shes pa'i rang bzhin myi dmyigaso// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi rang bzhin myi dmyigaso// de shes rab kyi pha
128b7('bum): rolang tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe// chos thams cad dngos po myed pa'i rang bzhin du rtogs par byed de/ de de ltar rtogs par byed cing / nang stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / phyi stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / phyi nang stong
128b8('bum): pa nyid la spyod pa dang / dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar la spyod pa'i tshe/ gtu gzugs so/ tshor ba 'am/ 'du shes so/ 'du byed dam/ rnam par shes pa'i// skye mched dam/ khas so// rten
129a1('bum): cing 'brel par 'byung ba rnams so// pha rol tu phyind pa rnaMs sa/ stong pa nyid rnas sam/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams so/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnas sam/ bas gtan rnaMs so
129a2('bum): tshad myed pa rnas so// gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams/ rnam par tha rad pa rnams/ mthard kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnaMs sam/ stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon
129a3('bum): pa myed pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnaMs sam/ ting nge 'dzind rnams sam/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnas sam/ myi 'jigs pa rnams so// so so yang dag par rig
129a4('bum): pa rdzas so/ byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs de rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams samabla na myed pa yang dgapar rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi bar re/ chos gang la yang mngon
129a5('bum): par chags pa myed do// de dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ byang chub kyi lam yong su rdzogs par byed de/ 'di ltar pha rold tu phyind pa drug dang
129a6('bum): stong pa nyid thams cad dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sa bcu rtsa bdun dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams sam/ bsam gtan rdzas sa// tshad myed pa rnams ka gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par
129a7('bum): 'jug pa rnams so// rnam par tha rang pa rnaMs sam/ mthard kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sa// stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa dang / mngon par shes pa dang / 
129a8('bum): ting nge 'dzind dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnaMs dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang / myi 'jigs pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos
129a9('bum): dang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa dz+ra rgyang
129b1('bum): ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad yongs su rdzogs par byed de// myi chen po'i mtshan sum bcu rtsa gnyis dang / dpel byang bzang po bzang po brgya bcu yong su 'dzind to// de byang chub kyi lam rnam par sbyind pa'i
129b2('bum): chos can la gnas pas pha rol tu phyind pa drug yongasasu rdzogs pa dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum bcu rtsa bdun dang / yongs su rdzogs pa dang / rnam par smin pa
129b3('bum): las byung ba'i mngon par shes pa lnga'i bar du yongs su rdzogs par gyur nas/ sems can gang la la sbyin pas phan gdags par bya ba de dag la yang sbyin pas phan 'dogaso// gang la tshul khris
129b4('bum): kyis phran gdags par bya ba de dag la yang tshul khrims kyis ra phan 'dog so// gang la bzod pas phan gdags par bya ba de dag la yang bzod pas phan 'dogs// gang la brtsan 'grus kyi
129b5('bum): phan gdags par bya ba de dag la yang brtson 'grus kyis phan 'dogs so// gang la ting nge 'dzind kyis phan gdags/ nye par bya ba de dag la yang ting nge 'dzind kyis phan 'dogaso
129b6('bum): gang la shes rab kyis phan gdags par bya ba de dag la yang shes rab kyis phan 'dog so// gang la rnam par grol bas phan gdags par bya ba de dag la ni yang rnam par grol bas phan 'dogs
129b7('bum): gang la rnam par grol gi ba'i ye shes mthong bas phan gdags par bya ba de dag la yang / rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong bas phar 'dog so// gang rgyu nad tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la 'tshod
129b8('bum): par bya ba dedag kyang rgyun da su zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la rab tu 'gong do// ga len cig phyir 'ang ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir gyi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu ga dgra com pa 'id dgar byang chu
130a1('bum): myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la rab tu 'god pa de dag kyang bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la rab tu 'god do// de rdzu 'phrul gi rnam pa du ma nyam su/ 
130a2('bum): rnam par 'phrul zhing 'jig rte rang gi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed du 'gro ste/ de 'dod na 'jig rten gi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed po de dag las grub par mngon par bsgrubs te/ 
130a3('bum): sems can rnams kyi bsam pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do// 'jig rten gi khams nas 'jig rtenang gi khams su 'gro ste/ de 'jig rten gi khams de dag mthong nas ci 'dod par sangs
130a4('bum): rgyas kyi zhing yongs su 'dzin te/ ni'adi ltar dper na gzhana'aphrul dbang byed kyi lha'i ris kyi long spyod dang / spyod pa lta bu dag dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing gzhan btsal ba dang bral ba dag
130a5('bum): na long spyod dang / spyod pa gang ji snyed cig yod pa der 'gyu ste/ de rnam par sbyin pa las byung ba'i sbyin pa'i pha rolal tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang / bzod
130a6('bum): pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang / bsam gtang gi pha rolang tu phyind pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang / rnam par sbyin pa las byu / 
130a7('bum): ba'i byang chub kyi lam des las gi rna pa shes pa nyid la spyod cing / chos thams cad yongasu rdzogs pa thob nas/ rnam tha thas cad mkhyen pa nyid rje su thob ste/ gal te ci tsam gzugs mdzes
130a8('bum): bzung ba myed pa dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa yongs su bzung ba myed pa dang / skye mched dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba yongs su bzung ba/ 
130b1('bum): myong ba dang / dge ba dang / myi dge ba dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa dang / zag pa dang bcas pa dang / zag pa myed pa dang / 'dus byas dang / 'dus ma byas kyi chos rnams yongs su
130b2('bum): bzung ba myed pa de bzhin du bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub du mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing der long skyong dang skyid pa bas cad yong su bcud myong bar 'gyur ro// 
130b3('bum): phyir rang 'di sa tshas sa na gyisasu byung bdu lakhrim sa su lung dbyung ba / mams cad yo du myed pa'i phyir mas ca rnas 'tshas stor to/ ra byor lnga pa byang chub ses dpa' sas dang ca ga la kyi pa ma du phyin
130b4('bum): mabyung ba'i'am chos bas cad mtshan ma myod pa dang / byed pa myang ba dang / nga dmyig su myed pa dang / 'byung ba byed pa dang / mngon par 'du bya ba skyed pa dang / mngon par 'dra tha ba sred pa sa mangs rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyong pa'i ma 'as
130b5('bum): rdzogs par byed pa yin te/ rab 'byor de ltar dbyang chubasas pa 'a dras pa' chen po nas rab kyis rolang du phyid da pa la skyong ba'i che chos sa cang mtshan sa byed/ pa dang / byed pa myed pa dag dmyig su myed pa dang / 'byung ba skyed pa dang matsa/ 
130b6('bum): bar 'du bya ba skyed pa la mam sa dang brab pa'i sems kyis pha rol tu phyi nga rnas yong su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa'i bar du longasu rdzogs par 'gyur// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag shus pa las leT drug su bar/ 
130b7('bum): dengs tshe dang ldare parab 'byor gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol do// bcom ldan 'das de ltar chos pas cad dader ma mchis shing mchi ma mchis la rang gi mngan nyid gis stong pa 'di lags na/ ji ltar ba rol du phyin pa drug/ sbyin par 'amangs
130b8('bum): phyim bu dang / rdul khrings kyi la phyind pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus gi pha rol du phyin pa dang / ngas gdan gi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha ro lang du phying pa skom pa lo su rdzogs par dbyur / lag pa dang cas pang/ 
130b9('bum): zag pa myed pa'i chos de dag kyang ji ltar tha dang du gyur par gang rab lags/ ji ltar shes A kyi pha rol du phyind par sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyinang ba 'dus pa lags// ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang / bzod pa'i phan
136a1('bum): can gang ji snyed kyis thos pa de thams cad theg pa gsum la nges par 'gyur te/ rab 'byor de de ltar phan pa chen po dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi pha rol tu
136a2('bum): phyin pa ste/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa de la gnas te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bya'o// rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid thob par byed/ 
136a3('bum): rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rmyi lam lta bu nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga la gnas/ sgra bstan lta bu dang / myig yor lta bu dang / sgyu ma lta bu dang / 
136a4('bum): smyig rgyu lta bu dang / sprul pa lta bu'i nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga la gan sa shing / ting nge 'dzin kyi pha rol tu phyind pa drug yongs su rdzogs par byed do// rab 'byor 'di ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
136a5('bum): tshon po shes rab kyi pha rolang tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ skyil mas tsu bar len pa'i phung po yadu snga la gnas nas/ sgra brnyad lta bu dang // myig yor lta bu dang / sgyu ma lta bu dang / spyig myu lta bu dang / 
136a6('bum): sprul pa lta bu'i nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga la gnas shing ting nge 'dzind kyi pha rol tu phyind pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa yin zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan
136a7('bum): dang po ma nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// bsam gtan gnyis pa dang / bsam gtan gsum pa dang / bsam gtan bzhi pa 'i nye bar bsgrubs te gnas// byams pa chen po dang / snying rje dang / dga' ba dang / btang snyoms
136a8('bum): nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// nam mkha' mthayas skye mched dang / cung zad myed pa'i skye mched dang / 'du shes myed 'dre zhes phyid myi skye mcheda'i lta bar bsgrubs te gan so// stong pa nyid dang / mtshan myed pa dang
136b1('bum): smond pa myed pa'i ting nge 'dzin sgom mo// glog lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin sgom mo// yang dag pa'i ting nge 'dzind bsgom mo// rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas shing / de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin ma rtogs par/ nya
136b2('bum): zos dang thun mong ma yin pa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i ting nge 'dzin gang ji snyed pa dang / gzhan yang ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pa'i tshogs gang ji snyed pa de dag thams cad lus kyi khyab par byas shing
136b3('bum): nye bar bsgrubs te gnas kyang ting nge 'dzin de dag dang / snyoms par 'jug pa'i 'bras bu'i ro myong bar yang myi byed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ doni 'od ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des ting nge 'dzin dag gi
136b4('bum): mtshan nyid myed pa dang / dngos po myeng ba'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid du shes mas na/ mtshan nyid myed pa'i chos kyi ro myong bar byed par yang ga te/ la 'gyur/ dngos po myed pa'i chos kyang dngos po myed pa'i chos
136b5('bum): kyi ro myong bar byed par ga la 'gyur te/ de ro myong bar byed pa myed pa ting nge 'dzin gang gis dbang gang gis kyang gzugs kyi khams sam gzugs myed pa'i skye ba'i khams su skye bar myi 'gyur ro// de
136b6('bum): 'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar des khams de gnyis kyang myi dmyigs/ gang snyoms par 'jug pa dang gang snyoms par 'jug pa de yang myi dmyigs so// de myi dmyigs pas mtshan nyid myed pa'i ting nge 'dzind kyi pha rol tu phyin
136b7('bum): pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do// ting nge 'dzin gyi pha rold tu phyind pa des nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi chos las yongs su 'da'o// rab 'byor kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa'
136b8('bum): sems dpa' chen po ting nge 'dzin gyi pha rol tu phyind pa yongs su rdzogs par bgyis shing nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi sa las yongs su 'da' ba lags// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de de ni 'di ltar
137a1('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos rabasong pa nyid mashin tu bslabs pa dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong ba nyid dang / dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi ba sa zhin bu bskabs pa'i sbyi
137a2('bum): stong pa nyid 'di dag yini d+han zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'as/ yan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir myi 'ong ci'i 'bras bu 'am/ dgra bcom pa nyid dam/ rang byang chub pas/ gang ma gnas par bya/ 
137a3('bum): chos delta bu gang yang myi dmyigs te/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ces bya ba de yang stong pa nyid rnams kyis stong stong stong pa nyid de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nyan thos dang rang
137a4('bum): sangs rgyas kyi sa las yongs su shin tu 'das nas/ byang chub sems dpa'i skyon myed par 'jug go// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i skyon
137a5('bum): ni gang lags smyon myed pa'i na gang lags / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsayang pa/ rab 'byor dmyigs pa thams cad ni byang rkyen sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i skyon no/ myo gyi
137a6('bum): pa thams cad ni skyon myed pa'o// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das dmyigs pa na gang lags/ myi dmyigs pa ni gang lags / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal da pa/ rab 'byor gzugs ni byang chub sems
137a7('bum): sems dpa' chen po'i dmyigs pa'o// rab 'byor da tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dmyigs pa'o// myig dang gzugs ni byang chub seMs
137a8('bum): dpa' chen po'i dmyigs pa'o// rna ba dang / sgra dang / sna dang / dri dang / lce dang / ro dang / lus dang / reg bya dang / yid dang chos ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dmyigs pa'o// myig gi rnam par shes pa dang
137b1('bum): myig gi 'dus te reg pa dang / myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba ni dmyigs pa'o// rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa dang / yod kyi 'dus te reg pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te ren/ 
137b2('bum): pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba ni dmyigs pa'o// sa'i khams dang / chu'i khams dang / mye'i khams dang / rlung ga khams dang / nam mkha'i khams dang / rnam par shes pa'i khams ni dmyigs pa'o// ma rig pa dang
137b3('bum): 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa dang / mying dang gzugs dang / skye mched drug dang / reg pa dang / tshor ba dang / sred pa dang / len pa dang / srid pa dang / skye ba dang / rga shi dmyigs pa'o// pha rol tu phyind pa thams
137b4('bum): cad dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos thams cad dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rdzas dang / tshad myed garnams dang / gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'ju
137b5('bum): pa rnams dang / rnam par tha rad pa rnams dang / mthar dkyi/ sa gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa dang / mngon pa thenas pa dang
137b6('bum): ting nge 'dzind rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / myi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / sa sa yang dag par rig pa zizhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen gyi
137b7('bum): dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad ni dmyigs pa'o// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar ni dmyigs pa ste skyon no// rab 'byor skyon myed pa na gang la gzugs dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang
137b8('bum): 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa dang / skye mched dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang / pha rol tu phyind pa thams cad dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos thams cad dang / 'bras/ 
140a1('bum): pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad myed pa rnams dang / gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par tha rad pa brgyad dang / mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par
140a2('bum): 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams dang / ting nge 'dzind rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / myi
140a3('bum): 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad la mi gnas/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi bar dang chos de
140a4('bum): ngag gi brjod pa yang dmyigs su myed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor de de ni 'di ltar gzugs ni rang bzhin myed de/ gang la rang bzhin myed pa de ni brjod du myed pa'o// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 
140a5('bum): 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa la rang bzhin myed de/ gang la rang bzhin myed pa de ni brjod du myed pa'o// skye mched dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la rang bzhin myed de/ gang la rang
140a6('bum): bzhin myed pa de ni brjod du myed pa'o// pha rol tu phyind pa thams cad dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum bcu thams cad la rang bzhin myed de/ gang la rang bzhin myed pa de ni brjod du myed
140a7('bum): 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad myed pa rnams dang / gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thard pa brgyad dang / mtha rad kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par
140a8('bum): 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smond pa myed pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams la rang bzhin myed de/ gang la rang bzhin myed pa de ni brjod du myed pa'o// de bzhin
140b1('bum): gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / myi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa pazhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad la rang bzhin myed de/ gang la rang / 
140b2('bum): bzhin myed pa de ni brjod du myed pa'o// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar la rang bzhin myed de/ gang la rang bzhin myed pa de ni brjod du myed pa'o// rab 'byor de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
140b3('bum): po'i skyon myed pa ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i skyon myed par zhugs pa/ ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pa thams cad dang // yongs su rdzogs par byed pa de ni ga ting nge 'dzin dang
140b4('bum): snyoms par 'jug pa'i dbang gis myi skye na/ 'dod chags so zhe sdang ngam/ gti mug gis skye bar myi 'gyur nga zhing nye bar gnas te/ de'i las mngon par 'du byed pa dang / las de mngon par 'dus
140b5('bum): byas pas/ 'gro ba lnga'i 'khor bar ltung bar 'gyur ba lta ci smos/ de ni gnas myed do gzhan du ni sgyu ma lta bu'i chos rnams la gnas shing sems can thams cad kyi don byed de/ seMs
140b6('bum): can rnams sgyu ma yang dmyigs pa myed de/ de sems can myi dmyigs pas sems can rnams yongs su sbyin par byed cing sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su 'dzin do// rab 'byor de de ltar na byang chub ses
140b7('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ ting nge 'dzind kyi pha rol tu phyind pa yongs su rdzogs par byas nas/ chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'i bar du ste/ myi dmyigs pa'i 'khor
140b8('bum): lo dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smond pa myed pa'i 'khor lo bskor ro// rab 'byor de gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ chos
141a1('bum): 5/ thams cad kyisems bur yongs sugs so// chos thams cad smra brnyanas bu dang / myig yong sa bur dang / sgyums bu dang / sbyin spyas bu dang / sprul pa gzung yongs sugs so// gsos
141a2('bum): bcom ldan 'das ji slar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen thogs rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ ji ltar na chos thams rmil ma k+ta bur yang dag po jis pa bzhin du yongs su 'chal ba lags/ 
141a3('bum): ji ltar na chos thams cad sgra banan lta bu dang / myig yong lta bu dang / sgyu ma lta bu dang / smyig rgyus bu dang / sprud pa lta bur yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du yongs su 'chal ba lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
141a4('bum): bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de 'di la byang chub semasadapa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i che/ rmi lam lta bu myi mthong ngo // rmi lam mthong ba myi mthog
141a5('bum): sgra brnyad nyan pa myi mthong ngo // myig yor myi mthong / myig yo mthong ba myi mthong ngo // sgyu ma myi mthong ngo // sgyu ma mthong myi mthong ngo smyig rgyu myi mthong ngo // smyig rgyu mthong ba myi mthong ngo // sprul pa kyi
141a6('bum): mthong ngo // sprul pa mthong ba mya mthong ngo // de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams kyi rmi la mi ni phyin ci log go// sgra brnyan ni phyin ci log go// myig yor na phyin de ci log go/ sgyu ma ni phyin ci log/ 
141a7('bum): smyig rgyu ni phyin ci log go// sprul pa ni phyind ci log go// dgra bcom pa ni rmi lam myi mthong ngo // myi lam mthong ba myi mthong ngo // sgra brnyan myi thos so// sgra brnyan nyan pa myi mthong ngo // myig yor myi mthong ngo // 
141a8('bum): myig yor mthong ba myi mthong ngo // sgyu ma myi mthong ngo // sgyu mthong ba myi mthong ngo // smyig rgyu myi mthong ngo // smyig rgyu mthong ba myi mthong ngo // sprul pa myi mthong ngo // sprul pa mthong ba myi mthong ngo // rang sangs rgyas kyi/ 
141b1('bum): bar dang byang chub sems dpa' dang / de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nom las myi mthong ngo // gzigs so/ myi lam mthong ba myi gzigs so// sgra bstan myigasan to// 
141b2('bum): sgra brnyan pa mya gzigs so// myig yor myi gzigs so// myig yor mthong myi gzigs so// sgyu ma myi gzigs so// sgyu ma mthong ba myi gzigs so// smyig rgyu myi mthong ngo // smyig rgyu mthong myi gzigs so// 
141b3('bum): sprul pa myi gzigs so// sprul pa mthong ba myi gzigs so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar yang dag par ma yin pas/ chos thams cad ni dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid de/ yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa dang mnye ba ste/ 
141b4('bum): yang dag pa ma yin pa'i phyir/ chos thams cad yongs su grub pa myed na/ de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rolang tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ dngos po myed pa'i 'du shes sam/ 
141b5('bum): yongs su grub pa'i 'du shes sam/ yang dag pa'i 'dug/ das su 'gyur ba lta ga la yod de/ gang de ni gnas myed do// de ci phyir zhe na/ gal te chos la la zhig gi ngo bo nyid dam/ yongs su
141b6('bum): grub pa 'am/ yang dag par gyur pa zhig dmyigs na ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par myi 'gyur // byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de ltar spyod pa ni/ 
141b7('bum): gzugs la chags pa myed do// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes la chags pa myed do// khams dang / skye mched dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la chags pa myed do// 'dod pa'i
141b8('bum): khams la chags pa myed do// gzugs kyi khams sam/ gzugs myed pa'i khams la chags pa myed do// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa la chags pa myed do// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa dang / brtson
142a1('bum): 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang / bsam gtan gi pha rol tu phyind pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la chags pa myed do// nang stong pa nyid la chags pa myed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngag
142a2('bum): nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar la chags pa myed do// byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum bcu rtsa bdun la chags pa myed do// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad myed pa rnams dang / 
142a3('bum): gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thard pa brgyad dang / mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa dang
142a4('bum): mngon par shes pa rnams la chags pa myed do// ting nge 'dzind dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams la chags pa myed do// de bzhin gshegs pa'i srogs rnams dang / myi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag pa
142a5('bum): rig pa rnams dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams la chags pa myed do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi bar la
142a6('bum): chags pa myed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di la gnas shing sa dang po yongs su rdzogs par byed do// de la 'dod pa'i 'dod chags myi bskyed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar
142a7('bum): des sa de yang myi dmyigs na/ de la 'dod pa'i 'dod chags skyed par lta ga 'gyur te// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing / sa gnyis pa dang / sa gsum pa dang / sa bzhi pa dang / sa lnga
142a8('bum): pa dang / sa drug pa dang / sa bdun pa dang / sa rgyad pa dang / sa dgu pa dang / sa bcu pa yongs su rdzogs par byed de/ de la 'dod pa'i 'dod chags myi bskyed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni skar des sa de
142b1('bum): myi dmyigs na/ de la 'dod pa'i 'dod chags skyed par lta ga la 'gyur/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod cing / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa de yang myi dmyigs so// de myi dmyigs pa'i
142b2('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa der chos thams cad kyang 'dus par mthong ste/ chos de dag kyang myi dmyigs so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar
142b3('bum): chos de dgra dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa de la gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar chos de dag ni tha dad du bya ba gang yang myed de/ chos kyi dbyings su
142b4('bum): bstan pa dang / de bzhin du bstan pa dang / yang dag/ pa'i mtha' bstand pa dang / chos thams cad dbyer myed do// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ltar chos thams cad
142b5('bum): dbyer ma mchis pa lags/ ji ltar dge ba dang myi dge ba'i chos rnams la bstan pa lags/ ji ltar 'jig rtend pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos rnams bstand pa lags
142b6('bum): ji ltar 'jig rten zag pa dang bcas pa dang / zag pa ma mchis pa'i chos rnams bstand pa lags/ ji ltar 'dus byas dang 'dus ma byas kyi chos rnams bstan pa la gas pa/ bcom ldan 'das
142b7('bum): kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor dade de ji snyam du tsasems/ chos rnams kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de la 'dus byas sam/ 'dus ma byas sam/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu 'am/ lan cig
142b8('bum): phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid dam/ rang byang chub bam/ sems gang yang brjod du yod dam/ gsold pa bcom ldan 'das de ni ma leg so
143a1('bum): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal da pa/ rab 'byor de de lta bas na/ khyod kyis rnam grangs des na 'di ltar chos thams cad dbyer myed pa dang / chos thams cad mtshan nyid myed pa dang / skye ba myed pa dang / 
143a2('bum): 'byung ba myed par rig par bya'o// rab 'byor dang sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe/ gzugs zhes bya ba 'am/ tshor ba zhes bya ba 'am/ 'du shes ces bya ba 'am/ 'du byed ces bya ba 'am/ rnam par
143a3('bum): shes pa zhes bya ba 'am/ skye mched dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba zhes bya ba 'am/ pha rol tu phyind pa rnams dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams zhes
143a4('bum): bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi bar zhe sa bya ba 'am/ dge ba 'am/ myi dge ba'i chos rnams zhes bya ba ra/ nyon mongs pa dang bcas pa dang / nyon mongs pa myed pa dang / 
143a5('bum): 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rtend las 'das pa dang / zag pa dang bcas pa dang / zag pa myed pa dang / thun mong dang / thun mong ma yin pa dang / 'dus byas dang / 'dus ma byas kyi chos rnams zhes
143a6('bum): bya ba 'am/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu zhes bya ba 'am/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu zhe sa dang / dgra bcom pa nyid ces bya ba da'am// rang byang chub ces bya ba 'am/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi
143a7('bum): zhes bya ba'i chos gang gis rang bzhin yang myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor de de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gas rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung
143a8('bum): bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi bar du/ myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin la mkhas par bya'o// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen/ 
143b1('bum): po chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin la mkhas pa ni/ byang chub kyi lam yongs su rdzogs par byed do// sems can rnams yongs su smyin par byed do// sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su 'dzin do// de la gnas te bla na myed
143b2('bum): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nas/ sems can rnams ci nas kyang dul bar gyur da naso// srid pa gsum na myi snang ba de ltar rnam par btul lo// rab 'byor de ltar na
143b3('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos mtshan ma'i tshul gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la bslab par bya'o// // shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa stong phrag nyi shu lnga pa las// le'u drug bcu gcig pa'o/ 
143b4('bum): de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor kyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad rmi lam lta bu dngos po ma mchis pa'i ngo bo nyid rang gi ma
143b5('bum): nyid stong pa nyid rnams la 'di dag ni dge ba'i chos so// 'di dag ni myi dge ba'i chos so// 'di dag ni 'jig rten pa'i chos so// 'di dag ni 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos so// 'di dag ni zag
143b6('bum): pa dang bcas pa'i chos so// 'di dag ni zag pa myed pa'i chos so// 'di dag ni 'dus byas kyi chos so// 'di dag ni 'dus ma byas kyi choso/ 'di dag ni rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon tu bya ba'i rgyur/ 
143b7('bum): 'gyur ba'o// 'di dag ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid kyi 'bras bu mngon du bya ba'i rgyur 'gyur ba'o// 'di dag ni rang byang chub kyi rgyur 'gyur ba'o// 'di
143b8('bum): dag ni bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi rgyur 'gyur ba'o// zhes bya bar ji ltar rnam par 'gyur// chos thams sgra brnyan lta bu dang / myig yor lta bu dang / sgyu ma lta bug/ smyig rgyu lta bu/ sgrub pa/ 
144a1('bum): lta bu/ dngos po ma mchis pa dngos po ma mchis/ ngo bo nyid rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong pa'i chos rnams la 'di dag ni dge ba'i chos so// 'di dag ni myi dge ba'i chos so// 'di dag ni 'jig rten
144a2('bum): 'i chos so// 'di dag ni 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos so// 'di dag ni zag pa dang bcas pa'i chos so// 'di dag ni zag pa myed pa'i chos so// 'di dag ni 'dus byas kyi chos so// 'di dag ni 'dus ma byas
144a3('bum): kyi chos so// 'di dag ni rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon tu bya ba'i rgyur 'gyur ba'o// 'di dag ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu mngon du bya'i/ 
144a4('bum): rgyur 'gyur ba'o// 'di dag ni rang byang chub kyi rgyur gyur/ ba'o// 'di dag ni bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub da kyi rgyur 'gyur ba'o// zhes bya bar ji ltar rnam par brgod par 'gyu
144a5('bum): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ 'di la byang chub sems byis pa thos pa dang myi ldan pa so so'i skye bo ni rmi lam yang dmyigs la/ rmi lam mthong ba yang dmyigs so// 
144a6('bum): sgra brnyan yang dmyigs la/ sgra brnyan nyan pa yang dmyigs so// myig yor yang dmyigs la/ myig yor mthong ba yang dmyigs so// sgyu ma yang dmyigs la/ sgyu ma mthong ba yang dmyigs so// smyig rgyu yang
144a7('bum): dmyigs la/ smyig rgyu mthong ba yang dmyigs so// sprul pa yang dmyigs la/ sprul pa mthong ba yang dmyigs so// des rmi lam yang dmyigs la/ rmi lam mthong ba yang dmyigs so// sprul pa yang dmyigs
144a8('bum): sprul pa mthong ba yang dmyigs so// lus dang ngag dang yid kyis bde ba'i 'dus bya bar yang mngon par 'du byed do// lus dang ngag dang / yid myi dge ba'i 'du bya ba la mkhas mngon par 'du byed do// lus dang
144b1('bum): ngag dang yid kyi bsod nams dang / bsod nams ma yin pa dang / myig yor gi 'du bya ba yang mngon par 'du byed do// de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa/ 
144b2('bum): mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid gnyis la gnas shing / sems can rnams la chos ston date/ khams gsum pa 'od ni stong pa ste/ 'odi la gzugs pa
144b3('bum): tshor ba 'am/ 'du shes sam/ 'du byed dam/ rnam pa shes pa 'am/ skye mched rnams dang / khams rnams myed do// 'di ni rmi lam/ 'di ni sgra brnyan/ 'di ni myig yod/ 'di ni sgyu ma/ 'di ni smyig rgyun 'di
144b4('bum): ni sprul pa ste/ 'di la phung po rnams sam/ skye mched rnams sam/ khams rnams myed do// 'di la rmi lam rnams myed do// rmi lam mthong ba myed do// sgra brnyan myed do// sgra brnyan nyan pa myed do// myig yor myed
144b5('bum): myig yor mthong ba myong do// sgyu ma myed do// sgyu ma mtho nga ba myed do// smyig rgyu myed do// smyig rgyu mthong ba myed do// sprul pa/ myed do// sprul par byed pa myed do// chos 'di dag thams cad ni
144b6('bum): dngos po myed pa/ dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid yin na/ 'on kyang khyed ni phung po lnga myed pa la phung po lngar 'du shes pa/ skye mched myed pa la skye mched du 'du shes pa/ khams myed pa la khams su
144b7('bum): 'du shes pa dag ste/ chos 'di dag thams cad ni rten cing 'brel bar bar 'byung ba phyin ci ma log las skyes pa las kyi rnam par smind pa la yongs su bzung ba yin na/ khyed rnams ci'i phyir chos thams cad kyi dngos
144b8('bum): po myed pa la dngos po'i 'du shes su byed de/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mkhas pas sems can ser sna can dag ser sna las rnam par 'jog
145a1('bum): nas/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa la sbyar te/ sbyin pa'i yongs su btang ba de yang de dag la long spyod chen po'i rgyur 'gyur ro// des de dag las bskyod nas// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la
145a2('bum): sbyor te/ tshul khrims yang dag par blangs pa de yang / de dag la man ris su skye ba'i rgyur 'gyur ro// des de dag las bskyod nas ting nge 'dzind sbyor te// ting nge 'dzin de yang de dag la tshangs pa'i 'jig rten du skye bo'i rgyur
145a3('bum): 'gyur ro// des de dag las bskyod nas bsam gtan bzhi pa dang po la sbyar te/ bsam gtan dang po las bsamam gtan gnyis pa/ bsam gtan gnyis pa las bsam gtan gsum pa/ bsam gtan gsum
145a4('bum): pa lus bsam gtan bzhi pa/ bsam gtan bzhi pa las nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa// nam ma'/ mtha' yas skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa las rnam
145a5('bum): shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa/ rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa las// cung zad myed pa'i skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa/ cung zad myed pa'i
145a6('bum): skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa las langs nas/ 'du shes myed 'du shes myed myin skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa la sbyor ro// des sbyin pa dang sbyin pa'i 'bras bu dam pa de las rnam grangs du mas bskyod de/ 
145a7('bum): phung po ma lus pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su dbugs 'byind to// gzhog go// rab tu dgod do// des tshul khrims dang tshul khrims kyi 'bras bu de las rnam grangs du mas skyod de/ phung po ma lus pa'i mya ngan/ 
145a8('bum): las 'das pa'i dbyings su rab tu gzhog go// des ting nge 'dzin da dang ting nge 'dzin gi 'bras bu de las rnam grangs du mas skyod de/ phung po lus pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su rab tu gzhog go// dran pa nye ba/ 
145b1('bum): gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa ban/ 
145b2('bum): bsam gtan bzhi dang / rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo gsum dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthard kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / mngon par shes pa rnams dang / ting nge 'dzind rnams dang / gzungs kyi
145b3('bum): sgo rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / myi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad la
145b4('bum): dag par stond to// yang dag par skul lo// yang dag par gzeng stod do// yang dag par dga' bar byed do// 'dul lo// gzhog go// rab tu 'god do// de zag pa myed pa'i chos gzugs myed pa/ bstan du myed
145b5('bum): pa thogs pa myed pa/ de dag gis gang rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu don du gnyer ba de dag rgyu nad tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la rab tu 'god do// gang lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu don du gnyer
145b6('bum): ba de dag lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la rab tu 'god do// gang phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i la rab tu don du gnyer ba de dag phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la rab tu 'god do// gang dgra bcom pa nyid kyi don du gnyer
145b7('bum): ba de dag dgra bcom pa nyid la rab tu 'god do// gang rang byang chub kyi don du gnyer ba de dag rang byang chub la rab tu 'god do// gang bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu don du gnyer ba de dag la byang chub kyi
145b8('bum): lam la brjod cing ston to// yang dag par skul lo// yang dag par gzeng stod do// yang dag par dga' bar byed do// 'dul lo// gzhog go// rab tu 'god do// rab 'byor de de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' ses dpa'
146a1('bum): chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ chos thams cad rmi lam lta bu dang / sgra brnyan lta bu dang / myig yor lta bu dang / sgyu ma lta bu dang / smig rgyu lta bu dang / sprul pa lta bu dang / dngos/ 
146a2('bum): po myed pa/ dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong pa la rgod par bya'o// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor kyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// 
146a3('bum): bcom ldan 'das de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ chos thams cad dngos myed pa'i ma mchis pa'i ngo bo nyid dang / chos thams cad mtha' las
146a4('bum): 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid dang / 'di dag ni dge ba'i chos so// 'di dag ni myi dge ba'i chos / 'di dag ni 'jig rtend pa'i chos so// 'di dag ni 'jig rten
146a5('bum): las 'das pa'i chos so// 'di dag ni kha na ma tho dang bcas pa'i chos so// 'di dag ni kha na ma tho ba myed pa'i chos so// 'di dag ni zag pa dang bcas pa'i chos so// 'di dag ni zag pa myed kyi
146a6('bum): pa'i chos so// 'di dgra ni 'dus byas kyi chos so// 'di dag ni 'dus ma byas kyi chos so// 'di dag ni rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon du bya ba'i rgyur 'gyur ba'o// 'di dag ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu
146a7('bum): dang / phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu mngon du bya ba'i rgyur 'gyur ba'o// 'di dag ni rang byang chub kyi rgyur 'gyur ba'o// 'di dag na bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi rgyur
146a8('bum): 'gyur ba'o zhes bgyi bar rnam par bgod par bya'i de ni ngo mtshar te/ rmad du byung ba'i chos so// de skad ces gsold pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor da la 'di skad ces bka' stsal te/ 
146b1('bum): rab 'byor de de bzhin no// deng bzhin te/ de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang ma 'di nyid la spyod pa'i tshe/ chos thams cad dngos po myed pa'ing banyid dag/ 
146b2('bum): chos thams cad mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid la 'di dag na dge ba'i chos so// 'di dag ni 'jig rten pa'i chos so// 'di dag ni 'jig rten las 'das pa'i
146b3('bum): chos so// 'di dag ni kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa'i chos so// 'di dag ni zag pa dang bcas pa'i chos so// 'di dag ni zag myed pa'i chos so// 'di dag ni 'dus byas kyi chos so// 'dus ma byas kyi chos so// 
146b4('bum): 'di dag ni rgyu nad tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon du bya ba'i rgyur 'gyur ba'o// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu mngon du bya ba'i rgyur 'gyur
146b5('bum): 'o// 'di dag ni rang byang chub kyi rgyur 'gyur ba'o// 'di dag ni bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi rgyur 'gyur/ ba'o zhes bya bar rnam par brgod par byed pa de ni ngo mtshar te
146b6('bum): rmad du byung ba'i chos// rab 'byor da gal te khyod kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang gis ngo mtshar rmad kyis de shes kyang nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis byang chub sems
146b7('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po de la slar phan gdags par bya ba slar ma yin te/ khyed cad thams cad kyis kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i chos de zil gyis mnan par myi nus so// rab 'byor/ 
146b8('bum): kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad la ma mchis pa'i ngo mtshar rmad kyis chos byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la mchis pa ljags// bcom ldan
147a1('bum): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// rnarab 'byor da de'i phyir shin tu legs par nyon la yid la gyis shig dang bshad par bya'o// rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes/ 
147a2('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam par smind pa las byung ba'i pha rol tu phyind pa drug la gnas/ rnam par sbyin pa las byung ba'i stong pa nyid thams cad dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos su
147a3('bum): bcu rtsa bdun dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad myed pa bzhi dang / gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi pa dang / rnam par tha rad pa brgyad dang / mthard kyis
147a4('bum): gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smond pa myed pa dang / mngon par shes pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang ka gzus kyi sgo dang / de bzhin gshegs pa
147a5('bum): stobs bcu dang / myi 'jigs pa ban dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad la
147a6('bum): gnas shing / phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gi khams dag du song zhing sems can gang la sbyin pas phan gdags par bya ba de dag la ni sbyin pas phan 'dogs so// sems can gang la tshul khrims dang / 
147a7('bum): bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / ting nge 'dzind dang / shes rab kyis phan gdags par bya ba de dag la ni shes rab kyis phan 'dogs so// sems can gang bsam gtan dang po dang / bsam gtan gnyis
147a8('bum): gnyis pa dang / bsam gtan gsum pa dang / bsam gtan gzhi pas pan gdags par bya ba de dag la ni bsam/ gtan bzhi pas pan 'dogs so// sems can gang la nam mkha' mnga' yas
147b1('bum): skye mchod kyi snyoms par 'jug pa dang / rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa dang / cung zad myed pa'i skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa dang / 'du shes myed 'du shes myed myin skye mched kyi snyos/ 
147b2('bum): par 'jug pa la phan gdags par bya ba de dag la ni 'du shes myed 'du shes myed myid myin skye sa mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pas phan 'dogs so// sems can gang la byams pas phan 'dogs par bya ba de dag
147b3('bum): ni byams pas phan 'dogs so// sems can gang la snying rje dang / dga' ba dang / btang snyoms kyis phan gdags par bya ba de dag la mi btang snyoms kyis phan 'dogs so// sems can gang la dran pa nye bar
147b4('bum): gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul li/ rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'dra
147b5('bum): pa'i bden pa rnams dang / rnam par tha rad pa brgyad dang / mthard kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smond pa myed pa dang / 
147b6('bum): mngon par shes pa dang / tshang nge 'dzin dang / gzungs kyi sgo dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / myi 'jigs pa yin dang / sa so yang dag par rig pa min dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres
147b7('bum): ba bcwo brgyad dang / snying rje chen pos phan gdags par bya ba de dag la ni snying rje chen pos 'dogaso par byed do// gang la rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gyis phan gdags par bya ba de dag la ni rnam pa thams
147b8('bum): cad mkhyend pa nyid kyis phan 'dogs so// rab 'byor kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sbyin pas sems can rnams la phan 'dogs pa lags// bcom ldan
148a1('bum): 'das kyis bka' stsal dpa/ rab 'byor nga 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i che/ pas 'dod pa rnams la zas/ skom 'dod pa rnams la naH/ 
148a2('bum): gnon pa 'dod pa rnams la bdod pa/ phreng ba 'dod pa rnams la phreng ba/ spos 'dod pa rnams la spos/ byug pa 'dod pa rnams la byug pag/ gos 'dod pa rnams la gos kamal cha 'dod pa rnams la mal chan/ gnas 'do/ 
148a3('bum): pa rnams la gnas/ myi'i yo byad ci yang rung ba'i bar du yongs su gtong ste/ ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la 'dul zhing yongs su gtong ba dang / 'di
148a4('bum): ltar rang sangs rgyas rnams dang / dgra bcom pa rnams dang / phyir myi 'ong ba rnams dang / rgyun tu zhugs pa rnams dang ga yang dag par spong ba rnams dang / yang dag par spong ba rnams la yongs
148a5('bum): su gtong ba de bzhin du myir gyur rad pa rnams dang / de bzhin du byom song gi skye gnas su rtogs pa'i sems can thams cad la yang tha dad du bya bar myed pa'i 'du shes nye bar gzhag cing sbyin pa yongs su gtong ngo // 
148a6('bum): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar chos thams cad du bya ba myed pa ste/ des tha dad du bya ba myed pa'i sbyin pa byin pas/ tha dad du bya ba myed pa'i chos 'di lta ste rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid thob par 'gyur ro// rab 'byord
148a7('bum): gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byol song gi skye gnas su gtogs pa'i sems can rnams sbyin pa'i gnas ma yin pa mthong bas/ 'di snyam du bdag gi sbyin gnas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
148a8('bum): rgyas te/ byol song gi skye gnas su rtogs pa'i sems can ma yin no snyam na byang chub sems dpa'i sems dpa' chen po'i chos ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i byang chub tu/ 
148b1('bum): sems bskyed nas/ 'di ltar bdag gis sems can 'di dag la sbyin pas phan gdags par bya'o// 'di dag la ni phan gdags par myi bya'o zhes bya bar bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag
148b2('bum): par zhugs pa ma yin te/ de dag sbyin pas phan gdags par byas nas/ rgyal rigs che'i zhing mtho' ba'i rigs su skyes te/ bram ze'i rigs che zhing mtho ba'i rigs su skye/ khyim bdag che zhing mtho ba'i
148b3('bum): rigs su skye bar 'gyur te/ sbyin pa de nyid kyis phan gdags par bya ba de dag theg pa gsum gos rim gis phung po ma lus pa'i nga mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su mya ngan las 'das par 'gyur ro// gal te byang chub
148b4('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la skye bo'i tshogs thams cad kyis bsad par gsol ba btab na/ de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin no snyam pas/ myi sbyin no snyam pa'i sems gzhan skyed
148b5('bum): par myi bya/ 'khrug pa myed pa'i sems kyis skye bo'i tshogs de dag la sbyin par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar de ni sems rna can thams cad kyi don du bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs
148b6('bum): pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs pa'i phyir gal te rnam parartog na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag dang / byang chub se mas dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag dang / rang sangs rgyas
148b7('bum): rnams dang / dgra bcom pa rnams dang / slob pa rnams dang / lha dang / myi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gis smad par myi 'gyur te/ de la thog mar sems can thams cad kyi 'gon gis shig
148b8('bum): ce 'am/ gnas dang skyabs dang / dpung gnyen gis shig ces sus gsol ba btab ces smad par 'gyur ro// rab 'byor de gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i drung du myir gyurd pa 'am/ myi
149a1('bum): ma yin par gyur pa dag 'ongs nas bdag ni slongs mo po zhes yan lag dang nyin lag bcad par gsol ba btab na/ de'i tshe des sbyin nam myi smin pa'i sems gnyis su bskyed par myi bya'o// de ci'i phyir/ 
149a2('bum): zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des sems can rnams don du chang du bsams te/ lus 'dis bdag gis sems can thams cad kyi don bya 'ogs lus yongs su bzung ba nas de rje/ 
149a3('bum): snyam du bdag gis sems can 'di dag gi don du lus yongs su bzung bas de dag bslang myi dgos par khye zhing deng shig ces/ sems skyed par bya ste/ rab 'byor de de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
149a4('bum): pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la bslab par bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos slongs mo po mthong na 'di snyam du chos 'di dag thams cad kyi rang ban
149a5('bum): ni dmyigs su mye ngan/ 'di la su zhig sbyin pa yongs su gangasu la ni sbyin par bya/ ci zhig ni sbyin par bya zhes sems skyed pa bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar chos de dag ni mtha' las 'das
149a6('bum): la stong pa nyid kyis stong ste/ stong pa nyid la ni gang yang yongs su gtong ba 'am/ gang las kyang 'phrog par myi byed do// rab 'byor de de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu
149a7('bum): byind pa dang / 'di lta ste/ nang stong pa nyid dang / dngos po myed pa'i stong pa nyid kyi bar la bslab par bya'o// de stong pa nyid la gnas shing sbyin pa gtong na/ de sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa rtag tu rgyun myi 'chad par
149a8('bum): rdzogs par 'gyur te/ de sbyin po pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs pa des/ byi nang gi dngos po brtad cing bdubs kyang / bdags su mang thub pa mam bcad do mam pa'i sems kyi 'byung ngo // rab 'byod pa
149b1('bum): 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gis 'jig rten la rnam par gzigs na/ shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag chen du bsams te/ 
149b2('bum): sems can dmyal ba chen po dag tu dong zhing / sems can dmyal ba chen po'i sdug bsngal zhi bar byas nas/ rdzu 'phrul gi cho 'phrul dang / yongs su bstan pa'i cho 'phrul dang / rjes su bstand pa'i cho 'phrul dang / 
149b3('bum): cho 'phrul gsum po de dag gis/ sems can dmyal ba'i sems can de dag la chos stond cing / rdzu 'phrul gi cho 'phrul gis/ sems can dmyal ba'i chen po'i sdug bsngal zhi bar byas te/ yongs su bstan pa'i
149b4('bum): cho 'phrul dang / rjes su bstand pa'i cho 'phrul gis chos stond pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / dga' ba chen po dang / btang snyoms
149b5('bum): chen pos chos ston te/ de sems can dmyal ba'i sems/ can de dge/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag la / sems mos par byas shing sems can dmyal ba chen po de dag nas
149b6('bum): rnam par ldang ba dang / de dag sems can dmyal ba chen po de dag gis rnam par langs nas/ lha dang / myi dang bskal pa mnyam par skyes shing / rim gis yong theg pa gsum kyis mthar phyind pa mthong ngo // rang
149b7('bum): 'byor da ngas 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gis 'jig rten da la rnam par gzigs na/ lho dang / nub dang / byang dang / byang shar dang / shar lho dang / lho nub dang / nub byang dang / 'og dang steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rtend gi
149b8('bum): khams gang gi'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag chen du bsams te/ sems can dmyal ba'i chen po dag tu dong zhing / sems can dmyal ba chen po'i sdug bsngal zhi bar byas nas/ 
150a1('bum): rdzu 'phrul te/ cho 'phrul gi tshe 'phrul dang / yongs su bskrund pa'i cho 'phrul dang / rjes su bstan pa'i tshe 'phrul dang / cho 'phrul gsum po de dag gis sems can dmyal ba'i sems can de dag la chos ston sa
150a2('bum): rdzu 'phrul gi tshe 'phrul gi/ cho 'phrul gis sems can dmyal ba chen po'i sdug bsngal de dag zhi bar byas nas yongs su bstand pa'i cho 'phrul dang / rjes su sand pa'i cho 'phrul gis sems can rnams la chos ston/ 
150a3('bum): pa dang / byang chub sem sa dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag la byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / dga' ba chen po dang / btang snyoms chen pos stond te/ des sems can dmyal ba'i sems can
150a4('bum): dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag la mos par byas shing / sems can dmyal ba chen po de dag nas rnam pa ldang ba dang / de dag sems can dmyal ba chen po de dag nas/ 
150a5('bum): rnam par langs nas lha dang myi dang skal ba mnyam par skyes shing rim gis theg pa gsum gas sdug bsngal mthard 'byin pa mtho rab 'byor dngas 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gis 'jig
150a6('bum): rten la rnam par gzigs na/ shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gi khams gang ga klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la bsnyen bkur byed pa rnas
150a7('bum): mthong ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la dgyes par myi 'gyur ba ma yin gyi/ dgyes par 'gyur nga ba dang / thugs su myi byon pa ma yin gyi// thug su byon
150a8('bum): pa dang / mthus pa ma yin gyi// gus bzhin tu dang po'i bsnyen bkur byed cing // byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'i chen po de dag sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis chos bstan pa de dag gis yid 'dzin/ 
150b1('bum): cing bzung nas bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi bar du 'chang zhing nam du yang chud myi gzond to// rab 'byor dngas 'di nyid nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gis 'jig
150b2('bum): rten la rnam par gzigs na/ lho dang nub dang byang dang byang shar dang / shar lho dang / lho nub dang / nub byang dang / 'og dang / steng gi phyogs gi 'jig rtend gi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ byang chub
150b3('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la bsnyen bkur byed pa rnams mthong ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la dgas
150b4('bum): par myi 'gyur ba ma yin gi/ dges par 'gyur ba dang / thugs su myi byon pa ma yin gyi/ thugs su byon pa dang / ma gus pa ma yin gi/ gus pa shin tu dad pas bsnyen bkur byed cing / byang chub seMs
150b5('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen/ po de dag sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag chos gang bstand pa de yang 'dzind cing bzung nas bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par
150b6('bum): rdzogs par sangs ma rgyas kyi bar du 'chang zhing nam du yang chud myi gzond to// dum bu bzhi pa bam po bcu gcig pa
150b7('bum): rab 'byor dngas yang 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gis 'jig rten la rnam par gzigs na/ shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
150b8('bum): chen po dag byol sod kyi skye gnas pa'i sems can rnams kyi don du bdag yongs su gtong bar byed cing / de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag yan lag dang nyin lag bcad cing btubs te/ 
151a1('bum): phyogs btsurnam par 'thong ba dang / byol song gi skye gnas su gtogs pa'i sems can de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen tha dag pa/ rin thos nasan/ de dag byang chub sas/ 
151a2('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag la byams pa za pa dang / de dag byams pa thob pa des byob song gi skye gnas nas rnam par ldang zhing / rnam par langs nas lha dang phyi'i nang du skye ba dang / de dag du skyes nas kyang
151a3('bum): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams mnyes par byed pa dang / de dag sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de de dag la bsnyen bkur byed pa dang / de dag sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das las chos bos te/ de bzhin nyid du
151a4('bum): nan tan byed pa dang / de dag nyan thos kyi theg pa'am/ rangs ngas rgyas kyi theg pa'am/ theg pa chen po 'am/ theg pa gsum po/ da de dag gis phung po ma lus pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyingasu
151a5('bum): rim gis yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa mthong ste/ nar 'byor de de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang bla na myeng ba yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed cing
151a6('bum): de bzhin nyid du nan tan byed pa de dag ni de ltar phan pa mang po byed po'o// rab 'byor dngas 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gis 'jig rten da la rnam par gzigs nas/ lho dang / nub dang / byang dang / byang shar dang / shar
151a7('bum): dang / lho nub dang / nub byang dang / 'og dang steng gi phyogs gi 'jig rten kyi kham chas gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag byol song gi skye gnas pa'i sems can
151a8('bum): rnams kyi don du bdag yongs su gtong ba byed cing / sa de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag yan lag dang nyin lag bcad cing labatubs te phyogs bcur rnam par 'thor ba dang / byol song gyi skye gnas su
151b1('bum): gtogs pa'i sems can de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag gi sha zos nas/ de dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag la byams pa dang / de dag byams pa des byol song
151b2('bum): gi skye gnas rnam par ldang zhing / rnam par langs nas lha dang myi'i nang du skye ba dang / de dag tu skyes nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams mnyes par byed pa dang / de dag sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
151b3('bum): de dag gi bsnyen bkur byed pa dang / de dag sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag las chos thos de de bzhin nyid du nan tan byed pa dang / de dag nyan thos kyi theg pa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa 'am/ theg pa chen
151b4('bum): po 'am/ theg pa gsum po de dag gis phung po ma lus pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su rim gis yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa mthong ste/ rab 'byor de de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems
151b5('bum): dpa' chen gang bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed cing cing de bzhin nyid du nan tan byed pa de dag ni de ltar/ phan pa mang po byed do// pa'o// rab 'byor dngas 'di nas sangs rgyas
151b6('bum): kyi spyan gis 'jig rten la rnam par gzigs na/ shar phyog sa kyi 'jig rten gi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can yi dgas kyi yul ba rdzas
151b7('bum): yi dgas kyi yul de dag na/ sdug bsngal ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad rab tu 'jil cing / ser sna spang ba'i phyir chos stond pa dang / de dag na sems can yi dgas kyi yul pa de dag byang chub sems dpa' sos
151b8('bum): dpa' chen po de dag la byams pa'i sems bskyed cing yi dgas kyi skye gnas de dag nas rnam par ldang ba dang / de dag yi dgas kyi skye gnas de dag nas rnam par langs nas/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de nyid kyis lha'i 'jig rten
152a1('bum): dang myi'i 'jig rtend tu skyes te/ phung po ma lus pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'das kyi bar du/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang nam yang bral bar myi 'gyur
152a2('bum): ba dag mthong ngo // rab 'byor dngas 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gis 'jig rten la rnam par gzigs na/ lho dang / nub dang / byang dang / byang shar dang / shar lho dang / lho nub dang / nub byang dang / 'og dang / steng gi
152a3('bum): phyogs kyi 'jig rtenang gi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can yi dgas kyi yul pa de dag rnams kyi yi dgas kyi yul pa de dag na/ sdug bsngal ci snyed
152a4('bum): cig yod pa de dag thams cad rab tu 'jil zhing ser sna spang ba'i phyir chos stond pa dang / de dag na sems can yi dgas kyi yul pa de dag thams cad byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' sems dpa'
