152a5('bum): chen po de dag byams pa'i sems skyed cing / yi dgas kyi skye gnas dag nas rnam par langs pa dang / de dag yi dgas kyi skye gnas de dag nas rnam par langs nas/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de nyid kyis lnga
152a6('bum): 'jig rten dang / myi'i 'jig rtend du skyes te/ phung po ma lus pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'das kyi bar du/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang nam yang bral bar myi 'gyur
152a7('bum): ba dag mthong ngo // rab 'byor dngas yang 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gis 'jig rten la rnam par gzigs na/ shar phyogs kyi 'jig rtend gi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ byang chub sems dpa'
152a8('bum): sems dpa' chen po rgyal chen bzhi'i ris gi lha rnams la chos stond pa dang / sum bcu rtsa gsum dang / mtsha ma dang / dga' ldan dang / 'phrul dga' dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams la chos ston pa dang / 
152b1('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems chen po de dag las lha'i bu de dag gis chos thos nas/ theg pa gsum pos rim gis yongs su mya ngan las 'das par gyur pa dang / yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa dang / yongs su mya
152b2('bum): ngan las 'das par 'gyur ba mthong ste/ rab 'byor da de la lha'i bu 'dod pa'i yon tan lngas shas cher myos pa de dag la gzhal myed khang de dag 'bar bar snang bar byas shing / de dag skyo bar gyur par shes nas/ 'di skad
152b3('bum): du grogs po dag 'du byed thams cad ni myi rtag pa/ 'du byed thams cad ni sdug bsngal ba/ 'du byed thams cad ni bdag myed pa/ 'du byed thams cad ni myi rgand pa/ 'du byed thams cad ni yid brtan tu myi rung ba// 
152b4('bum): 'du byed thams cad ni rnam par 'gyur ba'i chos can yin na/ 'du byed rnams lta su zhig yid ches phebs par gnas zhes chos ston to// rab 'byor dngas yang 'ong nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig
152b5('bum): rten la rnam par gzigs na/ lho dang / nub dang / byang dang byang shar dang / shar lho dang / lho nub dang / nub byang dang / 'og dang steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gi khams gang ka'i klung gi byem
152b6('bum): snyed dag na/ byang chub sems dpa' chen po rgyal chen po ga'i ris kyi lha rnams la chos stond pa dang / sum bcu rtsa gsum dang / mchem dang / dga' ldan dang / 'phrul dga' dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams la
152b7('bum): chos stond pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag las lha'i bu dag gis chos stond pa dang / theg pa gsum las rim gis yongs su mya ngan las 'das par gyur pa dang / yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa dang / 
152b8('bum): yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ba mthong ste/ rab 'byor de la lha'i bu 'dod pa'i yon tan lngas shas cher myos pa de dag la gzhal myed khang de dga' bar snang bar byas shing / de dag skyo bar 'gyur ba zhes nas/ 'di skad du 'du/ 
154a1('bum): so/ grogs po dag 'du byed thams cad ni myi rtag pa/ 'du byed thams cad ni sdug bsngal ba/ 'du byed thams cad ni bdag myed pa/ 'du byed thams cad ni myi brtan pa/ 'du byed thams cad ni yid brtan tu myi rung
154a2('bum): 'du byed thams cad ni rnam par 'gyur ba'i chos can yin na/ 'du byed rnams la lta su zhig yid phebs par gnas shes chos ston to// rab 'byor da ngas yang 'di nas sangs rgyas gis 'jig rten la gzigs na/ shar phyogs
154a3('bum): kyi 'jig rten gi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams sems can gang tshangs pa'i lta ba'i mngon par zhen pa de dag la/ kye grogs po dag chos sa thams cad stong pa la
154a4('bum): zhig lta ba skyed/ chos thams gsob dang / gsog sha stag la rtsi zhig lta ba bskyed ces lta ba'i rnam pa de dag dang bral bar byed pa mthong ste/ de rab 'byor de de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnas
154a5('bum): snying rje chen po la gnas shing ngo / sems can rnams la chos / stond to// rab 'byor de ni ngo mtshar che ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' rnams kyi rmad du byung ba'i chos so// rab 'byor/ 
154a6('bum): ngas yang 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gis 'jig rten la rnam par gzigs na/ lho dang / nub dang / byang dang / byang shar dang / shar lho dang / lho nub dang / nub byang dang / 'og dang / steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gi las
154a7('bum): gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams sems can gang tshangs pa'i lta ba la mngon par zhen pa de dag la/ kye grogs po dag chos thams stong pa la ci zhig lta ba skyed/ chos
154a8('bum): thams cad gsob dang / gsog sha stag la ci zhig lta ba bskyed/ ces lta ba'i rnam pa de dag dang bral bar byed pa mthong ste/ rab 'byor de de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams snying rje chen po la gnas shing
154b1('bum): sems can rnams la chos stond to// rab 'byor de de ltar na ngo mtshar che ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi rmad du byung ba'i chos so// rab 'byor dngas yang 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gis 'jig
154b2('bum): rtend la rnam par gzigs na/ shar phyogs kyi 'jig rtenang gi khams gang gi'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag myi rnams bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhis sdud pa mthong ste/ bzhi
154b3('bum): gang zhe na/ sbyin pa dang / tshig snyan pa dang / don spyad pa dang / don mthun pa'o// rab 'byor dngas yang 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gis 'jig rten la rnam par gzigs ma/ lho dang / nub dang / byang dang / byang shar dang /

154b5('bum): dngos po bzhis sdud pa mthong ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ sbyin padang / tshig snyan pa dang / don spyad pa dang / don mthun pa'o// rang 'byor ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyir
154b6('bum): pas sems can rnams sdud pa yin zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin gnyis kyis sems can rnams sdud pa mthong ste/ de gnyis gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ zang zing gi sbyin pa dang / 
154b7('bum): chos kyi sbyin pa'o// rab 'byor daji ltar ma byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ rang zing gi sbyin pas sems can rnams sdud pa yi nan na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu
154b8('bum): phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gser ram/ rdul lam/ nor bu 'am/ bye dUr+ya dang / dung dang / man shel lam/ bye ru'am/ sa le sbram 'am/ zas sam/ skom 'am/ gos sam/ gdugs sam/ spos sam/ phreng
156a1('bum): ba'am/ byug pa 'am/ man stand nam/ 'tsho ba 'am/ bud myed dam/ skyes pa 'am/ rta 'am/ glang po 'am/ bdag po yongs su gtong na/ 'di skad du kye sems can dag chur shag bdag nyid kyi dang
156a2('bum): 'dra bar spang myi dgos par khyer cig/ long la deng shig/ ces brjod de/ sbyin pa des sbyin nas sangs rgyas la skyabs su gtong ngo // chos la skyab su gtong ngo // dge 'dun la skyabs su gtong ngo // la la ni bslab pa'i gnas
156a3('bum): lnga la 'dzin tu 'dzud do// la la ni yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i nye bar gnas pa la nye bar gnas par byed do// la la ni dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam rnams la 'god do// la la ni bsam rtan dang po la/ la l-i ni busam gtan gnyis
156a4('bum): pa la/ la lin bsam gtan gsum pa la/ la la ni bsam rten bzhi pa la 'god do// la la ni byams pa la/ la la ni snying rje la/ la la ni dga' ba la/ la li na btang snyoms la// 'dod do// la la ni nam mkha'
156a5('bum): mtha' yas skye mched la/ la lin rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched la/ la lini cung zad myed pa'i skye mched la/ la la ni 'du shes myed 'du shes myed myin skye mched la 'god do// la la ni sangs rgyas rjes
156a6('bum): dran pa la/ la lini chos rjes su dran pa la/ la lin dge 'dun rjes su dran pa la/ la lin tshul khrims rjes su dran pa la/ la la ni gtong ba rjes su dran pa la/ la la di lnga rjes su dran pa la yang dag par bskul lo// la la ni
156a7('bum): lus la myi gtsang ba las rdzogs pa'i 'du shes so sor brtag pa la/ la lin rnam par dag pa la yang dag par daskul lo// la li ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi lu/ la la ni yang dag par spong ba ni la/ la la ni rdzu 'phrul gi rkang pa rin sa
156a8('bum): la la ni dbang po lnga la/ la la ni stobs lnga la/ la la ni byang chub kyi yan lag bdun la/ la la ni 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la yang dag par bskul lo// la la ni stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smond pa myed pa dang
156b1('bum): pa'i ting nge 'dzind la/ la la ni rnam par tha ra pa brgyad la/ la la ni mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la/ la la ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la/ la la ni myi 'jigs pa bzhi la/ la li ni sa sa yang
156b2('bum): dag par rig pa bzhi la yang dag par skul lo// la la ni byams pa chen po la/ la li ni snying rje chen po la/ la la ni sangs cha rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad la yang dag par skul lo// la la ni myi chen po'i mtshan sum bcu rtsa gnyis
156b3('bum): yongs su thug par bya ba la yang dag par skul lo// la la ni dpe' byad bzang po brgya bcu la yang dag par bskul lo// la la ni byang chub kyi phyogs kyi rgyun tu zhugs bri'i 'bras bu la/ la l-in lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la/ la la ni phyir 'ong
156b4('bum): ba' 'bras bu la/ la la ni dgra bcom pa nyid la/ la la ni rang byang chub la/ la la ni lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la/ la la ni rnam pa thas/ cad mkhyen pa nyid la yang dag par bskul lo// rab 'byor de de ltar na
156b5('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ sems can rnams la zang zing gi sbyin pa yongs su gtong zhing thabs mkhas pas bla na myed pa'i bde ba dang ldan par 'god de/ 
156b6('bum): rab 'byor de de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i chos so// rab 'byor ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rolal tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ chos kyi sbyin pas sems can rnas
156b7('bum): sdud pa yin zhe na/ rab 'byor da gnyis po 'di dag ni chos kyi sbyin pa ste/ 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'o// rab 'byor 'jig rten pa'i chos kyi sbyin pa gang zhe na/ 'jig ston pa'i chos rnams brjod pa dang / bshad pa dang
156b8('bum): ma nor bar bstand pa ste/ 'di ltar myi gtsang ba'i rnam pa dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshangs pa'i rnam par spyod pa bzhi dang / gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / mngon par shes pa lnga dang / gzhan yang 'jig rten pa'i chos
157a1('bum): kyi dbyings byis pa so so'i skye bo dag dang thun mong du gyur pa rnams te/ rab 'byor de de ni 'jig rtend pa'i chos kyi sbyin pa'o// rab 'byor de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des 'jig rtend pa'i chos kyi
157a2('bum): sbyin pa de btang nas/ rnam grangs du mas 'jig rten pa'i chos kyi sbyin pa ma nor ba blangs pa de las bskyod de/ de las bskyod nas thabs mkhas pas 'da'i chos rjes dang / 'phags pa'i chos kyi 'bras bu dag la rab tu 'god// 
157a3('bum): de la 'phags pa'i chos rnams ni gang / 'phags pa'i chos rnams kyi 'bras bu ni gang zhe na/ 'phags pa'i chos shes bya ba ni byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos su bcu rtsa bdun dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum mo// 'phags
157a4('bum): pa'i bden pa'i chos rnams kyi 'bras bu ni rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid de/ rab 'byor de de byang chub sems dpa' sos
157a5('bum): dpa' chen po'i chos rgyu nad tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu shes pa'o// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu shes pa'o// phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'dra sa bu shes pa'o// dgra bcom pa nyid shes pa'o// sbyin pa'i pha rol
157a6('bum): tu byin pa shes pa'o// tshul khrims kyi sa roso sa sbyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi rolang tu phyin pa dang / martson pasam gtan gipa maud su phyin pa
157a7('bum): dang / shes rab kyis yong tu phyin pa / shes pa'o// nang stong pa nyid shes pa'o// dngos po myed pa 'ang banyid kyi bar drugs pa'o// byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum bcu rtsa 'dun shes pa'o// 'phags
157a8('bum): bden pa pani dang / bsam gtan pani dang / tshad myed pa bani dang / gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa pa'i dang / rnam par thar da pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug par gu dang / 
157b1('bum): stong pa nyid dang // mtshan myed pa dang / smond pa myed pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams shes pa'o// ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams shes pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / myi 'dzig
157b2('bum): pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad shes pa'o// byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / dga' ba chen po dang / btang snyoms chen po dang / gzhan yang
157b3('bum): 'jig rtend pa dang / 'jig rtend las 'das pa'i chos rnams dang / zag pa dang bcas pa'i dang / zag pa skyed pa'i chos rnams dang / 'dus byas kyi dang / 'dus ma byos kyi chos rnams shes pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad
157b4('bum): mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gyi ye shes ma rtogs par/ de dgabyang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 'phags pa'i chos naso// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 'phags pa'i chos rnaMs/ 
157b5('bum): kyi 'bras bu gang zhe na/ bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor dring nyon mongs pa thams cad spong ba ste/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' chen po'i 'phags pa'i chos rnams kyi 'bras bu'o// de nas tshe dang ldan pa
157b6('bum): rab 'byor kyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsolang to// bcom ldan 'das ci lags// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos rnam par thams cad mkhyend pa nyid thob par 'gyur ro// / bcom ldan
157b7('bum): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa'o// rab 'byor de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ byang chub sems dpa' chen pos ni rnam pa thams mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa'
157b8('bum): sems dpa' chen pos rnam pa thams cad mkhyed pa nyid thob par 'gyur na/ byang chub sems dpa' chen po dang / de bzhin gshegs pa la bye brag ci zhig mchis// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ bye brag yod/ 
158a1('bum): gsol pa/ bye brag ci lta bu zhig mchis/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal da pa/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid thob par 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshes/ 
158a2('bum): pa ni ye shes brnyes pa zhes bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang la gnas shing / chos thams cad la mun pa myed pa 'thob la/ byang chub sems dpa'i sems kyang gzhan la/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag
158a3('bum): par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi thugs kyang gzhan zhes bya ba myed do// rab 'byor de de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 'jig rtend pa'i chos kyi sbyin pa ste/ de la brten pas 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos
158a4('bum): kyi sbyin pa 'byung ba'o// rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' chen po sems can rnams 'jig rtend pa'i chos kyi sbyin pa la sbyor zhing thabs mkhas pas 'phags pa'i chos 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos
158a5('bum): kye sbyin pa byin pa so so'i skye bo thams cad dang thun mong ma yi na pa gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste dran pa nye gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag pa / spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / 
158a6('bum): slobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yanalag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i sam yan lag brgyad pa dang / rnam par b.rang pa'i sgo gsum dang / rnam par thod pa brgyad dang / mang kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgus
158a7('bum): de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / myi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / sos yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / myi chen po'i/ 
158a8('bum): mtshan sum bcu rtsa gnyis dang / dbye byad bzang po brgya bcu dang / gzungs kyi sgo lnga brgya dang / ting nge 'dzin kyi sgo lnga brgya dang / ting nge 'dzind kyi sgo rnams dang / 'di ni 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos kyi sbyin pa
158b1('bum): zhes bya'o// rab 'byor de de la dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste nang gi lus dang / phyi'i lus dang / phyi nang gi lus la lus kyi rjes su lta zhing / brtson 'grus can shes bzhin dang ldan pa dran pa dang ldan pa
158b2('bum): 'jig rtend kyi chags sems dang yid myi bde ba rnam par gsal zhing rnam par spyod do// lus la kun 'byung ba dnga'i rjes su lta zhing rnam par spyod do// lus la zad pa'i rjes su lta zhing rnam par spyod do// lus la kun
158b3('bum): 'byung ba dang zad pa'i rjes su lta zhing rnam par spyod do// lus la rnam par spyod cing 'jig rten tu gang yang nye bar len pa myed do// nang gi tshor ba dang / phyi'i tshor ba dang phyi nang gi tshor ba dang / nang gi sems dang
158b4('bum): phyi'i phyi sems dang / phyi nang gi sems dang / nang gi chos / dang / phyi'i chos dang / phyi nang gi chos kyi rjes su lta zhing brtson 'gru/ sa can shes bzhin dang ldan pa/ dran pa dang ldan pas 'jig rten
158b5('bum): go chags sems dang / yid myi bde ba rnam par gsal zhing rnam par spyod do// chos la kun 'byung ba'i rjes su lta zhing rnam par spyod chos la zad pa'i rjes su lta zhing rnam par spyod do// chos la myi gnas
158b6('bum): par rnam par spyod cing 'jig rtend du gang du yang nye bar lend pa myed do// rab 'byor da yang dag par spong ba bzhi gang zhe na/ sdig to myi dge ba'i chos ma skyes pa rnams myi skye ba'i phyir mos pa bskyed pa dang / skyes pa rnams
158b7('bum): spang ba'i phyir rtsol ba dang / dge ba'i chos ma skyes pa rnams bskyed pa'i phyir mos pa bskyed par brtson 'grus rtsom pa dang / skyes pa rnams 'phel zhing shin tu rgyas par bya ba dang / bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par
158b8('bum): bya ba'i phyir mos pa bskyed pa'o// rab 'byor dade rdzu 'phrul ga rkang pa bzhi gang zhe na/ mos pa'i ting nge 'dzin spong ba'i 'du byed dang ldan pa'i rdzu 'phrul gi rkang pa dang / sems dang brtson 'grus dang dpyod pa'i ting nge 'dzin
159a1('bum): spong ba'i rdzu 'phrul gi rkang pa'o// rab 'byor dbang po lnga gang zhe na/ dad pa'i dbang po dang / brtson 'grus kyi dbang po dang / dran pa'i dbang po dang / ting nge 'dzinang gi dbang po dang / shes rab kyi dpa
159a2('bum): po ste/ de dag ni dbang po lnga zhes bya'o// stobs lnga gang zhe na/ dad pa'i stobs dang / brtson 'grus gi stobs dang / dran pa'i stobs dang / ting nge 'dzin gi stobs dang / shes rab kyi stobs te/ de ni stobs lnga
159a3('bum): zhes bya'o// de rab 'byor de byang chub kyi yan lag bdun gang zhe na/ dran pa yan lag byang chub kyi yan lag dang / chos rnam par 'byed pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang / brtson 'grus yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag
159a4('bum): dga' ba yang dag byang chub kyi yal ga dang / chos rnam par 'byed/ pa byang chub kyi yan lag dang / ting nge 'dzin da yang dag byang chub kyi yan la ga dang / btang snyoms yang dgra byang chub kyi yan lag ste/ de dag
159a5('bum): ni byang chub kyi yan lag bdun zhes bya'o// rab 'byor da 'phagasaba'i lam yan lag brgyad pa gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ yang dag pa'i lta ba dang / yang dag pa'i rtog pa dang / yang dag pa'i ngag
159a6('bum): dang / yang dag pa'i las kyim pa' dang / yang dag pa'i 'tsho ba dang / yam drug pa'i rtsol ba dang / yang dag pa'i 'dran pa dang / yang dag pa tang nge 'dzin te/ de dag ni 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa zhes
159a7('bum): bya'o// de la ting nge 'dzind gsum gang zhe na/ stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin da / mtshan myong ba'i ting nge 'dzind dang / smond pa myed pa'i ting nge 'dzin do// stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin dgang zhen/ stong pa nyid kyi
159a8('bum): rnam pa dang / dben pa'i rnam pa sems rtse gcig pa ste/ de ni stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin ces bya'o// smon pa myed pa'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhen/ myi rtag pa'i rnam pa dang / sdug bsngal ba'i rnam pa dang / sems rtse
159a9('bum): mtshan ma myed pa ma na gan/ na da ma da pa rnarnams kya na nr-id de ni 'tshan ma myed pa sa mdzad ces bya
159b1('bum): gcig pa ste/ de ni smond pa myed pa'i ting nge 'dzind ces bya'o// rnam par tha rad pa brgyad gang zhe na/ gzugs can gis gzugs mthong ba 'di ni rnam par tha dad pa dang po'o// nang gzugs myed pa'i 'du shes dang ldan pas/ 
159b2('bum): phyi rol gzugs rnams mthong ba 'di ni rnam par datha rad pa gnyis pa'o// bzang bar mos pa 'di ni rnam par thar pa gsum pa'o// nam mkha' mtha yas skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas pa 'di ni rnam par tha rad pa ban
159b3('bum): pa'o// rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas pa 'di ni rnam par tha rad pa lnga pa'o// cung zad myed pa'i skye mched la nye bar bskyabs te gnas pa 'di ni rnam par tha rad pa drug pa'o// 'du shes myed 'du shes
159b4('bum): myed mying skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas pa 'di ni rnam par tha rad pa bdun pa'o// 'du shes dang tshor ba 'gog pu l+yA gnas pa / 'di ni rnam par tha rad pa brgyad pa ste/ de dag ni rnam par thar
159b5('bum): ma brgyad ces bya'o// mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu gang zhe na/ 'di la la la ni 'dod pas dben sdig to myi dge ba'i chos kyi dben pa rnyog pa dang bcas dang / dpyod pa dang bcas pa dben pa las
159b6('bum): skyes pa'i dga' ba dang bde ba can bsam gtan dang po la nye bar bsgrub te gnas so// rnam par rtog pa dang / rnam par dpyod pa skyenye bar zhe nas/ nang yongs su dang ste/ sems kyi rgyud gcig tu gyur nas/ rtog pa myed
159b7('bum): po dpyod pa myed pa'i ting ngo 'dzin da las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang bde ba can bsam gtan gnyis pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de dga' las 'dod chags dang bral bas dran pa dang ldan zhing gis bzhin tu btang snyoms la gnas / 
159b8('bum): bde ba lus kyis myong la 'phags pa rnams kyis dran pa dang ldan pas bde ba la rnam par dpyod pa btang snyoms pa'o zhes brjod de/ dga' babyed pa'i bsam gtan gsum pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de ba pa yang spangs spun
160a1('bum): bsngal ba yang spangs shing yid bde ba dang mi/ yid myi bde ba snga nas kyang nub nas bde ba yang myed/ sdug bsngal ba yang myed pa btang snyoms dang / dran pas yongs su dag pa bsam gtan bzhi pa la nye bar sgrubs te/ 
160a2('bum): gnas so// de rnam pa thams cad du gzugs kyi 'du shes las yang dag par 'das te/ thogs pa'i 'du shes rnams nub par gyur cing / sna tshogs kyi 'du shes yid la myi byed pas nam mkha' mkha' mtha' yas su ma chad zhes te/ 
160a3('bum): nam mkha' skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// rnam pa thams cad du nam mkha' mtha' yas/ skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ rnam shes mtha' yas sgyu mched la so zhes rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs/ 
160a4('bum): gnas so// rnam pa thams cad du rnam shes mtha' yas mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ cung zad ma yod do zhes cung zad myed pa'i skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de rnam pa thams cad du
160a5('bum): cung zad myed pa'i skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ 'du shes myed 'du shes myed myin skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// / de rnam pa thams cad du 'du shes myed 'du shes myed myin skye mched la
160a6('bum): yang dag par 'das te/ 'du shes dang / tshor ba 'gog par skyed pa la nye bar bsgrubs shing gnas// 'di ni mthar da kyis gnas pas snyoms par 'jug par dgu nas bya'o// de la mtha' dag gi ma skye mched
160a7('bum): brgya gang zhe na/ mtha' dgas dang / mtha' dag chu dang / mtha' dag mye dang / mtha' dag rlung dang / mtha' dag sngon po dang / mtha' dag ser po dang / mtha' dag dmar po dang / mtha' dag dkar po dang / mtha' dag rnam par zhes
160a8('bum): mtha' dag nam mkha' ste/ de dag ni mtha' dag gi skye mched bcu zhes bya'o// dril bil gis granon pa'i skye mched brgyad gang zhe na/ nang gzugs su 'du shes shing phyi ro lang gi gzugs phra mo dang / kha dog sdug pa dang / kha dog
160b1('bum): myi sdug pa mthong yang gzugs de dag zil gyis mnan te shes/ zil kyis mnan te mthong zhing de ltar 'du shes pa de ni zil gis gnon pa'i skye mched dang pa'o// nang gzugs su shing phyi royod kyi gzugs rags pa dang / 
160b2('bum): dog sdug pa dang / kha dog myi sdug pa mthong yang gzugs de dag zil gas mnan te shes te/ zil gris mnan te mthong zhing de ltar zild kyis mnon pa'i skye mched gnyis pa'o// nang gzugs myed pa'i bar 'du shes shing phyi rol
160b3('bum): gi gzugs phra mo dang / kha dog sdug pa dang / kha dog myi sdug pa mthong yang de dag zil gis mnan te shes/ zil gyis mnan pi'i te mthong zhing 'du shes pa de da ni zil gis gnon pa'i skye mched gsum pa'o// nang gzugs myed
160b4('bum): par 'du shes shing phyi rol gi gzugs rags pa dang / kha dag sdug pa dang / kha dog myi sdug pa myi sdug pa mthong yang gzugs de zil da gis mnan te shes zil gis mnan te mthong zhing de ltar 'dus
160b5('bum): shes pa 'di ni zil gis gnon pa'i skye mched bzhi pa'o// nang gzugs myed par 'du shes shing phyi rol gi gzugs sngon po kha dog sngon po/ sngon po ltar snang ba/ mdog sngon po 'di lta ste/ dperan
160b6('bum): me tog oM ma ka lta bu 'am/ yul ba ra na ser byas pa'i gos ltar sngo ba/ kha dog sde ba sngo bar snang ba/ mdog sngo bar mthong yang gzugs de dag zil gis mnan te/ shes zil gis mnan te mthong zhing de ltar 'du
160b7('bum): shes pa de ni zil gis mnon po'i skye mched lnga pa'o// nang gzugs myed pa'i du shes shing phyi rol gi gzugs ser po kha dog ser po ser por snang ba mdog ser po 'di lta ste dper na/ shing ka ra na'i ka ra'i mye tog lta bu 'am/ 
160b8('bum): yul ba ra na ser byas pa'i gos ltar ser ba/ ser bar snang ba/ mdog ser bar mthong yang gzugs de zilang gis mnan te shes/ zil gis mnan te mthong zhing de ltar 'du shes pa de ni zil gis mnon pa'i skye mched drug
161a1('bum): 'o// rang gzugs byed pa cugs shing gyi sa ga gzugs dbyung po// kha dog dmang po dmang por snang ba// 'di sa skyed per na/ man 'du 'ji ba ga'i ma togs bu'am/ yul par na sed byas pa'i gos pa/ 
161a2('bum): dmar ba/ kha dog dmar ba dmar bar snang ba/ mdog dmar bar mthong yang mthong yang gzugs de zild kyis mnan te shes/ zild kyis mnan te mthong zhing de ltar 'du shes pa de ni zild kyis gnon pa'i skye mched bdun po/ 
161a3('bum): nang gzugs myed par 'du shes shing gyis gi gzugs dkang po la dog dkar po dka bor snang ba/ mdog dkar po 'di sa snyed dper na/ nang ma bsangs kyi 'od sa bu'am/ yul bar na ser byas pa'i gos snang dag dang / 
161a4('bum): kha dog dkar ba dkar bar snang ba/ mdog dkar bar mthong yang gzugs de dag zilang gis mnan te shes/ za yid kyis mnan tem thong zhing de ltar 'du shes pa 'di ni zilang gis gnon pa'i skye mched
161a5('bum): brgyad pa'o// de la nyon mongs pa myed pa gang zhe na/ bsam gtan// la gnas nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i rnam bar spyod pa sems can pha rol dang / gang zag pha rol gi nyon
161a6('bum): mongs myi skye ba'i mthu yod pa'i ting nge 'dzin gis 'grub pa de ni nyon mongs pa myed pa nas bya'o// smon lam gi shes pa gang zhe na/ bsam gtan la gnas te/ 'di shes par bya'o zhes byang chub sems dpa' sems
161a7('bum): dpa' chen po dus gsum gi shes pa 'am/ shes pa de gang dgang 'dod par gyur pa de la yid kyis smond par byed de/ de la ting nge 'dzin de de las langs nas de'i smon da lam de yongs su grub par gyur nas/ shes bya
161a8('bum): de yang shes pa de ni smon da lam gi shes bya'o// de la mngon par shes pa drug gang zhe na/ rdzu 'phrul gi mngon pa rigs pa dang / lha'i myig ga mngon pa shes pa dang / lhor rna ba'i mngon par nas dang / pha rol gi sems
161b1('bum): shes pa mngon par shes dang / sngon gi gnas rjes su dran pa'i mngon par shes pa dang / zag pa zad pa'i shes pa mngon par shes pa ste drug po de dag go// de la yongs su dag pa bzhi gang zhe na/ lus yongs su dag pa
161b2('bum): dang / dmyigs pa yong su dag pa dang / sems yongs su dag pa dang / ye shes yongs su dag pa ste bzhi po de dag go// de la dbang bcu gang zhe na/ tshe la dbang ba dang / sems la dbang ba dang / yo byad la dbang ba dang
161b3('bum): las la dbang ba dang / skye ba la dbang ba dang / mos pa la dbang ba dang / smond lam la dbang ba dang / rdzu 'phrul la dbang ba dang / ye shes la dbang ba dang / chos la dbang ba ste/ dbang po bcu po dag go// rab 'byor dade
161b4('bum): bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu gang zhe na/ rab 'byor de 'di la de bzhin gshegs pa'i gnas la yang gnas su yang dag pa ji lta babazhin du rab tu mkhyend to// gnas ma yin pa la yang gnas ma
161b5('bum): yin par yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to// 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dang da ltar byung ba'i las dang / yongs su sbyin pa'i rnam par sbyind pa las kyi rnam pa dang / rgyu'i rnam par yang dag / 
161b6('bum): pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyend to// khams sna tshogs can dang / khams du ma can gi 'jig rten gi yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyend to// sems can gzhan dang / gang zag gzhan gi mos pa sna tshogs dang / mos
161b7('bum): ba du ma yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin tu rabatu rab tu mkhyen to// sems can gzhan dang gang zag gzhan gi dpung por ba dang tha ma dang shes par bya ba'i yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin tu rab tu mkhyen to// kun du 'gro ba'i lam yang dag pa
161b8('bum): ji lta ba bzhin tu rab tu mkhyend to// dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / bsam gtan dang / rnam par thar pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa dang / rnam par
162a1('bum): byang bar dgod pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin tu rab tu mkhyen to// rnam pa du mar sngon gi gnas rjes su dgongs te/ tshe rabs gcig kyang dgongs pa nas tshe rabs brgya dang / tshe rabs stong dang / tshe rabs brgya
162a2('bum): stong dang / tshe rabs bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gi bar du yang rjes su dgongs nas/ bskal pa gcig kyang rjes su dgongs nas/ bskal pa brgya'i bar dang / bskal pa stong gi byar brgya phrag du mas/ bskal pa stong phrag
162a3('bum): du ma dang / bskal pa brgya phrag stong phrag du ma dang / bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma'i bar dag kyang rjes su dgongs te/ bdag ni 'di lta bu zhig 'dug go/ mying na 'di zhes bya bar gyur to// rigs ni 'di zhes
162a4('bum): bya bar gyur to// rus na 'di zhes bya bar gyur to// kha zas 'di ba'o// yun ni 'di srid cig du gnas gnas so// tshe'i mtha' na 'di tsam cig tu gyur da te/ bdag de nas rin 'phos nas che ge mo
162a5('bum): zhig tu skyes so// zhes bya ba nas de nas sha 'phos nas kyang 'dir skyes so zhes bya ba'i bar du rnam pa dang bcas/ sa mal dang bcas gtan tshigs dang bcas par rnam pa du mar sngon ga
162a6('bum): gnas rjes su dgongs so// lha'i myig rnam par dag pa myi las 'das pas sems can shi 'pho dang / skye ba dag kyang gzigs so// kha dog sdug pa dang / myi sdug pa dang / bzang ba dang / ngan pa dang / 
162a7('bum): 'gro na 'khod pa dang / ngan song na 'khod pa dang / las jil ba bzhin du nye bar 'dod pa'i sems can rnams rab tu mkhyen te/ sems can 'di dgan lus kyis ngan tu spyod pa dang ldan pa/ ngag gis ngan du spyod pa dang
162a8('bum): ldan pa yid kyi sa ngan du spyod pa dang ldan pa/ 'phags pa la skur pa 'debs pa log par lta ba dag ste/ de'i rgyu do'i rkyend kyis lus nig nas// ngan mang log par srung ba'i sems can dmyal pa/ skyer// sems can
162b1('bum): ngag ni lus kyis legs par spyod pa dang / ngag gis nges par spyod dang / yid kyis nges par spyod pa dang / ldan pa/ 'phags pa la 'phags pa la skur ba myi 'debs pa yang dag par lta bdag ste/ de'i rgyu do'i rkyend kyis
162b2('bum): lus zhig nas bde 'gro mtho ris gi 'jig rten gi lha'i nang du skye'o zhes bya bar rab tu mkhyen to// zag pa zang po'i sems rnam par grol ba dang / shes rab rnam par grol ba dang / zag pa myed pa'i yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du
162b3('bum): rab tu mkhyend to// stobs bcu po de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu'o// rab 'byor de de bzhin gshegs pa'i myi 'jigs pa bzhi gang zhe na/ bdag gis yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas so zhes dam bcas na/ 
162b4('bum): 'di la chos 'di mngon par sangs ma rgyas so zhes bya b.rabadag la dge sbyong ngam/ bram ze 'am/ lha 'am/ bdud dam/ tshangs pa 'am/ skye dgu'i tshogs gzhan su yang rung ste/ 'jig
162b5('bum): rten na chos dang ldan par rgol bar 'gyur zhes bya ba'i rgyu yang dag par rjes su myi mthong ste/ rgyu yang dag par rjes su ma mthongabs bdag bde ba thob pa dang / bag tsha la myed pa thob pa dang
162b6('bum): myi 'jigs pa rnam par skyed de/ khyu mchog rlabs po che'i nang du dam bca'o// 'khor gyi nang du sing ge'i sgra sgrog go// tshangs pa'i 'khor lo 'jig rten na dge sbyong ngamag bram ze 'am/ lha 'am/ bdud dam
162b7('bum): tshangs pa 'am/ gzhan su yang rung ste/ chos dang ldan par bskor bar myi nus pa bdag gis bskor bar bya'o// bdag zag pa zad do zhes dam bcas na/ de la zag pa zad pa 'di rnams yongs zad par ma gyur te/ 
162b8('bum): zhes bya bar bdag la dge sbyong ngam/ bram ze 'am/ bdud dam tshangs pa 'am/ skye dgu'i tshogs gzhan su yang rung ste/ 'jig rten na chos dang ldan par bskor bar 'gyur ro// zhes bya ba'i rgyu yang dag par rjes su
163a1('bum): myi mthong ste/ rgyu yang dag par rjes su ma mthong bas/ de la bdag bde ba thob pa dang / bag tsha ba myed pa thob dang / myi 'jigs pa thob pa rnam par spyod de/ khyu mchog rlabs po che'i gnas su dam
163a2('bum): bca'o// 'khor gi nang du seng go'i sgra sgrog go// tshangs pa'i 'khor lo 'jig rten na dge sbyong ngam/ bram ze 'am/ lba'am na bdud dam/ tshangs pa 'ama'i gzhan sus kyang rung ste/ chos dang ldan par brjor
163a3('bum): bar myi nus par bdag gis bskor bar bya'o// gang yang bdag gis bar chad du kyi chos su bstan pa de dag la sten na par chad kyi chos su myi 'gyur zhes dge sbyong ngam/ bram ze'amag lba'am/ bdud dam / tshangs
163a4('bum): pa 'am/ skye dgu'i tshogs gzhan su yang rung ste/ 'jig rten na chos dang ldan par bskor bar myi 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i rgyu yang dag par rjes kyi myi mthong ste/ rgyu yang dag par rjes su ma mthong bas/ de la bdag
163a5('bum): de ba zab papa dang / bkras pa skyed pa pog pa dang / dgas pa thob pas rnam par skyed khrum chog rlabs lo gnas/ rnam bca'o// 'khor kyi nang du meng ge'i sgra glags te
163a6('bum): ba'i 'khor lo 'jig rten na dge sbyong ngas/ bram ze 'tshalha 'am/ bdud dam/ tshangs pa'am/ gzhan sus kyang / chos dang ldan par bskor bar myi nus pa bdag gis yang dag
163a7('bum): 'tshul kyi rung // shes nga ma pod sa pa/ byaba'i sul na mas na
163b1('bum): rgyur yang dag par rjes su myi mthong ste/ rgyu yang dag par rjes su ma mthong bas/ de la bdag bde ba bob pa dang / bag tsha ba myed pa thob pa dang / myi 'jigs pa dang / bab pas rnam par spyod de/ khyu mtshan
163b2('bum): rlabs po che'i gnas su dam bana'o// 'khor gi nang du seng ge'i sgra sgrog go// tshangs pa'i 'khor lo 'jig rten dan dge sbyong ngam/ bram ze 'amed/ lha 'am/ bdud na dam/ tshangs pa 'am/ gzhan sus kyis
163b3('bum): rung ste/ chos dang ldan par bskor bar myi nus pa bdag gis rab tu bskor bar bya'o zhes bya ste/ bzhi po de dag na mi 'jigs pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / 
163b4('bum): zhe na/ 'di lnga ste don so so yang dag par rig pa dang / chos so so yang dag par rig pa dang / nges pa'i tshig so so yang dag par rig pa dang / spobs pa so so yang dag pur rig pa
163b5('bum): de dag gang zhe na/ don la dmyigs pa dang / chos la dmyigs pa dang / nges pa'i tshig la dmyigs pa dang / spobs pa la dmyigs pa'o// de bzhin gshegs por srung ba myed pa gsum gang zhe na/ de bzhin
163b6('bum): gshegs pa'i sku'i spyod pa yongs su dag pa dang ldan pa ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i spyod pa yongs su ma rig pa myi mnga' bas/ le las shes su 'ong zhes gang yang bcab par dgongs so// de bzhin gshenas/ 
163b7('bum): phas myi mang sti/ 'di ni srung ba skyed pa dang pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa ni gsung gi spyad pa dang ldan pa ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni gsung gi spyod pa yongs sum dag pa myi mang bas la las shes su 'ang banapa
163b8('bum): gang ba cad par dgongs pa de bzhin gshegs pa la myi mnga' ste/ 'di ni srung ba myed pa gnyis pa'o// de bzhin gshags pa ni thugs gi spyod pa yongs su dag pa dang ldan pa ste/ debanan gshags pa'i thugs kyi spyod pa yongs su
163'a1('bum): ma dag pa myi mnga' ba la la las shes su 'ong ngo zhes gang yang bcab par dgongs pa de bzhin gshegs pa la myi mnga' ste/ 'di ni srung ba myed pa gsum pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i dgongs pa nye
163'a2('bum): bar gzhag pa gsum gang zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos bstand pa'i tshe/ la la rna ba btud de rim gror nyan cing bka' nyan pa'i sems nye bar gzhog pa dang / chos dang nye bar chos la nan tan du byed
163'a3('bum): na yang des de bzhin gshegs pas dgas par myi 'gyur/ yid bde bar myi 'gyur/ thugs yang yang por myi 'gyur te/ 'di ni dgongs pa nye bar gzhag pa dang po'o// la la rna ba btud te rim gror nyan cing bkar
163'a4('bum): nyan pa'i sems nye bar gzhog pa myed pa dang chos dang gnyer ba'i chos la nan tan du byed na yang / des de bzhin gshegs pa thugs khro bar myi 'gyur/ myi bzod par myi 'gyur/ thugs myi ches par myi 'gyur te/ 
163'a5('bum): de ni dgongs pa nye bar gzhag pa gnyis pa'o// la la rna ba btud te rim gror nyan nga'i cing bka' banyan pa'i sems nye bar gzhog la/ chos dang gnyer ba'i chos la nan tan du byed na la la na
163'a6('bum): ba btud te rim gror myi nyan cing bka' nyan pa'i sems nye bar rgan gapa myed de/ chos dang gnyer ba'i chos la nan tan tu byed kyang des de bzhin gshegs pa dgas pa'am thugs khrom
163'a7('bum): myed par gnyi su myi 'gyur te/ thams cad dgongs pa dang ldan zhing mkhyen par btang snyoms su rnam par spyod pa 'di ni dgongs pa nye bar gzhag pa gsum pa'o// de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyams pa myed pa'i
163'a8('bum): chos nyid gang zhe na/ gang gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams don yod pa'i chos ston pa'i phyir/ sems can thams cad kyi don mdzad pa la lus las myi 'ad ba ste/ 'di ni mnyam pa myed pa'i chos
163'b1('bum): nyid ces bya'o// de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i bag chags kyi sgrib pa rab tu spangs pa gang zhe na/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa spangs kyang / lus kyi 'gyur ba yod kyi/ de bzhin
163'b2('bum): gshegs pa la ni de lta bu yang myi mnga' ste/ de ni bag chags gi sgrib pa spangs pa zhes bya'o// de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs rje chen po gang zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i thags rje chen po dang
163'b3('bum): ldan pas 'jig rten gi tha snyad brda nye bar bzung ste dge ba'i rtsa ba gzigs pa'i phyir dus thams cad la 'jig rtend la nyin lan gsumamatshan lan gsum du rtog pa mdzad ces bya ste/ dngos su
163'b4('bum): sangs rgyas rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi thugs rje chen po sems can mtha' yas pa yongs su smin par bya ba la gzigs brtag par 'byung ste/ de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i
163'b5('bum): thugs rje chen po zhes bya'o// rab 'byor de de bzhin gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad gang zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa la 'khrul pa myi mnga'o// ca co myi mnga'o// dgongs pa nyes
163'b6('bum): ba myi mngango'o// 'du shes sna tshogs pa myi mnga'o// thugs mnyam par ma gzhag pa myi mnga'o// ma brtags pa'i btang snyoms myi mnga'o// shes rab yongs su nyams pa myi mang 'o// rnam par grol ba yongs su
163'b7('bum): chos la yongs su nyams pa myi mnga'o// brtson 'grus yongs su nyams pa myi mnga'o// dgongs pa yongs su nyams pa myi mnga'o// ting nge 'dzin yongs su nyams pa myi mnga'o// shes rab yongs su nyams pa
163'b8('bum): myi mnga'o// rnam par grol ba yongs su nyams pa myi mnga'o// rnam pa grol ba'i ye shes gzigs pa yongs su nyams pa myi mnga'o// sku'i 'phrin las thams cad ye shes sngon du 'gro ba ste/ ye shes kyi rjesu
164a1('bum): 'brang ngo // gsung gi 'phrin las thams cad ye nas sngon du 'gro ba ste/ ye shes kyi rjes su 'breng ngo // thugs kyi 'phrin las thams cad ye shes sngon du 'gro ba ste/ ye shes gi rjes su 'brang ngon 'das
164a2('bum): ba'i dus la ma chags ma thogs pa'i ye shes gzigs pa 'jug go// ma 'ongs pa'i dus la ma chags ma thogs pa'i ye shes gzigs pa 'jug go// da ltar byung ba'i dus la martags ma thogs pa'i ye shes gzigs pa 'dzun/ 
164a3('bum): de dag ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnam so// rab 'byor de de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid gang zhe na/ gang la dmyigs pa myed pa dran pa'i dbang sgyur ba'i rnam pa dang ldan pa'i mtshan nyid kyi rnam pa zas
164a4('bum): cad mkhyend pa nyid ces bya'o// bam po'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i myi chen po'i mtshan sum bcu rtsa gnyis/ 
164a5('bum): gang zhe na/ phyag dang zhabs kyi 'khor lo'i mtshan dang ldan pa/ zhabasashin tu gnas pa dang / phyag dang zhabs kyi dra bas 'brel pa dang / phyag dang zhags gzhon zhing 'jam pa dang / mdun shin tumatsho
164a6('bum): ba dang / sor mo ring ba dang / rting pa yangs pa dang / sku che zhing / drang ba dang / zhabs legs par mtho ba dang / yan lag gi spu rkyen du 'khyil ba dang / ri dgas e ne yi byin pa lta bu dang / phyag
164a7('bum): bcu drang por slebs pa dang / gsang pa'i gnas sbubs su nub pa dang / gsang gi kha dog dang / mdog shin tu 'jam pa dang / s+phu re re nas g.yas phyogs su 'khyil ba dang / zhal mdzod spus brgyan pa dang / seng ge'i ma
164a8('bum): ro stong lta bu dang / phrag pa'i sku mdzes par grub pa dang / phrag so shin tu rgyas pa dang / ro bro ba'i mchog dang/ shing n+ya grong ltar chu zheng gab pa dang / dbu spyi gtsug dang ldan pa dang / ljags shin tu yangs pa dang / tshangs
164b1('bum): ba'i dbyangs dang / seng ge'i 'gram pa lta bu dang / chems shin tu dkar ba dang / tshems shin tu mnyam dang / tshems thags bzang ba dang / chems mnyam zhing bzhi bcu tshang ba dang / spyan dkar nag 'byes pa dang po'i
164b2('bum): rdzi ma lta bu ste/ de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag dang zhabs kyi 'jil dang / 'khor lo rtsibs stong dang ldan pa mu khyud can lte ba dang bcas pa/ rnam pa thams cad yangs su rdzogs pa 'di lta ste rus pa 'am ba sol gdus/ 
164b3('bum): brkos pa dang 'dra ba mnga' bas/ phyag dang zhabs kyi 'khor lo'i mtshan dang ldan pa'o// zhabs kyi 'thil gnyis sa la mnyam par sa la 'jog cing / zhabs zhum pa myed pas zhabs shin tu
164b4('bum): gnas so// ngang pa'i rgyal po ltar phyag dang zhabs kyi dra bar 'brelabs/ phyag dang zhabs dra bar 'brel ba'o// shing bal gyi sgo nga ltar shin tu 'jam zhing gzhon pas// phyag dang zhabs gzhon
164b5('bum): zhing 'jam pa'o// phyag dang zhabs dang / mgur gi lhun shin tu mtho bas mdun shin tu mtho ba'o// phyag dang zhabs kyi sor mo ring ba'o// rting pi rang bas rting pa spang ba'o// sku lag pa mdun tu 'phags la drang bas
164b6('bum): sku che zheng drang ba'o// pus me'i lhang dang long bu mdzes par nub pas/ zhabs legs par mtho ba'o// spu gyen du g.yas phyogs su 'khyil pas/ yan lag gi spu gyen du 'khyil ba'o// ri dgas e ne ya'i
164b7('bum): byin pa dang / smyig ma dang / ldum bu dang / dar pa ltar drang zhing ma nyams la rims kyis gzhol bar grub cing brum pa dang / ri dgas e ne ya'i byin pa lta bu'o// brla drang por bzhag ste ma bdud kyang // phyag gi 'jim
164b8('bum): gnyis kyis pus mo'i ljang la reg pas kyang / phyag brda drang por slebs pa'o// glang po dang / rta cang shes ltar gsang ba'i gnas sbubs su nub pas gsang ba'i gnas sbubs su nub pa'o// shin tu sbyangs pa'i gartse
165a1('bum): gI kha dog lta bu dang ldan pas gser gi kha dog go// gser gi kha dog dang / dardul gis shin tu sbyangs pa ltar 'jam zhing snyoms pa'i mdog du 'dug la skum rdul gis myi gos rapas mdog shin tu/ 
165a2('bum): 'jam pa'o// shin tu rnam par phye ba'i spu re rare skyes shing gnyis su myed pas/ sU re re nas g.yas phyogs su'i khyil pa'o// me tog kun 'ata dang / zla ba dang / 'o ma dang / ba mo'i mdog ltar 'dug la
165a3('bum): nyi ma dang / zla ba brgyalas kyang 'phags par 'od gos pa ba'i maho da su sprin mtshams shin tu brgyan pas/ zhal mdzod spus brgyan pa'o/ ro stod che bas seng ge'i ro snod do// mgur dang rgyud legs par 'bres/ 
165a4('bum): cing spun zlum pas/ phrag pa'i spun mdzes par thub pa'o// gser gi bstan bzhin pa phyis bltar/ brag sa sogs pa brung pas/ phrag so shin tu rgyas pa'o// rlung dang mchis pa dang / 
165a5('bum): bdaganigs ma nyams shing / rnam par shes pa mda' 'dra ba myod pas ro bro ba'i mchog go// sku mi zhing 'dom du mnyam pas shing nagro ltang du zheng gas pa'o// spyi gtsug zum zhing legs la g.yas byo/ 
165a6('bum): yu lakhyil ba dang ldan pa'i dbu mnyam pa'i legs par grub la gamadzes par mang bas/ dbu spyi drug dang ldan pa'o// me toga.ud pa la dmar po'i 'dab ma'i 'dog sbyar 'dug cing zhin tu yangs pas/ ljags zhin
165a7('bum): su sangs shing grub pa'o// tshangs pa dang byag la bying ka lta brir gsung mnga' bas tshangs pa'i dbyangs so// 'bras pa me long gi dkyil 'khor ltar legs par grub cing mings skyes te/ yid du 'ong bas se de'i
165a8('bum): 'gram pa lta du'o// me tog kun dang du ga cag 'gro lnga shin du dkan pa'i tshims mang pa bas// choms shin du dag ba'o// rnams sa mngon man pa man pa'o// choms ma mamams su dod bram
165b1('bum): zags bzang ba'o// bla 'og gye dgu myed pas tshems mnyam zhing bcu chang ba'o// dkar nag kyi cha ma 'dres pa la shin tu rnam par dag cing mdog dmar pos ma g.yogs pas spyan dkar nag 'byed pa'o// 
165b2('bum): rdzi ma zlum la 'od shin tu legs par gnas la/ ma 'dzings pas pa'i rdzi ma lta bu'o// de la bla ma la bsu bskyal dang chos nyan pa la sdod pa dang / gtsug lag khang dang / mchod pa la stsogs pa la bsti stang byas
165b3('bum): pas/ phyag dang zhabs 'khor lo'i mtshan dang ldan pa ste/ de ni minga' snga ltas so// yi dam la brtan pas zhabs shin tu gnas pa ste/ de ni myi g.yo zhing shin tu rtand pa'i snga ltas so // / sbyind pa dang / 
165b4('bum): ngag snyan pa dang / don spyad pa dang don mthun pa'i sbyin pa rnam pa bzhi goms par byas pas/ phyag dang zhabs dra bar 'brel ba ste/ de ni 'du ba'i snga ltas so// bza ba dang / bcil ba dang / btung
165b5('bum): bzhim zhing nyams su bde ba byin pas/ phyag dang zhabs gzhon zhing 'jam pa dang / mdun shin tu mtho ba ste/ de giHsa na bza' ba dang bca' ba dang / btung bzhim zhing nyams su
165b6('bum): bde ba thob pa'i snga ltas so// bcings pa grol ba dang / sreg ga rim gro byas pa dang / srog gcod pa spangs pa spangs pa dang / sor mo ring ba dang / rting pa yangs pa dang / sku che zhing yangs pa ste/ don
165b7('bum): sku tshe ring ba'i snga ltas so// dge ba'i chos yang dag par spangs pa dang / bzung ba yang dag par mngon par spel zhing 'grib par ma byas pas/ zhabs kyi gong mtho ba dang / yan lag gi spu gyen du 'khyil
165b8('bum): baTI/ don myinyam pa'i chos dang ldan pa'i snga ltas so// rig pa dang babor bras rim gro byab shing gzhan byin pa dang / bdag gos slabs pas/ ri dgas e na yi'i byin pa la bu ste/ don myur du
166a1('bum): 'dzind pa'i sdesmras so// bdog cing mod pa'i nor la bslangs na myi 'gong bar btod zhing myed ces ma byas pa phyag ba drang por slegs te don yo byad la mang ba sa
166a2('bum): dul ba'i snga lus so// 'grogs pa dang mdzas shes dang mnyan ma bye ba dang / bye bar gyur pa'i sems can rnams/ tshangs pa'i spyod pa la yang dag par bskul ba dang / gsang po'i tshig
166a3('bum): yongs su srungs pas gsang ba'i gnas sbubs su nub pa ste/ don bu mang ba'i snga ltas so// stand dang gos dang khang pa dang gzhal myong khang dang / gnas bzang po byin pas gser gi kha dog
166a4('bum): mdog shin tu 'jam pa ste/ de gnyis ni ba dan dang na bza' dang gzhal myed khang dang gnas bzang po thob pa'i snga ltas so// 'du 'dzi spangs pa dang 'khan po dang slob dpon dang / pha ma dang
166a5('bum): pu na las stsogs pa bla ma rnams la tshul dang 'dra bar rim gro byas pa dang / btsun par byas pa dang / gsol pa rna / ba la ma gzan pas spu re re nas g.yas phyogs su 'khyil
166a6('bum): ba dang / zhal mdzod spus brgya nad pa ste/ de ni nyams pa myed pa'i snga ltas so// myi snyan pa myi zer zhing myi smod la snyan par smra zhing legs par bshad pa mthun par 'dzind pas seng ge'i ro stong lta bu dang
166a7('bum): 'phrag pa'i lhun mdzes par grub pa ste/ de ni thub pa myed po'i snga ltas so// na ba rnams la rtsi dang / rim gro dang / sman dang nyams su phan pa'i zas byin pa dang / rim gror byas pas phrag so shinang
166a8('bum): tu rgyas pa dang / ro bro ba'i mchog ste/ de ni nad nyung ba'i snga ltas so// skyed mo tshal dang 'khor dang / btung ba dang rdzing bu dang / rgal brga pa'i rnam pa dang yun ring por 'phreng ba'i gnas dang steg dang / 
166b1('bum): rtsu ga lag khang dang / bya ba las stsogs pa gzhan mos par bya ba sngon du 'gro zhing bdag gis gzhan byin pas shong n+ya gro ltar chu zhing ga pa dang / dbu spyi sdug dang ldan pa sto// do ni mnga' ba chen/ 
166b2('bum): ba mnga' snga ltas so// yun ring por tshig snyan cing 'jam pa dang / nyams bde bar smras pas ljags shin tu yangs shing srab pa dang / tshangs pa'i dbyangs te/ de gnyis ni yan lag lnga dang ldan pa'i gsung
166b3('bum): mnga' ba'i lnga ltas so// gsung yan lag lnga dang ldan pa zhes bya ba ni yangs shing rnam par shes par 'gyur ba dang / mnyan na 'ga' zhing myi mthun pa myed pa dang / bab cing dbyings rjes su 'byung ba dang / 
166b4('bum): btang myi 'dra zhing rnar snyan pa dang / ma 'khrugs shing gsal ba'o// yun ring po nas tshig dkyil pa spangs shing dus dus su smra smra bas seng ge'i 'gram pa lta bu ste/ doni tshig kun
166b5('bum): kyis mnyam pa'i lnga ltas so// rim gror bya ba dang brnyas pa myed pa gnyis kyis 'tsho ba yongs su dag pas chems shin tu dkar ba dang mnyam pa ste/ de ni 'khor snga nas sdug pa 'o/ 
166b6('bum): snga ltas so// yun ring po nas bden zhing phra ma myed pa'i tshig sgra smra bas tshems btags pa zang mnyam zhing bzhi bcu chang ba ste/ de ni 'khor dbyer myi phyed pa'i snga ltaso// pad gis 'khyud pa bzhin du
166b7('bum): mnyes par bsdams pa myed pa la ma chags myi sdang ba dang / rmongs pa myed pa'i myig gis lta lta bas spyan dkar nag dbyes pa dang / ba'i rdzi ma lta bu ste/ de ni kun tso nas mdzes pa'i snga ltas so
166b8('bum): rab 'byor de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rgya chen po'i mtshan sum bcu rtsa gnyis 'an / de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i dpel byang bzang po brgya bcu gang zhen 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas
167a1('bum): bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mngon par 'du bya ba thams cad las dben pa ste/ sen mo zangs kyi mdog lngar 'dug pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni gnyen bshes byams pa dang / 
167a2('bum): par sems can la phan pa'i sems can rnams thugs mnga' ba ste/ sen mo'i mdog sdum pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni rigs rgyud mthon par 'byung ba ste/ sen mo mtho ba yini sangs rgyas
167a3('bum): bcom ldan 'das rnams ni tshul la nam tho bami mngar ba ste/ song sa smras pa yin sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni dag pa'i rtsa ba 'jogs pa ni/ song po rgyas pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
167a4('bum): nams ni dge ba'i rtsa ba rim gis grub pa ste/ sor mo rim gis gtos ba yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni thugs dang / gsung dang sku'i 'dzin mas dang 'gro bshin du dben pa ste tsa myi mthong bsrin
167a5('bum): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni nyon mongs pa'i 'dud pa 'grel ba ste rtsal mdud pa myed pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcomaldan 'das rnam sa ni shin tu dben pa'i tshogs mnga' me/ 'ong
167a6('bum): khris su chud pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan das nam ni kyi'i thang po/ rang ba gros su srid pa'in/ sa rgyas bcod ldan das rnam po rgyal pos pa mam nam
167a7('bum): ma// sa su su da/ rgyas com ldan na kyi ga/ byam ga sa sa su u pa na/ ma tha sa tsha
167b1('bum): g.yas phyogs su bzhud pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams rnams ni lta na mdzes pa ste/ mdzes par bzhud pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni rtag tu thugs yon po myi mnga' ba ste/ 
167b2('bum): myi g.yo bar bzhud pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams na tshul yang dag pa'i yon tan stond pa ste/ sku shin tu legs pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni sdig pa'i chos rnams shin tu sbyangs te/ 
167b3('bum): sku shin tu sbyangs pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni chos rim gas stond pa ste/ sku rim gis gzhol ba yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni sku dang gsung dang thugs gtsang ma dang ldan
167b4('bum): pa ste/ sku shin tu rtsang ba yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni rang bzhin gis thugs 'jam pa dang ldan pa yin te/ sku / shin tu 'jam pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rdzas
167b5('bum): ni rang bzhin gis rnam par dag pa'i thugs mnga' ba ste/ sku shin tu rnam par dag pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni chos shin tu rdzogs 'i skye/ dperal byang shin tu rdzogs pa yin/ sangs
167b6('bum): rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni yon tan yangs shing bzang bar stond pa ste/ sku che zhing mdzes pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni sems can thams cad la mnyam pa'i thugs mnga' ba ste/ sku legs par mnya
167b7('bum): ba yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni shin tu 'jam pa'i chos ston pa ste/ sku shin su gzhon pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni rtag tu zhus pa myed pa'i thugs mnga' ba ste/ sku zhum pa myed
167b8('bum): ba yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni myi dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad byang ba ste/ sru shin tu rgyas pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams na yang 'byung ba shin du bcom zhing zad pa snyed/ sku shin tu ma khregs/ 
168a1('bum): pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i yan lag dang nying lag legs par ston pa ste/ yan lag dang nying lag spang bar mdzad pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom/ 
168a2('bum): ldan 'das rnams gzigs pa shin tu rnam par dag pa ste/ snang bar b.rab myed cing rnam par dag pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni rdul dang ldan pa'i slob ma mnga' ste/ byal brum pa yin/ 
168a3('bum): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni 'khor ba'i nyes pa shin tu sbyangs pa ste/ phyal shin du byang ba dang ldan pa yin sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni nga rgyal gyi dedu bcom pa ste/ phyal ma nom pa yin
168a4('bum): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni chos pad pa rnam par bzlog pa te// byal byas mer 'dug pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das nas ni slob ma kun nas mdzes pa'i dag 'dun mnga' ba sa/ 
168a5('bum): chos bab mo thugs su chud pa ste/ lte ba zab pa yin/ sa / sa rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mthun pa'i'adzin pa'i slob ma mnga' ba ste/ lte ba g.yas phyogs su 'khyil ba yin/ 
168a6('bum): sangs rgyas bcos ldan 'das rnam sani spobs kun nas mangs pa'i dge 'dun mapar bste/ kun nas mdzes pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni thugs shin tu gang ma dang
168a7('bum): ldan pa ste/ kun spyod pashin du gtsang ba yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bcom ldan 'das rnams na chos nag po bstan pa dang bral ba'i chos 'dul ba mang ga ste/ srul skye ba skyed pa yin/ sangs
168a8('bum): rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni shing ngal ltar// rab tu yang bar 'thob pa'i stond pa ste/ phyag shing bal lta shin tu 'jam pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni ring gi skye bo lal la byams pa dang / 
168b1('bum): dge slong chen po skyes pa ste/ phyag gi ri mo sdum pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni shin du zab cing brtan pa la bzhugs pa ste/ phyag gi ri mo zab pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rjes
168b2('bum): ni bzod pa'i chos yangs par stond pa ste/ phyag gi sor mo ring ba yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni bslab pa'i gnas ha cang yang myi ring bar 'cha' ba ste/ zhal ha cang yang myi ring ba yin
168b3('bum): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni gzugs brnyan 'jig rten du bkye ba ste/ zhal gzugs kyi gzugs brnyan snang ba yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni 'jam pa sdon du btang zhing
168b4('bum): dul ba ste/ ljags shin tu 'jam pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni yon tan phra ba'i tshogs dang ldan pa ste / ljags shin tu srab pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom
168b5('bum): ldan 'das rnams ni glang po'i sgra dang 'brug gi sgra lta bus brnyas pa myi mnye ba ste/ glang po'i nga ro dang 'brug gi dbyangs dang ldan pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni snyan cing 'jam pa dang nyams su
168b6('bum): bde ba'i slob ma mnga' ba ste/ snyan cing 'jam pa dang / nyams su bde ba'i gsung dang ldan pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni srid pa kun tu sbyor ba las 'das pa ste/ tshems mche
168b7('bum): shin tu zlum pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni skye bo rno ba rnams kyi 'dul ba ste/ tshems mche ba rno ba dang ldan pa yin sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni chos dang 'dul ba shin tu dkar ba ste/ 
168b8('bum): tshems shin tu dkar ba yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni sa phyogs mnyam pa la bzhugs pa ste/ mche ba mnyam pa dang ldan pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni rim gis mngon/ 
169a1('bum): par rdzogs par sangs rgyas stond pa ste/ tshems mche ba rim gis gzhol ba yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni shes rab kyi ri bo mngon po la bzhugs pa ste/ shangs legs par mthong
169a2('bum): dang ldan pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni 'dul ba'i skye bo gtsang ma mnga' ba ste/ shangs shin tu gtsang ba yin sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni cho 'phrul dang yongs pa mnga' ba ste spyan ring ba dang ldan
169a3('bum): pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni gzigs pa shin tu rnam par dag pa spyan rnam par dag pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni sems can gyi stsogs pa shin tu sngags pa ste/ rdzi ma stug pa yin
169a4('bum): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni lha dang lha ma yin dang / skyes bu dang na chung mchog dmyig dkar nag 'byes shing pad mo'i 'dab ma ltar 'dug pa rnams kyis mngon par dga' ba ste/ spyan dkar nag 'byes shing
169a5('bum): pad mo'i 'dab ma ltar 'dug pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni rtag tu yangs pa gzigs pa ste/ sbyin ma ring / ba dang ldan pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnas
169a6('bum): ni 'jam par 'dul ba la mkhas pa ste/ sbyin ma 'jam pa dang ldan pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni rimi gis skyon thams cad mkhyend pa ste/ sbyin ma'i spu mnyam pa dang / 
169a7('bum): ldan pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni dge ba'i rtsa ba snum gis sems can par gyur pa'i skye bo 'dul ba ste/ sbyin ma snum pa dang ldan pa yin na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni chos mchog
169a8('bum): tu yangs shing don dang ldan pa mnga' ba ste/ snyan legs shing stan shal rang ba yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni nyon mongs pa'i rgyu las rnam par rgyal ba ste/ snyan mnyam pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom
169b1('bum): ldan 'das rnams ni sems can mnyam pa 'dul ba ste/ snyan gi dbang po ma nyams pa dang ldan pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni lta ba rnam pa thams byang ste/ zhal bral ba legs par grub pa dang ldan
169b2('bum): pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni phas pi'i rgol ba shin tu 'dul ba ste/ zhal phral ba yangs pa dang ldan pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni smon lam dam pa shin tu rdzogs brtse
169b3('bum): dbu shin tu rdzogs pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnaMs ni srul gi dbu rnam par thog ya ste/ dbu bung ba ltar gnag pa dang ldan pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mthong ba dang ldan
169b4('bum): pa sgom pas spang ba'i bag la nyal ba zad par byas te pa ste/ dbu sdug pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni thugs/ 'jam pas bstan po'i snying po thugs su chub pa ste dbul
169b5('bum): ma yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni rtag tu ma 'khrugs ba'i thugs dang ldan pa ste/ dbu myi 'dzings pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni brlang ba'i gsung dang yongs su
169b6('bum): thal ba snyed du myi rtsub pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams mi byang chub gi yan lagasung rgyan rton skye bo mthun pa sbubs pa ste/ dbu dri zhim pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnam pas
169b7('bum): byag dang nab sa pos gi bye dang kra zhis dang dga' ba'i khyil pas brgyand pa yin// rab 'byor de dag ni de bzhin gzhags pa'i dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi dpe byed babang po btu
169b8('bum): byor de ga den po chos kyinam dran chab de dag zhan pa sheng dang / yang dag pa stad pa don 'di dums 'ad pa ras kyi sbyin panas bya/ ma kyi na tu tshun tham
170a1('bum): sems dpa' chen po sems can rnams zang zing gi sbyin pa dang / chos kyi sbyin pas sdud pa yin te/ rab 'byor de de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i chos
170a2('bum): rab 'byor de ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen tshig snyan pas sems can rnams sdud pa yin zhe na/ rab 'byor de 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyind pa drug gis
170a3('bum): sems can rnams sdud pa yin te/ 'di ltar sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin/ 
170a4('bum): pa dang / bsam gtan gi pha rol tu phyind pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang / pha rol tu phyind pa drug po 'di dag gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni snyan par smra bas
170a5('bum): sems can rnams sdud do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar pha rol tu phyind pa drug po de dag gis dge ba'i rtsa ba'i chos thams cad 'dus pa ste/ rab 'byor de de ltar na byang
170a6('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' tshig snyan par smra bas sos can rnams sdud do// rab 'byor de ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos don byas pas sems can rnas
170a7('bum): sdud pa yin nyen/ rab 'byor da 'di la byang chub sems pa' sems dpa' chen po pa'i mad tu phyin pa drug pa de dag gis/ don byas pas sems can rnams srung ngo // de tsa'i phyir zhen/ doni 'di ltar
170a8('bum): rom tu phyind pa drug pa de dag gis dge ba ma 'i'i chos thams cad ni ma 'dus pa myed de/ rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' chen po don byas pas sems can rnams srung ngo // rab 'byor/ 
170a9('bum): di ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyind pa drug po rdo dag don mthun pas sems can rnams sdud pa yin zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
170b1('bum): pha rol tu phyind pa drug po de dag gi don mthun pas sems can rnams sdud do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar pha rol tu phyind pa drug po de dag gis dge ba'i chos thams cad ma 'dus pa myed de/ ra
170b2('bum): rab 'byor de de ltar na pha rol tu phyind pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po don mthun pas sems can rnams sdud do// rab 'byor de de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi ngo
170b3('bum): mtshar dang rmad du byung ba'i chos so// rab 'byor de gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzhan
170b4('bum): dag la 'di skad ces 'debs shing 'di skad ces stond to// rigs kyi bu tshur sheg/ yi ge mngon par sgrub pa la mkhas pa gyis shig/ yi ge gnyis kyis bya ba'i rang bzhin
170b5('bum): thams cad shes par gyis shig/ yi ge gcig la mkhas gyis shig/ yi ge gnyis la yi ge bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis kyi bar la mkhas par gyis shig/ yi ge gcig gi bya ba'i rang bzhin
170b6('bum): thams cad shes par gyis shig/ yi ge gnyis kyi bya ba'i rang bzhin thams cad shes par gyis shig/ yi ge bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis kyi bar gyi rang bzhin thams cad shes par gyis shig/ yi ge gcig tu yi
170b7('bum): ge bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis 'dus par sgoms shig/ yi ge bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis su yi ge gcig 'dus par sgoms shig ces chos stond to// rab 'byor da byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de yang yi ge gcig la
170b8('bum): mkhas pa yin/ yi ge bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis kyi bar la mkhas pa yin/ yi ge gcig gi nang du yi ge bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis 'dus par bsgom pa la mkhas pa yin/ yi ge bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis su yi ge gcig tu
171a1('bum): 'dus par bsgoms pa la mkhas pa yin te/ de de ltar yi ge mngon par bsgrub pa la mkhas par bya ba la bsgoms shing / yi ge myed pa la mngon par bsgrub pa la mkhas par yin no// dang / 
171a2('bum): 'byor da 'dis sde dbang na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos la mkhas pa dang yi ge la mkhas pa yin te/ chos la mkhas pa drang yi ge la mkhas pas yi ge mngon
171a3('bum): thos mi ge byed pa'i chos stod kyang rab 'byor da chos de yi ge'i rnam pa dang ma bral ba yang ma yin te/ rab 'byor de de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i rnams kyi ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i chos/ 
171a4('bum): gang nyan thos dang sangs rgyas thams cad dang ldan pa'i thun mong ma yin no// de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor kyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gal te
171a5('bum): mtha' las 'das pa dang / thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid nye bar bzung sted/ sems can yang shin tu dmyigs su chos kyang myi dmyigs/ chos kyi dngos po yang myi dmyigs pa lags na
171a6('bum): bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang / bsam gtan gi pha rol tu phyind pa dang / brtson 'grus gi pha rol tu phyind pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol
171a7('bum): tu phyind pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad myed pa bzhi dang / gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi la spyod pa dang
171a8('bum): byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum bcu rtsa bdun la spyod pa dang / stong pa nyid bcu bzhi la spyod pa dang / stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa'i ting nge 'dzin da la spyod pa dang / rnam pa tha ra pa brgyad la spyod pa dang / 
171b1('bum): mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la dang de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang myi 'jigs pa bzhi dang so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / 
171b2('bum): sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad dang / myi chen po'i mtshan sum bcu rtsa gnyis dang / dpe' byad bzang po brgya bcu la spyod cing rnam par sbyin pa las byung ba'i mngon par shes pa drug la gnas ses
171b3('bum): can rnams la chos stond par 'gyur ra/ de la ni sems can gyi dmyigs te/ sems can du gdags pa myi dmyigs so// sems can myi dmyigs pas gzugs su dmyigs pa ma mchis so// sems can
171b4('bum): myi dmyigs pas/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang rnam par shes pa dmyigs su ma mchis so// sems can myi dmyigs pas sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad kyi bar du
171b5('bum): dmyigs su ma mchis so// sems can myi dmyigs pas rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi bar du dmyigs su ma mchis so// sems can myi dmyigs pas myi chen po'i mtshan sum bcu rtsa gnyis
171b6('bum): dmyigs su ma mchis so// dpe' byad bzang po brgya bcu dmyigs su ma mchis so// sems can dmyigs su ma mchis pa la ni sems can ma mchis/ gzugs ma mchis so// tshor ba dang ka 'du shes dang 'du byed dang / rnam
171b7('bum): par shes pa ma mchis so// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad kyi bar du myi dmyigs su ma mchis so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi bar du dmyigs su ma mchis so// myi chen po'i mtshan sum bcu rtsa gnyis
171b8('bum): ma mchis so// dper byad bzang po brgya brgya bcu dmyigs su ma mchis so// de ci'i phyir slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe
173a1('bum): byang chub sems dpa' nyid kyang myi dmyigs na byang chub sems dpan gyi chos la dmyigs par 'gyur ba lta cig la mchis/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal dpa/ rab 'byor de de de bzhin no// de de bzhin/ 
173a2('bum): ji skad smras pa de bzhin no// rab 'byor de de ltar sems can myi dmyigs pas nang stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o// phyi stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid du kyi bar du rig par bya'o// phung
173a3('bum): po stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o// khams stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o// skye mched stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o// rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o// bden pa stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o// 
173a4('bum): bdag stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o// sems can stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o// srog dang 'gro ba dang gso ba dang / skyes bu dang / gang zag dang / shed can dang / shed bdag dang / byed pa
173a5('bum): po dang / byed du 'jug po dang / slong ba po dang / kun nas slong ba po dang / tshor ba po dang / tshor bar byed pa po dang / shes pa dang / mthong ba po dang / mthong ba po stong pa nyid du rig
173a6('bum): par bya'o// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o// yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag
173a7('bum): brgyad pa stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o// 'phags pa'i bden pa dang / bsam gtan dang / tshad myed pa rnams dang / gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / rnam par tha rang pa brgyad dang / mthar kyis
173a8('bum): gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smond pa myed pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / myi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa dang / 
173b1('bum): byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o// rgyu nad tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir myi 'ong
173b2('bum): ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid dang / rang byang chub stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o// lam gi rnam pa nyid dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid stong pa nyid cing stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o// sangs rgyas kyi
173b3('bum): zhing stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o// sangs rgyas stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o// byang chub sems dpa' stob pa nyid du rig para'o// rab 'byor de de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu
173b4('bum): la spyod pa'i tshe// chos de dag thams cad stong pa nyid kyi bar mthong nas/ phyi nad ci log tu gyur da pa'i sems can rnams la chos stond to// ji ltar stong pa chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe
173b5('bum): chos de dag thams cad stong pa nyid kyi bar mthong nas/ phyin ci log tu gyur pa'i sems pa nyid de dag la yang myi 'jug pa de dag la de ltar stond to// des de ltar mthong nas chos thams cad
173b6('bum): sgrib pa myed par shes te/ chos gang yang 'khrugs par myi byed gnyis su byed do// yang dag pa ji lta ba de bzhin du yang ston par byed/ rab 'byor de 'di lta ste dper na de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa
173b7('bum): ni sprul pa bye ba phrag du ma sprul cing / sems can la la sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa la sbyor/ la la tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang / la la bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa dang / la la brtson 'grus kyi pha
173b8('bum): rol tu phyind pa dang / la la bsam gtan kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang / la la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa dang / la la bsam gtan bzhi dang / la la tshad myed pa bzhi dang / la la gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par
174a1('bum): 'jug pa la sbyor la la byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum bcu rtsa bdun la sbyor/ la la 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / la la rnam par tha rad pa brgyad dang la la mthar da kyis gam+ba/ 
174a2('bum): pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / la la stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa dang / la la mngon par shes pa la sbyor/ la la ting nge 'dzin thams cad la dang ga la la gzungs kyi
174a3('bum): thams cad la sbyor/ la la de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / la la myi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / la la sos yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / la la byams pa chen po dang / la la snying rje chen po dang / la la
174a4('bum): sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad la sbyor/ la la rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la sbyor/ la la lan+ti phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras/ bu la dang / la la ni phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang
174a5('bum): la lin dgra bcom pa nyid la sbyor ba/ la li ni rang chub la sbyor la la rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi bar la sbyor/ rab 'byor/ de/ ji snyam du sems/ sprul pa des chos la la zhig
174a6('bum): tha dad du bye ba yod dam/ gso med pa bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsa mang pa/ rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang shes rab kyi
174a7('bum): pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ sems can rnams la chos ston te/ de dag phyin ci log rnams las yongs su bkrol nas/ ma bcings ma grog pa'i tshul du yang dag pa ji lta bzhin du rab tu mkhyend to// de ci'i
174a8('bum): zhe na/ rab 'byor da de ni 'di ltar gzugs ma bcings ma grol ba'o// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa ma bcings ma grol ba/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du ma bcings
174b1('bum): ma grol ba ste/ gzugs kyi ma bcings ma grol ba gang yin pa de ni gzugs ma yin no// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa'i ma bcings ma grol ba gang yin pa de ni rnam par
174b2('bum): shes pa ma yin no// rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi bar gi ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar gzugs ni shin
174b3('bum): tu rnam par dag pa'o// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o// rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi bar du shin tu rnam par dag pa'o// rab
174b4('bum): 'byor de de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ sems can rnams kyang chos ston kyang sems can du myi dmyigs so// byang chub
174b5('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni chos thams cad myi dmyigs/ pa'i tshul gis gnas te/ gzugs stong pa nyid myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / 
174b6('bum): rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis gnas 'dus byas dang / 'dus ma byas kyi chos rnams lani
174b7('bum): gang yang gnas pa myed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar gang la gnas par bya ba de lta bu'i ngo bo nyid myi dmyigs te/ dngos po myed pa'i dngos po myed pa myi gnas so// rang bzhin la rang bzhin myi
174b8('bum): gnas so// gzhan gi dngos la gzhan gi dngos po myi gan so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar de dag thams cad dmyigs su myed de/ gang dmyigs su myed pa de ni gang la myi gnas so// rab 'byor/ 
175a1('bum): de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ chos de dag thams cad stong pa nyid thams cad kyis dbye ste/ rab 'byor de shes rab kyi pha
175a2('bum): rol tu phyind pa la de ltar spyod pa'i/ byang chub sems dpa' chen pos sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams dang / nyan
175a3('bum): thos rnams dang / 'phags pa thams cad kyi skyonatu myi bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag dang / rang sangs
175a4('bum): rgyas de dag dang / nyan thos de dag gis kyang chos nyid de'i rjes su rtog pa ste/ nyid de'i rjes su rtogs nas kyang / sems can rnams la chos ston te/ de yang chos rnams kyi chos nyid las myi 'ad
175a5('bum): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor de chos kyi dbyings ni 'da' ba myed do// de bzhin nyid dang yang dag pa'i mtha' ni 'da' ba myed/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de dag la gang 'da' bar 'gyur ba'i rang
175a6('bum): bzhin myed do// de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor kyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gas te de ltar chos kyi chos dbyings la yang 'da' ba ma mchis
175a7('bum): de bzhin nyid dang yang dag pa'i mtha' la yang 'da' ba ma mchis pa ci lags/ 'o na gzugs kyang gzhan la chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan zhig
175a8('bum): lags sam/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa yang gzhan la chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan zhig lags pa
175b1('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kying bar yang gzhan la chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhon de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan pa zhig lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'/ 
175b2('bum): stsal da pa/ rab 'byor de de ni ma yin no// gzugs kyang gzhan la chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan zhig lpag sa sam/ tshor ba dang / 
175b3('bum): 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes ba yang gzhan la chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin no// rnam thams cad
175b4('bum): mkhyend pa nyid kyi bar gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings// kyang gzhan de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin no// gsol pa bcom ldan 'das gal te
175b5('bum): gzugs kyang gzhan la chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan ma lags/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa
175b6('bum): yang gzhan la chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan ma lags/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi gapar yang gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings
175b7('bum): kyang gzhan de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan ma lags na/ 'o na ji ltar chos rnams kyi 'bras bu dgod cing / nag po'i chos rnams kyi rnam par smyind pa nag po ni sems can
175b8('bum): dmyal ba dang / byol song gi skye gnas dang / gshin/ rje'i 'jig rten dkar ba'i chos kyi sbyin pa rnam par smind pa dkar po'i na lha dang myi dkar nag gi chos kyi rnam par smind pa dkar nag ni bde ba dang sdug sngal
176a1('bum): nyams su myong ba/ myi gnag cing dkang ba'i chos kyi rnam par sbyind pa myi gnag cing dkar ba ni rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir myi 'ong bar
176a2('bum): 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid dang / rang byang chub dang / za na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub pa'o zhes bgyi bar rnam par banod par 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsam dpa
176a3('bum): rab 'byor da kun rdzob gi bden pa tshad mar byas te/ 'bras bu rnam par bkod pa bstand kyi don dam pa'i bden pas ni 'bras bu rnam par bkod pa bstand par myi nus so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ chos de ni
176a4('bum): rnam par dag pa myed pa/ brjod du myed pa tha snyad myed pa ste/ 'di ltar mying bden pa dang / gzugs bden pa dang / skye ba// bden pa dang / 'gag pa bden pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs
176a5('bum): pa myed pa dang / rnam par byang ba myed pa dang / 'di ni mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid / gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das gal te/ de ltar kun rdzob
176a6('bum): kyi bden pa nye bar bzung ste/ 'bras bu rnam par bkod pa lags kyi/ don dam pa'i bden pas ma lags na/ byis pa so so'i skye bo thams cad dang / rgyu nad tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang / lan
176a7('bum): cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid dang / rang byang chub dang / bla na myeng ba yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka
176a8('bum): sbal pa/ rab 'byor da ci byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams kun rdzob gi bden pa dang 'am/ don dam pa'i bden pa shes sam/ gal te shes na ni de dag kyang rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'am/ lan cig phyir ri
176b1('bum): skad byed pa yang dgra par rdzog pa'i bya nub tu na par dgod par 'gyur na/ rab 'byor byis pas sad+d+hin+d+he hrI la m+b+ha myed/ marna par dgod pa yang byed/ swA~M pa myed par gyis pas sun su rna la la
176b2('bum): ba'i 'bras bu dang phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid dang / bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub rnam par dgod pa lto ga las 'ong // rab 'byor da 'phags pa'i gang zag
176b3('bum): rnams ni lam yang yod/ lam bsgom pa yang yod pa na de'i phyir/ gang zag de dag las 'bras bu rnam par dgod pa yod do// gsol pa bcom ldan 'das ci lags ka lam bsgom pas 'bras bu
176b4('bum): thob pa 'am/ 'bras bu thob par bgyi ba mchis sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa rab 'byor da de ni ma yin te/ lam bsgoms pas 'bras bu thob pa 'am/ 'bras bu thob par bya ba

176b8('bum): 'dus byas kyi khams sam/ 'dus ma byas kyi khams kyi rigs su bcad cing 'bras bu rnam par bkod pa ma mchis na/ bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di ni kun tu sbyor ba gsum spangs pas rgyu nad tu zhugs
176b9('bum): pa'i 'bras bu'o// 'dod pa'i 'dod chags dang / gnod sems bsrabs pas lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'o// 'og ma'i cha can gi kun tu sbyor lnga spangs pa'i phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'o// bla mi'i cha byad gi kun tu
177a1('bum): sbyor ba lnga spangs pas dgra bcom pa nyid do// gang ci yang rung ste/ kun 'byung ba'i chos de dag thams cad 'ogag pa'i cha can du shes pa rang byang chub bo// bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba'i nyon
177a2('bum): mongs pa thams cad spangs pas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub po zhes gsungs na/ bcom ldan 'das ris su bcad cing 'dus byas sam/ 'dus ma byas kyi chos rnams kyi 'bras bu rnam par gzhag pa mchis
177a3('bum): na gsung ba'i don de dag bdag gis ji ltar 'tshal bar bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal da pa/ rab 'byor da rgyu nad tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu 'am/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'am/ phyir myi 'ong ba'i
177a4('bum): 'bras bu 'am/ dgra bcom pa nyid dam/ rang byang chub pas bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'dus byas sam 'on te 'du sa byas kyi yin/ gsol pa bcom ldan 'das de ni 'dus ma

177a7('bum): rnams 'di lta ste/ mtshan nyid myed pa'i mtshan nyid gcig tu chud par gyu rud nas/ de'i tshe 'dus byas shes bya ba 'am/ 'dus ma byas kyi chos gang la yang rigs su bcad pa yod dam/ gsol pa bcom

177b1('bum): ste nang stong pa nyid dang dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi rnal du nye bar bzung ste/ sems can rnams la ris su bcad pa myi ston to// de dag kyang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa'i mi/ chu
177b2('bum): khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'am/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'am brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'am/ bsam gtan gi pha rol tu phyind pa 'am/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i
177b3('bum): sa gtan dang po 'am/ bsam gtan gnyis pa 'am/ bsam gtan gsum pa 'am/ bsam gtan bzhi pa 'am byams pa 'am/ snying rje'am/ dga' ba 'am/ btang snyoms saman nam
