177b8('bum): ting nge 'dzind rnams sam// gzungs kyi sgo rnams sam/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams sam/ myi 'jigs pa rnams sam/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams sam/ byams pa chen po 'am/ snying rje chen po
178a1('bum): sangs rgyas kyi mas pa 'dres pa rnamasasapa/ rnam pa thams cad ma snyen pa nyid kyi / chos gang pa yang mngon pa nan pa myed do// de mngod par zhin pas gang sa ma cags myang da/ 
178a2('bum): lha ste dper na de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa sbyin pa yongs su gtong bar sbyin pa'i 'bras bu byed do// de mngon par sbyin pa'i 'bras bu nyams su myong ba myed do// gzhan du na sems can thams cad yongs su mya ngan
178a3('bum): las 'dra ba'i don du ston pa yongs su gting ngo // tshus khrims kyi pha rob tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'bras gi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gi pha ro la tu phyin dpa da

179b1('bum): 'byed dang / rnam par shes pa thams cad sprul pa lta bu lags na/ bcom ldan 'das sprul pa la ni/ gzugs ma mchis tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa ma mchis/ kun

179b5('bum): bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos khams gsum nas yongs su grol bar bya ba'i sems can gang yang myi dmyigs so// de ci'i phyir zhe na
179b6('bum): 'di ltar de ni chos thams cad sgyu ma lta bur shes so// mthong ngo // rtogs so// sprul pa lta bur shes so// mthong ngo // rtogs so// gsol pa bcom ldan 'das gal te de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
179b7('bum): chos thams cad sgyu ma lta bur 'tshal cing mthong ste rtogs la/ sprul pa lta bur mtha' tshol cing mthong ste rtogs pa lags na/ gang gi don du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyind pa drug la spyod pa
179b8('bum): pa lags/ bsam gtan pa ni dang / tshad myed pa ban dang / gzugs myed pa'i snyoms 'jug pa yin dang / mngon par shes pa lnga dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos su bcu rtsa bdun dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa
180a1('bum): bcwo brgyad kyi bar la spyod pa lags/ de ci'i slad du zhen/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ byang chub kyi bar la spyod pa lags/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bgyid pa dang / seMs
180a2('bum): can rnams yongs su sbyind par bgyid pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor dgal te sems can rnams rang rang gi chos thams cad sprul pa lta bur shes zin na// byang chub sems dang
180a3('bum): sems dpa' chen po sems can rnams kyi don du skal pa grangs myed par byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa myi spyod de/ rab 'byorade sems can rnams kyi rang rang gi chos thams cad sprul pa lta bur myi shes pas de'i phyir
180a4('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po skal pa grangs myed par pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyod pa'i sems can rnams yongasu sbyind par byed do// sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par
180a5('bum): byed do// rab 'byor kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das gal te chos thams cad rmi lam lta bu/ sgra brnyan lta bu/ spyod rgyu lta bu/ ya myig yod lta bu/ sgyu ma lta bur sprul pa lta bu
180a6('bum): la gnas na/ bcom ldan 'das sems can rnams ci la gnas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ sems can rnams gyen du bskyod pa
180a7('bum): bgyid/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de sems can rnams mying dang mtshan ma yang dag par ma yin pa yongs su brtags pa ma yin pa la gnas pas ma/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpas
180a8('bum): chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ de dag mying dang mtshan ma dngapa las gyen du spyod do// gsol da pa bcom ldan 'das mying gang lags/ mtshan mo'i na gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
180b1('bum): bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor da 'di lta ste dper na/ mying zhes bya ba 'am/ mtshan ma zhes bya ba ni blo bur gi mying gis sgro btabs pa'o// mying zhes bya ba'i/ mtshan ma zhes bya ba 'am/ gzugs zhes
180b2('bum): bya ba 'am/ tshor ba zhes bya ba 'am/ 'du shes zhes bya ba 'am/ 'du byed ces bya ba 'am/ rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba 'am/ bud myed ces bya ba 'am/ skyes pa zhes bya ba 'am/ khye'u zhes bya ba
180b3('bum): bu mo zhes bya ba 'am/ sems can dmyal ba zhes bya ba 'am/ byol song gi skye gnas zhes bya ba 'am/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten zhes bya ba 'am/ lha zhes bya ba 'am/ myi zhes bya ba 'am/ 'dus byas kyi
180b4('bum): chos zhes bya ba 'am/ 'dus ma byas kyi chos zhes bya ba 'am/ rgyu nad tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i chos zhes bya ba 'am/ kyi lan cig/ phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu zhes bya ba 'am/ phyir myi 'ong ba'i
180b5('bum): 'bras bu zhes bya ba 'am/ dgra bcom pa nyid ces bya b.rarang byang chub ces bya ba 'am// yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ces pa'adi ni snga ma'i mying gis btags te/ 
180b6('bum): rab 'byor da mying thams cad ni don gis brtags pa ste/ byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams gang la chags par 'gyur ba'i 'dus byas thams cad kyi myong tsam ste/ de dag la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa
180b7('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mkhas pas mying thams cad ni yongs su rtog pa las byung ba yin gyi/ yongs su rtog pa dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa la khyed chags par
180b8('bum): ma byed cig/ chos thams cad ni stong pa la mkhas pa rnams ni mngon par zhen par myi byed do// zhes bskul bar byed do// rab 'byor de de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
181a1('bum): pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ mthabs mkhas pas sems can rnams la chos stond pa yin no// rab 'byor da mtshan ma gang zhe na/ gnyis pa 'di dag ni byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams gang la chags par 'gyur
181a2('bum): ba'i mtshan ma ste/ gnyis gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste gzugs kyi mtshan ma dang gzugs myed pa'i mtshan ma'o// rab 'byor de gzugs kyi mtshan ma gang zhe na/ 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i
181a3('bum): gzugs rags pa 'am 'phra ba 'am bzang ba 'am/ ngan pa 'am/ rgyang ring ba 'am thag nye ba gong chos thams cad skad cig ma la kun tu rtogs pas bzung ba ste/ 'di ni gzugs kyi mtshan ma'o// rab 'byor
181a4('bum): gzugs myed pa'i mtshan ma gang zhe na/ gzugs myed pa'i chos gang yang rung ba ste/ mtshan mar bzung bas yongs su brtags shing nyon mongs pa skye bar 'gyur te/ 'di ni gzugs kyi ma
181a5('bum): ma zhes bya'o// de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mkhas pas mtshan ma de dag dang grol zhing mtshan ma myong ba'i
181a6('bum): dbyings su 'god cing rab tu gzhog ste/ ci nas kyang 'di ni cinas kyang mtshan ma'o// 'di ni mtsham ma myed pa'i zhes bya ba gnyis su myi srung ba de ltar 'dod cing gnon ste/ rab 'byor de ltar dbyang chub sems
181a7('bum): dpa'i sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha ro lad tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mkhas pas sems can rnams mtshan ma las rnam par grol zhing mtsham myed pa'i dbyings su rab tu 'god do// gsol pa ga' te/ 
181a8('bum): chos 'di dag thams cad ni de tsam du bas te mying dang mtsham mar bas la/ rtag tu bas te yongs su brtags pa las byung ba lags na/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen thosas hU~M/ 
181b1('bum): pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ bdag kyang dge ba'i chos bgod par thob la/ gzhan yang dge ba'i chos kyi khyad par thob pa la gzhog cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag gis sa nas sa yongs su rdzogs par bgyid
181b2('bum): pa lags sems can rnams theg pa gsum la bkod pa lags// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor da gal te dngos po yang dngos po'i mtshan ma zhig yod na ni/ rab 'byor da 'di ni byang chub
181b3('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ khyad par yang thob par myi 'gyur te/ gzhan yang khyad par thob pa la sbyor bar myi 'gyur gyi/ 'di ltar dngos po dngos po'i mtshan ma
181b4('bum): yang myed dngos po yang myed pas na/ rab 'byor de de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ mtshan ma myed pa'i tshul gis bsam gtan
181b5('bum): gi pha rol tu phyind pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do// mtshan ma myed pa'i tshul gis brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang / bzodapa'i pha rol tu phyind pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu
181b6('bum): phyin pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do// mtshan ma myed pa'i tshul gis bsam gtan poni dang / chad myed pa bzhi dang / gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa pazhi yongs su
181b7('bum): rdzogs par byed do// mtshan ma myed pa'i tshul gos dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / 
181b8('bum): 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do// mtshan ma myed pa'i tshul gis nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang yongs su rdzogs par byed do// mtshan ma myed pa'i
182a1('bum): tshul gis dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du yongs su rdzogs par byed do// mtshan ma myed pa'i tshul gis rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu/ 
182a2('bum): 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / rnam par tha dad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang smon pa myed pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do// mtshan ma myed pa'i tshul gis mngon par shes pa rnams dang / ting nge 'dzin
182a3('bum): rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do// mtshan ma myed pa'i tshul gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / myi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa
182a4('bum): chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad yongs su brdzogs par byed do// de dge ba'i chos// de dag yongs su rdzogs par byas nas/ mtshan ma myed pa'i
182a5('bum): tshul gis gzhan yang dge ba'i chos de dag la sbyor te/ rab 'byor dgal te chung ngu na skra'i rtse mo'i cha shas gzhag pa tsam gis khyod la ci zhig mtshan ma yod na yang / byang chub sems dpa' sem/ 
182a6('bum): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ chos mtshan ma myed pa dran par myed pa yid la byed pa myed pa mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar myi 'gyur te/ sems can rnams kyang de bzhin nyid dang / 
182a7('bum): zag pa myed pa'i chos rnams kyang gzhog par myi 'gyur ro// rab 'byor dpag pa myed pa'i chos rnams thams cad ni mtshan ma myed pa dran pa myed pa yid la byed pa myed pa/ rab 'byor de de ltar na byang chub sems
182a8('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ zag myed pa'i chos rnams kyi sems can thams cad kyi don byed do// gsol pa bcom ldan 'das gal te de ltar chos thams cad
182b1('bum): mtshan ma mchis ning dran pa mchis ste/ yid la bgyid pa mchis te/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar 'di dag ni dge ba'i chos so// 'di dag ni myi dge ba'i chos so// 'di dag ni 'jig rten pa'i chos so 'di dag
182b2('bum): 'di dag ni 'jig rtend las 'das pa'i chos so// 'di dag ni zag pa dang bcas pa'i chos so// 'di dag ni zag pa myed pa'i chos so// 'di dag na 'dus byas kyi chos so// 'di dag ni 'dus ma byas kyi chos
182b3('bum): 'di dag ni thun mong gi chos so// 'di dag ni thun mong ma yin pa'i chos so// 'di dag ni nyan thos kyi chos/ 'di dag ning sangs rgyas kyi chos so// 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa'i chos so// 'di dgo na
182b4('bum): sangs rgyas kyi chos so zhes bgyi bar ji ltar bgrang bar bgyibacom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de de ji snyam du sems/ mtshan ma myed pa yang gzhan la/ nyan thos kyi chos rnas
182b5('bum): gzhan la/ gsol pa bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lagaso / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal da pa/ rab 'byor de de ji snyam du sems/ mtshan ma myed pa yang gzhan la/ rang sangs
182b6('bum): rgyas kyi chos rnams kyang gzhan la/ mtshan ma myed pa yang gzhan sa/ byang chub sems dpa'i chos rnams kyang gzhan/ mtshan ma myed pa yang gzhan la/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnas kyang
182b7('bum): gzhan la/ gsol pa bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lag so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor da mtshan ma nyid rgyu nad tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'o// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'o// phyin
182b8('bum): myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'o// dgra bcom pa nyid do// rang byang chub bo// byang chub sems dpa'i chos so// rang sangs rgyas kyi chos so// gsol pa bcom ldan 'das de de lags so// bde bar gshegs pa de lags
183a1('bum): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal da ba/ rab 'byor nga rnam grangs des na 'di ltar chos thams cad ni mtshan ma myed par rig par bya ste/ rab 'byor chos thams cad ni mtshan ma myed pa'i ma slob pa'i byang
183a2('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni dge ba'i chos mang bas mang pos rnam par 'phel te/ 'di lta ste pha rol tu phyind pa drug dang / nang stong pa nyid dang / dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar dang
183a3('bum): dran pa nye bar bzhag pa ban dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chu kyi yan lag bdud dang / 'phags pa'i lamya yan las
183a4('bum): brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / bsam rtan bzhi dang / tshad myed pa bzhi dang / gzugs myed pa'i snyoms para'ajug pa bzhi dang / rnam par tha rad pa brgyad dang / mthar
183a5('bum): gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa dang / mngon par shes pa lnga dang / ting nge 'dzind thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams
183a6('bum): dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / myi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / sa so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo
183a7('bum): brgyad dang / de ma yin pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa dpag tu myed pa dag gis rnam par 'phel lo// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ni stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma
183a8('bum): byed pa dang / smon pa myed pa la srab par bya ba ma rtogs par gzhan la bslab par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rnam par b.rad pa'i sgo 'odi gsum du dge ba'i chos thams cad ma 'dus pa myed do// 'di lta sterang
183b1('bum): gi mtshan nyid ni stong pa nyid ni stong pa nyid rnam par thar da pa'i sgo'o// mngon par 'du bya ba myed pa la ni smond pa myed pa'i rnam par thard pa ste/ rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo gsum po 'di dag la slob pa'i
183b2('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni phung po lnga la slob pa yin/ skye mched bcu gnyis la slob pa yin/ khams bco brgyad la slob pa yin/ rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i yan lag
183b3('bum): bcu gnyis la slob pa yin/ pha rol tu phyind pa drug/ la slob pa yin/ nang stong pa nyid la slob pa yin/ dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar la slob pa yin/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi
183b4('bum): la slob pa yin/ yang dag par spong bzhi la slob pa yin no/ rdzu 'phrul gi rkang pa bzhi la slob pa yin/ dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 
183b5('bum): 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la slob pa yin/ 'phag pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad myed pa ba zhi dang / gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa
183b6('bum): ni dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smond pa myed pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams dang
183b7('bum): ting nge 'dzind rna thams cad dang / gzugs kyi sgo thams cad dang / la slob pa yin/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / myi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa 'di rnams dang / 
183b8('bum): byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la slob pa yin/ rnam pa thams mkhyend pa nyid kyi bar la slob pa yin no// rab 'byor kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan
184a1('bum): 'das rnams la gang gi rdul du ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i che/ nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga la slob pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das
184a2('bum): kyis bka' stsal pa rab 'byor nga 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gzugs rab tu shes so// gzugs ji ltar skye ba dang / gzugs ji ltar
184a3('bum): 'gag pa dang / gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu sheso// de la ji ltar gzugs shes pa yin zhe na/ 'di lta ste dper na dbu ba'i phung po snying po myed pa ltar shin tu gsong ldong dang / shin tu ga
184a4('bum): shA chags dang / shin tu snying po myed par rab tu shes ten de ltar gzugs shes pa yin no// ji ltar na gzugs kyi skye ba dang 'jig pa shes pa gang zhe na/ gang gzugs ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba myed na
184a5('bum): gang du yang 'gro ba myed pas gang nas kyang myi 'ong gang du nye yang myi 'gro ba sten gang nas kyang ma 'ongs pa de gang du yang ma'o ngas par shes pa ste/ de ltar na gzugs kyi skye ba dang 'angag
184a6('bum): bshes par bya'o// ji ltar na gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid shes pa yon zhe na/ gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid ni myi skye myi 'gag/ 'ong ba myed 'gro ba myed kun nas nyon mongs pa ma yin/ rnam par byang ba ma yin
184a7('bum): 'bri ba ma yin 'phel ba ma yin te/ de phyin ci log ma yin zhing de bzhin nyid gnas te/ de'i phyir de bzhin nyid ces bya'o// de ltar na gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid ni shes pa yin te/ ji ltar tshor ba shes pa yin zhe na/ 
184a8('bum): 'di lta ste dper na chu'i chu'i bur gsog tu 'dug pa ltar skye zhing 'gag pa ltar shes pa ste/ de ltar ni tshor ba shes pa yin no// ji ltar na tshor ba'i shes pa dang / 'jig pa shes pa yin zhe na/ tshor ba ni gang nas kyang / 
184b1('bum): 'ong ba myong gang du yang 'gro ba myed pas/ gang nas kyang myi 'ong gang du yang myi 'gro ste gang nas kyang ma 'ongs pa de gang du yang ma song bar shes pa ste/ de ltar na tshor ba'i skye ba dang / 'jig pa shes pa yin no/ 
184b2('bum): ji ltar na tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid shes pa yin zhe na/ tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid ni myi skye myi 'gag 'ong ba myed 'gro ba myed kun nas nyon mongs pa ma yin/ rnam par ba ma yin bri ba ma yin 'phel ba ma yin te phyin ci log
184b3('bum): ma yin zhing de bzhin nyid du gnas pa ste/ de bzhin nyid ces bya'o// de ltar na tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid shes pa yin no// ji ltar na 'du shes shes pa yin zhe na/ 'di lta ste dper na smyig rgyu la chu shin tu myi dmyigs pa ltar/ 
184b4('bum): shes pa ste/ de ltar na 'du shes shes pa yin no// ji ltar na 'du shes kyi skye ba dang 'jig pa shes pa yin zhe na/ 'du shes ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba myed cing gang du yang 'gro ba myed pas/ gang nas kyang
184b5('bum): myi 'ong gang du yang myi 'gro ba myed pa ste/ gang nas kyang ma 'ongs pa de gang du yang ma song bar shes pa ste/ de ltar na 'du shes kyi skye ba dang 'jig pa shes pa shes pa yin no// ji ltar na 'du
184b6('bum): shes kyi de bzhin nyid shes pa yin zhe na/ 'du shes kyi de bzhin nyid myi skye myi 'gag 'ong ba myed 'gro ba myed pa/ kun nas nyon mongs pa ma yin/ rnam par byang ba ma yin/ 'bri ba ma yin/ 'phel ba ma yin/ 
184b7('bum): de phyin ci log ma yin zhing / de bzhin nyid du gnas pa ste/ de'i phyir de bzhin nyid ces bya'o// de ltar 'du shes kyi de bzhin nyid shes pa yin no// ji ltar na 'du byed shes pa yin zhe na/ 'di lta ste dper na chu shing
184b8('bum): shun pa so sor phye na snying po shin tu myi dmyigs pa ltar shes pa ste/ de ltar 'du byed shes pa yin no// ji ltar na 'du byed kyi skye ba dang 'jig pa shes pa yin zhe na/ 'du byed ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba myed gang du
185a1('bum): yang 'gro ba myed pas/ gang nas kyang myi 'ong gang du yang 'gro ba myed pa ste/ gang nas kyang ma 'ongs pa de gang du yang ma song bar shes pa ste/ de ltar na 'du byed kyi skye ba dang 'jig pa shes pa yin no// ji ltar na
185a2('bum): 'du byed kyi de bzhin nyid shes pa yin zhe na/ 'du byed kyi de bzhin nyid ni myi skye myi 'gag 'ong ba myed 'gro ba myed kun nas nyon mongs pa ma yin rnam par byang ba ma yin/ 'grib pa ma yin 'phel ba ma yin te/ phyin ci lag yin
185a3('bum): de bzhin nyid du gnas pa ste/ de'i phyir de bzhin nyid ces bya'o// de ltar na 'du byed kyi de bzhin shes pa yin no// ji ltar na rnam par shes yin zhe na/ 'di lta ste rnam par shes pa ni dper na sgyu ma byed pas sprul pa'i dpung gi
185a4('bum): tshogs yan lag bzhi pa ltar shes pa ste/ de ltar rnam par shes pa shes pa yin no// ji ltar na rnam par shes pa'i skye ba dang 'jig pa shes pa yin zhe na/ 'di lta ste rnam par shes ni gang nas kyang 'ong
185a5('bum): ba myed cing gang du yang 'gro ba myed pas/ gang nas kyang rmyi'ongs pa de gang du yang myi 'gro ste/ gang nas kyang ma 'ongs pa de dang / gang du yang ma 'ongs par shes pa ste/ de ni rnam par shes pa'i skye ba
185a6('bum): rang 'jig pa shes pa yin no// ji ltar na rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid shes pa yin zhe na/ rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid ni myi skye myi 'gag 'ong ba myed/ kun nas nyon mongs pa ma yin/ rnam par byang ba ma yin
185a7('bum): 'grib pa ma yin/ 'phel ba ma yin te/ phyin ci log ma yin zhing bden pa de bzhin nyid du gnas pa ste/ de'i phyir de bzhin nyid ces bya'o// de ltar na rnam par zhes pa'i de bzhin nyid shes pa yin no// ji ltar na skye mched nas
185a8('bum): shes pa yin zhe na/ nang gi chos rnams ni nang gi chos rnams kyis stong ngo // phyi'i chos rnams ni phyi'i chos rnams kyis stong po nas te/ de ltar skye mched shes pa yin no// ji ltar khams rnams shes pa yin zhe na/ myig gi khas
185b1('bum): kyang myig gi khams kyi rang bzhin gis stong ngo // gzugs kyi khams kyang gzugs kyi khams kyi rang bzhin gis stong ngo // myig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyang myig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi rang bzhin gis stong
185b2('bum): rna ba dang sna dang lce dang lus dang / yid kyi khams kyang yid kyi khams kyi rang bzhin gis stong ngo // chos kyi khams kyang chos kyi khams kyi rang bzhin gis stong ngo // yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams yid kyi rnam par
185b3('bum): shes pa'i khams kyi rang bzhin gis stong ngo zhes bya bar shes te/ de ltar na khams rnams shes pa yin no// ji ltar na rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba shes pa yin zhe na/ rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba skye ba myed par shes pa dang / 
185b4('bum): de bzhin nyid rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba 'gag pa myed pa dang / tshad myed pa dang / rtag pa myed pa dang / don gcig ma yin pa dang don tha dad pa ma yin pa dang / 'ong ba ma yin pa dang / 'gro ba myed pa
185b5('bum): dang / sdom pa dang bral zhing zhi bar shes pa/ de ltar rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba shes pa yin no// ji ltar na 'phags pa'i bden parnams shes pa yin zhe na/ sdug bsngal 'phags pa'i bden pa shes
185b6('bum): pa yin/ kun 'byung ba dang / 'gog pa dang / 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam 'phags pa'i bden pa shes pa yin te/ ji ltar na sdug bsngal 'phags pa'i bden pa yin zhe na/ sdug bsngal shes pa yin bden pa shes pa yin/ 
185b7('bum): 'phags pa'i bden pa shes pa yin/ gnyis las rnam par grol ba 'phags pa'i bden pa ste/ gnyis su myed pa'i 'phags pa'i bden pa zhes bya bar shes pa yin no// de bzhin tu kun 'byung ba dang / 'gog par 'gro ba'i
185b8('bum): lam 'phags pa'i bden pa shes pa yin te/ de ltar na 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams shes pa yin no// ji ltar na sdug bsngal gi de bzhin nyid shes pa yin zhe na/ sdug bsngal gi de bzhin nyid ma nor ba zhes bya bar shes pa yin/ 
186a1('bum): bzhin du kun 'byung ba yin/ 'gog pa dang lam bsgom pa de bzhin nyid kyang rab tu shes pa yin te/ de ltar na 'phags pa'i rnams kyi de bzhin nyid shes pa yin no// de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor
186a2('bum): kyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ phan tshum tha dad pa'i chos de dag de ltar 'tshal na/ 
186a3('bum): des chos kyi dbyings rnam par 'grag par myi 'gyur ras/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal da pa/ rab 'byor dgal te chos kyi dbyings su ma rtogs pa'i chos kyi dbyings la la zhig yod na ni/ rnam par grag
186a4('bum): par myi 'gyur te/ rab 'byor dachos kyi dbyings su ma rtogs pa'i chos so gnan no nas bya ba ma rtags pa myong ngo // rab 'tsho/ rang de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' che gang yang
186a5('bum): myi dmyigs so// gal te dmyigs na ni chos kyi dbyi// ngas rnam par krug par myi 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byo/ rang de bzhin pa'am/ byang chub sems dpa' 'am/ rang
186a6('bum): sangs rgyas sam/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyan thos kyi dbyings su ma rtogs pa'i chos gang yang mi dmyig so// de ltar ma dmyigs pas/ chos kyi dbyings la bslab par bya'o// rab 'byor dkyis
186a7('bum): gsol dpabacom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyi dbyings la slob pas bslabs par 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal dpa/ rab 'byor de chos kyi
186a8('bum): ngas la spong ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ chos thams cad la bslabs par 'gyur te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor de 'di ltar chos thams cad ni chos kyi dbyings so// gsol
186b1('bum): ru ga dper byed pa'i dul gis chos rnams kyi chos kyi byings ni ban nyid du gnas pa ste/ rab 'bya danas kyi byings ni 'di sar dag pa'i ngos dang / myi dag pa'i chos dang 'dig nyid ra
186b2('bum): dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dang zag pa dang bcas pa dang / bag pa myed pa'i chos dang / khan mtho ba dang bcas pa dang / kha nas ba myed pa'i chos dang / 'dus byas dang 'dus sa kyi
186b3('bum): kyi chos thams cad de/ rab 'byor de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i chos kyi dbyings la slob chos thams thams cad
186b4('bum): la bslab par 'gyur ro// gsoyod pa bcom ldan 'das gal te chos thams cad chos kyi dbyings lags na/ byang chu sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi mchol
186b5('bum): byind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ ji ltar gzugs la bslab par bgyu/ ji ltar tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar skye mched dang / khams dang rted
186b6('bum): cing 'brel par 'byung ba la bslab par bgyiji ltar sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa la bslab par bgyiji ltar tshul khrims kyi pha rolal tu phyind pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa dang ga brtson
186b7('bum): 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa dang / ting nge 'dzin kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la bsla bar bgyi / ji ltar nang spong pa nyid la bslab par bgyi/ dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid
187a1('bum): stong pa nyid kyi bar la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi la slab par bgyi/ ji ltar yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stong / 
187a2('bum): lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la slab par bgyi/ ji ltar 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad myed pa bzhi dang / gzugs
187a3('bum): myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / rnam par thard pa brgyad dang / mtha rad kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smond pa myed pa dang / mngon pa
187a4('bum): shes pa drug dang / ting nge 'dzind thams cad dang / gzungs gi sgo thams cad la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / myi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so
187a5('bum): yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / dga' ba chen po dang / btang snyoms chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad la slab par
187a6('bum): bgyi/ ji ltar myi chen po'i mtshan sum bcu rtsa gnyis dang / dpe byad bzang po brgya bcu yongs su grub par bgyi ba la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar rgyal rigs che zhing mtho ba'i rigasu skye bar bgyi ba la slab
187a7('bum): par bgyi/ ji ltar bram ze'i rigs su che zhing mtho ba'i rigs/ ji ltar khyim bdag che zhing mtho ba'i rigs su skye bar bgyi ba la slab par bgyi/ ji ltar rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lhar skye bar bgyi ba dang / su
187a8('bum): bcu rtsa gsum dang / mtshe ma dang dga' ldan dang / 'phrul dga' dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed dang / tshangs lha nye phan dang / tshangs pa kun 'khor dang / tshangs chen dang / snang ba dang chung
187b1('bum): snang dang / chad myed snang ba dang / kun snang dang ba dang / dge ba dang / chung dge dang / tshad myed dge' ba dang / dge rgyas dang / che ba dang / chung che dang / tshad myed che ba ba dang / 'bras bu che'i lhar skye/ 
187b2('bum): bar bgyi ba la slab par bgyi/ ji ltar 'du shes byed pa'i sems can du skye bar bgyi ba lta byaslab par bgyi/ ji ltar gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lhar skye ba la bslab par myi bgyi/ ji ltar nam mkho ma
187b3('bum): skye mched dang / rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched dang / cung zad myed pa'i skye mched dang / 'du shes myed pa'i dri shes myed myin skye mched kyi lhar skye bar bgyi ba la slab cing der yang myi skye bar bgyi/ ji ltar
187b4('bum): sems dang po bskyed pa nas bslab bgyi/ ji ltar sems bskyed pa gnyis pa dang / gsum pa dang bzhi pa dang / lnga pa dang / drug pa dang / bdun pa dang / brgyad pa dang / dgu pa dang / seMs
187b5('bum): bskyed pa bcu pa la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sa la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar byang/ chub sems dpa'i skyon ma mchis pa dang / sems can yod
187b6('bum): sbyin par bgyid pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bgyi ba la slab par bgyi/ ji ltar byang chub kyi lam la slabs shing chos thams cad rnam pa thams cad du 'tshal bar bgyi ba'i byang
187b7('bum): chub kyi lam la bslab par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la slab las spyod pas gzugs la bslab par bgyi// tshor ba dang 'du shes
187b8('bum): rang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa la bslab par bgyi/ khams dang rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la bslab par bgyid/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa la bslab par bgyi/ tshul khrims kyi pha 'om spyod/ 
188a1('bum): pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang / bsam gtan gi pha rol tu phyind pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bgyi/ 
188a2('bum): nang stong pa nyid la bslab par bgyi/ dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar la bslab par bgyi/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum bcu rtsa bdun la bslab par bgyi/ 'phags pa'i bden pa bani
188a3('bum): rang / bsam gtan pa'i dang / chang myed pa pa'i dang / gzugs myed po'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar dkyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / 
188a4('bum): stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smond pa myed pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams dang / ting nge 'dzind rnams dang / gzu sa kyi sgo rnams la bslab par bgyi/ de bzhin gshegs
188a5('bum): pa'i stobs rnams dang / myi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnas
188a6('bum): la bslab par bgyi/ rgyu na tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la dang lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir myi 'ong po'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid la bslab par bgyi/ rang byang chub la ji ltar
188a7('bum): bslab par bgyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar la bslab par ba~M g+ha na/ bcom ldan 'das do'i slad du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyin ci log la spyod pa dang / myi spro ba sprob
188a8('bum): bgyid par myi 'gyur ba lags/ bcom ldan ci'i slad du zhe na/ chos kyi dbyings la ni rnam par rtog pa ma mchis de dag ma mchis te/ gzugs kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lagaso// gzugs las kyang
188b1('bum): kyi dbyangs ma mchis te/ gzugs cad kyang chos kyi dbyangs sa chos kyi dbyangs nod kyang gzugs so// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam pa shes pa nyid yang chas kyang bya
188b2('bum): ma lags/ rnam par shes las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ rnam par shes pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so ga chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang rnam par shes pa'o// skye mched dang khams dang
188b3('bum): rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba yang chos kyi dbyangs ma lags// rtend cing 'brel par 'byung ba las gud na yang chos kyi dbyangs mchis te/ rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba nyid kyang chos kyi dbying so// chos kyi dbying
188b4('bum): nyid rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'o// pha rol tu phyind pa rda rnams dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum bcu rtsa bdun yang chos kyi dbyings ma lags
188b5('bum): byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum bcu rtsa bdun las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid
188b6('bum): byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnamaso// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad myed pa rnams dang / gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rna bar thard
188b7('bum): pa rnams dang / mthar da kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smyond pa myed pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams dang / ting nge 'dzind rnaMs dang
188b8('bum): gzungs kyi sgo nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang gzungs kyi sgo rnams so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu rnams dang / myi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig
189a1('bum): pa rnams dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams
189a2('bum): las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnamaso// rgyu nad tu zhugs
189a3('bum): pa'i 'bras bu 'am/ la ni cag phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'am/ phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'am/ dgra bcom pa nyid dang / rang byang chub kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ rang byang chub las
189a4('bum): gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ rang byang chub nyid kyang chos kyi dbyingaso// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang rang byang chub bo// rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang
189a5('bum): bar yang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ rnam thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings
189a6('bum): chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid do// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal dpa rab 'byor da de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ ji skad smras pa bzhin no// gzugs
189a7('bum): nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang gzugs so// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang
189a8('bum): rnam par shes pa'o// skye mched dang / khams dang rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'o// pha rol tu phyind pa rnaMs dang
189b1('bum): stong pa nyid thams cad dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum bcu rtsa bdun nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams so// 'phags pa'i bden pa dang / bas/ 
189b2('bum): gtan dang / tshad myed pa rnams dang / gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / rnam par thard pa dang / mngar da kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed par
189b3('bum): smond pa myed pa dang / mngon par shes dang / ting nge 'dzind dang / gzungs kyi sgo nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang gzungs kyi sgo rnams so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang
189b4('bum): myi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings
189b5('bum): nyid kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams so// rgyu tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid dang / 
189b6('bum): rang byang chub nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang rang byang chub bo// rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi bar yang chos kyi dbyingaso// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid
189b7('bum): rab 'byor da gal te byang chub sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ chos kyi dbyings ma rtogs pa'i chos 'ga'i zhag mthong na ni/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la
189b8('bum): yang gnas par myi 'gyur te/ chos thams cad chos kyi dbyings su shes nas/ chos thams cad mying myed pa la mying gi brdas chos stond to// 'di ni gzugs zhes bya'o// 'di ni tshor ba dang / 'di ni 'du shes dang
190a1('bum): 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa zhes bya'o// 'di dag ni skye mched dang / khams dang rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba zhes bya'o// 'di dag ni pha rol tu phyind pa rnams dang / stong pa nyid rnams dang
190a2('bum): byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum bcu rtsa bdun zhes bya'o// 'di dag ni 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad myed pa rnams dang / gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnas dang
190a3('bum): rnam par tha rad pa brgyad dang / mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smond pa myed pa dang / mngon par shes pa dang / ting nge 'dzind dang / gzungs
190a4('bum): rnams shes bya'o// 'di dag na de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams dang / myi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos
190a5('bum): ma 'dres pa rnams shes bya'o// 'di dag ni bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi bar zhes bya bar chos ston to// rab 'byor de 'di lta ste dper na sgyu ma'i mkhan po 'am sgyu ma byed pa'i
190a6('bum): mtshan bu mkhas pa zhig gis rdzas kyi rnam pa ga ra zhig la rten te/ gzugs kyi bye brag sna tshogs pa 'di lta ste dper na glang po'i tshogs sam/ rta'i tshogs so// gzugs// rta'i gzugs sa
190a7('bum): glang gi gzugs sam/ rnga mo dang lug gi gzugs sam skyes pa dang bud myed kyi gzugs dang / khye'u dang bu mo'i gzugs sam/ skyed mos tshal dang / gzhal myed khang dang / dka' thub kyi nags tshal dang / 
190a8('bum): kun dga'i ra ba dang / mdangs dga' ba dang / rdzing bu mdangs dga' ba dang / rags tshal mdangs dga' ba dag sprul te/ de dag tu bstand pa dang / 'khor gyi bstand pa dang / bzhi rnam pa sna tshogs pa bting
190b1('bum): me tog dang / 'phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / kha zas dang / spyan gzigs zhim po dag bstan tam/ klu dang sil snyan gis skye bo mang po dga' bar byas sam/ sbyin pa yongs su gtong ba'am/ 
190b2('bum): tshul khrims srung ba 'am/ bzod pa bsgom pa 'am/ brtson 'grus brtsams pa 'am/ ting nge 'dzin gis rnam par brtse ba 'am/ shes rab bsgom pa 'am/ rnam pa de lta bu dag gis skye bo dga' bstu te
190b3('bum): rgyal rigs che zhing mtho ba'i rigs bstan da tam/ bram po'i rigs mtho ba'i rigs dang / khyim bdag tshe zhing mtho ba'i rigs bstan te/ rgyal chen bani'i rigs kyi lha rnams bstand tam/ sum bcu
190b4('bum): gsum ko lha rnams dang / mtshe ma dang / dag ldan dang / 'phrul dga' dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed dang / tshangasaris dang / tshangs lha nye phan dang / tshangs pa kun 'khor dang / 
190b5('bum): tshangs chen dang / snang ba dang / chung snang dang / tshad myed snang ba dang / kun snang dang ba dang / dge ba dang / chung dge dang / cha de myed dge ba dang / dge rgyas dang / che ba dang / chung che dang / tshad myed
190b6('bum): che ba dang / 'bras bu che ba dang / myi tsho'i lha rnams bstan tam/ myi gdung ba'i lha rnams sam/ shin tu mthong ba'i lha rnams dang / gya nom snang ba'i lha rnams dang / 'og myin gi lha rnams bstan tam/ 
190b7('bum): nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams dang / rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched dang / cung zad myed pa'i skye mched dang / 'du shes myed pa'i du shes myed myin gi skye mched kyi lha rnams gzugs myed pa'i
190b8('bum): lha rnams bstand ta ma/ rgyu nad tu zhugs pa'i dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang / phyir myi 'ong ba dang / dgra bcom pa nyid dang / rang sangs rgyas mang pos bstan tam/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
191a1('bum): sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi
191a2('bum): pha rol tu phyind pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang / nas rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams dang / bsam gtan dang / rnam
191a3('bum): par ba rad pa dang / ting nge 'dzin 'jug pas 'jug pa la spyod pa dang / sa dang po yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang / sa bcu pa'i bar du yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i skyon myed par
191a4('bum): dang / mngon par shes pa mngon par sgrub pa dang / mngon parashes pa de dag gis rnam par rtse zhing 'jig rten gi khams rnams snang bar byed pa dang / sems can rnams yongs su smind par
191a5('bum): byed pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed pa dang / yan lag dang nying lag yongs su btong ba dang / spyad pa dka'i spyad pa spyod pa na/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs
191a6('bum): rnams yongs su sgrub pa dang / myi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams yong su sgrub pa dang / snying rje chen po yongs su sgrub pa dang
191a7('bum): mngon par sgrub de dag bstan da tam/ sangs rgyas kyi sku'i yan lag dang nying lag thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bstan na/ de la sems can byis pa'i ngang tshul can dag 'di snyam du sems te/ kye ma myi 'dis
191a8('bum): sems legs par bslabs pa ngo mtshar che'o// re mdzes dag byed/ de ltar skye bo dga' bar byed cing / gzugs kyi bye brag sna tshogs 'di lta ste/ glang po'i gzugs dang / rta'i gzugs dang / sangs rgyas
191b1('bum): nga silas mas skye bo mang po dga' bar byas sam/ son pa yongs sa gdong ba 'am
191b2('bum): lha snyam ste/ 'di la chos gang la yang dmyigs su myed na/ myi 'di de ltar myed pa'i chos nyid kyis skye bo mang po 'di dag dga' bar byed pa ni ngo mtshar chad du byung ba'i chos so snyam ste/ sems can 'di dag ni
191b3('bum): dngos po myed pa la dngos por 'du shes pa'o zhes bya bar de dag gis shes pa 'byung ngo // rab 'byor de de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe
191b4('bum): chos kyi dbyings su ma rtogs pa'i chos gang yang myi mthong ste thabs mkhas pas sems can rnams yongs su smyind par byed kyang sems can du myi dmyigs sems can du gdags myi dmyigs
191b5('bum): te/ bdag kyang sbyin pa gtong ba yin/ gzhan yang sbyinapa la yang dag par skul ba yin/ sbyin pa'i legs par brjod pa yin/ sems can gzhan gang sbyin pa gtong ba de dag
191b6('bum): gi legs pa brjod cing / mthun pas dga' bar spyod pa yin/ bdag kyang tshul khrims srung ba yin/ gzhan yang tshul khrims la yang dag par bskul ba yin/ tshul khrims kyi legs pa brjod pa yin/ 
191b7('bum): sems can gzhan tshul khrims srung ba de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun par dga' bar spyod pa yin/ bdag kyang bzod pa bsgom pa yin/ gzhan yang bzod pa la yang dag par skul ba yin/ bzod pa'i
191b8('bum): pa'i legs par brjod pa yin/ sems can gzhan gang bzod pa bsgom pa de dag gi legs pa brjod pa mthun pas dga' bar spyod pa yin/ bdag kyang brtson 'grus rtsom pa yin/ gzhan yang brtson 'grus la
193a1('bum): ga la yang dag dag par skul ba yin/ brtson 'grus kyi legs pa brjod pa yin/ sems can gzhan gang brtson 'grus rtsom pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun par dga' bar spyod
193a2('bum): pa yin/ bdag kyang ting nge 'dzin bsgom pa yin/ gzhan yang ting nge 'dzin la yang dag par skul ba yin/ ting nge 'dzin gi legs pa brjod pa yin/ sems can gzhan dgang ting nge 'dzind la snyoms
193a3('bum): par 'jug pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar spyod pa yin/ bdag kyang shes rab bsgom pa yin/ gzhan yang shes rab la yang dag par bskul ba yin/ shes rab kyi legs
193a4('bum): pa brjod pa yin/ sems can gang shes rab sgo ma pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar spyod pa yin// shes rab dum bu bzhi pa/ 
193a5('bum): bam po / bdag kyang dge ba bcu'o las kyi lam la yang dag par skul bar 'dzin pa yin/ gzhan yang
193a6('bum): dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la yang dag par 'dzind par bskul ba yin/ dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la yang dag par legs par brjod pa yin/ sems can gzhan gang dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam yang dag
193a7('bum): bar 'dzin pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar spyod pa yin/ bdag kyang yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i gso sbyin la nye bar gnas pa yin gzhan yang yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i gso
193a8('bum): sbyin la yang dag par skal ba yin/ yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i gso sbyin gi legs pa brjod pa yin/ sems can gzhan gang 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i gso sbyin la nye bar gnas pa'i legs
193b1('bum): pa brjod cing mthun par dga' bar spyod pa yin/ bdag kyang bslab pa'i gnas la yongs su 'dzind pa yin/ gzhan yang slab pa'i gnas lnga la yang dag par skul ba yin/ bslab pa'i gnas lnga'i legs
193b2('bum): pa brjod pa yin/ sems can gzhan gang bslab pa'i gnas lnga yang dag par 'dzin pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun par dka' bar spyod pa yin/ bdag kyang bsam gtan dang po la snyoms par 'jug
193b3('bum): pa yin/ sems can gzhan / yang bsam gtan dang po la yang dag par skul ba yin/ bsam gtan dang po'i legs brjod cing yin/ sems can gzhan gang bsam gtan dang po la snyoms par 'jug pa de dag
193b4('bum): gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar spyod pa yin/ bdag kyang bsam gtan gnyis pa dang / bsam gtan gsum pa dang / bsam gtan bzhi pa la snyoms par 'jug pa yin/ gzhan yang bas
193b5('bum): gtan bzhi pa la yang dag par skul ba yin/ bas gtan bzhi pa'i legs par brjod pa yin/ sems can gzhan gang bsam gtan bzhi pa la snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gi legs
193b6('bum): pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bas spyod pa yin bdag kyang byams pa dang / snying rje dang / dga' ba dang / btang snyo/ mas la yang dag par skul ba yin/ btang snyoms kyi legs
193b7('bum): la brjod pa yin/ sems can gzhan btang snyoms la snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gi yang legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar spyod pa yin/ bdag kyang nam mkha' mtha' mas skye mchad dang / 
193b8('bum): mags mapa'ams rgya che sa chung byung bang rgya pa dang / duni sa byed tshugs byed byin rgyam ma noms pa dzu 'an/ gran ma tsug pa byed zugs kyi kyi rgya
194a1('bum): la yang dag par skul ba yin/ 'du shes myed 'du shes myed myin skye mched kyi legs par brjod pa yin/ sems can gzhan 'du shes myed 'du shes myed myin skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa de dag/ 
194a2('bum): gi legs par brjod pas mthun pas dga' ba spyod pa yin/ bdag kyang byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum bcu rtsa bdun bsgom pa yin/ gzhan yang byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum bcu rtsa bdun la yang dag par skul
194a3('bum): yin/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum bcu rtsa bdun gi legs pa brjod pa yin/ sems can gang byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum bcu rtsa bdun sgom pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar spyod pa yi
194a4('bum): bdag kyang rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo gsum dang / rnam pa tha rad pa brgyad dang / mthard kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug ba dgu dang / mngon par shes pa lnga dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams dang
194a5('bum): gzungs kyi sgo rnamasmra pa yin/ gzhan yang gzungs kyi sgo rnams la yang dag par bskul ba yin/ gzungs gi sgrarnams kyi legs pa brjod pa yin/ sems can gzhan gang gzungs
194a6('bum): gi sgo rnams sgom pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar spyod pa yin/ bdag kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / myi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi
194a7('bum): rang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la sgom pa yin/ gzhan yang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la yang dag par skul ba yin
194a8('bum): sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad kyi legs pa brjod pa yin/ sems can gzhan gang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad sgom pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar spyod pa
194b1('bum): yin/ bdag kyang myi chen po'i mtshan sum bcu rtsa gnyis dang dpe byad bzang po brgya bcu sgrub pa yin/ gzhan yang myi chen po'i mtshan sum bcu rtsa gnyis dang / dpel byad bzang po brgya bcu la yang
194b2('bum): dag par skul ba yin/ myi chen po'i mtshan sum bcu rtsa gnyis dang / dpe' byad bzang po brgya bcu'i legs par brjod pa yin/ sems can gzhan gang myi chen po'i mtshan sum bcu rtsa gnyis dang / 
194b3('bum): dpe' byad bzang po brgya bcu la sgrub pa de dag gi legs pa brjod pa rjes su dag pa la spyod pa yin/ rab 'byor de gzhan yang gal te chos kyi dbyings sngon ji lta bar phyis kyang de bzhin ma yin nam/ bar du yang
194b4('bum): de bzhin ma yin du zin ni ni/ byang chub sems dpa' / sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mkhas pas sems can rnams la chos kyi dbyings
194b5('bum): myi 'gyur/ sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed par myi 'gyur ba/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par myi 'gyur te/ rab 'byor de chos kyi dbyings de sngon ji lta bar
194b6('bum): phyis kyang de bzhin bar du yang de bzhin pas de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mkhas pas sems can rnams la chos kyi dbyings
194b7('bum): ston to// sems can rnams kyi don du byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod do// sems can rnams yongs su spyonod par byed do// sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed do// 
194b8('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa stong phrag nyi shu lnga pa lasamanyam pa nyid du bstand pa'i le'u ste/ drug bcu rtsa gsum pa'o// / 
195a1('bum): de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor kyis bcom ldan 'da' la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gal te de ltar sems can yang dmyigs su ma mchis la sems can du dmyigs pa yang ma
195a2('bum): mchis na/ su'i don du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor de la
195a3('bum): 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rab 'byor nga byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni yang dag pa'i mtha' tshang mar byas shing / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa sgom ste/ rab 'byor gal te yang dag 'i
195a4('bum): mtha' yang gzhan la/ sems can gi mtha' yang gzhan yin na ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom par myi 'gyur te/ rab 'byor de yang dag pa'i mtha' yang
195a5('bum): gzhan ma yin/ sems can gi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin pas/ de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen yang sems can rnams kyi don du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa yang sgo ste/ 
195a6('bum): sarab kyi pha ro mod tu phyin pa bsgos pa'i byang chu sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang dag pa'i mab 'das par 'jug pa myed par sems can rnams yang dag pa'i mtha' la 'god do// 
195a7('bum): mal pabacom ldan 'das gal tid de ltar mang dag pa mar yang gdanas lags/ sems can gi mthal yang gnanam la gas pa/ yang dag pa ma par yang yang dag pa'i mapangs gnas pasasu
195a8('bum): ga rjod pa tsham na 'das ga te yang la pa nga dag pa ma pa'i gnas par lu 'dzad sa des na rang zhin la gnas par rung // bcom lda das na sa ni sa gnas pam ma
195b1('bum): 'das ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i che / sems can rnams yang dag pa'i mtha' la 'god pa lags / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal dpa
195b2('bum): rab 'byor de yang dag pa'i mtha' la yang dag pa'i mtha' gnas par 'gyur ba yang myed/ rang bzhin la rang bzhin gnas par 'gyur ba yang myedapa'on kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi
195b3('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mkhas pas sems can gi mtha' yang dag pa'i mtha' la 'god do// yang dag pa'i mtha' rnam par 'khrug par myi byed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sems gi mtha' yang gzhan
195b4('bum): ma yin/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin te/ de ltar sems can gi mtha' dang yang dag pa'i mtha' de la gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do// gsol pa bcom ldan 'das byang sos
195b5('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mkhas pa dang ldan pas sems can rnams yang dag pa'i mtha' la 'god kyang yang dag pa'i mtha' ma yin
195b6('bum): rnam par 'khrug par myi bgyid pa de lta bu'i thabs gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal da pa/ rab 'byor de 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod
195b7('bum): pa'i tshe/ sems can rnams sbyin pa la rab tu 'god do// sbyin pa la rab tu bkod nas sbyin pa de'i thog ma'i mtha' dang / tha ma'i mtha' dang / dbus stond te/ ji ltar sbyin pa de'i thog ma'i mtha' yang stong / tha ma'i
195b8('bum): mtha' yang stong dbus kyang stong pa de ltar sbyin pa'i 'bras bu yang stong / sbyin bdag kyang stong le nad pa yang stong par stond cig/ rigs kyi bu de ltar yang dag pa'i mtha' la don de dag myed gis/ sbyin pa yang gzhan la/ 
196a1('bum): a sbyid pa'i 'bras bu yang gzhan no snyam du sems shig/ basbyin bdag kyang gzhan la len pa yang gzhan no snyam du sems shig/ rigs kyi bu khyod nam sbyin pa yang gzhan la/ sbyin pa'i 'bras bu yang gnan/ 
196a2('bum): no snyam du myi sems de/ sbyim bdag kyang gzhan la len pa yang gzhan no snyam du myi sems pa de'i tshe khyod kyi sbyin pa 'di lta bur bdud rtsi dang bdud rtsi'i 'bras bu dang / mthar bdud rtsir 'gyur te/ sbyin pa 'dis
196a3('bum): gzugs yongs su ma 'dzind cig tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes yongs su ma 'dzind cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar khyod kyi sbyin pa 'di ni sbyin pas stong ngo // de'i 'bras
196a4('bum): 'bras bus stong ngo // sbyin bdag kyang sbyin bdag gis stong ngo // len pa yang le nad pas stong ngo // stong pa nyid ni sbyin pa myi dmyigs sbyin pa'i 'bras bu myi dmyigs sbyin bdag dang len pa myi dmyigs so// de
196a5('bum): phyir zhe na/ chos de dag ni ngo bo nyid kyis stong ngo // zhes brjod// rab 'byor de gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shesarab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mkhas
196a6('bum): pas sems can tshul khrims la 'god do// tshur rigs kyi bu srog gcod pa spongs la/ srog gcod pa las phyir log par gyis shig/ ma byin par len pa spongs dang / 'dod pas log par g.ye
196a7('bum): pa dang / rdzun tu smra ba dang / phra ma dang / zhe gcod pa'i dang / tshig khyal pa dang / tshegs sems dang / gnod sems dang / log par lta ba las phyir ldog par gyis shig/ rigs kyi bu mos chos 'di dag la ji ltar
196a8('bum): yongs su brtags pa de lta bu'i rang bzhin la gang yang myed pas rigs kyi bu soms dang gang gi srog gcod par bya ba'i srog chags dang / gang gi srog bcad par bya ba'i de lta bu'i chos kyang gang zhig yin/ gang ma
196b1('bum): byon par lo nad pa dang / 'dod pa me log pa g.yem pa dang / brdzun tu smra ba dang / phra ma dang / ni gcod pa'i tshig dang / tshig khyal pa dang / tshogs sems dang / gnod sems dang // ldog par lta ba
196b2('bum): 'alog par lta bar brtags pa dang / gang gis log par lta ba mthong ba de lta tshu chos gang zhig yin ces stond cing tshul khrims la 'god de/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thabs pa la
196b3('bum): la de lta bu dang ldan pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ sems can rnams yongs su smyin par byed do// des de la sbyin pa dang na tshul khrims kyi 'bras bu stan te/ sbyin pa'i 'bras bu dang
196b4('bum): tshul khrims kyi 'bras bu de yang ngo bo nyid kyis stong par bstan/ pas/ rigs kyi bu de sbyin pas tshul khrims kyi 'bras bu ngo bo nyid kyis stong par rig nas/ de la mngon par zhen pa myed
196b5('bum): mngon par zhen pa myed pas 'khrug par myi 'gyur zhing shes rab skye shes rab des kyang bag la nyal ba dang / kun nas ldang ba thams cad bcad nas phung po ma lus pa mya ngan las 'das pa
196b6('bum): dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'das te/ de yang 'jig rten gi tha snyad gi don dam par ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la gang yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba 'am yongs su mya ngan las 'das
196b7('bum): pa zhes bya ba de lta bu'i chos gang yang myi dmyigs te/ de'i mya ngan las 'das pa zhes bya ste ba ni 'di lta ste/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid do// rab 'byor de gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
196b8('bum): chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ sems can phan tshun gnod par sems shing 'khrug par myi 'gyur ba dang na ldan bu dag mthong na/ 'di skad du 'dems shing ston te/ rigs kyi
197a1('bum): bu bzod pa sgrubs shig ni/ bzod pa sgoms shig/ nges pa dang / sems zhi ba dang / dang du sems pa'i ngang tshul nad du gyis shig/ gang gnod par byed pa dang / gang gis gnod par bya ba dang / 
197a2('bum): gang la gnod par bya ba'i chos de dag ni thams cad kyang rang bzhin gis shig/ rigs kyi bu gnod par byed pa ni su yod/ gnod par ni su la bya cis ni gnod par bya/ soms dang / chos thams cad rang bzhin gis stong pa ste/ 
197a3('bum): rang bzhin gis stong pa nyid gang yin pa de ni nam yang stong par myi 'gyur te/ de ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis ma mdzad do// byang chub sems dpa' dang / rang sangs rgyas dang nyan thos kyis ma byas so// lha dang klu
197a4('bum): dang dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / myi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis ma byas so// rgyal chen bzhi'i rigs kyi lha rnams kyis ma byas so// sum bcu rtsa gsum dang / mtshe ma dang
197a5('bum): dga' ldan dang / 'phrul dga' dang // gzhan 'phrul dbang byed dang / tshangs pa dang / dge' rgyas dang / gnas rtsang ma dang / nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mchid dang / rnam shes mtha'
197a6('bum): yas skye mched dang / cung bad myed pa'i skye mched dang 'du shes myed 'dunas myed myin skye mched kyi lha rnams kyis ma byas deni rtag par yangs byas rang bzhin gis stong ngo // rang bzhin gis stong
197a7('bum): pa ni su la yang gnod par myi byed do// zhes nas rab 'byor de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i cha/ sems can rnams thabs mkhas pas rang bzhin gis
197a8('bum): nga bad do// rlung nga zus bu la gyur // rang ba'i shing banyid pa zhid nga/ ri'i gi byur byang pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chu kyamang dag pa sto rtso yang dag par drus so// yang gang ma/ 
197b1('bum): yang dag par dga' bar byed do// gzhog go// 'dul lo// rab tu 'god do// de yang 'jig rten gi tha snyad kyis// don dam par ni ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rang bzhin gis stong pa nyid la gang thob par byed pa dang
197b2('bum): gang thob par bya ba gang yang myed do// rab 'byor de 'di ni yang dag pa'i mtha'i stong pa nyid de de la gnas shing byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ de la sems can
197b3('bum): du dmyigs pa myed do// sems can du gdags pa yang dmyigs pa myed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar chos thams cad ni sems kyis dben no// rab 'byor de gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
197b4('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mkhas pas sems can le lo can brtson 'grus chung ba dag mthong na 'di ltar lus dang sems kyi brtson 'grus la yang dag par bskul te/ 
197b5('bum): rigs kyi bu dag rang bzhin gis stong pa nyid la ni chos 9gang yang zhum zhing le lor 'gyur ba'am/ gang gis zhum zhing le lor 'gyur ba 'am/ gang zhum zhing le lor 'gyur ba'i chos gang ya
197b6('bum): myed de/ chos de dag thams cad kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid las myi 'da' ba yin gis/ lus dang sems kyis brtson 'grus skyed pa le lor bor te/ dge ba'i chos sbyin pa'am/ tshul khrims sam/ bzod pa'i
197b7('bum): brtson 'grus sam/ bsam gtan nam/ shes rab 'am/ nang stong pa nyid dang / dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar ram/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams sam/ yang dag par spong rnams sam/ rdzu 'phrul gi
197b8('bum): rkang pa rnams sam/ dbang po rnams sam/ stobs rnams sam// byang chub kyi yan lag rnams sam/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa 'am/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams sam/ bsam gtan rnams sa
197b9('bum): tshad myed pa rnams sam/ gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sam/ rnam par thar pa rnams sam/ mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sam/ stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / 
198a1('bum): smon pa myed pa 'amamangon par shes pa rnams sams ting nge 'dzind rnams samagazungs kyi sgo rnams samade bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams sam/ myi 'jigs pa rnams
198a2('bum): so so yang dag par rig pa rnams sam/ byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa dag la brtson par gis shig/ rigs kyi bu dag stong pa nyid kyis chos thams cad
198a3('bum): sgrib par rtogs shig/ sgrib pa myed pa'i chos la zhum par 'gyur ba gang yang myed do zhes/ rab 'byor nga gzhan yang de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin la spyod
198a4('bum): pa'i tshe/ thabs mkhas pas sems can rnams la rang bzhin stong nye pa nyid yang dag par stond to// yang dag par bskul to// yang na dag par gzeng stod do// yang dag par dga' bar byed
198a5('bum): gzhog go// 'dul lo// rab tu 'god do// ci nas kyang gnyis lam gnas pa de ltar rab tu 'god do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid ni gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do// gnyis
198a6('bum): su myed pa'i chos ni gang la yang gnas pa myed do// rab 'byor da gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i che ba/ thabs mkhas pus sems can rnams rang
198a7('bum): bzhin gis stong pa nyid kyis brtson 'grus la de ltar 'dems shing rjes su stond te// tshur rigs kyi bu sbyin pa 'am/ tshul khrims sam/ bzod pa'am/ brtson 'grus sam// bsam gtan nam/ shes rab 'am
198a8('bum): nang stong pa nyid dam/ dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar ram/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams rnams samayang dag par spong ba rnams sam/ rdzu 'phrul gi rkang pa rnams sam/ dbang po rnam sa
198b1('bum): stobs rnams sam/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams sam/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa 'am/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams sam/ bsam gtan rnams sam/ chad myed pa rnams sam gzugs
198b2('bum): myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sam/ rnam par thadad pa rnams sams ma par kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sam/ stong pa nyid dam ga mtshamam skye ba dang / smon pa skyed pa dang / 
198b3('bum): mngon par shes pa rnams sam/ ting nge 'dzind rnams sam/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams sams de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams sam myi 'jigs pa rnams sam/ sa so yang dag par rig pa rnam
198b4('bum): byams pa chen po 'am/ snying rje chen po 'am/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa dag la brtson 'grus rtsoms la chos de dag gnyis chu par yid la ma byed cig/ myi gnyis par yid la ma byed cog/ do ci'i phyir na
198b5('bum): chos de dag ni rang bzhin gis stong pa ste/ rang bzhin gis stong pa nyid ni gnyis par yid la bya ba ma yin pa/ myi gnyis par yid la bya da pa ma yin no// rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems
198b6('bum): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'ithabs mkhas pas sems can rnams rang bzhin stong pa nyid la yongs su smyind par byed de/ yongs su smyind par
198b7('bum): byas nas rim gis rgyu nad tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid dang / rang byang chub la 'god do// lam gi rnam pa shes pa nyid
198b8('bum): dang / bla ma myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la 'god do// rab 'byor da gnas yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i me thabs mkhas pas mos
200a1('bum): can sems g.yeng ba rnams la 'di skad du 'dems shing rjes su ston te/ tshur rigs kyi bu ting nge 'dzin sgoms shig/ g.yeng ba'i 'du shes sam/ ting nge 'dzind kyi 'du shes su ma byed cig/ 
200a2('bum): de ci'i phyir zhe na chos de dag ni rang bzhin gis stong pa ste/ rang bzhin gis stong pa nyid la ni gang g.yeng ba'am/ rtse gcig tu 'gyur ba'i chos gang yang dmyigs su myed do// khyod kyis ting nge 'dzind de
200a3('bum): la gnas shing rang / bzhin stong pa nyid spyad na/ lus dang ngag dang yid kyis dge ba'i chos gang ji snyed byed kyang rung ste/ sbyin pa gtong ngam/ tshul khrims srung ngam/ bzod pa sgrub pa 'am/ brtson 'grus
200a4('bum): rtsom 'am ting nge 'dzin bskyed dam/ shes rab sgo ma 'am/ nang stong pa nyid la spyod dam dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar la spyod dam/ dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnaMs dang / 
200a5('bum): yang dag par spong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gi rkang pa rnams dang / dbang po rnams dang / stobs rnams dang byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang 'phags pa'i lam yan
200a6('bum): lag brgyad pa la spyod dmapa/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnam dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad myed pa rnams dang / gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sam/ rnam par thard pa brgya
200a7('bum): dang / mtha rad kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smond pa myed pa dang / mngon par shes rnams dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sku
200a8('bum): rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / myi 'jigs bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo
200b1('bum): brgyad la spyod dam/ myi chen po'i mtshan sum bcu rtsa gnyis la spyod dam/ dpe' byad bzang po brgya bcu la spyod dam/ nyan thos kyi lam dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi lam la spyod dam/ byang chub sems dpa' dang sangs/ 
200b2('bum): rgyas kyi lam la spyod dam/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid dang / rang byang chub la spyod dam/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
200b3('bum): pa nyid la spyod dam/ sems can rnams sbyin par bya ba la skyod dam/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya ba la spyod dam/ kyang rung ste/ dge ba'i chos de dag la 'gron chu dus grub par 'gyur ro// zhes 'das
200b4('bum): shing rjes ston te ra/ rab 'byor du de ltar na byang chub sa sa dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinadang la spyod pa'i tshe/ mthabs mkhas pas sems can rnams kyi don byed de/ ses
200b5('bum): dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung nas/ bar 'ag yang las myi byed par myi 'gyur nga gi dge ba thams cad tshol zhing sesacan rnams kyi don byed de/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams
200b6('bum): la rtag tu rgyun myi 'chad par bsnyen bkur byed cing / sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro ste/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag las chos thos pa de yang bla ma myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
200b7('bum): chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi bar du tshe rabs rjes kyang nam du yang rnam par chud myi tha ste ra rtag tu rgyun myi 'chad par gzungs thob cing lus po 'am/ ngag gi dbang po 'am/ yid kyi dbang po mye
200b8('bum): ma yin/ de ci'i phyir zhen/ don 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po das rtag tu rgyud myi 'chang bar rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid shin tu bsgoms par 'gyur te/ nyan thos kyi lama'am
201a1('bum): rang sangs rgyas kyi lam 'o/ byang chub sems dpa'i lam 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi lam 'am/ shin tu bsgoms par 'gyur/ mngon par shes pa gang byang chub sems dpa' sems
201a2('bum): dpa' chen pos rnam pa chud myi ba'i chul gis phan par 'gyur ba de dag kyang shin bu sgoms par 'gyur te/ rnam par smind pa las byung ba'i mngon pa shes pa de dag la gnas shing sems can rnas kyi don byed do// 
201a3('bum): 'gro ba lnga'i 'khor bar yang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid las kyang yongs su myi nyam mo// rab 'byor dede ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nas rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i rtse
201a4('bum): rang bzhin stong pa nyid la gnas shing / thabs mkhas pas sems can rnams kyi byed do// rab 'byor de gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin dpa la spyod pa'i med
201a5('bum): rang bzhin stong pa nyid la gnas shing / sems canashes rab 'chal pa can blo chung ba rnams mthong na 'dems shing rjesustond te/ tshur rigs kyi bu lus dang ngag dang yid kyi las gang ji
201a6('bum): snyed kyang rung ste/ de thams cad kyang rang bzhin gis stong pa nyid du rtogs shig dang / khyod kyi las thams cad bdud rtsi 'i 'bras bur 'gyur te/ mthar bdud rtsir 'gyur ro// rang bzhin
201a7('bum): stong pa nyid yin 'jig par 'gyur ba 'am/ yongs su nyams par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i rang bzhin chos gang yang dmyigs su myed do// na ci'i phyir zhe na/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid ni yongs su nyams par myi 'gyur
201a8('bum): rang bzhin stong pa nyid ni yongs su nyams pa'i chos can gang yang myed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar rang bzhin gis stong pa nyid ni dngos po yod pa yang ma yin / dngos po myeng ba yang ma yin/ chos thams cad
201b1('bum): dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid la ci zhig yongs su nyams par 'gyur zhes rab 'byor de de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mkhas pas
201b2('bum): sems can rnams la 'dems shing rjes su stond to// de ltar 'dems shing rjes su stond pa'i tshe/ nam yang rjes su ma sgrubs pa yin/ de ni bdag kyang dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam yang dag par blangs shi
201b3('bum): gnas pa yin/ gzhan yang dge ba bcu'i las kyi las la yang dag par skul ba yin/ bdag kyang bslab pa'i gnas snga la yang dag par blangs shing gnas pa yin/ gzhan yang bslab pa'i gsos
201b4('bum): snga la yang dag par grangs shing gnas pa yin/ gzhan yang gaslab pa'i gnas lnga la yang dag par skul ba yin/ bdag kya da yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i gso byin la nye bar gnas pa'i
201b5('bum): yang dag par blangs shing gnas pa yin/ gzhan yang bslab pa'i gnas lnga la la yang dag par bskul ba yin/ gzhan yang yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i gso sbyin la nye bar gnas par yang dag par
201b6('bum): yang dag mar skul ba yin/ bdag kyang bsam gtam dang po la yang dag par bskul ba yin/ gzhan yang bsam gtan dang po la yang dag par skul ba yin/ bdag kyang bsam gtan gnyis pa dang / bsam
201b7('bum): gtan gsum pa dang / bsam gtan bzhi pa la yang dag par skul ba yin/ gzhan yang bsam gtan bzhi pa la yang dag par skul ba yin/ bdag kyang rtag tu rgyun myi 'chad par byams pa la gnas pa yin
201b8('bum): gzhan yang rtag tu rgyund myi 'chad par byams pa bsgom pa la yang dag par skul ba yin/ bdag kyang rgyu nad myi 'chad par snying rje dang / dga' ba dang / btang snyoms la gnas pa yin/ gzhan yang rtag tu rgyu nad
202a1('bum): myi 'chad par btang snyoms bsgom par yang dag par bkrol ba yin/ bdag kyang rtag tu nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la snyoms par 'jug pa yin/ rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched dang
202a2('bum): snyoms par 'jug pa yin/ 'du shes myed 'du shes myed myin skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa la snyoms par 'jug pa yin/ gzhan yang 'du shes myed 'du shes myed myin skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa la yang
202a3('bum): dag par bskul ba yin/ bdag kyang pha rol tu phyind pa rnams dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum bcu rtsa bdun la bsgom pa yin/ gzhan yang byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos
202a4('bum): sum bcu rtsa bdud la yang dag par bskul ba yin// bdag kyang rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo gsum la sleb pa yin/ gzhan yang rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo gsum la yang dag par bskul ba yin
202a5('bum): bdag kyang 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / rnam paratha rad pa brgyad dang / mtha rad kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jugapa dgu dang / mngon par shes pa rnams dang / ting nge 'dzind
202a6('bum): rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams la slob pa yin/ gzhan yang gzungs kyi sgo rnams la yang dag par skul yin/ bdag kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la slob pa yin/ gzhan yang de bzhin gsheg
202a7('bum): pa'i stobs bcu la yang dag par skul ba yin/ bdag kyang myi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / la yang dag par skul ba yin/ so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas
202a8('bum): kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad la slob pa yin/ gzhan yang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad la yang dag par skul ba yin/ bdag kyang myi chen po'i mtshan sum bcu rtsa gnyis dang / dpe' byad bzang po brgya
202b1('bum): bocu la slob pa yin/ gzhan yang myi chen po'i mtshan sum bcu rtsa gnyis dang / dpe' byad bzang po brgya bcu la yang dag par skul ba yin/ bdag kyang rgyu nad tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la yang shes pa bskyed
202b2('bum): cing / de la myi gnas pa yin gzhan yang rgyunang tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la dgod pa yin/ bdag kyang lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu'i
202b3('bum): shes pa bskyed cing de la myi gnas pa yin/ gzhan yang dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu la rab tu 'god pa yin pa bdag kyang rang chub kyi lam sbed cing de la myi gnas pa yin te/ gzhan yang rang chub la dgod pa yin ladan/ 
202b4('bum): kyang bla ma myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi lam skyed pa yin// gzhan yang las de yang rjes su 'dems shing rjes su s+ho nad pa dang / gzhol cing 'dul ba dang / 'god pa yin te/ rab
202b5('bum): 'byor de de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ sems dang / po skyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid la gam
202b6('bum): sems can rnams kyi don byed pa'i tshe ga nam yang lam myed par gnas pa ma yin no// gsol pa bcom ldan 'das gal te de ltar chos thams cad rang bzhin gis stong pa lags na/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid la ni sems
202b7('bum): can yang myi dmyigs/ chos kyang myi dmyigs/ chos ma lags pa yang myi dmyigs na/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi don du yang dag par
202b8('bum): zhugs pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ ji skad smras pa de bzhin no// chos thams cad ni rang bzhin gis stong pa ste/ rang bzhin gis stong pa nyid la ni
203a1('bum): masems can myi dmyigs so// chos myi dmyigs so // chos kyi dmyig myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor dgal te chos thams cad ni rang bzhin gis stong pa zhig ma yin ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
203a2('bum): dpa' chen po yang rang bzhin stong pa nyid la gnas par myi 'gyur te/ bla myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas kyang / chos rnams rang bzhin gis stong par myi stond to// 
203a3('bum): rang bzhin gos stong pa'i chos de dag kyang gang zhe na/ rab 'byor de gzugs ni rang bzhin gis stong ngo // tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa ni rang bzhin gis stong ngo // skye mched dang las
203a4('bum): dang rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba ni rang bzhin gis stong da / pha rol tu phyind pa rnams dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams ni rang bzhin gis stong ngo // 'phags pa'i bden pa
203a5('bum): rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad myed pa rnams dang / gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par tha rad pa rnams dang / mthard kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'ju
203a6('bum): ga pa rnams dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smond pa myed pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams dang / ting nge 'dzind rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams ni rang bzhin gis stong / 
203a7('bum): de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams dang / myi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams ni rang bzhin gyi
203a8('bum): stong ngo/ myi chen po'i mtshan sum bcu rtsa gnyis dang / dpe' byed bzang po brgya bcu ni rang bzhin gis stong ngo // skye mched bcu gnyis ni rang bzhin gis steng nge zhes bya bar chos ston to// khams bcwa brgyad na rang
203b1('bum): rgyu nang tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid dang / rang byang chub ni rang bzhin gis stong ngo // rnam pa thams cad mkhyen dpa / 
203b2('bum): nyid ni rang bzhin gis stong ngo // de bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ phung po lnga ni rang bzhin gis stong zhes bya bar chos pa stond to// skye mched bcu
203b3('bum): gnyis ni rang bzhin gis stong ngo zhes bya bar chos stond to// khams bcwo brgyad ni rang bzhin gos stong ngo zhes bya bar chos ston to// rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba ni rang binan gis stong ngo zhes bya bar chos stond to// pha rol
203b4('bum): tu phyind pa thams cad ni rang bzhin gis stong zhes bya b.rachos ston to// stong pa nyid thams cad ni rang bzhin gis stong ngo / 9/ zhes bya bar chos ston to// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag
203b5('bum): par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gi rkang pa bzhi dang dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdunadang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ni rang bzhin gis stong ngo / 
203b6('bum): zhes bya bar chos ston to// 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad myed pa bzhi dang / gzugs myed pa'i snyom par 'jug pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mtha rad kyis gnas
203b7('bum): pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan myed pa dang / smond pa myed pa dang / mngon par shes pa lnga dang / ting nge 'dzin thams dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams
203b8('bum): cad ni rang bzhin gis stong ngazhes bya bar chos gdang to// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / myi 'ongags pa pa ni dang / sa so yang dag par rig pa bani dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang
204a1('bum): dga' ba chen po dang / btang snyoms chen po ni rang bzhin gis stong ngo zhes bya bar chos ston to// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo zhes bya bar chos ston to// 
204a2('bum): myi chen po'i mtshan sum bcu rtsa gnyis dang / dpe' byad bzang po brgya bcu ni rang bzhin gis stong ngo zhes chos stond to// rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir myi 'ong
204a3('bum): ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid dang / rang byang chub ni rang bzhin gis stong ngo zhes bya ba ro stod to// rnam pa thams cad mkhyend dang ldan pa'i bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba thams cad spang ba ni rang bzhin gis
204a4('bum): stong ngo zhes bya bar chos ston to// rab 'byor dgal te nang stong pa nyid rang bzhin gis stong pa nyid zhig ma yin na ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos kyang bag chag chos thams cad ni rang bzhin gyi
204a5('bum): stong ngo zhes bya bar chos stond par myi 'gyur ro// gal te phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang
204a6('bum): 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid dang / rang
204a7('bum): bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po myed
204a8('bum): pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid rang bzhin gis stong pa ma yin na ni// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos kyang chos thams cad rang bzhin gis stong pa zhes bya bar chos stond par myi 'gyur te/ de'i phyir rang
204b1('bum): nga pa nyid byas gag par 'gyu na/ rang zhin song ba nyid na 'ag par bya 'gyu ga ma sa/ khyim myang par 'tha ma ya na// ca byi ba na/ da'asu kyisargyags bya
204b2('bum): deni gnas kyang ji ba ma min no// gang du yang 'gro ba ma yon te chos gnas pa dad// nam macas gang yang 'phel ba dmyigs pa 'am 'grib par myigs pa 'am/ 'gong ba ma na skye ba 'amam 'byung
204b3('bum): 'am/ 'gag pa'am/ kun nas nyon mongs pa'am/ rnam par byung ba dmyigs su myed do// nani chos rnams kyi rang bzhin te/ de la gnas shing byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams
204b4('bum): byud pa pang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang dusasu dgas/ chos gang yang 'dug pa 'ang/ kyi 'drug pa mthosagyu da/ gnas bams cad ni 'dug pa kyad cing banas pa byang ba
204b5('bum): chos rnams kyi gnas pa'o// de bas mdungachub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pa shes rab kyi pha rolangs phyind pa la spyod pa'i ma/ chos thams cad rang bzhin gis stong dang / 
204b6('bum): mthong nas thar byed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyid myi ldog go// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ doni 'di ltar des sgrib pa'i chos gang yang dag par rjes su myi mthong ste/ chos thams cad sgrib pa myed pa
204b7('bum): yang dag par rjes su myi mthong ngo // do ni 'di ltar rang bzhin stong pa nyid la bdag myi dmyigs bdag du gdags pa yang myi dmyigs so// sems can dang / srog dang / 'gro ba dang / gsob dang / skyes
204b8('bum): bu dang / gang theg dang // shed can dang / nad bdag dang / byed pa po dang / tshor ba po dang / tshor bar byed po dang / slong ba po dang / kun nas slong ba po dang / shes pa po dang / mthong ba por myi dmyigs
205a1('bum): mthong ba por gdags pa yang myi dmyigs gzugs kyang mi dmyigs/ gzugs su brtags pa yang myi dmyigs tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa yang myi dmyigs/ rnam
205a2('bum): par shes par bdags pa yang myi dmyigs/ myi chen po'i mtshan sum bcu rtsa gnyis kyi bar dang / dpe byad bzang po brgya bcur brdegs pa yang myi dmyigs na/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
205a3('bum): chu ba la the tsom za bar 'gyur ba lta ga las 'ong // rab 'byor de 'di lta ste dper na de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa'i dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma la bskal pa bye
