205a4('bum): ba khrag khrig brgya stong du mar rgyu nang tu chos ston na rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems sprul pa de dag la rgyu nang tu zhug pa'i 'bras bu rjes su thob par 'gyur ba'i bskal pa lta ga la yod de/ 
205a5('bum): lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid dang / rang byang chub bam// bla ma myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob par 'gyur ba'i
205a6('bum): skal pa yod dam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan de ni ma logs te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar de dag la dngos po ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal dpa rab 'byor de de bzhin no/ 
205a7('bum): de bzhin te/ chos thams cad la dngos po myed na/ sems can gang zhig byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu 'am/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'am/ phyir myi 'ong ba'i
205a8('bum): 'bras bu 'am/ dgra bcom pa nyid dang / rang byang chub dang / bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i tu dgod par bya ste/ gzhan du na phyind ci log gis 'khris pa'i skye dgu dag phyin ci log myed pa la gzhog go// 
205b1('bum): 'dul lo rab tu 'god do// phyin ci log gang yin pa de yang rtog pa'i rgyu las byung ba'i phyir phyin ci ma log pa yin pa ste/ rnam par rtog pa myed pa'i na phyin ci ma log pa ma yin pa'o// gang phyin ci log byed pa rol ban/ 
205b2('bum): myed do// sems can myed do// srog myed do// 'gro ba myed do// gas pa myed do// skyes bu myed do// gang zag myed do// shed can myed do// shed bdag myed do// byed pa po myed do// tshor ba po myed do// shes pa po
205b3('bum): byed do// mthong ba po myed do// de la gzugs byed do/ tshor ba myed do// 'du zhes myed do// 'du byed byed do// rnam pa zhes pa byed do// del skye mched dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'altung ba skyed do// ya ma
205b4('bum): tu phyinang pa rnams dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang / byang byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams myed do// de la 'phags pa'i bden pa dang / bsam gtan dang / tshad myed pa dang / gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par
205b5('bum): 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thadad pa rnams dang mthar dkyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa su dang / stong pa nyid dang / tsha ma myed pa dang / smond pa myed pa dang / mngon pa napa
205b6('bum): pa dang / ting nge 'dzind dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang / myed do// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / myi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / 
205b7('bum): sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dus pa bcwo brgyad byed do// de la rnam pa thams cad ma khyen pa nyid kyi bar du de la byed do// gang la gzugs byed pa dang / tshor ba myed pa dang / 'du shes byeng pa dang / 'du byed byed pa dang / rnam pa
205b8('bum): mabyeng ba dang / gangs rgya ma chad dang / khams dang / nyan cing 'dras par 'byung ba byed pa dang / pa ros su phyind pa rnams dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang / byang chus kyi phyongs kyi min mas byed da
207a1('bum): myang pa yang dag pa rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi bar du byed pa'i don ni rang bzhin spong nyid de de la gnas 'dang ba byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas
207a2('bum): spyod de nas rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod cing sems can phyin dri log tu gyur pa rnams sems can gi 'du shes re 'i brel te/ gzugs kyi 'du shes las 'grel to// gzugs byed pa'i 'du shes
207a3('bum): lus 'grel to// zag pa dang bcas pa'i chos thams cad kyi bar las 'grel to// zag pa myed pa'i chos 'di lta ste/ byang chub kyi chos rnams dang / rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo gsum dang / 'phags pa'i bden
207a4('bum): pa ba'i dang / rnam par tha dad pa brgyad dang / mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs
207a5('bum): bcu dang / myi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad po de dag kyang de la don dam
207a6('bum): pa'i rnam pa gang yin pa de lta bu ma yin te/ de ltar 'dus ma byas dang / ma skyes pa dang / dngos po myed pa dang / 'byung ba myed pa dang / de ni rang bzhin stong pa nyid do// de ni sangs
207a7('bum): rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi byang chub ste/ de la bdag myed do// sems can dang / srog dang / 'gro ba dang / gso ba dang / skyes bu dang / gang zag dang / shed can dang / shed bdag dang / byed
207a8('bum): pa po dang / tshor ba po dang / shes pa po dang / mthong ba po myed do// gzugs myed do// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa myed do// skye mched dang / khams dang / rten cing
207b1('bum): 'brel par 'byung ba myed do// pha rol tu phyind pa rnams dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams myed do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du myed do// byang chub
207b2('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni gzhan du rang bzhin stong pa nyid yongs su shes pa las lam gi don du bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu 'jug pa myed do// rang bzhin stong stong pa
207b3('bum): nyid de snga nas kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid/ phyi ras kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid/ bang du yang rang bzhin stong pa nyidade/ de nam yang rang bzhin gis myi stong pa ma yin no// de bas na byang chub sems dpa
207b4('bum): sems dpa' chen po yang rang bzhin gis stong / pa nyid kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod cing nga / sems can du 'du shes pa'i sems can gi 'du shes yongs su 'grol ba'i phyir
207b5('bum): am gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la spong ngo // de las gi rnam pa shes pa rjid la spyod pa'i ma 'di sa ste nyan pos kyi sam 'bre rang sangs rgyas kyi lan lalag byang chub sems dpa'i lam dang / 
207b6('bum): pa gams cad la spyod du// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' tshan po de la mi khams cad yongs su rdzogs par bya sems can rnams yongs su spyon par byas/ sangs rgyas kyi ning yongs
207b7('bum): da sar byamam 'i ma du byu kyi kyis bdubs te/ rgyudabyed pa 'ang dag par rdzogs pa d+ha rgyag sa rgyag / dzin byed pa ya dan pa rdzog
208a1('bum): pa'i dus na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed cig byung ba'i sangs rgyas kyi tshul de dag kyang 'di lta ste rang bzhin stong pa nyid do// ma 'ongs pa'i dus na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed
208a2('bum): cig 'byung ba de dag gi sangs rgyas kyi tshul yang 'di lta ste rang bzhin stong pa nyid do// de ltar phyogs bcu'i 'jig rtenang gi khams ma sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba de dag gis sangs
208a3('bum): rgyas kyi tshul yang 'di lta ste/ rab bzhin stong pa nyid do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ma rtogs par gzhan las 'jig rtend du 'byung bar myi 'gyur ro// de bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
208a4('bum): chen pos rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod par byas te/ de la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid las yongs su nyams par myi 'gyur ro// rab 'byord
208a5('bum): kyis gsol da pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ltar byang chub se rnams dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams rang bzhin gyi chos thams cad la spyod cing / gzugs kyang gzhan no// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no/ 
208a6('bum): tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par pa yang gzhan no// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no// skye mched/ dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba yang gzhan no// rang bzhin/ 
208a7('bum): stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no// pha rol tu phyind pa rnams dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams kyang gzhan rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no// 'phags pa'i bden pa dang / bas
208a8('bum): gtan dang / tshad myed pa dang / gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / rnam par tha rad pa dang / mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smond pa myed pa dang
208b1('bum): dag par ngon pa pan dang / byams pa chen po dang / ring rjechen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa ma sagyu rnams kyang gzhan na/ rang banin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no// rnam pathams cad sa byed pa na kyang
208b2('bum): yang gzhad do// rang ba da stong ba nyid kyang gzhan no// nas pa rgya la rang bzhin myong ba nyid rnam par 'khrug par myi bgyid de/ gtsug du mya mang ba'in stong pa nyid do// rang banin stong pa nyid kyang gzugs// tshang ba dang / 
208b3('bum): 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do// rang ba ni stong pa nyid kyang rnam par shes pa'o// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar yang rang bzhin stongs
208b4('bum): nyid do// rang banid stong pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi do zhes spyod pa ngo mtshar che'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal dpa / rab 'byor de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ ji skad smras pa
208b5('bum): de bzhin no// rab 'byor da gal te gzugs kyang gzhan la rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan/ tshor ba yang gzhan la rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan// 'du shes kyang gnan/ 'du byed kyang gzhan/ rnam par shes pa yang
208b6('bum): gzhan la rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan/ skye mched dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba yang gzhan la rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan/ pha rol tu phyind pa yang gzhan/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang
208b7('bum): gzhan/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos kyang gzhan la/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhanas 'phags pa'i bden pa dang / bsam gtan dang / tshad myed pa dang / gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / rnam par
210a1('bum): tha rad pa dang / mtha rad kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / sngond pa myed pa dang / mngon par shes pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs kyi sgo
210a2('bum): dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / myi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa pa'i dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyang
210a3('bum): gzhan la/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi bar yang gzhan la/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ gal te gzugs rang bzhin gis stong pa zhig ma yin na ni/ 
210a4('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu 'tshang myi rgya ste/ rab 'byor gang gi phyir gzugs rang bzhin gis stong pas na/ 
210a5('bum): de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzugs rang bzhin gis stong ngo zhes bya bar khong du chud par byas shing / bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par
210a6('bum): rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// gal te tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'dubyed dang / rnam par shes pa yang bzhin gis stong pa zhig ma yin nin byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang bla ma
210a7('bum): myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang myi rgya ste/ rab 'byor nga gang gi phyir rnam par shes pa rang bzhi nags stong pas ma/ de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam
210a8('bum): byams yang bani gis nang zhis kya nga 'ang du chung bar byung zhing / blam byung pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chu du ma nga rdzogs par rje bya'o// ma 'byu dag gi rnam pa mas ca ma khyed
210b1('bum): nyid kyi khar du rang bzhin gis stong pa zhig ma yin na ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang myi rgya ste rab 'byor
210b2('bum): gang gi phyir rnam pa mkhyend pa nyid rang bzhin gis stong pas na pa de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi rang bzhin gis stong ngo zhes bya bar khong du chud par byas
210b3('bum): tha mang pa yang dag par rdzogs par byang du du ma nga bar rdzogs par 'ang d+has par 'byur ga te tha byed pa yang dag pa rdzogs pa byang chu rang tshanas mas nigam ma du kyi nub
210b4('bum): dang 'drang po bla ma myang pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'phang myi rgyas rab 'byor gang gi phyird thun myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub rang bzhi / 
210b5('bum): gis stong pasam/ de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bra na myang ba yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub du rang bzhim gis stong ngo zhes bya bar khong du chud par byas shing rje
210b6('bum): pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid rjes su zab par byed de/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid la ni chos gang yang rnam par 'jig par 'gyur ba 'am rtag tu gnas pa 'am/ 'gro ba myed de/ gzhan du na lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten dang
210b7('bum): bdung dang cam pa'i 'jig rten rnams 'di gzugs so// bdag gi gzug so// bdag ni gzugs dang ldan no// 'di ni rnam pa gos pa'i bar ro// bdagon rnam par shes pa'o// bdagani rnam pa shes par
210b8('bum): ldar nonam du tshangs dang / de dag gzugs pa mngon par nan teg rnam par shes pa'i bar la bachos pa rgyas mngon par zhen te bdag tu bya ba dang / bdag gir bya ba ma mngon par zhen te/ phyi nang gi dngos po la mngon
211a1('bum): bzhin cing chags so// de skar mngon pa zhin ni chags nas/ skye ba'i skye mtshad dag tu gzugs dang / tshor ba dang / 'dun pa dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par nus pa nye bamachen te/ skye ba dang ga na pa dang
211a2('bum): na ba dang / 'chib dang na mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid myi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa las yongs su myi 'grel/ 'gro ba lnga'i 'khor ba nas yongs su myi 'grol lo// 
211a3('bum): bamatho de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen porang
211a4('bum): bzhin stong pa nyid kyi pha rol tu phyind pa rnams la spyod cing / gzugs rang bzhin gis stong pas 'on tam myi stong zhes bya bar rnam par sher 'khrug par myi byed do// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang
211a5('bum): 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa stong pa 'amar 'on tam myi stong zhes bya bar rnam par 'khrug par myi byed do// skye mched dang / kham sa dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba rnams stong pa 'am
211a6('bum): 'on tam myi stong zhes bya bar rnam par 'khrug par myi byed do// pha rol tu phyind pa rnams dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams stong pa 'am/ 'on tan myi stong zhes bya bar rnam
211a7('bum): brar 'khrug par myi byed do// 'phags pa'i bden pa dang / bsam gtad dang / tshad myed pa dang / gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / rnam par ba dad pa dang / mab da kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par
211a8('bum): 'jug pa dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa dang / mngon pa gas pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams stong ba 'am 'od tam su thong nam bya zang rnam pa la dz+nyAn
211b1('bum): par myi byed do// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / myi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po skyong dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma
211b2('bum): 'dres pa bcwo brgyad stong ngam/ 'on tam myi stong zhes rnam par 'grug par myi byed do// bla ma myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi bar du stong pa 'am 'on tan myi stong zhes bya bar rnam par 'khrug par
211b3('bum): myi byed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid ni 'di ni gzugs so// 'di ni gzugs kyis stong ngo zhes rnam par 'khrug par myi byed do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid 'di ni tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed
211b4('bum): dang / rnam par shes pa'o// 'di ni rnam par shes pa'i stong pa nyid do zhes bya bar rnam par 'khrug par myi byed do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid 'di dag ni skye mched dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'o// 
211b5('bum): thong dag mi rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i chos nyid do zhes rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i chos rnam par 'khrug par myi byed do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid 'di dag ni pha rol tu phyind pa dang
211b6('bum): stong pa nyid thams cad dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams 'di dag ni byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos kyi stong pa nyid do zhes byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams rnam par 'khrug par myi byed do// 
211b7('bum): rang bzhin stong pa nyid 'di dag ni 'phags pa'i bden pa dang / bsam gtan dang / tshad myed pa dang / gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / rnam par tha rad pa dang / mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms
211b8('bum): pa dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa dang / mngon par shes pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / gzugs kyi sgo rnams dang / 'di ni gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi stong pa nyid do zhes gzungs kyi
212a1('bum): sgo rnam par 'khrug par myi byed do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid ni 'di dag ning pa'i na gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / myi 'jigs pa pani dang / sa so yang dag par rig pa pazhi dang / byams pa chen po dang
212a2('bum): snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams so ka 'di ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi stong pa nyid de nas sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams rnam par 'khrug par myi byed do// rang ni
212a3('bum): stong pa nyid 'di ni rgyu nang tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid dang / rang byang chub dang / byang chub bo// 'di ni byang chub kyi stong
212a4('bum): pa nyid do zhes byang chub rnam par 'khrug par myi byed do// rab 'byor de 'di lta ste dper na nam mkha' ni nam mkha' rnam par 'khrug par myi byed do// nang gi nam mkha' ni phyi'i nam mkha' rnam par 'khrug par myi byed
212a5('bum): phyi'i nam mkha' ni nang gi nam mkha' rnam par 'khrug par myi byed do// rab 'byor gzugs kyang stong pa nyid rnam par 'khrug par myi byed/ stong pa nyid kyang gzugs rnam par 'khrug par myi byed
212a6('bum): tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam pa shes pa dang yang stong pa nyid rnam par 'khrug par myi byed/ stong pa nyid kyang rnam bor 'khrug par myi byed do// skye mched drug dang / khams
212a7('bum): dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba rnams kyang stong pa nyid rnam par 'khrug par myi byed do// stong pa nyid kyang rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba rnam par 'khrug par myi byed do// pha rol tu phyind pa rnams dang / stong pa nyid
212a8('bum): khams dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams kyang stong panyid rnam par 'khrug par myi byed/ stong pa nyid kyang byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams rnam par 'khrug par myi byed dong// 'phags pa'i bden pa dang /

212b7('bum): ro zhes rnam par 'khrug par myi byed po de lta bu'i rang bzhin myed do// rab 'byor kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das gal te chos thams cad dper ma mchis na/ ci'i slad du zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
212b8('bum): chen po dag ni bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs pa ste/ mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar myi nus so// bya'o zhes bgyi bar sems par gyur pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub ni gnyis su

213a3('bum): byang chub ni byang chub po// byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya bar gnyis su bya ba la myi spyod de/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i byang chub de ni gzugs la myi spyod do// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rna

213a8('bum): dag gam bdag gir bya ba myed pa ste/ bdag gi gzugs la spyad par bya'o zhe'am/ bdag gi gzugs so zhe 'am/ bdag gis tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed la dang / rnam par shes pa la spyad par bya'o// 
213b1('bum): zhe 'am/ bdag gi rnam par shes pa'o zhe 'am/ bdag gi skye mched dang / khams dang / rtend cing 'brel par 'byung ba la spyad par bya'o zhe'am/ bdag gis rten cing 'brel ba'o zhe 'am/ bdag gis pha rol tu phyind pa

213b8('bum): kyi byung sa phyi na du myi myo / rgyang chu sems da'i mams dpa chen pa phyi nu cis spyod pa lags com ldan 'das kyis pas dul pa/ rang byos pan ma chu sa / gan sa / 
214a1('bum): byang chub 'dzin dpa'am/ myi 'dzin dpa'am ci la yang spyod pa yod dam/ gsol dpa bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal da pa/ rab 'byor de de ji snyam du
214a2('bum): sems dgra bcom pa'i rmi lam gi blo 'dzin pa'am/ myi 'dzind pa gang la yang spyod dam/ gsol dpabacom ldan 'das de ni ma lags te/ dgra bcom pa la yang nyal ba ma mchis na/ de rmi lam gi blo
214a3('bum): 'dzin pa 'am/ myi 'dzinang par spyod par 'gyur ba lta ga la mchis/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal da pa/ rab 'byor de de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i byang chub kyang 'dzin pa 'am/ myi 'dzinang

215a1('bum): yongs su sbyin par ma bgyis myi chen po'i mtshan sum bcu rtsa gnyis dang / dpe' byang bzang po brgya bcu yongs su ma sgrubs par ni bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par

215b7('bum): pa 'am/ kun nas nyon mongs pa 'am/ rnam par byang ba 'am/ thob pa 'am/ mngon par rtogs par byed pa myed de/ de yang 'jig rten gi ba snyad du btags pa'i chos nyid de nye bar bzung na byang chub sems

216a6('bum): ngag myi dmyigs te/ sems can rnams dang / byang chub dang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' yang myi dmyigs so// rab 'a rang de ji snyam du sems/ gang gi tshe rab 'byorang khyod kyis

216a8('bum): ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid thob par gyur pa de'i tshe rmi lam 'am/ sems sam/ lam 'am/ 'bras bu dmyigs par gyur pa yod ngam/ gsol dpa bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so// bcom ldan/ 
216b1('bum): 'das kyis bka' stsal da ba 'o na ji ltar khyod kyis bdagra bcom pa nyid thob bo zhes bya bar bka' stsal te lung bstand par gyur da/ gsol pa bcom ldan 'das 'jig rtenang gi tha snyad nye bar bzung ste bkas lung bstan

217a1('bum): can byachos kyirang ba'ini ma myi dmyigs ma/ sems dang po bskyed pa nas dmyigs par 'gyur ba la ci spros te/ do ni gnas myed do/ sa bcu pa'i babadang pa ro lad tu byond pa rnams dang / stong pa nyid

217b4('bum): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'chang rgya ba'i skal pa ma mchis na/ bcom ldan 'das de ltar bya chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na myed pa ya
