249a3('bum): 'gyur ba yod dmagasol pa bcom ldan 'das de ni ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa'i chos rnams zag pa
249a4('bum): myed pa dang ldan pa yang chen du bsams shing de lta bu'i lus yodas su 'dzind to// lus de dag gis sems can rnams kyi don byed// sdug bsngal gi tshor ba yang 'gyur ba gang yang myed do// ra
249a5('bum): 'byor kyis gsol pa/ kye ma bcom ldan 'das de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa'i ye shes zag ba ma mchis pa de ltar ldan zhing / lus dang ngag dang gang gis
249a6('bum): sems can rnams kyi don du 'gyur ba de dang de ltar lus yongs su 'dzind pa ni thabs shing tu mkhas pa ste/ de ni ngo mtshar che'o// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos dkar po gang dang
249a7('bum): gang la gnas shing de lta bu'i thabs la mkhas par bgyid kyang les de lta bu'i myi gos par spyod pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsalang pa na rab 'byor de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa la gnas ning
249a8('bum): byang chub tu sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de lta bu'i thabs mkhas pa la spyod de/ thabs mkhas pa de phyogs bcu'i phyogs re re'i 'jig rten gi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag tun sems can gi don
249b1('bum): byed kyang / des de la gang yang reg par 'gyur ba myed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos gang reg par byed pa dang / gang gis reg par bya ba dang / gang la reg pa/ 
249b2('bum): bya ba de lta bu'i chos gang yang gsum po de dag myi dmyigs te/ de ci'i phyir/ zhen de ni 'di ltar chos gsum po de dag thams cad ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa nyid la reg par myi byed do// stong pa nyid la chos gang yang reg par
249b3('bum): myi 'gyur ro// stong pa nyid kyang reg par 'gyur ba ma yin no/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ doni 'di ltar stong pa nyid la stong pa nyid myi dmyigs de ni myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid de/ de la gnas shing byang chub
249b4('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par 'tshang rgya'o// gsol pa bcom ldan 'das ci lags byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
249b5('bum): chen po chos gnanal myi gnas kyi shes rab kyi pha rolal tu phyin pa la 'ba' zhig la gnas shing rnam pa de lta bu'i thabs mkhas pa la spyod pa lagaso sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// rab 'byor pa
249b6('bum): chos gang shes rab kyi pha rol dang phyi nang pa'i khongs su chud pa de lta bu yod dam/ gsol pa bcom ldan 'das gal de shes rab kyi pha rolab tu phyind pa ngo bo nyid kyis stong ma/ ji ltar zhes rab kyi pha rolang tu phyir dpar
249b7('bum): khongs su chud pa chos thams cad 'dus pa lags// bcom ldan 'das stong pa nyid la ni chos gang yang khongs su chud pa 'am/ khongs su ma chud pa zhes bgyi ba ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 
249b8('bum): rab 'byor de chos thams cad chos thams cad kyis stong na/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid du ma 'dus sam/ gsol pa bcom ldan 'das de de legs so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal da pa/ rab 'byor da rda grangs
250a1('bum): des na/ khyod kyis 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni nas rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing / de lta bu'i thabs mkhas pa la spyod par rig par bya'o// de nas tshe dang ldan pa/ 
250a2('bum): rab 'byor kyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod par rig par bya'o// de nas tshe dang rab 'byor dkyis
250a3('bum): bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod cing chos thams cad stong pa nyid la gnas te/ mngon par shes pa
250a4('bum): lnga la gnas shing phyogs bcu'i phyogs re re'i 'jig rten gi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag tu mchi ba dang / 'jig rten ga khams de dag na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed cig bzhugs
250a5('bum): shing phyogs bcur phyogs re re'i 'jig rte rang gi khamasa'atsho skyong ba dang chos stond pa de dag la sti bstang bgyid pa dang chos nyan cing sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la dge ba'i rtsa
250a6('bum): ba bskyed pa'i mngon par shes pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par sgrub pa lags// de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor dal 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rab 'byor
250a7('bum): 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe phyogs bcu'i phyogs re ro'i 'jig rtenang gi khams gang gi'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag thams cad ngo bo nyid kyis stong
250a8('bum): mthong ngo // 'jig rten gi khams de dag na sangs rgyas bcom 'das gang ji snyed cig bzhugs shing sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag kyis stong par par mthong ngo // gzhan du na mying dang bdar gdags pa'i nye bar
250b1('bum): bzung zhing bstand pa ma rtogs te// gdags pa de kun kyang ngo bo nyid kyis stong ngo // gal te 'jig rtenang gi khams de dag kyang ngo bo nyid kyis myi stong la/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag kyang ngo bo nyid kyis
250b2('bum): myi stong ste/ gdags pa'i rgyud de dag kyang ngo bo nyid kyis myi stong pa zhig min mchin nye tshe'i stong pa nyid du 'gyur te/ de yang stong pa nyid nyi tso ma yin no// de'i phyir chos thams cad kyis myi stong ste/ nagadags pa'i
250b3('bum): rgyud de dag kyang ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa zhig yin min/ nyi che ba'i stong pa nyid du 'gyur te/ de yang stong pa nyid nyi che ba ma yin no// de'i phyir chos thams cad chos thams cad kyis stong ste/ de nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
250b4('bum): chen po thabs mkhas pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pasal spyod cing // mngon par shes pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa'i mngon par bsgrubs te/ mngon par shes pa de dag la gnas shing / lha'i myig dang / 
250b5('bum): lha'i rna ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam pa dang / pha rol da gis sa shes pa dang / sngon gi gnas dran pa dang / 'chi 'pho shes pa mdza na par grub ste/ mngon pa myed par byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
250b6('bum): chen pos bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar myi nus so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i byang chub ni mngon
250b7('bum): par shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'dus te/ mngon par shes pa de dag las byang chub yongs su btsal bar bya'o// de tshol ba'i tshe/ lha'i myig rnam par dag pa myi las 'das pas bdag nyid kyang dge ba'i chos thos
250b8('bum): cad mthong gzhan yang dge ba'i chos thams cad la sbyor te/ dge ba'i chos de dag la mngon par zhen par 'gyur ba myed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ dge ba'i chos de dag thams cad ni ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa ste/ stong pa nyid ni gang la
251a1('bum): mngon par zhen pa myed pa'i myong ba myed pas mngon par zhend par 'gyur ba myed do// stong pa nyid ni ro myong bar byed pa myed do// de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la
251a2('bum): spyod pa'i tshe/ lha'i myig mngon par sgrub ste/ lha'i myig des chos thams cad kyang stong pa nyid du mthong ste/ de chos de dag la gnas shing las mngon par sgrub bo// las mngon par bsgrubs pa des sems can rnams la
251a3('bum): ston te/ sems can nam sems can du gdags par dmyigs pa myed do// de ltar myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mngon par shes pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa mngon par bsgrub ste/ 
251a4('bum): mngon par shes pa de dag gis mngon par shes pa'i bya ba'i chos de dag gang ji snyed pa de dag myed do// de lta'i myig rnam par dag pa myi las 'dra/ pa de nyid kyis shar phyogs kyi 'jig rtenang gi khams thams
251a5('bum): cang mthong ste/ de dag du rdzu 'phrul gis song zhing / sbyin pa 'am/ tshul khrims sam/ bzod pa 'am/ brtson 'grus sam/ bsam gtan nam/ shes rab 'am/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos
251a6('bum): rnams sam/ rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smond pa myed pa dang / bsam gtan rnams sam/ tshad myed pa rnams sam// gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sam/ 
251a7('bum): rnam par thard pa rnams sam/ ting nge 'dzind rnams sam/ mtha rad kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sam/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams sam/ myi 'jigs pa rnams sam/ stsol
251a8('bum): yang dag par rig pa rnams sam/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams sam/ nyan thos kyi chos sam/ rang sangs rgyas kyi chos sam/ byang chub sems dpa'i chos sam/ sangs rgyas kyi chos kyis sos
251b1('bum): can rnams kyi don byed cing / sems can de dag gi bya ba byed de/ de sems can ser sna can gang ji snyed pa de dag la 'di skad du chos ston date/ sbyin pa byin cig/ 'phongs pa ni sdug bsngal ba ste/ phongs pas ni bad/ 
251b2('bum): gi ron kyang bya bar mya nus na/ gzhan gyi don la ci smos kyis/ de ltar khyed kyis sbyin pa byin la bdag kyang bde bar gyis dge/ phongs pas zi lod kyis non cing nya na nyid kyis thos ste/ ngan song gsum las myi ma dang / 
251b3('bum): bar gyu rad ta re zhes chos stond to// sems can tshul khrims ngan pa can gang ji snyed pa de dag la de dag la 'di skad du chos stond te/ kye skyes bu dag tshul khrims ngan pa ni sdug bsngal ba ste/ tshul khrims ngan pa'i/ 
251b4('bum): ni bdag gi don kyang bya bar bya bar myi nus na/ gzhan gi dor lta ci smos te/ tshul khrims ngan pa'i rnam par sbyind pa ni/ byol song gi skye gnas sam/ gra shin rje'i 'jig rten yin te/ de ltar khyed ngan song gsum du myi
251b5('bum): lhung na bdag kyang gton par myi nus na/ gzhan gdon par lta ci smom kyis de'i phyir khyed kyis tshul khrims ngan pa'i sems gtsam gi goH/ bas kyang myi dbye'o// phyis 'gyod pa can tu gyur da ta re zhes
251b6('bum): chos stonang to// sems can phan tshun gnod sems su gyur pa de dag la 'di skad du so sond te/ de ltar khyed gtsigasagacig gnod sems su ma byed cig sems 'khrugs par gyur pa la dge ba'i chos gang yang
251b7('bum): skye bar myi 'gyur te/ de bas ma khyed phan tshu sems 'khrugs par gyur dam/ sems can dmyal bar skye bar 'am/ byol seng gi skye gnas su skye ba 'am/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten du skye ba'i gnas yin gis/ de bas na khye
251b8('bum): kyis 'khrug pa'i sems 'ga' tsam gi gi skabs kyang myi dbye'o// phyis 'gyod pa can du gyur da ta ro zhes chos stonang ngo to// sems can lo lo tsan gang ji snyed pa de dag la 'di skad du chos ston te/ kye skyes bu dag le lo ni
252a1('bum): sdug bsngal ba ste/ le los ni bdag gi don kyang bya bar myi nus na gzhan gnod par lta ci smos te/ le le'i rnam par smind pa ni sems can dmyal ba 'am/ byol song gi skye gnas sam/ gshi na rje'i
252a2('bum): 'jig rten yin te/ de ltar khyed ngan song gsum du ltung na bdag cag kyang gdon par myi nus na/ gzhan gdon pa lta ci smos kyis/ de'i phyir khyed kyise le lo'i sems 'ag tsam gri go skyabs kyang myi dbye'o// phyis 'god/ 
252a3('bum): pa can du gyur da ta re zhes bya bar chos stond to// sems can sems g.yeng ba can gang ji snyed pa de dag la 'di skad du chos ston te/ kye skyes bu dag sems g.yeng ba ni sdug bsngal ba ste gang sems g.yeng ba'i rnam
252a4('bum): par smind pa ni/ sems can dmyal ba 'am/ byol song gi skye gnas sam/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten yin te/ de ltar khyed ngan songagasum du ltung na bdag kyang gdon par myi nus na gzhan gno/ 
252a5('bum): pa lta ci smos kyis de'i phyir khyed kyis sems yangs pa 'ga' ci gi go skabs kyang myi dbye'o// phyis 'gyod pa can du gyur da ta re zhes chos stond to// sems can shes rab 'chal pa can gang
252a6('bum): ji snyed pa de dag la 'di skad du chos stonang to// kye skyes bu dag shes rab 'chal pa ni sdug bsngal ba ste/ shes rab 'chal bsam bdag gi don kyang bya bar myi nus na gzhan gi don lta ci smos te/ gang shes rab
252a7('bum): 'chal pa'i rnam par sbyind pa ni sems can dmyal ba 'am/ byol song gi skye gnas sam/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten yin te/ de ltar khyed shes rab 'chal pa'i sems 'ga' tsam gi go skabs kyang myi dbye'o// 
252a8('bum): phyis 'gyod pa can du gyur ta re zhes chos stond to// 'dod chags kyi spyod pa can gang ji snyed pa de dag ni myi sdug pa la sbyor ro// zhe sdang gi spyod pa can gang ji snyed pa de dag ni byams pa la sbyor ro// gti mug gi spyod pa
252b1('bum): can ji snyed pa de dag ni rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la sbyor ro// lam ngan par zhugs pa de dgang ji snyed pa de dag ni yang dag ni yang dag pa'i lam la sbyar te/ nyan thos kyi lam 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi la'o/ 
252b2('bum): sangs rgyas kyi lam la sbyor zhing / de dag la 'di skad du chos ston te/ khyed chos gang la mngon par zhen par gyur pa'i chos de dag ni ngo bo nyid kyis stong ste/ ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i chos rnams ni mngon par
252b3('bum): zhen par myi nus te/ stong pa nyid la mngon par myed do zhes chos stond to// rab 'byor de de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ mngon par shes bya
252b4('bum): rnams la gnas shing sems can rnams kyi don byed pa yin no// de lta'i myig rnam par dag pa myi las 'das pa de nyid kyis shar phyogs dang lho dang / nub dang / byang dang / byang shar dang / shar lho dang
252b5('bum): lho nub dang / nub byang dang / 'og dang steng gi phyogs kyi 'jigarten ge khams thams cad mthong ste/ de dag du rdzu 'phrul gis songazhing / sbyin pa 'am/ tshul khrims sam/ bzod pa 'am/ 
252b6('bum): brtson 'grus sam/ bsam gtan nam/ shes rab bam/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams sam/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa dang / bsam gtan
252b7('bum): rnams sam/ tshad myed pa rnams sam/ gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sam/ rnam par tha rad pa rnams sam/ mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sam/ de bzhin gshes
252b8('bum): pa'i stobs rnams sam/ myi 'jigs pa rnams sam/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams sam/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams sam/ nyan thos kyi chos sam/ sangs kyi chos sam/ byang chub seMs/ 
253a1('bum): dpa'i chos sam/ sangs rgyas kyi chos kyis sems can rnams kyi don byed cing / sems can de dag gi bya ba byed de de la sems can ser sna can gang ji snyed pa de dag la 'di skad du chos stond te/ sbyin pa
253a2('bum): byin cig 'phongs pa ni sdug bsngal ba ste/ 'phongs pas ni bdag gi don kyang bya bar myi nus na gzhan gi don lta ci smos kyis de ltar khyed kyis sbyin pa byin la/ bdag kyang bde bar gyis shig/ gzhan yang bde bar gis
253a3('bum): shig/ phongs pas ni zil gis non cing / nying sha nying gis thos te ngan song gsum las myi tha rang bar gyurd ta re zhes chos stond to// sems can tshul khrims ngan pa can ji snyed pa de dag la 'di skad du ces ston two/ 
253a4('bum): kye skyes bu dag tshul khrims ngan pa ni sdug bsngal ba ste/ tshul khrims ngan pas ni bdag gi don kyang bya bar myi nus na/ gzhon gi don lta ci smos te/ tshul khrims ngan pa'i rnam par smind pa ni sems can dmyal
253a5('bum): ba 'am/ byol song gi skye gnas sam/ gshin rje'i 'jig rtend yin te/ de ltar khyed ngan song gsum du ltung na bdag cag kyang // gdon par myi nus na/ gzhan gdon pa lta ci smos kyis/ ngo'i
253a6('bum): phyir khyod kyis tshul khrims ngan pa'i sems 'ga' tsam gi go skabs kyang myi dbye'o// phyis 'gyod pa can du gyur da ta re zhes chos stonang to// sems can phan tshun gnod sems can du gyur pa ji snyed pa de dag
253a7('bum): la 'di skad du chos ston te/ de ltar khyed gcig la gcig gnod sems su ma byed cig/ sems 'khrug par gyur pa la dge ba'i chos gang yang skye bar myi 'gyur te/ de lta bas ma khyad phan tshun sems 'khrug
253a8('bum): par gyur da na/ sems can dmyal ba'am/ byol song gi skye gnas su skye ba'i/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten du skye ba'i gnas yin gis de bas mkhyed kyis 'khrugs pa'i sems ni 'ag tsam gi go skabs kyang
253b1('bum): myi dbye'o// phyis 'god pa can du gyurd ta re zhes chos stond to// sems can lo lo can gang ji snyed pa de dag la 'di skad cesas ston te/ kye skyes bu dag le lo ni sdug bsngal ba ste/ le los ni bdag gi don kyang
253b2('bum): bya bar myi nus na gzhan gi don lto ci smos te/ le lo'i rnam par smin pa ni sems can dmyal ba 'am/ byol song gi skye gnas sam/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten yin te/ de ltar khyed ngan song du ltung na/ bdag cag kyang
253b3('bum): gdon par mya nus na/ gzhan gdon pa lta ci smos kyis/ de'i phyir khyed kyis le lo'i sems 'ag tsam gi go skabs kyang myi dbye'o// phyis 'gyod pa can du gyur ta re zhes chos stond to// sems can sems g.yeng ba gas
253b4('bum): ji snyed pa de dag la 'di skad du chos stond te/ kye skyes bu dag sems g.yeng ba ni sdug bsngal ba ste/ gang sems g.yengaba'i rnam par smyin pa ni sems can dmyal ba 'am/ byol song gi skye/ 
253b5('bum): gnas sam gshin rje'i 'jig rten yin te/ de ltar khyed ngan/ song gsum du ltung nas bdag kyang gdon par myi nus na/ gzhan gdon pa lta ci smos kyis/ de'i phyir khyed kyis g.yang ba'i sems 'ag
253b6('bum): tsam gi go skabs kyang myi dbye'o// phyis 'gyod pa can du gyur da ta re zhes chos stonang to// sems can shes rab 'chal pa can gang ji snyed pa de dag la 'di skad du chos stond te/ kye skyes bu dag shes rab 'chal pa ni
253b7('bum): sdug bsngal ba ste/ shes rab 'chal pas ni bdag gi don kyang bya bar myi nus ma/ gzhan gi don lta ci smos te/ gang shes rab 'chal pa'i rnam par sbyind pa ni/ sems can dmyal ba 'am/ byol song gi skye gnas
253b8('bum): sam/ ga shin rje'i 'jig rtend yin te/ de ltar khyed kyis shes rab 'chal pa'i sems 'ag tsam gi go skabs kyang myi dbye'o// phyis 'gyod pa can du gyur te ro zhes chos ston do pa/ 'dod chags kyi spyod pa cam
254a1('bum): gang ji snyed pa de dag ni myi sdug pa la sbyor ro// zhe sdang gi spyod pa can gang ji snyed pa de dag ni byams pa la sbyor ro// gti mug gi spyod gang ji snyed pa de dag rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la sbyor ro// 
254a2('bum): ngan par zhugs pa gang ji snyed pa de dag ni yang dag pa'i lam la sbyor te/ nyan thos kyi lam 'am ni rang sangs rgyas kyi lam 'am/ sangs rgyas kyi lam la sbyor zhing de dag la 'di skad du chos stond te/ khyed chos gang
254a3('bum): la mngon par zhen par gyur pa'i chos de dag ni ngo bo nyid kyis stong ste/ ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i chos rnams ni mngon par myi nus te/ stong pa nyid mngon par zhen pa myed do zhes chos stond te/ rab 'byor de de ltar na byang
254a4('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ mngon par shes pa rnams la gnas shing sems can rnams kyi don byed do// rab 'byor nga byang chub sems dpa'
254a5('bum): sems dpa' chen pos ni mngon par shes pa rnams la ma ga nA par sems can rnams la chos stond par myi nus te/ lam 'gol/ par zhugs pa'i sems can rnams kyang lam du gzud par
254a6('bum): myi nu se ma na/ rab 'byor du 'di lta ste dper ma/ bya 'dab ma myed pas ni nam mkha' la 'gro bar myi nus so// rab 'byor de thozhin du byang chubasems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos kyang mngon par shes pa
254a7('bum): rnams la marten par sems can rnams la chos stonang par myi nus so// rab 'byor de de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rolal tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ mngon par shes pa rnam
254a8('bum): mngon par sgrub par bya ste/ de mngon par shes pa mngon par bsgrubs pa de dag gis sems can rnams kyi don ji bya bar dga' ba bde bar byed do// de nas lha'i myig gis shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i grung
254b1('bum): gi bye ma stong mthong ste/ de dag tu sems can gang ji snyed cigri skyes pa de dag kyang mthong ngo // de ltar mthong nas kyang rdzu 'phrul gis de dag du song zhing sems can de dag gi sems sems kyis khong du chud par byas na/ 
254b2('bum): de dang mthun par sbyin pa'i gtam 'am/ tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / byasam gtan dang / shes rab kyi gtam 'am/ 'phags pa'i bden pa'i gtam 'am/ 'byung po'i gtam gi bar du chos san/ 
254b3('bum): de lha'i myig gis lo dring nub dang / byang dang / byang shang dang / shang sgo dang / ljo nub dang / rlung byung dang / 'og dang steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gi khams gang ga'i thu ga bya sa mamadzim/ de dag tu sems ca
254b4('bum): ga skyes pa de dag kyang mthong ngo // de ltar mthong nas kyang thungan dul kyis de dag tu song zhing na sems can de dag gi sems can sems kyis khong du chud par byas nas de dang mthun par sbyin pa'i gtam
254b5('bum): 'am/ tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang bsam gtan dang / shes rab kyi gtam 'am/ 'phags pa'i bden pa'i gtam 'am/ 'byung ba'i gtam gi bar du chos ston to// 
254b6('bum): des lha'i khams kyis 'di lta ste/ lha dang myi gnyis ka'i sgra yang thos te/ shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gi'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed po'i chos sond pa de dag
254b7('bum): gi chos lha'i rnabs mnyan te/ thos nas kyang de bzhin nyid du 'dzin to// de bzhin nyid du bzung nas de bzhin du sems can rnams la chos stonang to// sbyin pa'i gtam 'am/ tshul dang / bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus
254b8('bum): dang bsam gtan dang / shes rab kyi gtam 'am/ 'phags pa'i bden pa'i gtam 'am/ 'byung ba'i gtam gang bar gi chos ston to// de lho dang / nub dang / byang dang / byang shar dang / shar lho dang / lho nub dang / nung
257a1('bum): byang dang / 'og dang steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed cig chos stonang ngo // sbyin pa'i gtam 'am/ tshul khrims dang / 
257a2('bum): bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / bsam gtan dang / shes rab kyi gtam 'am/ 'phags pa'i bden pa'i gtam 'am/ 'byung ba'i gtam gi bar du chos stond to// de sems kyi rnam grangs shes pa shin tu rna bar
257a3('bum): dag pa dang ldan pa yin te/ de sems kyi rnam grangs shes pa des sems can rnams kyi sems shes par byas shing de dag la de bzhidi nyid du chos stonang to// sbyin pa'i gtam 'am/ tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / brjod
257a4('bum): 'grus dang / bsam gtam dang / shes rab kyi gtam 'a 'phags pa'i bden pa'i gtam 'am/ 'byung ba'i gtam gyi bar du chos stond to// de dag gam gzhan gi gnas rnam pa du mar rjes su dran te/ 
257a5('bum): sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mtshan de dag zhes bya ba nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas par 'byung ngo zhes bya bar yang shes te/ sems
257a6('bum): can sngon gi gnas rjes su dran pa la mos pa gang bsnyed pa de dag la yang dag pa nyid du chos stond to// sbyin pa'i gtam 'am/ tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / bsam gtan dang / shes rab
257a7('bum): kyi gtam 'am 'phags pa'i bden pa'i gtam dang 'byung ba'i gtam gi bar du chos stond to// de rdzu 'phrul gyi phyogs bcu'i 'jig rte nang gi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag du song zhing / sangs rgyas bcom
257a8('bum): ldan 'das rnams la bsnyen bkur byed de/ bsnyen bkur byas nas mngon par shes pa'i ye shes kyis sems can rnams la chos stonang to// sbyin pa'i gtam 'am/ tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / brtson
257b1('bum): 'grus dang / bsam gtan dang / shes rab kyi gtam 'am/ 'phags pa'i bden pa'i gtam 'am/ 'byung ba'i gtam gi bar du chos stond to// de zag pa myed pa mngon par byas pa'i shes pa shin tu rnam par dag/ 
257b2('bum): pa yin te/ de zag pa myed pa mngon par bya ba'i shes pa shin tu reg pa des sems can rnams la chos stond te/ sbyin pa'i gtam 'am/ tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / bsam gtan dang / 
257b3('bum): shes rab kyi gtam 'am/ 'phags pa'i bden pa'i gtam 'am/ 'byung ba'i gtam gi bar du chos stond to// rab 'byor de de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa
257b4('bum): la spyod pa'i tshe/ mngon par shes pa rnams mngon par bsgrub par bya ste/ de mngon par shes pa shin tu 'dris pa 'di dag gi/ lus ci dang ci lta bu yongs su bzung zhing mos pa ji bzhin du sems
257b5('bum): can rnams kyi don byed de/ bde ba'am/ sdug bsngal ba de dag gis gos par myi 'gyur ro// rab 'byor de 'di lta ste dpe ra na/ de bzhin gshegs pas sprul pa'i skyes bu ni dgos pa thos
257b6('bum): cad byed kyang bde ba 'am/ sdug bsngal ba ngas gos par 'gyur ba myed do// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la gnas shing / mngon par shes
257b7('bum): pas rnam par rtse zhing / phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag tu mos pa ji lta ba bzhin du chos stond kyang / bde ba 'am sdug bsngal ba des 'phrogs par myi 'gyur ro// rab 'byor
257b8('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ de ltar mngon par shes pas rnam par brtse bar byas te/ ji nas kyang sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par 'gyur ba dang / 
258a1('bum): sems can yongs su smin par 'gyur ba de ltar brtse bar bya ste/ rab 'byor nga byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ni sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par ma byas/ sems can yongs su
258a2('bum): sbyin par ma byas par/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar myi nus so// rab 'byor da de ci'i phyir zhe na/ lam gi yan lag dang myi ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa'
258a3('bum): dpa' chen po bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub myed do// rab 'byor da kyis gsol da pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lam gyi yan lag yongs su rdzogs par bgyis/ 
258a4('bum): shing bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba'i lam de gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de dge ba'i chos thos
258a5('bum): cad ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lam gyi yan la ga go// gsol pa bcom ldan 'das lam gyi yan lag gang / gis bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mdzes
258a6('bum): par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba'i lam gyi yan lag de dag gi chos de dag gang lags// shes rab bam po / bcom ldan 'das
258a7('bum): kyis bka' stsal pa/ sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/ dge ba'i chos sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod kyang / de la myi rtag cing de yongs su gtong ba'i tshe ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir 'di ni sbyin te/ 
258a8('bum): 'di la yongs su gtang bar bya'o// bdag gis sbyin par bya'o// zhes gsum po de dag li myi rtog pa ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa gang gis 'khor ba las sgrol zhing / gzhan yang sgrol ba 'di ni lam gi yan lag
258b1('bum): dge ba'i chos so// sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste dge ba'i chos tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang / bsam rten
258b2('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod kyang / da la myi rtog cing shes rab bsgom pa'i tshe/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi tshe phyir 'di ni shes rab po// bdag gis shes rab bsgom mo// 'di'i don
258b3('bum): tu shes rab bsgom mo zhes gsum po de dag la myi rtag pa ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang gis bdag kyang 'khor ba las sgrol zhing gzhan yang sgrol ba 'di ni lam gyi yan lag dge ba'i chos so// sems dang po
258b4('bum): bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dge ba'i chos stong pa nyid thams cad dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos na/ sa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / bsam gtan pa'i
258b5('bum): dang tshad myed pa bzhi dang / gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi// / dang / rnam par tha rad pa brgyad dang / mtha rad kyis gnas pa'i snyom sa par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid
258b6('bum): dang mtshan ma myed pa dang smyon pa myed pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams dang ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzugs kyi sgo rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / myi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par
258b7('bum): rig pa bzhi dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad la spyod kyang / de la myi rtag pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad bsgom pa'i tshe/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir 'di dag ni sangs
258b8('bum): rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams so// bdag gis sangs rgyas kyi sa ma 'dres pa rnams bsgom par bya'o// 'di'i don tu sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams sgom mo zhes gsum po de dag la myi rtag pa ste/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma/ 
258b9('bum): 'dres pa gang gis bdag kyang 'khor ba las sgrol zhing gzhan yang sgrol ba 'di ni lam gi yan lag dge ba'i chos so// rab 'byor de dge ba'i chos de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams sems can tshad myed pa de
259a1('bum): bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi lam ste/ lam des 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar gyi byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams sems can tshad myed pa de 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho las
259a2('bum): rgal bar gyur pa dang / rgal ba dang rgal bar 'gyur ba dang / la me de yongs su rdzogs par byas shing / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do// rnam pa thams cad sa khyed
259a3('bum): pa nyid thob par byas nas chos kyi 'khor lo skor ro// chos kyi 'khor lo skor te sems can rnams kyi don byed do// // shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa stong phrag nyi shu lnga pa las le'u drug bcu bdun pa'o// 
259a4('bum): de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor kyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gal te chos de dag byang chub sems dpa'i chos lags na/ sangs rgyas
259a5('bum): kyi chos gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' du lad pa/ rab 'byor gang 'di skad du gal te chos de dag byang chub sa// mas dpa'i chos yin na/ sangs rgyas kyi chos gang yin zhes zer zin
259a6('bum): rab 'byor nga sangs rgyas kyi chos de dag nyid du rnam pa thams cad du mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar yang ma zang de// de rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob nas bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba thams cad spong
259a7('bum): de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs ni chos thams cad skad cig gcig dang ldan pa'i shes
259a8('bum): rab kyis mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa zhes bya ba'i grangs su 'gro ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dang / de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa
259b1('bum): sangs rgyas la khyad par de yod do// rab 'byor de 'di lta ste dper na/ zhugs pa yang gzhan la/ 'bras bu la gnas pa yang gzhan ste/ de gnyis ka yang 'phags pa'i gang zag ma yin zhes myi bya'o// rab 'byor/ 
259b2('bum): de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni bar chad myed pa'i lam du zhugs pa yin/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas na chos thams cad la sgrib pa myed pa'i ye
259b3('bum): shes brnyes pa ste/ rab 'byor de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dang / de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi khyad par ro// rab 'byor kyis gsol dang
259b4('bum): bcom ldan 'das gal te chos thams cad rang gi mtshan nyid kyis skyong pa lags ma/ rang gi mtshan nyid kyis skyong pa'i chos de dag da la 'don sems can dmyal ba'o// 'di ni byol song gi skye gnas pam/ 
259b5('bum): 'di ni gshin rdzo'i 'jig rten pa'o// 'di ni lnga'o/ 'dzin myi'o// 'di ni rigs kyis 'o// 'di ni brgyad pa'o/ 'di ni rgyum dulu pa'o// 'di ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba'o// 'di ni phyir myi 'ong ba'o// 'di
259b6('bum): ni dgra bcom pa'o// 'di ni rang sangs rgyas so// 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'o// 'di ni de bzhin gdags pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas so zhes bgyi bar khyad par dang rnam par dper
259b7('bum): bar ji ltar 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar gang zag de dag dmyigs su ma mchis pa de bzhin du las kyang dmyigs su ma mchis/ las ji ltar dmyigs su ma mchis pa de bzhin du las kyi rnam par smyin pa yang ma
259b8('bum): mchis so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// rab 'byor nga de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ ji skad smras pa de bzhin te/ chos thams cad rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong pa la las dang las kyi rnam par smin pa
260a1('bum): myi dmyigs so// rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong pa'i chos thams cad de ltar ma shes pa de dag ni ngan par spyod pa 'am/ legs par spyod pa 'am/ myi g.yo ba'i lam mngon par 'du byed de/ de dag ngan
260a2('bum): par spyod pa'i las kyis ngan song gsum du ltung ngo // legs par spyod pa'i las kyis lha dang myir skye'o// nyams pa myed pa'i las kyis gzugs kyi khams sam/ gzugs myed pa'i khams su skye'o// de la byang
260a3('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa la spyad/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang / bas
260a4('bum): gtan gyi pha rold tu phyind pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyad/ nang stong pa nyid la spyad/ dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid s+ho/ dang pa nyid kyi bar la spyad/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnaMs la
260a5('bum): spyad/ yang dag par spong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gi rkang pa rnaMs dang / dbang po rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag
260a6('bum): brgyad pa la spyad/ 'phags pa'i bden pa dang / bsam gtan dang / tshad myed pa dang / gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / rnam par tha rad pa dang / mtha rad kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / 
260a7('bum): rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang smon pa myed pa dang / mngon par shes pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams la spyad/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / myi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / 
260a8('bum): so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad la spyad te/ nyams pa myed pa'i spyod pas byang chub kyi lam bskyed nas// rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin byang chub kyi yan lan
260b1('bum): gi 'khor dang ldan pa la mnyam par gzhag cing / bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ste/ mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ sems can rnams kyi don
260b2('bum): byed de/ don byas nas ci nas kyang phyir chud zos shing rgyud lnga'i 'khor bar ltung ba de ltar don byed do// gsol pa bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
260b3('bum): tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ rgyud lnga'i 'khor ba gzigs sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor dam yin no// gsol pa bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ de mni nags
260b4('bum): pas chos nag po 'am/ dkar por gdags pa 'am/ dkar ba 'am myi gnag myi dkar ba myi dmyigs sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka/ ga' stsal dpa/ ma yin no// gsol pa bcom ldan 'ang
260b5('bum): de ste ma dmyigs na/ sems can dmyal ba 'am/ byol so 'i skye gnas sam/ gang nan rje'i 'jig rten du ji ltar gdags pa mdzadalha dang phyir ji ltar gdags pa mdzad/ rgyun tu zhus
260b6('bum): pa dpal na cig phyir 'ong ba dang / phyir myi 'ong ba dang / dgra bcom pa dang / rang sangs rgyas su ji ltar gdags pa mdzad/ byang chub sems dpa' dang / de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogasa'i
260b7('bum): sangs rgyas ji ltar gdags pa mdzad/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor ci sems can 'di dag chos rnams rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong par shes sam/ gsol dpa/ ma la gso/ bcom ldan
260b8('bum): 'das kyis bka' stsal da pa/ rab 'byor da gal te sems can de dag 'di ltar chos rnams rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong ngo zhes bya bar shes na ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang bla na myed pa yang dag pa
261a1('bum): rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu myi 'jug ste/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu ma zhugs na/ sems can rnams kyang ngan song gsum dang 'khor ba'i rgyun rnams las myi grol ste/ rab 'byor/ 
261a2('bum): sems can de dag chos rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong par myi shes la/ myi shes pas rgyud lnga'i 'khor ba las yongs su myi grol bas de'i phyir byang chub tu sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'dra
261a3('bum): de dag la chos thams cad rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong par mthong nas sems can rnams kyi don tu bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu 'jug ste/ chos 'di dag ni ji ltar byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams kyis
261a4('bum): mdza na par chags par myi bya ba de ltar yod pa yin na/ de dag ni mye cing yang dag par ma yin pa'i chos rnams yod par brtags shing sems myed pa la sems can du 'du shes/ gzugs myed
261a5('bum): pa la gzugs su 'du shes/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa myed pa la rnam par shes par 'du shes paskye mched rnams myed pa la skye mched du 'du shes/ khams
261a6('bum): rnams myed pa la khams su 'du shes/ rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba la rten cing 'brel bar 'du shes/ 'jig rten gyi chos myed pa la 'jig rten gyi chos su 'du shes/ 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos myed pa la 'jig
261a7('bum): rten las 'das pa'i chos su 'du shes/ zag pa dang bcas po'i chos myed pa la zag pa dang bcas pa'i chos su 'du shes zag pa myed pa'i chos myed pa la zag pa myed pa'i chos su 'du shes/ 'dus byas kyi chos myed/ 
261a8('bum): pa la 'dus byas su 'du shes/ 'dus ma byas kyi chos myed pa la 'dus ma byas kyi chos su 'dushes nas/ yod pa ma yin pa'i phyir gyi log gis phyin ci log tu gyur pa'i sems dang ldan pa rnams lus dang ngag dang ying
261b1('bum): kyi las mngon par 'du shes pa de dag rgyud lnga'i 'khor ba las yongs su myi grol ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind par dge ba'i chos thams cad 'dus par byas te/ 
261b2('bum): byang chub sems dpa' spyad pa spyod cing bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ rgyud lnga'i 'khor ba las sems can rnams
261b3('bum): yongs su 'grel to// rab 'byor kyis gsolang pa/ gal te chos thams cad rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong pa lags na/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
261b4('bum): byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs pa sangs rgyas te/ rgyud lnga'i 'khor ba las sems can rnams yongs su 'grel pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal da pa/ rab 'byor nga 'di la byang chub
261b5('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzog pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/ sdug sngal dang / sdug bsngal kun 'byung ba dang / sdug bsngal 'go/ 
261b6('bum): so 'gro ba'i lam sems can rnams la chos ston to// mchod do// 'gog go// 'gad do/ 'grel ton/ rnam par 'grel to/ gsal bar byed do// yong dag par brjod do// 'phags pa'i bden pa pon po 'dir dge
261b7('bum): ba'i chos thams cad byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos ji snyed pa gang gis rkon mchog gsum rnam par dgod pa de dag thams cad yongs su 'dus pa/ sangs rgyas dkon mchog dang / chos dkon mchog dang / dge 'am
261b8('bum): dkon mchog 'jig rten du 'byung bas sems can rnams lam rgyud lnga'i 'khor bas yongs su 'grel to// rab 'byor kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das sdug bsngal 'tshal bas yongs mya ngan las 'das
262a1('bum): par 'gyur ram/ 'on te sdug bsngal gyi mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur/ kun 'byung ba 'tshal bas yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ram/ 'on te kun 'byung bas yongs su mya ngan las 'dang
262a2('bum): sdug bsngal 'gog par 'tshal bas yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur// 'on te sdug bsngal 'gog pas mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur/ lam 'tshal bas yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur/ 
262a3('bum): 'on te lam gyis mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor sdug bsngal shes pas yongs su mya ngan las myi 'da' ste/ sdug bsngal gyis kyang ma yin no// kun 'gyu
262a4('bum): shes pas yongs su mya ngan las myi 'da' ste/ kun 'byung gis kyang ma yin no// sdug bsngal 'gog par shes pas yongs su mya ngan las myi 'da' ste/ sdug bsngal 'gog pas ma yin
262a5('bum): lom shes pas yongs su mya ngan las myi 'da' ste/ lam gyi kyang ma yin no// rab 'byor de 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi po de dag mnyam pa nyid gang yin pa de ni mya ngan las 'da' bar ngas gsu
262a6('bum): ngas so// sdug bsngal shes pas yongs su mya ngan las myi 'da' ste/ lam gyis kyang ma yin no// kun 'byung ba deshes pas yongs su mya ngan las myi 'da' ba ma yin/ kun 'byung bas kyang ma yin no// sdug sngal
262a7('bum): 'gog pa shes pas yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba ma yin/ sdug bsngal 'gog pa shes pas yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba ma yin no// gsol pa bcom ldan 'das gang la sdug bsngal kyang ma mchis/ sdug bsngal
262a8('bum): 'tshal ba yang ma mchis// kun 'byung ba yang ma mchis/ kun 'byung ba 'tshal ba yang ma mchis/ 'gog pa yang ma mchis/ 'gog pa 'tshal ba yang ma mchis/ lam yang ma mchis/ lam 'tshal ba yang ma mchis// 
262b1('bum): pa'i 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi mnyam pa nyid ces bgyi ba de gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de ni 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi po de dag gi de bzhin nyid dang / ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan
262b2('bum): ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang // chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings nyid dang / chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos skyon myed pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' de bzhin gshegs pa rnams byung yang rung de bzhin gshegs pa rnams
262b3('bum): ma byung yang rung ste/ de bzhin gnas pa'i dbyangs dang / chos kyi dbyings myi mnyam myi 'grib par 'dug pa ste/ de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ bden
262b4('bum): pa khong du chud pa ji ltar bya ba bzhin du bden pa khong du chung bar bya ba'i don du spyod do// rab 'byor kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu
262b5('bum): phyinang pa la ji ltar spyon ma/ bden pa rtogs pa'i don du spyod pa lags/ ji ltar bden pa rtogs shing 'chal te khong du chud pas/ nyan mthos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyisar myi ltung zhing / byang chub
262b6('bum): sems dpa'i skyon ma mchis par 'jug pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// rab 'byor da 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i chos de dag ji
262b7('bum): nas kyang chos gang yang dmyigs su myed pa de ltar mthong ste/ chos thams cad ma dmyigs pas bden par rtogs pa 'am/ bden par ma rtogs pa'i chos thams cad stong ste/ des de ltar mthong bas skyon myed par chud pa'i
262b8('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rigs kyi sa la gnas par 'gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa' de rigs kyi sa la gnas par gyur nas/ spyi bor ltung bar myi 'gyur te/ de la nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rab sangs
263a1('bum): rgyas kyi sar ltung ba'i spyi bor lhung bar myed do// byang chub sems dpa' de'i rigs kyi sa la gnas shing bsam gtan bzhi sgrub bo// tshad myed po bzhi dang / gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi bsgrub bo// 
263a2('bum): de lhag mthong gis de la gnas shing chos thams cad rab tu shes par byed de/ 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi khong du chud par byed do// de sdug bsngal yongs su shes kyang sdug bsngal la myi dmyigs pa'i sems myi skyed do// kun 'byung
263a3('bum): la rab tu spangs kyang kun 'byung la dmyigs pa'i sems myi skyed do// 'gog pa mngon du byed kyang 'gog pa'i sems myi skyed do// lam sgom yang lam la dmyigs pa'i sems myi skyed do// gzhan du na byang chub la gnog pa'i
263a4('bum): sems kyis chos thams cad yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du mthong bar byed do// gsol pa bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad kyi yang dag pa/ ji lta ba bzhin du zhes bgyi ba gang lags// bcom ldan 'das
263a5('bum): kyis bka' stsal pa/ stong pa nyid du gsol pa stong pa nyid gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid de/ rnam pa de lta bu'i lhag mthong gis chos thams cad
263a6('bum): stong ngo zhes bya bar lta ste/ ngo bo nyid gang la gnas shing byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bya ba de lta bu'i ngo bo nyid chos gang la yang ngo bo nyid yod par myi mthong ngo // dngos po myed pa ni byang chub ste/ de ni sangs rgyas
263a7('bum): kyis ma mdzadan rang sangs rgyas kyis ma mdzad/ dgra bcom pa dang / phyir myi 'ong ba dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang / rgyun tu zhugs pa 'am byas/ de dag la zhugs pas kyang ma byas/ gang byang chub 'di la spyod pa'i byang chub
263a8('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag gis kyang ma byas te/ gzhan du na yang dag par ji lta ba de sems can rnams kyis myi shes myi mthong bas/ de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol
263b1('bum): tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mkhas pas sems can rnams la chos stond to// / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa stong phrag nyi shu lnga pa las le'u drug bcu rtsa brgyad pa'o// 
263b2('bum): de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor kyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gal te chos thams cad ni dngos po ma mchis te/ de dag sangs rgyas kyis kyang ma mdzad rang sangs
263b3('bum): dang dgra bcom pa dang / phyir myi 'ong ba dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang / rgyun tu zhugs pas kyang ma bgyis/ de dag kyang rgyun tu zhugs pas kyang ma bgyis/ gang byang chub 'di la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpas
263b4('bum): chen po de dag gis kyang ma bgyis na/ chos de dag la 'di ni sems can dmyal ba'o// 'di dag ni byol/ song gi skye gnas so// 'di dag ni gshin rje'i 'jig rten pa'o// 'di dag ni lha'o// 'di dag ni myi'o// las 'di
263b5('bum): ni sems can dmyal ba dang / byol song gi skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten par 'gyur ro// las 'dis na myir 'gyur ro// / las 'dis ni rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lhar 'gyur ro// las 'dis
263b6('bum): ni sum bcu rtsa gsum dang / mtsha ma dang / dga' ldan dang / 'phrul dga' dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed dang / tshangs ris dang / tshangs lha nye phan nga tshangs pa kun 'khor dang / tshangs chen dang / snang ba dang / chung snang dang / 
263b7('bum): tshad myed sdang ba dang / kun snang dang ba dang / dge ba dang / chung dge dang / tshad myed dag ba dang / dge ba rgyas dang / che ba dang / chung che dang / tshad myed che dang / 'gras bu che ba dang / myi che ba dang / myi gdung ba dang / shin tu mthong
263b8('bum): ba dang / gyo nam snang ba dang / 'og myin gi lhar 'gyur ro// las 'dis ni nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched dang / rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched dang / cung zad myed pa'i skye mched dang / 'du shes myed 'du shes myed myi
264a1('bum): skye mched kyi lhar 'gyur ro// las 'ongs ni rgyu nang tu zhugs pa dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang / phyir myi 'ong ba dang / dgra bcom pa dang / rang sangs rgyas su 'gyur ro// las 'dis ni byang chub sems dpa
264a2('bum): dpa' chen por 'gyur ro// las 'dis mi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su 'gyur ro zhes bgyi bar tha dad par dpe' 'am/ rnam par dgod par yang ji ltar 'gyur/ bcom ldan
264a3('bum): 'das dngos po ma mchis pa la ni bgyid pa gang yang ma mchis te/ bgyi ba gang gis sems can dmyal bar mchi ba 'am/ byol song gi skye gnas su mchi ba 'am/ ga shin rje'i 'jig rten du mchi ba 'am/ myir skye ba
264a4('bum): rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lhar skye ba 'am/ sum bcu rtsa gsum gyi lhar skye ba 'am/ mtsho ma dang / dga' ldan dang / 'phrul dga' dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed dang / tshangs ris dang / tshangs lha nye phan dang / 
264a5('bum): tshangs pa kun 'khor dang / tshangs chen dang / snang ba dang / chung snang dang / kun snang dang ba dang / dge ba dang / chung che dang / tshad myed// dge ba dang / dge rgyas dang / che ba dang / chung che dang / tshad myed
264a6('bum): che ba dang / 'bras bu che ba dang / myi che ba dang / myi gdung ba dang / shin tu mthong ba dang / gya nom snang ba dang / 'ogro myin gyi lhar skye ba 'am nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched dang / rnam denas mtha' yas skye mched dang
264a7('bum): cung zad myed pa'i skye mched dang / 'du shes myed 'du shes myed myin skye mched kyi lhar skye ba 'am/ rgyu ma du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob par 'gyur ba 'am/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par dang / phyir myi 'ong ba
264a8('bum): dang / dgra bcom pa dang / rang byang chub thob par 'gyur ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lam la sbyor bar 'gyur ba 'am/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid thob par 'gyur ba 'am/ thob par
264b1('bum): gyur nas sems can rnams 'khor ba las yongs su 'grol bar 'gyur ro zhes bgyi ba de lta bu gang yang ma mchis so// de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor de la 'di skad
264b2('bum): ces bka' stsal to// rab 'byor de de de bzhin te/ de de bzhin te/ ji skad smras pa de de bzhin te/ rab 'byor de dngos po myed pa la ni las kyang myed/ bya ba yang myed/ 'bras bu yang myed/ 'on kyang byis pa so so'i skye
264b3('bum): bo 'phags pa'i chos la myi mkhas pa rnams kyis/ chos rnams dngos po myed po'i ngo bo nyid du myi shes te/ phyin ci log las byung ba'i sems kyis las sna tshogs mngon par 'du byed pas/ de dag gi lus rnam pa
264b4('bum): de lta bu de bzhin du sbyar mngon par bsgrub ste/ sems can dmyal ba 'am/ byol song gi skye gnas sam/ gshin rje'i 'jig rtenanam/ myi 'am rgyal rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha 'am/ su
264b5('bum): bcu rtsa gsum 'am/ mtshe ma 'am/ dga' ldan na mdo'aphrul dga' 'am/ gzhan 'phrul dbang byed dang / tshangs ris dang tshangs lha nye phan dang / tshangs pa kun 'khor dang / tshangs chen
264b6('bum): rang snang ba dang / chung sdang dang / tshad myed sdang ba dang / kun snang dang ba dang / dge ba dang chung dag dang / chang myed dge ba dang / dger rgyas dang / che ba dang / chung che dang / tshad myed che ba dang / 'bras bu che ba dang
264b7('bum): myi che dang / myi gdung ba dang / shin tu mthong ba dang / gya nom snang ba dang / 'og myin gyi lha dang / nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched dang / rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched dang / cung zad myed pa'i skye mched dang
264b8('bum): 'du shes myed 'du shes myed myin skye mched kyi lha'i nang du lung mngon par bsgrub ste/ bya ba gang gis bya ba la mi bya ba 'am/ 'bras bu myed de/ dngos po myed pa gang yin pa de ni dngos po myed pa'o// rab 'byor de de
265a1('bum): la 'di skad du dngos po myed pa la ni bya ba gang yang myed de/ bya ba gang gis sems can dmyal ba dang / byol song gi skye gnas su 'gro ba 'am/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten du 'gro ba 'am
265a2('bum): skye ba 'am/ rgyal chen po'i'i ris kyi lhar skye ba 'am/ sum bcu rtsa gsum dang / mtshe ma dang / dga' ldan dang / 'phrul dga' dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed dang / tshangs ris dang / tshangs lha nya pan dang
265a3('bum): tshangs pa kun 'khor dang / tshangs chen dang / snang ba dang / chung snang dang / tshad myed snang ba dang / kun snang dang ba dang / dge ba dang / chung dge dngang / dge rgyas dang / che ba dang / chung che dang / tshad myed che ba dang / 'bras bu
265a4('bum): che ba dang / myi che ba dang / myi gdung ba dang / shin tu mthong ba dang / gya nom snang ba dang / 'og myin gi lhar skye ba 'am/ nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched dang / rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched dang / cung
265a5('bum): zad myed pa'i skye mched dang / 'du shes myed 'du shes myed myin/ skye mched kyi lhar skye ba 'am/ rgyu nang tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob par 'gyur ba 'am/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'am
265a6('bum): phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'am/ dgra bcom pa nyid dang / rang byang chub thob par 'gyur ba 'am/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lam la spyod pa 'am/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid/ 
265a7('bum): thob par 'gyur ba 'am/ de thos nas sems can rnams 'khor ba las yongs su grol bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i bya ba gang yang myed do zhes zer ba ni/ rab 'byor nga ji skad du sems/ lam dngos po myed pa ma yin
265a8('bum): na ni/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dngos po myed pa ma yin nam/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'am/ phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid dang / rang byang chub dngos po myed pa ma yin nam/ 
265b1('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du dngos po myed pa yin nam/ gsol pa bcom ldan 'das lam ni dngos po ma mchis pa'o// rgyu nang tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dngos po ma mchis pa'o// lam
265b2('bum): cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid dang / rang byang chub ni dngos po ma mchis pa'o// rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi bar ni dngos po ma mchis pa'o// 
265b3('bum): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ dngos po myed pa'i chos shig/ dngos po myed pa'i chos thob par byed snyam 'am/ gsol pa bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lag so// bcom
265b4('bum): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ltar dngo// po myeng ba gang yin pa dang / lam gang yin pa'i chos de gnyis ka yang ldan pa yang ma yin/ myi ldan pa yang ma yin/ gzug
265b5('bum): myed pa bstand tu myed pa thogs pa myed pa mtshan nyid gci pa ste/ 'di ltar mtshan nyid myed pa'o// rab 'byor de de la byang chubasems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu
265b6('bum): phyi nang pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mkhas pas sems can phyin ci log ba nis phung po lnga la mngon par zhen pa/ myi rtag pa la rtag pa'i 'du shes su gyur pa/ sdug bsngal la bde ba'i 'dushes su gyur pa
265b7('bum): bdag myed pa la bdag gi 'du shes su gyur pa/ myi sdug pa la sdug pa'i 'du shes su gyur pa/ dngos po myed pa la mngon par zhen pa rnams dngos pa las rnam par 'grel ton/ rab 'byor kyis gas langs
265b8('bum): bcom ldan 'das ci lags byis pa sa sor skye bo rnams gang la mngon par zhen nas/ mngon par zhen par gyur pa de lta bu'i dngos po de bzhin ma nor ba de bzhin nyid ces bgyi ba ma mchis sam/ de snya ma mchis smin
267a1('bum): mngon par 'du bgyi bar yang ji ltar 'gyur/ sug las des kyang shul rgyud lnga'i 'khor ba nas ji ste myi grol// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor da phyin ci log ma rtog
267a2('bum): gang la gnas te/ byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams las mngon par 'du byed pa'i dngos po ni chung ngu na spro'i skye mo'i cha shas bshags pa tsam yang myed do// rab 'byor de de bas mji nas kyang don 'di gsal cing rdzogs
267a3('bum): pa dang / mkhas pas shes par bya ba'i phyir khyod la dpe' bshad do// rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ rmyi lam du mthong ba la rmyi lam mthong ba de gang la gnas shing / 'dod pa'i yon tan lngas yongs su spyod
267a4('bum): pa de lta bu'i dngos po gang yang yod dam/ gsol dpa bcom ldan 'das mi lam nyid kyang ma mchis na/ rmyi lam mthong na ba de la ga denas shing / 'dod pa'i yon tan lngas yongs su spyod kyang lta ci
267a5('bum): smos te/ bci 'tshal te ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das/ kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de de ji snyam du sems/ 'dzinarten pa 'am/ 'jig rten las 'das pa 'am/ zag pa dang
267a6('bum): bcas pa'am/ zag pa myed pa 'am/ 'dus byas sam/ 'dus ma byas kyi chos gang la dmyigs su pa dang 'dra ba de lta bu yod dam/ gsol pa bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten pa 'am/ 'jig rten las
267a7('bum): 'das pa'am/ zag pa dang bcas pa'am/ zag pa myed pa ma mchis pa'am/ 'dus byas 'am/ 'dus ma byas kyi chos gang la yang rmi lam lta bu ma lags pa de lta bu ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das kyi
267a8('bum): bka' stsal pa/ ji rmi lam lam la rgyud lnga'i 'khor ba yod dam/ gsol pa bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor da de ji snyam du sems rmi lam 'am
267b1('bum): bsgoms pas kun nas nyon mongs par myi 'gyur la/ rnam par byang ba yang myi 'gyur ba de lta bu'i lam bsgom pa yod dam/ gsol pa bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das de ni dngos po ma
267b2('bum): mchis pa ste/ brjod pa dang / tshig dang / sgra dang / yi ge thams kyis gdags pa ma mchis pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de de ji snyam du sems/ me long la gzugs brnyan sngang
267b3('bum): ba de la gang las mngon par 'du byed cing / mngon par 'du byas pas sems can dmyal bar 'gro ba 'am/ byol song gi skye gnas su 'gro ba 'am// gshin rje'i 'jig rten du 'gro ba 'am/ myi dang lhar 'gro
267b4('bum): ba de lta bu'i dngos po yod dam/ gsol pa bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das de ni gzhan du na byis pa rnams slu ba ma rtogs par dngos po ma mchis ste/ gzugs rnam
267b5('bum): nyid kyang ma mchis na gang mngon par 'du bgyid cing mngonapar 'du bgyis pas sems can dmyal bar mchi ba 'am/ byol/ sod kyi skye gnas su mchi ba 'am/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten
267b6('bum): du mchi ba 'am myi dang ltar skye 'gyur ba'i lus las lta smos kyang rtsi 'tshal te ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// rab 'byor de de ji ska du sems/ de la lam bsgoms pas kun
267b7('bum): nas nyon mongs par yang myi 'gyur la/ rnam par byang bar yang myi 'gyur ba de lta bu'i lam bsgom pa yod dam/ gsol pa bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das gzugs brnyan
267b8('bum): nyid kyang ma mchis ma/ lam bsgoms pas kun nas nyon mongs par yang myi 'gyur la/ rnam par byang bar yang myi 'gyur ba de lta bu'i lam bsgom pa lta smos kyang ci 'tshal te ma mchiso// bcom ldan 'das
268a1('bum): kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor da de ji snyam du sems nags stug po 'am/ ri dang tsong rong dang / lung pa nas sgra brnyad byung na/ sgra brnyan de la mngon par 'du byed cing / mngon par 'du byas
268a2('bum): pas sems can dmyal bar 'gro ba 'am/ byol song gi skye gnas su 'gro ba 'am/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten tu 'gro ba 'am/ lha dang myir 'gyur ba 'am/ de lta bu'i dngos po yod dam/ gsol pa bcom
268a3('bum): ldan 'das de ni ma la gson/ bcom ldan 'das kyis ba kyang su bang ba/ sgra brnyan de dag nyid kyang dngos po ma mchis na/ sug las gang mngon par 'du bgyid cing / mngon par 'du bgyis kyang sems cas
268a4('bum): dmyal bar mchi ba 'am/ byol song gi skye gnas su michi ba 'am/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten du mchi ba 'am/ lha dang mying/ skye ba 'am nga rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lhar skye ba 'am/ sum
268a5('bum): bcu rtsa gsum dang / mtshe ma dang / dga' ldan dang / 'phrul dga' dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed dang / tshangs ris dang / tshangs lha nye phan dang / tshangs pa kun 'khor dang / tshangs chen dang / snang ba dang / 
268a6('bum): chung dang / tshad myed snang ba dang / kun snang dang ba dang / dge ba dang / chung dge dang / tshad myed dge ba dang / dge rgyas dang / che ba dang / chung che dang / tshad myed che ba dang / 'bras bu che ba dang / myi che ba dang / myi gdung
268a7('bum): ba dang / shin tu mthong ba dang / gya nom snang ba dang / 'og myin gyi lhar skye ba 'amanam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched dang / rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched dang / cung zad myed pa'i skye mched dang / 'du shes
268a8('bum): myed 'du shes myed myin skye mched kyi ltar skye bar lta smos kyang ci 'tshal te ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor da de ji snyam du sems/ sgra brnyan gi lam gang bsgoms pa
268b1('bum): kun nas nyon mongs par myi 'gyur la/ rnam par byang bar myi 'gyur ba de lta bu'i lam bsgom pa yod dam/ ge so la pa bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags te/ bcom ldan 'das sgra brnyan nyid kyang shin tu mchis pa lags na
268b2('bum): lam gang bsgoms pas kun nas nyon mongs par myi 'gyur la/ rnam par byang bar myi 'gyur ba de lta bu'i lam bsgoms pa lta bu smos kyang ci 'tshal te ma mchiso// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa na rab 'byor de
268b3('bum): ji snyam du sems/ spyig rgyu la chu myong pa la chu'i 'du shes su gyur pa dang / chu klung myed pa la chu klung gi 'du shes su gyur pa dang / grong khyer myed pa la grong khyer gi 'du shes su gyur pa dang / bskyed mo tshal myed pa la
268b4('bum): skyed mos tshal gi 'du shes su gyur pa de la 'du shes kyi lam gang mngon par 'dus byas pas sems can dmyal bar 'gro ba 'am/ byol song gi skye gan su dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten du 'gro ba 'am/ myir skye ba
268b5('bum): 'am rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lhar lnga skye ba 'am/ sum cu rtsa gsum dang / mtsho ma dang / dga' ldan dang / 'phrul dga' dang / degazhan 'phrul dbang byed dang / tshangs ris dang / tshangs lha nya sa
268b6('bum): rang tshangs pa kun 'khor dang / tshangs chen dang / snang ba dang chung sdang dang / tshad myed snang ba dang / kun snang dang ba dang / dge ba dang / chung dge dang / tshad myed dge ba dang / dag rgyas dang / 
268b7('bum): dang chung che dang / tshad myang che ba dang / 'bras bu me pa dang / myi che ba dang / myi gdung ba dang / ridzin tu mthong ba dang / glo spong ba dang / 'og rkyen gyi ltar ste ba'am/ rnam mkha' mtha' yas skye mchad dang
268b8('bum): sa mtha' yas skye mchod dang / cung bar myed myed pa'i skye mched dang / 'dunas myed 'dugs myeng phyir skye mched kyi lhar skye ba'am / 'ad dgangal du yod ngas nags yod pa bcom ldan 'das sgrog rgyul 'dun
269a1('bum): asaphyin ci log du gyur pa dang / myig gis log par mthong bar ma rtogs par chu klung dang / grong khyer dang / bskyed mos tshal shin tu ma mchis na na sug las gang mngon par bgyis saman sems can dmya
269a2('bum): bar mchi ba 'ab byom song sa rgyu gnas sam ni gshin rje'i 'jig rten du mam ba 'am/ mying skye ba 'am da rgyal tsho ba'i'i chos kyi lhar skye ba'am/ sum bcu rtsa gsum dang / mche ma dang / dga' ldan dang / 'phrul dgas
269a3('bum): dang gzhan 'phrul dbang byed dang / tshangs ris dang / tshangs lha nye phan dang / tshangs pa kun 'khor dang / tshangs chen dang / snang ba dang / chung snang dang / tshad myed snang ba dang / kun snang dang ba dang / dge ba dang / chung dge dang / 
269a4('bum): dge rgyas dang / che ba dang / chung che dang / tshad myed che ba dang / 'bras nga bu che ba dang / myi che ba dang / myi gdung ba dang / shin tu mthong ba dang / da gya nom snang ba dang / 'og myin gi lhar skye ba 'am/ nam mkha' mtha'
269a5('bum): yas skye mched dang / rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched dang / cung ca zad myed pa'i skye mched dang / 'du shes myed 'du shes myed myin skye mched gi lhar skye bar 'gyur ba lta smos kyang ci 'tshal te ma mchis so/ 
269a6('bum): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de de ji snyam du sems/ phyin ci log gi 'du shes de la lam gang bsgoms pas kun nas nyon mongs par myi 'gyur/ rnam par byang bar yang myi 'gyur ba de lta bu'i lam bsgoms pa
269a7('bum): yod dam/ gsolang pa bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags te/ bcom ldan 'das phyi nad ci log gi 'du shes de nyid kyang dngos po ma mchis pa lags na/ lam gang bsgoms / kun nas nyon mongs par yang myi 'gyur la na rnam
269a8('bum): bar byang bar yang myi 'gyur ji de lta bul ma bsgoms pa lta spos kya ci 'tshal te ma mchi son/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pan rab 'byor nga ji snyam du sems na sgyum ma khan thos sgyu ma'i sna tshogs glang ba ma'i tshogs/ 
269b1('bum): rta'i lus tshogs sam/ glang gi lus tshogs sam/ dpung du chung gi lus tshogs sam/ bud myed kyi gzugs sam/ skyes pa'i gzugs sa mngon par sprul pa/ sgyu ma de gang mngon par 'du byas pas/ sems can dmyal bar 'gro
269b2('bum): ba'ams byol song gi skye gnas su 'gro ba 'am/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten du 'gro ba 'am/ myir skye ba 'am/ rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lhar skye ba 'am nasum bcu rtsa gsum dang / mtshe ma dang / dga' ldan dang / 'phrul dga'
269b3('bum): dang gzhan 'phrul dbang byed dang / tshangs ris dang / tshangs lha nye phan dang / tshangs pa kun 'khor dang / tshangs chen dang / snang ba dang / chung snang dang / chang myed sdang ba dang / kun snang dang ba dang / dge ba dang / chung dge dang / chang
269b4('bum): myed dge ba dang / dge rgyas dang / che ba dang / chung dge dag dang / tshad myed dge ba dang / 'bras bu che ba dang / myi che ba dang / myi gdung ba dang / shin tu mthong ba dang / gya nom snang ba dang / 'og myin gi lhar skye ba 'am
269b5('bum): nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched dang / rnam shes mtha' yas/ skye mched dang / cung zad myed myed pa'i skye mched dang / 'du shes myed 'du shes myed myin skye mched gi lhar skye ba de lta bu'i dngos po yod dam
269b6('bum): gsol pa bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags te/ sgyu ma de gang la gnas te/ sug las de gang mngon par 'a bgyid pa dang / sug las gang mngon par 'du bgyis pas/ sems can dmyal bar mchi ba 'am/ byol song gi skye
269b7('bum): gnas su skye mchi ba 'am/ gdoshin rje'i 'jig rten du mchi ba 'am/ myor skye ba 'am/ rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lhar skye ba 'am/ sum bcu rtsa gsum dang / mtshe ma dang / dga' ldan dang / 'phrul dka' dang / gzhan 'phrul
269b8('bum): dbang byed dang / tshangs ris dang / tshangs lha nye phan dang / tshangs pa kun 'khor dang / tshangs chen dang / snang ba dang / chung snang dang / tshad myed snang ba dang / kun snang dang ba dang / dge ba dang / chung rkye dang / tshad myed dge ba dang / dge
270a1('bum): rgyas dang / che ba dang / chung che dang / tshad myed che ba dang / 'bras bu che ba dang / myi che ba dang / myi gdung ba dang / shin tu mthong ba dang / gya nom snang ba dang / 'og myin gyi lhar skye ba 'am/ nam mkha' mtha' yas skye
270a2('bum): mched dang / rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched dang / cung zad myed pa'i skye mched dang / 'du shes myed 'du shes myed myin skye mched kyi lhar skye bar 'gyur ba'i ni skra'i rtse mo'i cha shas bshags pa tsam yang ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das
270a3('bum): kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de de ji snyam du sems/ sgyu ma gang bsgoms pas kun nas nyon mongs par yang myi 'gyur la/ rnam par byang bar yang myi 'gyur ba de lta bu'i lam sgom pa yod dam/ gsol pa bcom ldan 'dra
270a4('bum): de ni ma lags te// bcom ldan 'das dngos po ma mchis pa'i chos la nyon mongs pa 'am/ rnam par byang bar 'gyur ba lta ga la mchis/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de de ji snyam du sems
270a5('bum): de bzhin gshegs pas sprul pa mdzad na/ sprul da pa de la las gang mngon par 'du byas pas/ sems can dmyal bar 'gro/ pa 'am/ byol song gi skye gnas su 'gro ba 'amag gshin rje'i 'jig
270a6('bum): rten du 'gro ba 'am/ myir skye ba 'am/ rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lhor skye ba 'am/ sum bcu rtsa gsum dang / mtshe ma dang / dga' ldan dang 'phrul dga' dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed dang / tshangs ris dang / 
270a7('bum): tshangs lha nye phan dang / tshangs pa kun 'khor dang / tshangs chen dang / snang ba dang / chung snang dang / tshad myed snang ba dang / kun snang dang ba dang / dge ba dang / chung dge dang / tshad myed dge ba dang / dge rgyas dang / che ba dang / chung
270a8('bum): che dang / tshad myed che ba dang / 'bras bu che ba dang / myi che ba dang / myi gdung ba dang / shin tu mthong ba dang / gya nom snang ba dang / 'og myin gyi bar da lhar skye ba 'am/ nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched dang ga rnam shes mtha'
270b1('bum): yas skye mched dang / cung zar byed pa'i skye mched dang / 'du shes myed 'du shes myed myin skye mched kyi lhar skye bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i dngos po yod dam/ gsol pa bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags te/ bcom ldan 'das de la/ 
270b2('bum): dngos po ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor da de ji snyam du semasaka sprul pa de la lam bsgoms pas kun nas nyon mongs par yang myi 'gyur lag rnam par byang bar yang myi 'gyur ba de lta bu'i
270b3('bum): lam bsgom pa yod dmag gsol pa bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal da paka rab 'byor de de ji snyam du sems/ de la gang la la zhig kun nas nyon mongs pa 'am rnam par byang bar 'gyur
270b4('bum): ba yod dam/ gsol pa bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal dpa rab 'byor de de de bzhin te/ da ji ltar kun nas nyon mongs pa 'am/ rno bar byang bar 'gyur gang yang
270b5('bum): myed pa de bzhin du kun nas nyon mongs pa dang / rnam par byang ba gang yang myed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ bdag dang bdag gir bya ba gnas shing sems can kun nas nyon mongs pa 'amag rnam par byang bar
270b6('bum): 'gyur gyi yang dag par mthong ba ni kun nas nyon mongs pa 'am rnam par byang bar 'gyur ba gang yang myed do// ji ltar yang dag pa mthong ba la kun nas nyon mongs pa dang rnam par byang bar 'gyur ba myed pa de bzhin du kun nas nyon
270b7('bum): mongs pa dang rnam par byang ba myed do// / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag nyi shu lnga pa las/ le'u drug bcu dgu pa'o// / de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor kyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad
270b8('bum): ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das yang dag pa mthong ba la kun nas nyon mongs par 'gyur ba 'am/ rnam par byang bar 'gyur ba gang yang ma mchis pa de bzhin du yang dag lnga'i mtho ba la kun nas nyon mongs pa 'am brna bar byang gi
271a1('bum): 'gyur ba ma mchis te/ de ni chos thams cad dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid lags pas na bcom ldan 'das kyis dngos po ma mchis pa la ni kun nas nyon mongs pa 'am rna bar byang ba ma mchis pa te
271a2('bum): bcom ldan 'das ngo bo nyid la kun nas nyon mongs pa'am rnam par byang ba/ nga ma mchis te/ dngos po ma mchis pa'i ngo bo nyid la yang kun nas nyon mongs pa'am rnam par byang ba ma mchis na/ bcom ldan 'das kyi
271a3('bum): rnam par byang bar gsungs pa de ji lta bu lags// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// rab 'byor de chos kyi mnyam pa nyid gang yin pa de ni ngas rje bar gsungs so// gsol pa bcom ldan 'das chos thas cad kyi
271a4('bum): mnyam pa nyid de gang lags // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal dpa ka/ de bzhin nyid dang / ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan/ ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang chos kyi dbyings dang / 
271a5('bum): chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos skyon myed pa nyid dang / yang dgapa'i mtha' gang de bzhin gshegs pa rnams byung yang rung / de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ma byung yang rung ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i
271a6('bum): chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings 'di lta ste chos kyi dbyings shes bya ba 'ang mi rab 'byor rnam par byang ba ste ga re ni 'jig rtem gi tha snyad kyis brjod kyi ga nga'i brjod du myed cing spos su myong ba ste / sgra dang tshig thams cad/ 
271a7('bum): lam las 'das pa'i chos so// gsol pa bcom ldan 'das gal te chos thams cad rmyilam lta bu smra brnyas bu dmyig yong la bu smyig rgyu la bun sgyum lta bur sprul pa lnga bu lags na 'ji ltar byang chub ses
271a8('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen pa chos bams na skyil sa ga bu ngag smra nam sa bu dang / myini mangs bu dang / spyig phyug bu dang / sbrum la bu chos bams ca du 'a ba gsugag das pom mchim pa
271b1('bum): ma mchis pa la bdag gi sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang
271b2('bum): bsam gtan gi pha rol tu phyind pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang / thab mkhas pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa dang / smon lam gyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang / stobs kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang / ye shes
271b3('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyind pa yang / yongs su rdzogs par bya'o// nang stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du yong su rdzogs
271b4('bum): par byed do// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs pa bya'o// yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang
271b5('bum): 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yongs su rdzogs par bya'o// 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / bsam gtan bzhi/ dang / tshad myed pa bzhi dang / gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par
271b6('bum): 'jug pa bani dang / rnam par thard pa brgyad dang / mthar dkyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtsha myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa dang / mngon pa shes pa dang / ting / 
271b7('bum): nge 'dzind thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / yongs su rdzogs par bya'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / myi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / snying rje chen
271b8('bum): po rang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad yongs su rdzogs par bya'o// myi chen po'i tshem sum bcu rtsa gnyis yongs su rdzogs par bya'o// dpe' byang bzang po brgya bcu yongs su rdzogs par bya'o// 
272a1('bum): 'od chen po yongs su rdzogs par bya'o// phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gi khams kyi sems can rnams kyi sems kyi rtog pa sems kyis shes par bya ste/ dbyangs gcig gis mos pa ji lta ba bzhin du chos bstan/ 
272a2('bum): pa'i tshangs pa'i dbyangs yongs su rdzogs par bya'o zhes bgyi bar bla ma myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor da de ji snyam du sems
272a3('bum): gang khyod kyis brjod pa'i chos de dag rmyi lam lta bu dang / sgra brnyan lta bu dang / myig yor lta bu dang / smyig rgyu lta bu dang / sprul pa lta bu ma yin no/ gsol pa bcom ldan 'das gal te chos de dag rmyi lam lta bu dang / sgra brnyan lta
272a4('bum): bu dang / myig yor lta bu dang / sgyu ma lta bu dang / sprul pa lta bu lags na/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyad par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das rmyi lam ni yang dag pa ma lags
272a5('bum): sgra brnyan dang namyig yor dang / smyig rgyu dang / sgyu ma dang / sprul pa'i na yang dag pa ma lags te/ bcom ldan 'das yang dag pa ma lags pas/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa la spyad pa dang / tshul
272a6('bum): tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa/ 
272a7('bum): la spyad pa dang / nang stong pa nyid la spyad pa dang / dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar la spyod pa la byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum bcu rtsa bdun la spyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi la spyad pa dang / bsam rten
272a8('bum): bzhi dang / tshad myed pa bzhi dang / gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / rnam par tha rad pa brgyad dang / mthard kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon da pa
272b1('bum): byed po dang / mngon par nas pa dang / ting nga'adzin dang / gzung gi sgobams cad dang / de bzhin gshags pa'i skabs bcu dang / myi 'jigs pa pa ni dang ga so so yang dag par rig pa pa'i dang / snying rje chen po dang
272b2('bum): sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad la spyad pas tha ma myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'chang rgya bar myi nus so/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal dpa 'a rab 'byor de de bzhis
272b3('bum): yang dag pa ma yin pas sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa la spyad pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu
272b4('bum): phyind pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa dang / da nang stong pa nyid la spyad pa dang / dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid da kyi bar la spyad pa dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum bcu rtsa
272b5('bum): bdun la spyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / bsam gtan dang / tshad myed pa dang / gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / rnam par tha dad pa dang / mthard kyis gnas pa'i snyom
272b6('bum): par 'jug pa dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa dang / mngon par shes pa dang / ting nge 'dzind dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad la spyad pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / myi 'jig
272b7('bum): pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad la spyad pas bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar myi nus so// rab 'byor
272b8('bum): de ji snyam du sems/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya 'am/ gsol pa bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags log/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal / 
273a1('bum): ga 'byor doji snyas nusams 'tshul khrims kyi pha rolang tu phyin pa dang bzod pa'i pha ro lang tu phyind pa dang na martson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang lasam gtan gyil rol su byadang / 
273a2('bum): ba na shes rab kyi romo tu phyin pa bla na myang ba yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'chang bya'am stong pa nyid thams cad dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams bla myangang / 
273a3('bum): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// 'phags pa'i bden pa dang / bsam gtan dang / tshad myed pa dang / gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / rnam par thar/ 
273a4('bum): rdzopa dang / mthar da kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug ba dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smyond pa myed pa/ dadang / mngon par shes dang / ting nge 'dzind dang / gzungs kyi/ 
273a5('bum): sgo rnams bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tumangon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'am/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / myi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag
273a6('bum): par rig pa bzhi dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad bla ma myang ba yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'chang rgya'am ka gsol pa bcom ldan 'das
273a7('bum): 'on ma lags / kham bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal da rang 'byu pas no/ da na/ 
273a8('bum): kha lakhong tu phyinang pa bla ma myang pe yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'ang tu bar myo rus/ chub khrims su la rol tu phyin pa dang bzang po pha rol tu phyin pa dang ngan chu
273b1('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang / khas sam gtan gi pha rol tu phyind pa dang / sher ba kyi pha rol pa tu phyind pa rol tu phyind pa bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang myi rgya'o// nang stong pa
273b2('bum): nyid bla ma myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'chang myi rgya'o// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du bla ma myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang
273b3('bum): myi rgya'o// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po rnams dang / stobs rjes
273b4('bum): rang byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang / 'phags pa'i lam ya ma lag brgyad pa bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang myi rgya'o// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / 
273b5('bum): bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad myed pa rnams dang / gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par tha rad pa rnaMs/ dang / mthard kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnaMs dang / 
273b6('bum): stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang / smond pa myed pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon
273b7('bum): rdzogs par 'chang myi rgya'o// de ba zhim gsheshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / myi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad brgyad bla ma
273b8('bum): myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang myi rgya'o// rab 'byor dede ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar chos de dag thams cad kyang 'dus byas so// mngon par 'dus ma byas ste/ 'dus byas dang / mngon
274a1('bum): par 'dus byas pa'i chos kyis ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid thob par myi nuso// rab 'byor de 'on kyang chos de dag thams cad ni lam bsgrubs pa dang / lam bskyed pa'i rgyur 'gyur ba ste/ 'bru
274a2('bum): bu thob pa'i phyir ma yin no// chos de dag ni myi skye ba dang myi 'byung ba gang yin pa de ni mtshan nyid myed pa yang de yin te/ de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems dang / po skyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/ 
274a3('bum): dge ba'i chos sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol pa tu phyind pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang / shes
274a4('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'am/ nang stong pa nyid dang / dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar ram/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum bcu rtsa bdun nams 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams sam/ pas gtan rnaMs
274a5('bum): tshad myed pa rnams se/ gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'ju ga pa rnams so/ rnam par thard pa brgyad dam/ mthar kyis gam/ pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rdzas sam/ stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myong
274a6('bum): pa dang / smon pa myed pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams so ting nge 'dzin rnams sems gzungs gi sgo rnams sam/ de bzhin gsheg pa'i stobs rnams sam/ myi 'jigs pa rnams sam/ so so yang
274a7('bum): dag par rig pa bzhi dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams sam/ dge ba'i chos gang rtsom yang de thams cad sgyu ma lta bu shes par rab tu shes te/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa dang / 
274a8('bum): tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang / nang stong pa nyid dang
274b1('bum): dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams dang yang dag par spong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gi rkang pa rnams dang / dbang po rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / byang chub kyi yan lag
274b2('bum): rnams dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad myed pa rnams dang / gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rjes dang / rnam par thar pa pa
274b3('bum): rnams dang / mthard kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smond pa myed pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams dang / ting nge 'dzind rnams dang / gzungs kyi
274b4('bum): rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams dang / myi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bya rgyang po de dag
274b5('bum): yongs su rdzogs par ma byas par sems can rnams yod sa su smyind par bya ba 'am/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyidapar bya bar myi nus pas ka de'i phyir de lta bas na byang chub sems dang
