274b6('bum): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ dge ba'i chos gang dang gang rtsom yang de thams cad rmyil lta bur shes so// sgra brnyan lta bur sheso// myig yor lta bur dang / smyig rgyu lta bu dang
274b7('bum): sprul pa lta bar na so'// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rolal tu phyind pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol
274b8('bum): tu phyinang pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rolal tu phyind pa dang / nang stong pa nyid dang / dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar dang / dran pa nyab gnajug pa rapas yang dag par spong
275a1('bum): ba dang rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa dang / bsam gtan dang / tshad myed pa dang / 
275a2('bum): gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / rnam par tha rad pa dang / mthard kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa dang / mngon par shes pa dang / 
275a3('bum): ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs gi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / myi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres bcwo brgyad
275a4('bum): dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du rmi lam da lta bur shes so// sgra brnyan lta bu dang / myig yor lta bu dang / smyig rgyu lta bu dang / sgyu ma lta bu dang / sprul pa lta bur shes so// sems
275a5('bum): can de dag thams cad kyang rmyi lam la spyod do zhes bya bar myi shes so// sgra brnyan dang / myig yor dang / smyig rgyu dang / sgyu ma dang / sprul pa la spyod do zhes bya bar shes so// de bas na byang chub sems
275a6('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe// rmyi lam lta bu'i chos rnams dngos po myed par 'dzin to// de ltar bzung zhing rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid thob par byed do// shes rab
275a7('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ sgra brnyan lta bu dang / myig yor lta bu dang / smyig rgyu lta bu dang / sgyu ma lta bu dang / sprul pa lta bu'i chos rnams dngos po myed par 'dzind to// de ltar bzung zhing / rnam pa thams cad
275a8('bum): mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang bzung du myed do// bsam gtan ga pha rol tu phyind pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang / 
275b1('bum): bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa bzung du myed do// nang stong pa nyid bzung du myed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar yang bzung du myed do// 
275b2('bum): dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang / yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yang bzung du myed pa'o// 'phags pa'i
275b3('bum): bden pa dang / bsam gtan dang / chad myed pa dang / gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / rnam par tha rad pa dang / mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang / 
275b4('bum): smond pa myed pa dang / mngon par shes pa dang / ting nge 'dzi/ dang / gzungs gi sgo rnams kyang bzung du myed pa 'di bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / myi 'jigs pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa
275b5('bum): rang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyang bzung du myed de bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos thams cad bzung du myed par shes par byas shing / bla na myed pa yang dag par
275b6('bum): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu ron tu gnyer to// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar chos thams cad thung ngu myed cing dngos po myed pa ste rmyi lam lta bu/ sgra brnyan lta bu/ myig yor lta bu/ smyig rgyu lta bu/ sgyu ma lta bu/ 
275b7('bum): sprul pa lta bu ste/ sems can rnams kyis chos de dag ma shes mthong ma rtogs par bzung du myed pa'i chos gang yang thob par myi nus pas/ de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can thams
275b8('bum): cad kyi don du bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par yang dag par 'jug ste/ de sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/ sbyin pa gang ci gtong yang sems can thams cad kyi ngom tu gtong
276a1('bum): tshul khrims gang ci srung ba dang / bzod pa gang ci bsgom pa dang / brtson 'grus gang ci rtsom pa dang / bsam gtan gang ci la mnyam par gzhog pa dang / shes rab gang ci bsgom pa de yang / sems
276a2('bum): cad thams cad kyi don tu sgom ste/ bdag gi don ma yin no// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni sems can rnams kyi don ma rtogs par bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mi 'jug ste
276a3('bum): de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ sems can gang sems can myed pa la sems can gyi 'du shes su gnas pa dang / bdag myed pa la bdag gi 'du shes su gnas pa dang / srog myed pa la srog gi
276a4('bum): 'du shes su gnas pa dang / 'gro ba myed pa la 'gro ba'i 'du shes su gnas pa dang / gso ba myed pa la gso'i 'du shesu gnas/ pa dang / skyes bu myed pa la skyes bu'i 'du shes su gnas
276a5('bum): pa dang gang zag myed pa la gang zag gi 'du she su gnas pa dang shed can myed pa la shed can gi 'dun su gnas pa dang / shed bdag myed pa la shed bdag gi 'du shes su gnas pa dang / byed pa po
276a6('bum): myed pa la byed pa'i 'dun su gnas pa dang / byed du 'jug pa myed pa la byed du 'jug pa po'i 'dzungs su gnas pa dang / slong po myed pa la slong ba po'i 'du shes su gnas pa dang / slong du 'jug pa po myang ba sa
276a7('bum): slong du 'jug po'i 'du she su gnas pa dang / tshor ba myed pa la tshor ba po'i 'dun su gnas pa dang / tshor du 'jug pa po myed pa la tshor du 'jug pa po'i 'dun su gnas pa dang / shes pa po myed pa la shes pa po'i
276a8('bum): 'du shes su gnas pa dang / mthong ba po myed pa la mthong ba' bo'i 'du shes su gnas pa dang / bdag phyin ci log las rnam par grol ten phyi nang ci log las rnam par bkrol zhing 'chi ba myong ba'i dbyings su/ 
276b1('bum): la bkod nas rgyu ba 'di dag yongs su myi gtong / bdag gi 'du shes sam/ sems can gyi 'du shes sam/ byed po'i 'du shes sam/ byed du 'jug po'i 'du shes sam/ slong po'i 'du shes sam/ slong du
276b2('bum): 'jug pa po'i 'du shes samanatshor ba po'i 'du shes sam chor du 'jug pa po'i 'du shes sam/ shes pa po'i 'du shes so/ mthong ba po'i 'du shes su myi rgyu ste/ de g.yo ba dang / rlom sems dang / 'brang
276b3('bum): ba dang spros pa 'di dag gtong nas spros pa myed pa'i sems kyis nye bar bsgrubs shing mang du spyod de/ rab 'byor nga rnam grangs des na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod
276b4('bum): pa'i tshe/ bdag nyid kyang chos gang la yang mngon par zhen pa myang bas sems can thams cad kyang mngon par zhen pa la rab tu 'god de/ de ni 'jig rten gi tha snyad kyi don dam pa ma yin no// gsol pa bcom
276b5('bum): ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa la chos gang mngon par zhen/ rdzogs par sangs rgyas so zhes bya ba na/ 'jig rtenang gi tha snyad du mngon par sangs rgyas pa ma lags kyi/ don dam par mngon
276b6('bum): par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsol pa// de bzhin gshegs pas chos mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so zhes bya ba na/ 'jig rten gi tha snyad du brjod pa ste/ de la chos 'dis lta
276b7('bum): bu zhig mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so zhes bya bar de lta bu gang yang myi dmyigs te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di lta ste chos 'dis chos 'di lta bu zhig mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyaso zhes bya ba ni dmyigs pa ste/ 
276b8('bum): gnyis kyis ni gang yang thob pa'am mngon par rtogs par 'gyur ba myed do// gsolang pa bcom ldan 'das de ste gnyis kyis thob pa dang / mngon par rtogs par 'gyur ba ma mchis nan gnyis sum monus pas thob pa dang / 
277a1('bum): mngon par 'gyur ram/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gnyis kyang thob pa dang mngon par rtogs par 'gyur ba myed do// gang la gnyis kyang myed la myi gnyis pa yang myed pa ni thob pa yang myed do// 
277a2('bum): mngon par rtogs pa myed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar 'di ni thob pa'o// 'di ni mngon par rtogs pa zhes bya ba ni spros pa ste/ chos mnyam pa nyid la spros pa myed de/ spros pa myed pa'i na chos mnyam pa nyid do// gsol pa
277a3('bum): bcom ldan 'das chos dngos po mchis pa'i ngo bo nyid rnams la chos mnyam pa nyid ces bgyi ba gang zhig mchis/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gang la dngos po myed pa dang / dngos po myed pa yang ma yin pa dang
277a4('bum): ngo bo nyid myed pa dang / yongs su rdzogs pa myed pa 'di ni chos/ nyid de chos mnyam pa nyid gnyis pa 'di ni brjod du myed pa'o// chos mnyam pa nyid ni byis pa so so'am/ 'phags pa'am/ chos gang gis kyang she
277a5('bum): par myi rung zhing yul ma yin no// gsold pa bcom ldan/ 'das chos nyid de/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i yul yang ma lags bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// rab 'byor de chos mnyam
277a6('bum): pa nyid ni/ 'phags pa'i thams cad kyi yul ma yin te/ rgyun tu zhugs pa 'am/ lan cig phyir ba 'am/ phyir myi 'ong ba dang / dgra bcom pa 'am/ rang byang chub 'am/ spyi byang chub sems dpa' 'am/ de bzhin gshe
277a7('bum): gas pa'i yul ma yin no// gsolang ba bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni/ chos thams cad kyi yul la mngar bsgyur ba ma lags saman bcom ldan
277a8('bum): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor ded gal te chos mnyam pa nyid kyang gzhan la/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyang gzhan zhig yin ni/ de bzhin gsheg/ 
277b1('bum): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas chos thams cad kyi yul la mnga' sbyar bar 'gyur/ rab 'byor so so'i skye bo rnams kyi chos nyid gang yin pa dang / rgyun tu zhugs pa rnams dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba rdzas
277b2('bum): dang / phyir myi 'ong ba'i rnams dang / dgra bcom pa rnams dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams dang / byang chub dpa' rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de ni mnyam pa nyid gcig pa ste/ mnyam pa
277b3('bum): nyid la bye brag gang yang myed do// de la so so'i skye bo rnams kyi mnyam pa nyid gang yin pa dang / 'phags pa thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid gang yin pa de ni gcig pa ste/ mnyam pa nyid gcig pa la/ 'di nis so'i skye
277b4('bum): 'di ni rgyun tu zhugs pa'o// 'di ni la cig phyir 'ong ba dang / dgra bcom pa dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa'o// 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
277b5('bum): sangs rgyas so zhes bya ba gnyis bya ba myed de/ rnam par rtogapa de dag ni mnyam pa nyid la myi dmyigaso// gsol pa bcom ldan 'das de ste/ chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid la 'di ni skye ba'o// 'di ni
277b6('bum): rgyun tu zhugs pa'o// 'di ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba 'am/ phyir myi 'ong ba 'am/ dgra bcom pa dang / sa rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa'o// 'di mi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
277b7('bum): pa'i sangs rgyas so zhes so// zhes bgyi ba'i rnam pa de dag myi dmyigs na/ des so so'i skye bo rnams dang / rgyun tu zhugs pa rnams dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams dang / phyir myi 'ong ba rnams dang / dgra bcom pa nyid dang / 
277b8('bum): rang sangs rgyas rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams khyad par ma mchis par 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// rab 'byor de de de bzhin no// 
278a1('bum): de de bzhin te/ chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid la so so'i skye bo rnams dang / rgyun tu zhugs pa rnams dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams dang / phyir myi 'ong ba rnams dpa de dgra bcom pa rnams dang ni rang byang chub
278a2('bum): rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams khyad par ro// gsol pa bcom ldan 'das de ste chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid la sas
278a3('bum): 'i skye bo rnams dang / rgyun tu zhugs pa rnams dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams dang / phyir myi 'ong bu rnamasu dang / dgra bcom pa rnams dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang / de bzhin
278a4('bum): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs// rgyas rnams la khyad par ma mchis na// bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du sangs rgyas dkon mchog dang / chos dkon mchog dang / dge 'dun/ 
278a5('bum): dkon mchog dang / dkon mchog gsum po de dag 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ba lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa rab 'byor de de ji snyam du sems/ sangs rgyas dkon mchog kyang
278a6('bum): gzhan la/ chos dkon mchog kyang gzhan te/ dge 'dun dkon mchog kyang gzhan la/ chas mnyam pa nyid kyang gzham zhig yin snyam 'am/ gsol pa bcom ldan 'das bdag gis bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs
278a7('bum): pa'i don 'tshal ba ltar na/ sangs rgyas dkon mchog kyang gzhan la/ chos dkon mchog kyang gzhan te/ dge 'dun du klon mchog kyang gzham zhig la/ chos mnyam pa nyid kyang gzhan ma lags kyi/ bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas
278a8('bum): dkon mchog gang lags pa dang / chos dkon mchog gang lags pa dang / dge 'dun dkon mchog gang lags pa de nyid chos mnyam pa nyid de/ chos thams ni ldan pa yang ma lags/ myi ldan pa yang ma lags// gzugs
278b1('bum): ma mchis pa bstan du ma mchis pa thogs pa ma mchis pa mtshan nyid ma mchis te// 'di ltar mtshan nyid ma mchis pa'o// de ltar chos rnams mtsham nyid ma mchis la 'di ni so so'i skye bo'o// 'di ni rgyun tu zhugs pa'o// 'di ni
278b2('bum): lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang / 'di ni phyir myi 'ong ba dang / dgra bcom pa dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems de ba'o dang / 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas so zhes bya bar
278b3('bum): par dgod par bgyi ba de ni bcom ldan 'das kyi yul lo// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de de bzhin no// de bzhin te/ mtshan nyid myed pa'i chos rnam par dgod pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i yul te/ 
278b4('bum): de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i mthu'o// rab 'byor dade ji snyam du sems/ de ste de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sang ngas rgyas byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas la/ mngon par
278b5('bum): rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i phyir/ chos rnams rnam par dgo// dpa ma mdzad na/ sems can dmyal ba yod par mngon nam/ byol song gyi skye gnas sam/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten nam/ myi yod
278b6('bum): par mngon mas/ rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha yod par mngon nas/ sum bcu rtsa gsum dang / mtshem dang / dga' ldan dang / 'phrul dga' dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed dang / tshangs ris ris dang / tshangs lha nye 5
278b7('bum): dang / tshangs pa kun 'khor dang / tshangs chen dang / snang ba dang / chung sdang dang / tshad myed snang ba dang / kun sdang dang ba dang / dge' ba dang / chung dge dang / tshad myed dge ba dang / dge rgyas dang / che ba dang / chung me dade/ tshang byed
278b8('bum): che ba dang / 'bras bu che ba dang / myi che ba dang / myi gdung ba dang / shin tu mthong ba dang / gya nom snang ba dang / 'og myin gyi lha yod par mngon par mngon nam/ nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched dang / rnam shen sa mtha' yas/ 
279a1('bum): skye mched dang / cung zad myeng pa'i skye mched dang / 'dunas myed 'du shes myed myin skye mched kyi lha yod par mngon nam/ sbyin po'i pha rol tu phyind pa yod par mngon nam/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol pa tu phyin
279a2('bum): pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa yod par mngon nam/ byang chub sems dpa'i sa
279a3('bum): bcu yod par mngon par nam/ nang stong pa nyid yod par mngon nam/ dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du yod par mngon nam/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang / yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gi rkang pa dang / 
279a4('bum): dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yod par mngon nam/ 'phags pa'i bden pa dang / bsam gtan dang / tshad myed pa dang / gzugs
279a5('bum): myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / rnam par thard pa dang / mthar du kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan mi myed pa dang / smond pa myed pa dang / mngon par shes pa dang / 
279a6('bum): ting nge 'dzind dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams yod par mngon nam/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mya 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs
279a7('bum): rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams yod par mngon nam/ myi chen po'i mtshan sum bcu rtsa gnyis dang / dpe' byad bzang po brgya bcu yod par mngon nam/ sangs rgyas dkon mchog dang / chos dkon mchog dang / dge'
279a8('bum): 'dun dkon mchog yod par mngon nam/ nyan thos kyi theg pa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa dang / theg pa chen po yod par mngon namapar dad pa'i rje su 'brang ba dang / chos kyi rje su 'brang ba dang / brgyad pa yod pa
279b1('bum): mngon nam/ rgyun tu zhugs pa dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang / phyir myi 'ong ba dang / dgra bcom pa dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dang / de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
279b2('bum): sangs rgyas yod par mngon nam// gsol pa bcom ldan 'das chos de dag thams cad ni mchis par mngon par myi 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de de bas na de lta bas na yang dag
279b3('bum): chos mnyam pa nyid las kyang myi g.yol la/ chos rnams rnam par dgod pa mdzad pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i mthu'o// gsol da pa/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa chos mnyam pa nyid las myi g.yo/ 
279b4('bum): ba de bzhin du bso so'i skye bo rnams kyang chos mnyam pa nyid las myi lags sam/ de bzhin du dad pa'i rjesu ches 'brang ba dang / chos kyi rje su 'drang ba dang / brgyad pa dang / rgyun tu zhugs dang / lan cig
279b5('bum): phyir 'ong ba rnams dang / phyir myi 'ong ba rnams dang / dgra bcom pa rnams dang / rang sangs dang / byang chub sems dpa' yang chos man+ta pa nyid las myi g.yo ba lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
279b6('bum): bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de de de bzhin no// de de bzhin no// rab 'byor nga chos thams cad ni chos mnyam pa nyid las myi 'anga'o// rab 'byor de de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag
279b7('bum): par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi de bzhin nyid dang / ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings dang / chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos skyon myed pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i
279b8('bum): mtha' gang yin pa de ni so so'i skye bo rnams kyi de bzhin nyid dang / ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings dang / chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos skyon myed pa nyid dang / yang
280a1('bum): dag pa'i mtha' ste/ de nyid ni dad pa'i rje su 'brang ba rnams dang / chos kyi rje su 'brang ba rnams dang / brgyad pa dang rgyun tu zhugs pa rnams dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams dang / phyir myi 'ong ba
280a2('bum): rnams dang / dgra bcom pa rnams dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams de bzhin nyid dang / ma nor pa de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / 
280a3('bum): chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings dang / chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos skyon myed pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' ste/ de dag thams cad ni/ chos mnyam pa nyid de de las 'da' bar dza par myi 'da'o// de ci'i phyir zhen
280a4('bum): de dag gi chos nyid dang / chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos skyon myed pa nyid dang / de bzhin nyid dang / ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' na de bzhin nyid yin te
280a5('bum): de dag la chos mnyam pa nyid ces bya ba gang yang myed de/ rab 'byor da kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das gal te de ltar/ so so'i skye bo rnams kyi mnyam pa nyid gang lags pa de nyid dang / 
280a6('bum): pa'i rje su 'brang ba rnams dang / chos kyi rje su 'brang ba rnas dang / brgyad pa dang rgyun tu zhugs smra dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams dang / phyir myi 'ong ba rnams dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams dang / byang
280a7('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi chos mnyam pa nyid de/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi chos mnyam pa nyid lags na/ bcom ldan 'das maN+Da/ 
280a8('bum): nyid myi 'dra ba'i chos 'di lta ste/ gzugs dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa dang / skye mched dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang / 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang
280b1('bum): rang gti mug dang / lta ba'i rnam pa thams cad dang / bsam gtan dang / chang myed pa dang / gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin/ 
280b2('bum): pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa dang / brtson 'grus gi pha rolal tu phyind pa dang / bsam gtan gi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang / thabs mkhas pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa da
280b3('bum): smon lam gyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang / stobs kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang / ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i sa bcu dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams dang / yang dag par spong ba
280b4('bum): rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gi rkang pa rnams dang / dbang po rje/ sa dang / spobs rnams dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i
280b5('bum): bden pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / rnam par tha rang pa'i sde stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smond pa myed pa dang / nang stong pa nyid dang / dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid
280b6('bum): stong pa nyid kyi bar dang / rnam par tha ra pa brgyad dang / mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / mngon par shes pa lnga dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgothams cad dang / de bzhin
280b7('bum): gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dngar myi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad dang / myi chen po'i mtshan
280b8('bum): sum bcu rtsa gnyis dpa' dpe'i byed bzang po brgya bcu dang / 'dus byas kyi khams dang / 'dus ma byas kyi khams dang / bcom ldan 'das chos de dag ni kun kyang gcig dang gcig tu myi 'dra ba cig las gcig dan
281a1('bum): bcom ldan 'das de ci'i slad du zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar gzugs nyid kyang gzhan/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa'i chos nyid kyang gzhan/ skye mched dang / khams dang / rten cing
281a2('bum): 'byung ba'i chos nyid kyang gzhan/ 'dod chags kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/ zhe sdang gi chos nyid kyang gzhan/ gti mug gi chos nyid kyang gzhan/ lta ba'i rnam pa'i chos nyid kyang gzhan// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa'i
281a3('bum): chos nyid kyang gzhan/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang / bsam gtan gi pha rol tu phyind pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu
281a4('bum): phyind pa'i chos nyid kyang gzhan/ nang stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/ dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan
281a5('bum): yang dag par spong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gi rkang pa rnams dang dbang po rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rjes dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i chos nyid
281a6('bum): kyang gzhan/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad myed pa rnams dang / gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par tha rad pa rnams dang / ma ba ra kyis gnas pa'i
281a7('bum): snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/ de bzhin gshes
281a8('bum): pa'i stobs bcu dang / myi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi chos nyid cakyang gzhan/ myi chen po'i mtshan su bcu
281b1('bum): rtsa gnyis dang / dper byad bzang po brgyad bcu'i chos nyid kyang gzhan/ 'dus byas kyi khams kyi chos nyid kyang gzham/ 'dus ma byas kyi khams kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar mtshan nyid kyi
281b2('bum): 'dra ba'i chos rdzas chos kyi mtshan nyid gcig par 'gyur ba lags/ chos rnam par dgod par ni myi 'gyur/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe// gang la rgan/ 
281b3('bum): shing chos rnams tha dang du bgyi ba lags// chos rnams tha dad du ma bgyis pa na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod par mya nus na/ ji ltar byang chub
281b4('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chem shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ sanas sang 'phar zhing skyon myed par 'jug pa lags/ ji ltar skyon myed par zhugs nasamanyan thos kyi sa dang dang / 
281b5('bum): sangs rgyas kyi sa las 'das te/ mngon par shes pa rnams yod/ sa su rdzogs par bgyi ba lags// ji ltar mngon par shes pas rdza par rtse zhing / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa yongs su
281b6('bum): rdzogs par bgyid pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin po dang / bsam gtan gi pha rol du phyinang pa dang / shes rab
281b7('bum): kyi pha rolal tu phyind pa yongs su rdzogs par bgyid pa dang / de dag la rnam par rtsa bas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du mchi ba lags/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la bsnyen bkur bgyid pa lags/ de dag tu
281b8('bum): dge ba'i rtsa ba des sems can rnams yongs su rjeka smind pa bgyid pa lags/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su 'dzind pa lags// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// rab 'byor dgang 'di skad du/ de snyom
282a1('bum): thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid gang yin pa de nyid so so'i skye bo rnams kyi mnyam pa nyid de/ de nyid dang pa'i rjes su 'brang ba rnams dang / chos kyi rjes su 'brang ba rnams dang / brgyad pa rnams dang / rgyun tu zhugs pa rdzas pa
282a2('bum): lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams dang / phyir myi 'ong ba rnams dang / dgra bcom pa rnams dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom
282a3('bum): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams dang / kyi chos mnyam pa nyid yin na/ mtshan nyid myi 'dra ba'i chos rnams kyi mnyeb nyid ji ltar gcig par 'gyur zhes zer ba ni/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ gzugs kyi
282a4('bum): chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ tshor ba'i tshe sa nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa dang 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin ma/ skye
282a5('bum): mched dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i chos gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ sbyin pa'i pha/ rol tu phyind pa'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin/ 
282a6('bum): tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang bI dang chos
282a7('bum): nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam// rang stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ 
282a8('bum): byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad myed pa rnams dang / gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnaMs dang / rna bar
282b1('bum): tha rad pa rnams dang / mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams dang / ting nge 'dzind rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo

282b4('bum): myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid dang / rang byang chupa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi bar gyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ rgyun tu zhugs pa dang /

282b6('bum): ma yin nam/ gsol pa bcom ldan 'das da ni stong pa nyid do// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'o na stong pa nyid la gzugs kyi mtshan nyid dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rna bar shes
282b7('bum): pa'i mtshan nyid dam/ skye mched dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i mtshan nyid dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa'i mtshan nyid dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu
282b8('bum): phyind pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang / bsam gtan gi pha rol tu phyind pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyin pa'i mtshan nyid dam/ nang stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid dam/ dngos po myed pa'i ngon
283a1('bum): nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gi mtshan nyid dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams kyi mtshan nyid dam/ 'phags pa'i bden pa dang / bsam gtan dang / tshad myed pa dang / gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang /

283a3('bum): cad kyi mtshan nyid dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang / myi 'jigs pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi mtshan nyid dam/ rgyun tu zhug

283a5('bum): de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan nyid dang / chos kyi mtshan nyid tha dad par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i gang yang dmyigs sam// gsol da pa bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das
283a6('bum): kyis bka' stsal dpa/ rab 'byor de de lta bas na/ rnam grangs des 'di ltar rig par bya ste/ chos thams cad kyi mtshan nyid gang yin pa de ni la so so'i skye bo yang myed/ so so'i skye bo las gud na yang de myed
283a7('bum): de la yang dad pa'i rjes su 'brang ba myed/ dad pa'i rjes su 'brang ba las gud na yang de myong / de la yang chos kyi rje su 'brang ba yang myed/ chos kyi rje su 'brang ba las gud na yang de myed/ de la yang brgyad pa myed
283a8('bum): brgyad pa las gud na yang de myed/ de la yang rgyun zhugs pa myed/ rgyun tu zhugs pa las gud na yang de myed de// de la yang lan cig phyir 'ong ba myed/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba las gud na yang de myed/ de la yang phyir myi
283b1('bum): ba myed phyir myi 'ong ba las kud na yang de myed/ de la yang dgra bcom pa myed/ dgra bcom pa las gud na yang de myed/ de la yang rang sangs rgyas myed/ rang sangs rgyas las gud na yang de myed/ de la yang byang
283b2('bum): chub sems dpa' myed/ byang chub sems dpa' las gud na yang de myed/ de la yang de bzhin gshegs pa myed/ de bzhin gshegs pa las gud na yang de myed par rig par rig par bya ste/ gsol pa/ chos nyid
283b3('bum): de 'dus par bgyis pa lags sam/ 'dus ma bgyis pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de ni 'dus mal byas byas kyang ma yin/ 'dus byas kyang ma yin/ 'dus byas las gud na yang 'dus
283b4('bum): ma byas dmyigs su myed do// 'dus ma byas las gud na yang 'dus byas dmyigs su myed do// 'dus byas kyi khams dang / 'dus rngam byas kyi khams gang yin pa'i chos de gnyis ka yang ldan pa
283b5('bum): yang ma yin/ myi ldan pa yang ma yin/ gzugs myed pa bstan du myed pa thogs pa myed pa mtshan nyid gcig pa ste/ 'di ltar mtshan nyid myed pa'o// de yang de bzhin gshegs
283b6('bum): bas 'jig rten gi tha snyad du brjod kyi/ don dam par ni ma yin no// don dam pa la lus kyi 'du byed dam/ ngag gi 'du byed dam/ yid kyi 'du byed dam/ lus kyi 'du byed dang / ngag gi 'du byed dang / yid kyi
283b7('bum): kyi 'du byad las gud na yang don dam pa dmyig su myed do// 'on kyang 'dus byas dang / 'dus ma byas kyi chos rnams kyi mnyam pa nyid gang yin pa ni don dam pa ste/ de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems
283b8('bum): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ don dam pa las myi grayo la/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa yang byed do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa stong phrag nyi shu lnga pa las// 
285a1('bum): le'u bdun bcu pa'o// de nas tshe dang pa rab 'byor kyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad kyi
285a2('bum): mnyam pa nyid ni rang bzhin gyis stong pa ste/ de'i slad du chos gang la yang ci yang bgyid pa ma mchis na/ de ltar chos thams cad ci yang bgyid pa ma mchis shing ci yang ma lags pa la/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' ses
285a3('bum): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ don dam pa las myi g.yo/ sbyin pa dang / tshig snyan pa dang / don bgyid pa dang / don mthun pas kyang sems can thams cad kyi don bgyid pa lags/ bcom
285a4('bum): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal dpa/ rab 'byor de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ ji skad smras pa de bzhin te/ stong pa nyid gang yin pa de ni gang la yang ci yang byed pa myed/ ci yang myi byed pa yang myed de/ 
285a5('bum): gal te sems can 'di dag kyang bdag cag nyid kyis stong pa nyid shes nim/ de ltar stong pa nyid las kyang myi g.yo la/ sems can rnams kyang bdag gi 'du shes dang bral bar byed cing bdag gi
285a6('bum): gi 'du shes dang bral nas stong pa nyid kyis 'khor ba las 'brel ba dang / sems can gyi 'du shes dang 'gro ba'i 'du shes dang / gso ba'i 'du shes dang / skyes bu'i 'du shes dang / gang zag gi 'du shes dang / shed
285a7('bum): can gi 'du shes dang / shed bdag gi 'du shes dang / byed pa po'i 'du shes dang / tshor ba po'i 'du shes dang / shes pa po'i 'du shes dang / mthong ba po'i 'du shes dang / bral bar byed cing mthong ba po'i 'du shes
285a8('bum): dang bral nas/ stong pa nyid kyis 'khor ba las 'grel pa dang / gzugs kyi 'du shes dang dral bar byed cing / gzugs kyi 'du shes dang bral nas na stong pa nyid gi 'khor ba las 'brel pa dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes
285b1('bum): rang 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa'i 'du shes dang bral bar byed cing rnam par shes pa'i 'du shes dang bral nas stong pa nyid kyis 'khor ba las 'brel ba pa dang / skye mched dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel par
285b2('bum): 'byung ba'i 'du shes dang bral bar byed cing / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i 'du shes dang bral nas stong pa nyid kyis 'khor ba las 'brel pa dang / 'dus byas kyi 'du shes dang bral bar byed cing 'dus byas kyi 'du
285b3('bum): shes dang bral nas 'dus ma byas kyi dbyings stong pa nyid yin yang / 'dus byas kyi dbyings su 'god pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa khyu mchog gi mthur myi 'gyur ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de cis slong pa
285b4('bum): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'du shes thams cad kyis stong ste/ rab 'byor dal la zhig gis sprul pa zhig sprul na/ de ga stong pa nyid ma yin pa de lta bu'i dngos po gang yang yod dam/ 
285b5('bum): gsol pa bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so// sprul pa/ de la gang stong pa nyid ma lags par de lta bu'i dngos po gang yang ma ma chis te/ stong pa nyid gang lags pa dang / sprul pa gang lag
285b6('bum): pa'i chos de gnyis ka yang ldan pa yang ma lags myi ldan pa yang ma lags te/ de gnyis ka yang stong pa nyid kyis stong na/ de ci'i slad du/ 'di ni stong pa nyid do// 'di ni sprul pa'o zhes bgyi bar bcas par mdzad/ 
285b7('bum): de ci'i slad du zhe na/ de ni 'di lta ste stong pa nyid dang / sprul pa gnyis ka yang stong pa nyid la dmyigasu mya ngan/ mchis so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal dpa/ rab 'byor nga gzugs sam/ tshor ba 'am/ 'du
285b8('bum): shes sam/ 'du byed ngam rnam par shes la yang gang yang sprul pa ma yin pa de lta bu yod dam/ gang sprul pa de ni stong gnyid do/ gsol pa bcom ldan 'das gal te 'jig rten gyi chos sprul pa lags kyang / 
286a1('bum): 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos 'di lta ste/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan
286a2('bum): lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / rnam par thard pa'i sgo gsum dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang / rna bar tha rad pa brgyad dang / mthar kyis gnas pa
286a3('bum): snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / ting nge 'dzand thams cad dang / gzungs gi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / myi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / 
286a4('bum): byams pa chen po dang / stong rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad dang / de dag gi 'bras bu gang gis gang zag rgyun tu zhugs pa dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang / 
286a5('bum): phyir myi 'ong ba dang / dgra bcom pa nyid dang / rang byang chub dang / de bzhin gsheg pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas zhes gang zag rnam par dgod pa'i chos de dag sprul pa lta bu lags
286a6('bum): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor nga chos thams cad ni sprul pa lta bu ste/ de la la mi rang sangs rgyas kyi sprul pa'o// la la ni byang chub sems dpa'i sprul pa'o// la la ni de bzhin gshegs
286a7('bum): pas sprul pa'o// la la ni nyon mongs pas sprul pa'o// lA ni las kyis sprul pa'o// rab 'byor da rna grangs des na kyang / chos thams cad ni sprul pa'o// gsol pa bcom ldan 'das gang spangs pa zhes
286a8('bum): bgyi na/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'am/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'am/ phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'am/ dgra bcom pa nyid dang / rang sangs rgyasti sa ma/ sangs kyi sa 'am// bag chags kyi
286b1('bum): mtshams sbyor ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs pa'i chos de dag kyang sprul pa lta bu lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/ rab 'byor nga skye ba'am 'gag pa'i chos gang yang rung ste de thas cad/ 
286b2('bum): ni sprul pa'o// gsol pa bcom ldan 'das gang ma sprul pa'i chos de dag gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos gang la skye ba yang myed 'gag pa yang myed pa de ni ma sprul pa ste/ gsol
286b3('bum): pa de gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal par myi mnyam pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa ste/ chos de ni ma sprul pa'o// gsolang pa bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad du stong pa nyid las myi g.yo'o/ 
286b4('bum): gnyi su yang myi dmyigs te/ chos gang yang stong pa nyid ma yin pa'i mde lta bu myed do zhes bka' stsal rnyed pa ltar na/ bcom ldan 'das myi mnyam pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa yang sprul par 'gyur ro// bcom
286b5('bum): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pas/ rab 'byor da de de bzhino// de de bzhin te de/ rab 'byor de chos thams cad ni stong pa ste/ de dag ni nyan thos kyis ma byas/ rang sangs rgyas kyis ma byas/ byang
286b6('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ma byas/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyisam byas te/ ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa gang yin pa de ni mya ngan las
286b7('bum): 'das pa'o// rab 'byor kyis gsol dpe/ bcom ldan 'das las dang po pa'i gang zag gis ngo bo nyid gis stong pa nyid yongs su 'tshal bar bgyi na// ji ltar gdags shing rje su bstand par bgyi/ bcom ldan
286b8('bum): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor nga ji dngos po myang yod par gyur pa la/ phyis dngos po myed par gyur pa yod dam/ rab 'byor de 'di la dngos po yod pa yang myed/ dngos po myed pa yang myed/ ngo bo nyid myed/ 
287a1('bum): nagazhan gyi dngos po yang myed na/ de la yongs su shes par bya ba'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ces bya ba lta yod par 'gyur re skand// / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa stong phrag nyi shu
287a2('bum): lnga pa las chos nyid myi 'gyur bar bstan de pa'i le'u ste/ bdun bcu gcig pa'o// shes rab bam pa// 
287a3('bum): de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos byams pas zhus pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod cing
287a4('bum): byang chub sems dpa'i slob pa la slob par 'tshal bas/ gzugs la ji ltar bslab par bgyi/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa ji ltar bslab par bgyi/ myig gi skye mched dang
287a5('bum): rna ba'i skye mched dang / sna'i skye mched dang / lce'i skye/ mched dang / lus kyi skye mched dang / yid kyi skye mched la ji ltarabaslab par bgyi/ gzugs kyi skye mched dang / sgra'i skye mched dang / 
287a6('bum): dri'i skye mched dang / ro'i skye mched dang / reg gi skye mched dang / chos kyi skye mched la ji ltar bslab par bgyi/ te myig gi khams dang / gzugs kyi khams dang / myig gi rna bar shes
287a7('bum): ba'i khams dang / rna ba'i khams dang / sgra'i khams dang / rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i khams dang / sna'i khams dang / dri'i khams dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa'i khams dang / lce'i khams dang / ro'i khams dang / 
287a8('bum): lce'i rdza bar she pa'i khams dang / lus kyi khams dang / lus kyi rna bar shes pa'i khas dang / yid kyi khas dang / chos kyi khas dang / yid kyi rna bar shes pa'i khas dang ga la ji ltar bslab par bgyin myig gi 'dus
287b1('bum): te reg pa'i skye mched dang de rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i skye mched la ji ltar bslab par bgyi// ma rig pa la ji ltar bslab par bgyi/ 'du byed dang / rje bar shes dang mying ngang
287b2('bum): gzugs dang / skye mched drug dang / reg pa dang / tshor ba dang / sred pa dang / len pa dang / srid pa dang / skye ba dang / rga shi dang la ji ltar bslab par bgyid sdug bsngal gyi bden pa la ji ltar bslab par bgyid
287b3('bum): kun 'byung gi bden pa dang / 'gog pa'i bden pa dang / lam gi bden pa la ji ltar bslab par bgyi// gzugs dang chos la ji ltar bslab par bgyi/ gzugs myed pa dang / snang ba dang bcas pa dang / 
287b4('bum): snang ba myed pa dang / thogs pa dang bcas pa dang / thogs pa myed pa dang / 'dus byas dang / 'dus ma byas dang / zag pa dang bcas dang / zag pa myed pa dang / kha na ma tho ba dang bcas
287b5('bum): pa dang kha na ma tho ba myed pa dang / bsten par bya ba dang / bsten par myi bya ba dang / bzang ba dang ngan pa dang / nang gi dang phyi'i dang mthong ba dang / thos pa dang / shes pa dang / 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs
287b6('bum): pa dang da ltar gyi rang / dge ba dang sa myi dge ba dang / lung du bstand pa dang / lung du bstan pa dang / lung du ma bstan pa dang / 'dod par rtogs pa dang / gzugasu rtogs pa dang / ma tshogs pa dang / slod pa dang / 
287b7('bum): myi slob pa dang / slob pa yang ma yin myi slob pa yang ma yin pa dang / 'dod chags dang / khong khro ba pa dang / nga rgyal dang / ma rig pa dang / lta ba dang / the tsom la ji ltar bslab par bgyi/ sbyin pa dang / ser sna dang
287b8('bum): tshul khrims dang / tshul khrims ngan pa dang / bzod pa dang / gnod sems dang / brtson 'grus dang / le lo dang / bsam gtan dang / g.yeng ba dang de shes rab dang / shes rab ngan pa la ji ltar bslab par
288a1('bum): bgyi/ stong pa nyid dang / rnam par rtog pa dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smond pa myed pa dang / log pa'i smon lam dang / myi dge ba'i chos dang / myi rtag pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / bdag myed pa
288a2('bum): la ji ltar bslab par bgyi/ nyon mongs pa dang / nyon mongs pa spangs pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa dang / rnam par byang ba dang / 'khor ba dang / mya ngan las 'das pa dang / byang chub dang / sangs rgyas
288a3('bum): kyi chos la ji ltar bslab par bgyi// de skad ces bka' stsal da pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' byams pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// byams pa byang
288a4('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol pa tu phyind pa la spyod cing / byang chub sems dpa'i bsla ba pa la slob par 'dod pas/ gzugs mying tsam du zad par slab par bya/ 
288a5('bum): tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rna bar shes pa mying tsam du zad nas/ sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi bar du mying tsam du zad par bslab par bya'o// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom
288a6('bum): ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sem byams pas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gang gi tshe gzugs zhes bgyi bar mying tsam du brjod pa'i di dngos po dang bcas par dmyags// tshor ba dang
288a7('bum): 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rna bar shes pa zhes bgyi bar mying tsam du brjod pa 'di dngos po dang bcas par dmyigs nas/ sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi bar du mying du brjod pa 'di ni dngos po dang bcas par dmigs te
288a8('bum): 'di ltar 'dus byas kyi mtshan ma de dang de dag la rten nas dngos po dang bcas par dmyigs na/ de ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ gzugs mying tsam du bas par bslab par bgyi/ tshor ba dang
288b1('bum): 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes mying tsam du bas nas sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi bar du mying tsam du bas par bslab par 'gyir myong de'i dngos po ma mchis nanagang 'di gzug so zhes bgyi ba'i mying nam de
288b2('bum): yang myi rig so/ gang 'di tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rdza bar shes pa zhes pagyi ba'i mying bam po de yang myi rigaso pa nas gang sangs rgyas zhes bgyi ba'i bar gyi mying tsam pa de yang myi rigaso// des
288b3('bum): ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa'al bka' stsal pa/ byams pa byang chub sems dpa' gang 'di gzugs zhes bgyi ba 'di ni 'du byed kyi mtsham ma'i dngos po de dag la mying
288b4('bum): bla dgas su btags pa'o// gang 'di tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rna bar shes pa zhes bgyi ba de ni mying bla dag su btags pa nas/ gang 'dis sangs rgyas kyi so zhes bya ba mying du bla dgaso pa'o// 
288b5('bum): de skad ces bka' stsalang ma dang / bcom ldan 'ang/ la byang chub sems dpa' byams pas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gang gi slad du 'du byed kyi mtshan ma'i dngos po zhes bgyi
288b6('bum): ba'i mying de la yid ches khongasu chud na so sor rig bA gyur te/ gzugs zhes bgyi ba'i mying des kyang 'du byed kyi mtsham ma'i dngos po des kyang de dang de la yang ches pa dang / khong du chud pa dang
288b7('bum): so ser rig par gyur pa na/ de ji ltar 'du byed kyi mtshan ma'i dngos po de dang de dag tu gang la gzugaso zhes mying du bla dgasu btags par 'gyurd/ bcom ldan 'das gang gi slad du 'du byed kyi mtshan mi'i dngos po tshor
288b8('bum): bzhes bgyi ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rna par shes pa zhes bgyi ba nas/ bcom ldan 'das gang gi slad du 'du byed kyi mtshan mi'i dngos po/ sangs rgyas kyi chos zhes bgyi ba'i bang gi mying gis yod / 
289a1('bum): ches par bya dang / khong du chud par dang / so sor rig par 'gyur/ tshor ba shes par 'gyur ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rna bar shes pa zhes bgyi ba de dag dang / sangs rgyas kyi bar gyi mying de rig/ 
289a2('bum): gis 'du byed kyi mtshan ma'i dngos po de dag la yid ches pa dang / khongs su chud chud pa dang / so sor rig par gyur pa na/ de ji ltar 'du byed kyi mtshan ma'i dngos po de dang de dag la gang 'di ni gzug so// tshor ba dang
289a3('bum): 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rna bar shes pa zhes bya ba nas gang 'di ni sangs rgyas kyi chos so zhes bya ba'i bar du mying de dag bla dgas su btags par 'gyur// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das
289a4('bum): kyis byang chub sems dpa' byams pa la bka' stsal pa/ de'i phyir khyod nyid la dris/ khyod kyis ji ltar nus pa de ltar lan thob shig/ byams pa de ji snyam du sems/ 'du byed kyi mtshan ma'i dngos po de dang de
289a5('bum): dag la gang 'di sangs rgyas gzugs zhes bya ba'i mying de las bzhi ma ma rten par myi gnas pa'i 'du byed kyi mtshan ma'i dngos po de dang de da ga la 'di ni gzugaso zhes bya bar 'gyur ro/ gsol
289a6('bum): bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lagaso// byams pa de ji snyam du sems/ 'du byed kyi mtshan ma'i dngos po de dang de dag las 'di ni gang 'di tshor ba zhes bya ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang
289a7('bum): rje par shes pa zhes bya ba de byams pa ji snyam du sems/ 'du byed kyi mtshan ma'i dngos po de dang de dag la/ gang 'di skad du sangs rgyas kyi chos zhes bya ba 'di ni bar du mying du gdags pa de dag las gzhi ma
289a8('bum): blangs ma rten par myi gnas par 'du byed kyi mtshan ma'i dngos po de dang de dag tu tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa nas sangs rgyas kyi chos bya ba'i bar du de ltar 'gyur ram/ gsol pa/ 
289b1('bum): bcom ldan 'das ma lagasod/ byams pa gzhung des kyang khyod kyis 'di ltar rig par rig par bya'o// 'du byed kyi mtsham ma'i dngos po dang de dag la gzugs zhes bya ba dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang /

289b3('bum): mi byams pa ji snyam du sems// 'du byed kyi mtshan ma'i dngos po de dang de dag la mying dang brda' dang / tha snyad kyis gdags pa dang / rnam pa sna tshogs kyis nye bar spyod pa 'amanatha snyad kyis bya
289b4('bum): ba 'am gdags pa 'am/ mngon par zhen par 'gyur ramag gsol pa bcom ldan 'das de ltar 'gyur ro// byams pa gzhung des kyang khyod kyis 'di ltar rig par bya'o// 'du byed kyi
289b5('bum): mtshan ma'i dngos po de dang de dag la gzugs shes bya ba dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba gang yin pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos zhes bya ba gang yin pa'i bar du de dag
289b6('bum): ni mying dang bla dag su btags pa'o// ci 'di la 'du byed kyi mtshan ma'i dngos po de dag nyid kha cig la 'du byed kyi mtshan ma'i dngos po de las gzhan bdag gis 'du shes sre/ gdags pa'i// mying ngam/ tha snyad
289b7('bum): ngam mngon par zhen par 'gyur ram/ gsol dpa bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du 'gyur ro// khyams pa gzhung des kyang khyod kyis de 'di ltar rig par bya'o// 'du byed kyi mtshan ma'i dngos po'i drug sa gzugs sos
289b8('bum): pa dang tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rna bar shes pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos shes bya ba'i bar du do ni de dag gi bla dag su btags pa'o// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la byang chu/ 
290a1('bum): sems dpa' byams pas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na gang 'du byed gi mtshan ma'i dngos po myed pa/ gzugs kyi ngo bo nyid dmyigs pa nyid du myi 'gyur ram gang la
290a2('bum): brten pas mying dngag 'du shes dang / gdags pa dang / tha snyad du 'gyur ba'i gzugs dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba gang yin pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos zhes bya'i/
