290a4('bum): dngos po la mying dang 'du shes dang / gdags pa dang / tha snyad du gang gzugs zhes bya ba gang yin pa de snyam du gzugs kyi ngo bo nyid dam/ rang bzhin nams 'on te btags pa tsam du zad
290a5('bum): gsol pa bcom ldan 'das btags pa tsam du bso// 'o na byams pa khyod ji ltar 'du byed kyi 'di snyam du gzugs kyi ngo bo nyid dmyigs pa nyid do du sems se/ byams pa 'du byed kyi mtshan ma'i dngos pa la
290a6('bum): mying dang / 'du shes dang / btags pa dang / tha snyad du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rna bar shes pa nas sangs rgyas kyi chos shes bya ba'i bar du gang yin pa de dag ji snyam du sems ngo bo nyid dam
290a7('bum): tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rna bar shes pa nas sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi bar du btags pa tsam du zad/ gsol ba bcom ldan 'das btags pa tsam du bso// 'o na byams pa khyod ji ltar 'di snye du
290a8('bum): sems// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rna bar shes pa nas sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi bar du dmyigs pa nyid du sems// de skad ces bka' stsalang pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la byang chub seMs dpa' byas pas
290b1('bum): 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de ste gzugs kyi mying dang / 'du shes dang / bda' dang / gdags pa dang / tha snyad gang lags pa dang / bcom ldan 'das de ste tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rna bar shes
290b2('bum): pa nas sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi bar du mying dang / 'du shes dang / brda' dang / gdags pa dang / tha snyad tsam zhes bgyi ba de ltar gyur pa gzugs kyi ngo bo nyid dmyigs pa nyid du myi 'gyur ramu/ de ltar gyur pa na tshor ba dang 'du shes dang
290b3('bum): 'du byed dang / rna bar shes pa nas sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi chos kyi bar du mying dang ka 'du shes dang / brda' dang / gdags pa dang / tha snyad tsam zhes bgyi ba'i ngo bo nyid dmyigs pa nyid du 'gyur ram/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / 
290b4('bum): bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' byams pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// byams pa 'di ji snyam du sems/ gang gzugs zhes bgyi gyi bya ba 'di mying dang / 'du shes dang / brda' dang / gdags pa dang / tha
290b5('bum): skang tsam 'i/ 'on te de la skye ba'am 'jig pa 'am/ sun nas nyon mongs pa 'am/ rna bar byang ba yang dam/ gsol pa bcom ldan 'das ma la gso/ bkar stsal pa/ 'on byams pa khyod ji lang nga
290b6('bum): ma dums kya da yod par bas/ byasade'i nyam dumams / cho pa dag 'asug dang / 'du byed dang / gas panas sas rgyas kyi tsha gyi mang dug so pa nga myong su
290b7('bum): nga / gdags nga/ bstang cas 'am/ 'an la rgyu ba'/ 'jig pa nga// kun nas nyin mos pa'am/ rnam byu ba yod dang / gangs pa ma ldam dmams nas 'on rgya ma
290b8('bum): mang gyu yang lus pa du byu kyi dus sa ma bya ga mas
291a1('bum): dpa' chen po byams pas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das ci lags / gzugs rdzab thams cad mtshan nyid thams cad du ma mchis pa lags sam/ tshor bcom ldan 'das ji lags/ tshor ba dang 'du
291a2('bum): shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa nas sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi bar du rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang mtshan nyid thams cad du ma mchis pa lags sam/ de skad ces gsol pa dang ga bcom ldan 'das kyis
291a3('bum): byang chub sems dpa' byams pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// byams pa nga ni gzugs thams cad dang mtshan nyid rnam pa tha dad du myed do zhes myi smra'o// byams pa nga ni tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam
291a4('bum): par shes pa nas sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi bar du rnam pa thams cad dang mtshan nyid thams cad du myed do zhes nga smra'o// de skad ces bka' stsal/ da pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' byems
291a5('bum): pas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gzugs ji lta bur mchis/ bcom ldan 'das tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rdzi par shes pa nas sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi bar du
291a6('bum): ji ltar bur mchis/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' byams pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// byams pa gzugs ni 'jig rten gyi brda' dang tha snyad yod kyi don dam
291a7('bum): khar yod pa yin no// byams pa tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa nas sangs rgyas kyi bar du 'jig rten gi brdal dang / tha snyad yod kyi/ don dam par ni ma yin no// de skad ces bka'
291a8('bum): stsal pa dang / bcom ldan la byang chub sems dpa' byams pas 'di skad ces gar gsol da to// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis bcom ldan 'das bka' stsal pa'i don 'tshal ba ltar na/ dbyangs 'di ni dam par
291b1('bum): brjod du ma mchis pa'o// bcom ldan 'das de ste don dam par brjod du ma mchis pa'i dbyings lags na/ bcom ldan 'das 'du byed kyi mtshan ma'i dngos po de la ji ltar gzugs shes bgyi ba'i mying bla dag su
291b2('bum): btags pa'o// 'du byed kyi mtshan ma'i dngos po gang lags pa de la tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du shes byed dang / rnam par shes pa nas sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi bar du mying bla dag su btags/ de bas na don par ma
291b3('bum): ma mchis// de ste don dam par ma mchis na/ de ji ltar 'du byed kyi mtshan ma'i dngos po brjod du ma mchis par 'gyur// de lta bas na brjod du ma mchis pa'i dbyings zhes bgyi ba myi rig so// de skad ces gsol pa dang
291b4('bum): bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal pa/ de bas na byams pa khyod nyid la dris khyod kyis nus pa lan thob shig/ byams pa de ji snyam du sems/ nam khyod brjod pa ma
291b5('bum): mchis pa'i dbyings la shes rab spyod pa de'i tshe/ 'du byed kyi/ mtshan ma'i dngos po gang la gzugs zhes bya ba dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rje bar shes pa nas sangs rgyas
291b6('bum): kyi bar du gang la mying bla dgasu btags par bya ba de dag khyod kyis yod par dmyigs sa// gsol pa bcom ldan 'das ma la gsod/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ byams pa gzhung 'dis kyang
291b7('bum): khyod kyis 'di lta rig par bya'o// 'du byed kyi mtshan ma ngos po de 'arjod du myed pa'i dbyings kyang ma yin/ 'du byed kyimatsham ma'i dngos po gzugs gas bya ba dang / tshor ba dang / 'dugs dang / 'du bya
291b8('bum): 'a byu sa las yang rgyas kyi megs kyim bang chung sasu pa ngog sa yod byung 'i rgyas ga pa mas kyil sal bya semam
292a1('bum): sdug bsngal rgyun chad pa zhig yod pa dang / de nas skyes bu la la zhig gis grong khyer chen po de'i yang dag pa'i yon tan dang / bsngags pa thos nas skyes bu de la bu mthong na dga' ba sdug pa yid du 'o
292a2('bum): myi mthun pa ma yin pa/ gcig kyang yod pa las/ de las bu gcig po de bor nas/ grong khyer chen po de'i lam du zhus te/ de stobs kyi shugs dang / brtson 'grus thas cad kyis sdug bsngal khyad ba ngas
292a3('bum): te/ lam ring po de 'das nas/ rkang pa ya cig ni grong khyer chen po de'i sgo them pa la bzhag rkang pa ya cig ni phyi rol na 'dug pa las/ des bu cig pa de yid la dran par gyur nas de 'di snye du sems te/ ma la rkye
292a4('bum): bdag gi bu gcig pa de 'drir khrid de ma 'ongs pa lta zhig snyam nas/ bu cig pa de sdug pas grong khyer chen po der ma zhugs kyi phyi ra phyogs nas/ debu cig pa dag la bdug par slar log pa bzhin
292a5('bum): du/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang 'bad pa chen po dang / brtson 'grus rtsom pa chen po dang lhag pa 'i bsam pa brtan pa nan tan gis mngon par shes pa lnga po rnams
292a6('bum): skyed de/ sems kyis bas gtan dang / mngon par shes pa yongasu sbyangs pa byas pa de la zag pa zad pa'i ye shes mngon su du 'gyuraro// de snying rje chen po'i sems skyes nas/ sems can thos cad yongasu bskyab pa'i phyir/ 
292a7('bum): thog pa zad pa'i ye shes 'dris par byas pa las/ sems can rnams la lta bas phyir phyogs te/ slar log nas so so'i skye bo'i sa na yang kun tu snang // rigs kyi bu grong khyer zhes bya ba de ni zag pa zang pa'i ye shes
292a8('bum): kyi tshig bla dag so// dpag tshad brgya stong phrag bye ba dgrong dgos pa zhes bya ba de ni/ 'khor ba dpag tu myed pa zhes bya ba de ni 'khor ba dpag tu myed pa yongasu 'dzin pa'i tshig bla dag so// bar du gcod pa mang po bgrang
292b1('bum): ces bya ba ni bdud kyis 'dun pa zlog pa bar chad kyi tshig blo dag so// skyes bu zhes bya ba ni byang chub sems dpa'i tshig bla dag so// rkang pa ya cig ni grong khyer gi sgo'i thim pa la bzhag rkang pa ya cig ni phyi rol du banan
292b2('bum): ces bya ba ni/ 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' 'dus byas dang / 'dus ma byas dang / 'dres pa'i sems dang / sems las byung ba rnams 'jug pa'o// cig pa dran nas grong khyer chen po dor zhugs pa las phyir phyogs
292b3('bum): te/ slar log ces bya ba de ni 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems can thos cad la bu cig pa bzhin du byams pa nye bar gnas par 'gyur ba'o// de zag pa'i spyi bor phyin kyang zag pa yang myi spong ba la sos
292b4('bum): can yongasu smin par bya ba'i phyir phyogs shing ldog par yang myi 'gyu/ da ra te/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams ci 'dra ba'ibs mkhas pas sems can rnams la cher snying rje ba la ltos/ 
292b5('bum): de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ byang chub sems dpa' seMs dpa' chen po gtsug na rin po ches 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom lda na 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnaMs la 'di
292b6('bum): ltar byang chub lag mthil du 'thob pa yang myi 'tshal bar 'khor ba nyid kyi rje su 'jug cing / sems can yongasu smin par bgyid pas yongasu myi skyo ba ni ngo mtshar to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sos/ 
292b7('bum): dpa' chen po chos du zhig dang ldan na/ 'khor ba na yongasu myi skyo ba lags// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams chos nyi shu dang ldan na/ 'khor ba ma
292b8('bum): yongasu myi skyo ba yin te/ chos nyi shu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste dge ba'i rtsa ba yang dag par zin pa'i byams pa chen po dang / byams pa chen po yang dag par zin pa'i snying rje chen po dang / snying rje chen po yang dag pa zin pa
293a1('bum): du myed pa'i dbyings yin par gyur na ni/ khyim pa so so'i skye bo thams cad kyang mya ngan las 'das pa 'am/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sangs rgyas nye par 'gyur ro// byas
293a2('bum): pa de 'du byed kyi mtshan mi'i dngos po gang las brjod du myed pa'i dbyings gzhan zhig yin no// brjod du myed pa'i dbyings kyang gang la/ brjod myed pa'i dbyings rab tu chud par bya ba de'i mtshan ma yang dmyig su myed par
293a3('bum): 'gyur ro// byams pa gzhung 'dis kyang khyod kyis 'di ltar rig par bya'o// 'du byed kyi mtshan ma'i dngos po gang de brjod du myed pa'i dbyings kyang ma yin/ gang la gzugs zhes bya ba dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang
293a4('bum): 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa nas sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi bar du mying bla dgas su btags pa de dag las brjod du myed pa'i dbyings kyang mu y-i no// de skad ces bka' stsal po dang / bcom
293a5('bum): ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' byams pas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de ste byang chub sems dpa' brjod du myed pa'i dbyings dang / nye bar 'brel pa'i shes rab kyi spyod
293a6('bum): pa la gnas pa de mi/ 'du byed kyi mtshan ma'i dngos po gang gzugs zhes bgyi ba dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa nas sangs rgyas kyi chos zhes bgyi ba'i bar du mying bla dag su gangags
293a7('bum): pa gang lags pa gang lags pa de dag dmyigasu ma mchis na/ bcom ldan 'das de ji lags mchis pa las dmyigasu ma mchis pas/ 'on te ma mchis pa lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das
293a8('bum): kyis byang chub sems dpa' byams pa la bka' stsal pa/ byams pa 'du byed kyi mtshan ma'i dngos po rang dbang du yod pa nyid dam/ myed pa nyid du myi 'gyur ba myed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byams pa khyod gang gi tshe/ 
293b1('bum): 'du byed kyi mtsham mo'i dngos po de la rnam par rtog pa ro'i tshe/ 'du byed kyi mtshan ma'i dngos po de la rnam par rtog pas bzung ba ma yin/ gang gi tshe brjod du myed pa'i dbyings dang / lta bar 'brel pa'i zhes rab / 
293b2('bum): pha rol tu phyind pa la gnas shing rnam par myi rtog pa'i ngo tshen yang / rdza bar myi rtog pas zin par ma gyurd tam/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lagaso// byams pa de ltar na 'du byed kyi mtshan ma'i dngos po dang / 
293b3('bum): la gzugs shes bya ba dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa nas sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad ces bya bar mying bla dag su gdags pa gang yin pa de dag rno par rtog pa tsam du'ang
293b4('bum): ma yin nam/ de rnam par rtog pa tsam du zad na yang / rnam par myi rtog pa'i dbyings la gnas shing / rnam par rtog pa gsal ba na/ yod pa dmyigs pa gang la gzugs shes bya ba dang / tshor ba dang / 'du
293b5('bum): shes dang / 'a byed dang / rnam par shes pa nas sangs rgyasakyi chos kyi bar zhes du yod par dmyigs pa gang yin/ de skadaces bka' stsal pa dang / byang chub bcom ldan 'das la
293b6('bum): byang chub sems dpa' byams pas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinod pa la spyod cing / chos rab tu 'byed mkhas pa la gnas pas/ gzug
293b7('bum): rab tu 'byed pa rnam pa yums gdags par 'tshal bar bgyi// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa nas sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi bar du rab tu dbye ba rnam pa du mas gdags par 'tshal pa
293b8('bum): bgyi/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' byams pa la bka' stsal pa/ byams pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod cing / chos rab tu dbye ba mkhas pa la gan+d+ha/ 
294a1('bum): pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnam pa gsum gyis/ gzugs rab tu dbye ba gdags pa rjesu shes par bya'o// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa nas sangs rgya
294a2('bum): kyi bar du rab tu dbye ba gdags pa rje su shes par bya ste/ 'di ltar 'di ni yongasu brtags pa'i gzugs 'di ni rnam par brtags pa'i 'du shes/ 'di ni chos nyid kyi gzugaso// 'di ltar 'di ni yongs su
294a3('bum): brtags pa'i tshor ba/ 'di ni rnam par rtags pa'i tshor ba/ 'di ni chos nyid kyi tshor ba'o// 'di ltar 'di ni yongasu brtag pa'i 'du shes/ 'di ni rnam par brtags pa'i 'du shes na 'di ni chos nyid kyi 'du shes so/ 
294a4('bum): 'di ltar 'di ni yongasasu brtags pa'i 'du byed na 'di ni rnam par brtags pa'i 'du byed/ 'di ni chos nyid kyi 'ud byed do// 'di ltar 'di ni yongs brtags pa'i rnam par shes pa/ 'di ni rnam par brtags pa'i
294a5('bum): rnam par shes pa// 'di ni chos nyid kyi rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba nasa'adi ltar 'di dag ni yongasasu brtags pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos 'di dag ni rnam par brtags pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos
294a6('bum): 'di dag ni chos nyid kyi sangs rgyas kyi chos so zhes bya ba'i bar du'o// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' byams pas 'di skad ces gsol to// 
294a7('bum): bcom ldan 'das yongasu brtags pa'i gzugs gang lags/ rnam par brtags pa'i gzugs gang lags/ chos nyid kyi gzugs gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das yongasu brtags pa'i tshor ba dang / 'du sa
294a8('bum): dang 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa nas gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das yongasu brtags pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos gang lags/ rnam par brtags pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos gang lags/ chos nyid kyi sangs
294b1('bum): bya rlon stsam pa byams padudu byed bya ma ma ma ma pa dang dag pa gzug sanas myong dang / 'jugs dang / gdags pa dang / lag nga byab la pa bzu chu na
294b2('bum): su brtags pa gang yin pa deni/ yong su btags pa'i gtsun pa khyams pa 'du byed kyi mngan pa'i dngos po dang ngo dag ma chor bu dang / 'jugs dang / 'du byed dpar nas pa shes pa nas sangs rgyas bya
294b3('bum): so nas bya ba'i bar du mying dang 'du shes dang / gdags pa dang / tha snyang du bya ba la brtan nas tshor ba'i ngo bo nyid dang 'jugs dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa nas sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi bar du yong su rtogs pa/ 
294b4('bum): gang yin pa 'di dag ni yongasu rtogs pa'i tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa nas sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi bar 'di dag ni yongasu brtags pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos so// 
294b5('bum): 'du byed kyi mtshan ma'i dngos po de dang de dag la rnam par rtog pa'i mtshan nyid tsam du gnas pa'i rnam par rtog pa brten nas/ mngon par smra bgang la 'di ni mying dang / 'du shes dang / gdags pa dang / 
294b6('bum): tha snyad kyi gzugaso// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa nas sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi bar du'o// zhes bya ba gang yin pa 'di ni rna bar brtags pa'i gzug so// 'di ni rnam par brtags pa'i
294b7('bum): tshor ba dang / rnam par brtags pa'i 'du shes dang / rnam par brtags pa'i 'du byed dang / rnam par brtags pa'i rnam par shes pa nas/ sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi bar du'o// de bzhin gshegs pa rnams byung yang
294b8('bum): rung radre bzhin gshegs pa rnams ma byung yang rung / chos nyid dang chos kyi gnas nyid kyi dbyings 'di dag ni gnas pa nyid der brtags pa'i gzugs gang yin pa des rnam par brtags pa'i gzugs brtag
295a1('bum): rtag pa'i dus brtan zhing brtan pa'i dus ngo bo nyid myed do// chos bdag myed pa dang / de bzhin nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' gang yin pa de ni chos nyid kyi gzugaso// 'di ni chos nyid kyi tshor ba dang / 'du
295a2('bum): shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa nas 'di dag ni chos nyid kyi sangs rgyas kyi cho so zhes bya ba'i bar du'o// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan la byang chub sems dpa' byams pas 'di skad ces gas
295a3('bum): lang to// bcom ldan 'das gzugs 'di gsum las gzugs gang ma mchis par blta bar bgyi/ gang rdzas ma mchis pa lags gang mchis pa yang ma lags/ gang rdzas ma mchis pa lpags ma/ don dam pas rab tu
295a4('bum): phyi ba lags/ bcom ldan 'das tshor ba 'di gsum dang / 'du shes 'di gsum dang / rnam par shes pa 'di gsum dang 'ad byed 'di gsum dang / rnam par shes pa 'di gsum nas sangs rgyas kyi chos 'di gsu
295a5('bum): gi bar du sangs rgyas kyi chos gang rdzas ma mchis par lta bar bgyi// gang rdzas mchis pa yang ma lags/ rdzas ma mchis ma pa yang ma lags par lta bar bgyi zhing mngon par rab tu phye ba zlags
295a6('bum): de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' byams pa la bka' stsal da pa/ byams pa yongasu brtags pa gzugs gang yin pa de ni rdzas myed par lta'o// rnam pa
295a7('bum): brtags pa'i gzugs gang yin pa de ni rnam par brtags pa'i rjes yongs su yod par lta ba'i rang dbang du 'jug pa ni ma yin no// chos nyid kyi gzugs gang yin pa de ni rdzas myed pa yang ma yin/ rdzas yod pa yang ma
295a8('bum): yin te/ don dam pas phye bar blta'o// yongs su brtags pa'i tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa nas yongasu brtags pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos gang yin pa'i bar du 'di dag ni rdzas myed pa/ 
295b1('bum): blta mini rnam par brtags pa'i tshor ba dang / 'dunas dang / 'du byed dang / rnam pa thoms pa yin pa nas na rnam par brtags pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos yang yin pa'i bar du rnam par rtog pa yod pa'i phyir rdzas/ 
295b2('bum): yod par lta ba'i rang dbang du 'jug pa ni ma yin no// byams pa chos nyid kyi tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa gang yin pa nas chos nyid kyi sangs rgyas kyi chos gang yin pa'i bar du
295b3('bum): de dag ni rdzas myed pa yang ma yin/ rdzas yod pa yang ma yin te/ don dam pas rab tu phye ba ma yin par lta'o// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' byams pas 'di
295b4('bum): skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di ltar gzugs shes bgyi ba gnyis su ma mchis par brtsis/ 'di ltar tshor ba dang 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnamap+pa nas sangs rgya
295b5('bum): kyi chos kyi bar du de dag gnyis su ma mchis par brtsis te/ de ltar gzu gas rab tu dbye ba mdzadanatshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang rnam par shes pa nas sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi bar du
295b6('bum): dbye bar mdzad na/ bcom ldan 'das kyis ci la dgongs nas/ 'di ltar gzugs shes bgyi ba 'di gnyi su ma mchis par myos/ 'di ltar tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam pa na shes pa nas sangs
295b7('bum): rgyas kyi bar du gnyis su ma mchis par brtsas te stand/ de skad kyi ces gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' byams la bka' stsal dpa byams pa de ji snyam du sems/ yongs su
295b8('bum): rtog pa'i gzugs la rdzas myed pa de gzugs sams 'on te gzugs ma yin/ gsold pa bcom ldan 'das ma lags so// gang yang de la mying dang / 'du shes dang / gdags pa dang / ba skad tsam gi gsus
296a1('bum): shes bya ba ji gzugs yin nam/ gsoyod pa bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lan mad / byams pa rnam grangs des kyang khyod kyis rig par rim par byamod yongs su brtags pa'i gzugs gang mim pa ma
296a2('bum): gzugs ma yin no// gzugs myed pa yang ma yin no// gzugs kyang ma yin gzugs myed pa yang ma yin/ pa gang yin pa de ni gnyis su myed pa ste/ ngas 'di la dgongs nas/ 'di ltar gzugs zhes bya ba 'di gnyis su/ 
296a3('bum): myed par brtsi bar gsungaso// byams pa de ji snyam du sems/ rnam par brtags pa'i gzugs rdzas yod pa de la rten nas mying dang 'du shes dang / gdags pa dang na tha snyad du 'gyur ba gang yin pa de ni gzugs yin nam/ 
296a4('bum): gsol pa bcom ldan 'das ma lags so// byams pa de ji snyam du sems/ rnam par brtags pa'i gzugs de nyid la yongasu brtags pa'i gzu rdzogs kyi ngo bo nyid myed pa dang / de'i mtshan nyid gang yin pa de
296a5('bum): ci gzugs yin nam/ bsol dpa bcom ldan 'das ma la gso/ byams pa gzhung des kyang khyod kyis 'di ltar rig par bya'o// rnam par brtags pa'i gzugs gang yin pa de ni gzugs ma yin/ 
296a6('bum): gzugs myed pa yang ma yin/ gzugs kyang ma yin gzugs myed pa yang ma yin pa de yang gnyis su myed pa ste/ ngas de la dgongs nas/ 'di ltar gzugs shes bya ba 'di gnyis su myed par brtsi bar
296a7('bum): gsungs don byams pa da jigam du sems/ chos kyi gzugs padag byed par rab tu phye ba'i bathugs yin nam/ gsolang pa bcom ldan 'das ma la gsod/ chos nyid kyi gzugs dong / gathun sa phyin ma nyid ga ming
296a8('bum): rab de'i yang ci gzugs yin nam/ gsol pa bcom ldan 'das ma lagaso/ byams pa gzhung des kyang khyod kyis 'di ltar rig par bya'o// chos nyid kyi gzugs gang yin pa de yang gzugs kyang ba yin/ bzugs
296b1('bum): myed pa yang ma yin no// gang gzugs kyang ma yin/ gzugs myed pa yang ma yin pa de ni gnyis su myed pa ste/ ngas de la dgongs nas gzugs de gnyis su myed par rtsi bar gsungs so// de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 
296b2('bum): 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa nas sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi bar du sbyar bar bya'o// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang byang chubacom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' byams pas 'di skad ces
296b3('bum): gsol to/ bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyir pa la skyong po'i byang chub sems dpa' de ltar gzugs myed pa'i mtsham nyid la mkhas shing / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rdza bar
296b4('bum): shes pa nas sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi chos kyi bar du de ltar gnyisu myed pa'i mtshan nyid la mkhas pa mtha' gnyis spangs nas dbu ma'ing lam la zhugs nas/ ji ltar mtshan nyid yongs su
296b5('bum): shes pa dang / ji ltar mtshan nyid mngon du bgyi ba dang / ji ltar mtsham nyid sgom par lta bar bgyi/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' byams pa la
296b6('bum): bka' stsal pa/ byams pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' mtha' gnyis spangs nas/ de ltar dbu ma'i lam la rab tu zhugs pas/ gang gzugasu shes pa yang ma yin/ yong
296b7('bum): su myi shes pa yang ma yin pa de nyid de'i yong su shes pa'o// de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa nas sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi bar du gang yongs su shes pa yang ma yin/ yongs
296b8('bum): shes pa yang ma yin pa de nyid de'i yongs su shes pa'o// bdag gzugs spong ba yang ma yin myi spong ba yang ma yin pa de nyid de'i spong ba'o// de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rna bar shes
297a1('bum): pa nas sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi bar du gang spong ba yang ma yin myi spong ba yang ma yin pa de nyid de'i spong ba'o// gang gzugs spong ba mngon gsum du myi byed pa yang ma yin mngon gsum du myi
297a2('bum): byed pa yang ma yin pa de nyid de'i mngon gsum du byed pa'o// gang gzugs spong ba'i lam bsgom pa yang ma yin myi bsgom pa yang ma yin pa de nyid de'i bsgom pa'o// de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 
297a3('bum): 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa nas sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi bar du sbyar bar bya'o// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' byams pas 'di skad ces gsol to// 
297a4('bum): bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i byang / chub sems dpa' sems dpa' de ltar shes pa dang / spong ba dang / mngon tu byed pa dang / bsgom par ldan pa de'i mya ngan las
297a5('bum): 'das pa gang lags pa de skad ces gas yod pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa la dag/ 'astsal ba byams pa byang chub sems dpa' rdzas kyi
297a6('bum): mya ngan las 'das pa ni zab po/ rab tu zab bo// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' byams pas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad dus byang chub
297a7('bum): semam papa' rnams kyi mya ngamapas 'das pa das cing / rang grubapa pa lags bcom ldan ngas kyis pa 'dum pa/ byams pa byang chubasam pa mas kyi skya nga la
297a8('bum): byang na pa lam yi ma nga byang mam 'as pa ya mame ma rgyas da tsa pa ba ma mas
297b1('bum): bas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi mya ngan las 'das pa de mya ngan las 'das pa yang ma lags pa mya ngan las ma 'das pa yang ma lags bcom ldan 'ad/ 
297b2('bum): kyis bka' sprul pa/ byams pa gzhan gyi don las brtsams te 'khor ba yongasu btang ba'i phyir mya ngan las ma 'das pa'o// bdag gi don la brtsams te mya ngan las 'das pa yongs su ma btang ba'i phyir mya ngan las
297b3('bum): 'das pa'o// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' byams pas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de ste byang chub sems dpa' gzhan gi don la brtsams te/ 
297b4('bum): 'khor ba yongs su myi gtong na/ 'khor ba yongs su ma btang bas des mya ngan las 'das pa/ btang bar myi 'gyur/ bcom ldan de ste byang chub ses dpa' bdag gi don las brtsams te/ mya ngan las
297b5('bum): 'das pa yongs su myi gtong na/ des ji ltar 'khor ba yongasu btang ba myi 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal da pa/ byams pa 'di la byang chub sems dpa' shes rab kyi pha rol tu
297b6('bum): phyin pa la spyod pa nas 'khor ba la 'khor ba rnam par myi rtogamya ngan las 'das pa la yang mya ngan las 'das par myi rtog ste/ de de ltar rnam par myi rtog nas 'di ltar 'khor ba dang mya ngan las
297b7('bum): 'dres pa gnyis mtshungs par 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar de 'khor ba la 'khor bar rnam par myi rtog na/ mya ngan las 'das pa bzhin du 'khor bas myi skye'o// mya ngan las 'das pa la mya ngan las
297b8('bum): 'das par rna bar myi rtog na 'khor ba bzhin du mya ngan las 'das pa la zhen par myi 'gyur ro// de ltar rnam par myi rtog pa'i dbyings la gnas shing pa de rigs pa 'dis 'khor ba yongs su myi gtong na ba dang / mya ngan/ 
298a1('bum): las yongs su myi gtong bar rig par bya'o// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' byams pas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'on byang
298a2('bum): sems dpa' shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod po rnam par myi rtog pa'i dbyings la rab tu gnas pas ji ltar na 'khor ba ma btang ba de ltar blangs pa yang ma lagaso// mya ngan las 'das pa ji ltar ma btang
298a3('bum): pa de ltar blangs pa yang ma lag so// bcom ldan 'das de ste ma blangs na ji ltar btang ba ma lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' sprul dpa/ byams pa do na de ltar blangs pa 'am gyi myi blang bar myi smra ba'i
298a4('bum): b+ha ka byams pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i/ byang chub sems dpa' rnam par myi rtog pa'i dbyings la dmyigs/ pa'i ye shes kyis sems dbang du gyur dpa/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten
298a5('bum): gi 6 khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed du thabs mkhas pas/ 'khor ba bstan pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' mya ngan las 'das pa rnams 'khor ba yongs su myi gtong bar smra'o// stong pa nyid
298a6('bum): dmyigs su myed pa la gnas pa'i phyir mya ngan las 'das pa yongs su myi gtong bar smra'o// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' byams pas 'di skad ces
298a7('bum): gsolang rte/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par myi rtog pa la mtshan nyid thams cad ji ltar ba lta bar bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsalang par byams pa gzugs gang yin pa dang / tshor ba yang yin pa
298a8('bum): 'du shes rang 'du byed dang / rna bar shes pa nas sangs rgyas kyi chos gang yin pa'i bar rang ga gzugs kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa nas sangs rgyas kyi chos gang yin pa dang / stong pa nyid gang yin pa'i thang du'i
298b1('bum): chos de dgadang stong pa nyid de dag bsgom pa dang / dngos po gnyis su myed pa dang / rab tu spobs pa myed pa 'di ni byams pa thams cad kyi mtshan thams cad du lta ba'o// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / 
298b2('bum): bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' byams pas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das ci lags nyan thos thams cad phyogs gcig pa 'am shin tu mya ngan las 'das pa la gnas pa lags
298b3('bum): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ byams pa do ni ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe ma/ byams pa 'jig rten pa 'di dag ni khams sna tshogs pa/ khams du ma ste khams sna tshogs/ khams du ma'i
298b4('bum): 'jig rten pa de dag la sems can gyi rigs dang / rang bzhin rab tu mang po yod de/ byams pa sems can gi rus dang / rigs dang po nas bzang po'i khyad par 'dod cing / bzang po'i khyad par nyid thob pa
298b5('bum): lta bu yang yod do// sems can kyi rus dang / de rigs gang dang po nas khyad par ngan pa 'dod cing / ngan pa nyid thob ste/ de nyid kyis mgu bar 'gyur ba de lta bu yang yod do// rus dang rigs gang
298b6('bum): thog ma nas ngan pa'i bye brag nyid 'dod cing ngan pa nyid thob sken ngan pa thob nas de tsam gyis mgu bar myi 'gyur zhing de nas phyis gong du bzang po'i khyad par 'dod cing / bzang po thob par 'gyur
298b7('bum): ba de ltar dag kyang yod do// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' byams pas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gang sems can gi rus dang rigs gsu
298b8('bum): po de dgra bcom pa thob nas/ bla na ma mchis pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob par 'tshal na/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i skye ba yang ma mchis par lung bstan te/ skye ba mchis na ji ltar thob pa 'gyur
299a1('bum): bcom ldan 'das kyis paka'aphrul ba rgyal pa rgyabasas dang / nyon mongs pa'i bang gyur na yin par ni myang nas gyur 'a gyu ni ba sa kyis khyab byung rna las 'das gang nas// de mang rnam
299a2('bum): smras sa dang / bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' byams pas 'di skad ces gsolang to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' can mo bsam brgyan pa dang / lhag pa'i bsam pa mabum pa gang lang
299a3('bum): nyid du mang po'i khyad ba 'ams da / bzang ba'i khyang sa cid thob par 'gyur dongo mar 'o// bcom ldan 'das byed chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bsam pargyache ba de dag gang lags / ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' rnams de las
299a4('bum): pa'i bden pa dang / myi 'dzi nang ba'i bde ba dang / mya ngan las 'das pa'i bde ba'i sems can thams cad dang nathun mong ba'i 'dod cing bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba 'di ltar/ 'khor ba yong su myi btang
299a5('bum): ba'i phyir te/ 'di ni bdag gi lhag pa'i bsam pa mthu chen po yin par lta'o// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das 'a la byang chub sems dpa' byams pas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom
299a6('bum): ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi chos ni ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'o// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bslab pa ni ngo mtshar rmad du b+h+ya ba ste/ rigs kyi bu pho 'am rigs kyi bu mo ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i byang chub
299a7('bum): sems dpa' chos thob par 'tshal bas/ bla na ma mchis pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par bgyi'o// byang chub sems dpa' bslab pa la rab tu dbye ba'i le'u ste// / 
299a8('bum): bdun bcu rtsa gnyis pa'o// shes rab dum bu bzhi pa/ bam po'o// de nas tshe dang ldanas rab 'byor kyi bcom ldan 'das/ 
299b1('bum): kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor de la bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor da rigs kyi bu pho 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di tshol 'dod pa'i rigs kyi bu pho 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo ngas rtag pas rab tu ngu ba'i byang
299b2('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ji ltar btsal cing / de ltar dbyangs sgra 'jigs par sgrogs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi drung na tshangs par spyod pa de lta bur btsal bar bya'o// 
299b3('bum): de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor kyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das rtag par rab tu ngu ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu
299b4('bum): ji ltar btsal/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor nga la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rab 'byor nga rtag par rab tu ngu ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
299b5('bum): chen po sngon shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa tshol ba nadalus myi phangs pa dang / srog la myi lta ba dang / rnyed pa dang bkur sti dang grags pa la myi gnas par btsal to// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa tshol
299b6('bum): ba na 'brog dgon pa na 'dug pa'i chon par snang las 'di skad du rigs kyi bu shar phyogs su song shig dang / de nas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa thos par 'gyur ro// ji nas kyang lus ngal ba'i yid la byed pa myi skye ba dang
299b7('bum): rmugs pa dang gnyid kyi yid la byed pa myi skye ba dang / zas yid la byed pa myi skye ba dang / skom gyi yid la byed pa myi skye ba dang / mtshan mo yid la byed pa myi skye ba dang / nyin par yid la byed pa myi skye ba dang / grang ba yod la byed pa
299b8('bum): myi skye ba dang / tsha ba yid la byed pa myi skye ba de ltar song shig/ phyi rol dang nang gang la yang sems ma 'jog shig/ rigs kyi bu g.yon tu lta zhing ma 'gro zhig/ g.ya su ma lta zhig/ nub phyogs dang / byang phyogasu dang / bla dang 'og dang
300a1('bum): 'tsham su lta zhing ma 'gro shig/ rigs kyi bu ci nas kyang 'jig tshogs las myi g.yo ba dang / gzugs las mi g.yo ba dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa las myi g.yo ba de ltar song shig/ 
300a2('bum): gang de la g.yos pa de ni 'gal bar gan so// gangal 'gal bar gnas she na/ sangs rgyas kyi chos la 'gal bar gnas so// gang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams la 'gal bar gnas pa de 'khor ba na spyod de/ gang 'khor ba na spyod pa
300a3('bum): des shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa myi rnyed do// zhes zer ba'i sgra tha'i par gyur pa to// sgra de skad smras pa dang / rtag par rab tu ngu'i byang du chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sgra de'i lam du 'di skad ces smra so// de ltar bya'o/ 
300a4('bum): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ bdag ni sems can thams cad kyi snang bar byed par 'dod cing / sangs rgyas kyi chos bsgrub par 'dod pa'i phyir ro// de skad ces smras pa dang / sgra des rtag par rab tu ngu ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
300a5('bum): chen po la 'di skad ces smraso// rtag par rab tu ngu ba'i byang / chub sems da' sems dpa'i rigs kyi bu legs so leg so// de nayang rtag par rab tu ngu ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos stong pa
300a6('bum): nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos la khyod kyis mos pa bskyed do// shes rab kyi pha rol tuphyin pa btsal bar bya'o// mtshan ma spangs dang / dngos po spangs pa dang / sos
300a7('bum): can du lta ba khyod kyis spang bar bya'o// rigs kyi bu khyod kyis sdig pa'i grogs po rnaMs bang bar bya'o// gang stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang kasmon pa myed pa dang / mngon par 'du myi byed pa dang / mkhyung ba dang / ma skyes pa dang
300a8('bum): dngos po myed pa dang / ma 'gags pa'i dngos po'i chos 'chad pa'i dge ba'i bshas gnyen dag bsnyen pa dang / bstend par bya bsnyen bkur bya'o// rigs kyi bu khyod kyis de ltar byas na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa glegs bam du gyur
300b1('bum): 'jams smra ba'i dge slong la so rab myi thogs par 'gyur ro/ rigs kyi bu khyod kyis gang las gas rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa mnyan pa de la ston pa'i 'dugs bskyed par bya'o// khyod kyis dri du 'azo ba dang / byas pa drang par byar dang
300b2('bum): 'di ni bdag gi dag zi'i tha shas gnyen te/ 'di las bdag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa thos so// gang thos nas bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las myur du slar myi ldog par 'gyur ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa
300b3('bum): dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams dang / nye bar 'gyur ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa dang myi 'bral ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du skye bar 'gyur ba dang / myi khom pa rnams spangs par 'gyur ba dang / 
300b4('bum): dal 'byor de dang ldan par 'gyur ro zhes rigs kyi bu khyod kyis phan yon 'di dag yongasu brtag cing / chos smra ba'i dge slong la ston pa'i 'du shes bskyed par bya'o// rigs kyi bu khyod kyis 'jig rten gyi zang zing dang
300b5('bum): ldan pa'i sems kyis chos smra ba'i dge slong la bsnyen par myi ba'o// khyod kyis chos kyi don du g.yer ba dang / chos la gus pas chos smra ba'i dge slong gi rje su 'brang bar 'gyur/ khyod kyis bdud kyi las rnams shes par bya ste/ rig
300b6('bum): kyi ba bdud sdig do tsan byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnaMs la/ gzugs dang / sgra dang dri dang ro dang reg dag bsnyen pa dang / sten pa dang / spyad pa'i phyir khyer de 'ong ba dag kyang yod do// de dag kyang des zil gis mnan
300b7('bum): thabs mkhas pas ma sor sngon nasmon tha mngasu srung // de la yang rigs kyi su khyod kyis chos sgrub la sems sa dang ba rgya byung po// yang 'di ltar sems myong // bdag ni bangs mkhas pa darab tu sbyinas kyi 'di ni babs ma la
300b8('bum): 'angatun ma 'ang thams can gatshul gas sems can rnams kyi dgapa'i na yo yongs su bzung ba'i phyir chos 'i na sos ming bsnyed bye myong ba nga nga / byang chung sem par mas dpa nga rigs mams sapa
301a1('bum): sgrib pa myed do// de'i tshe yang rigs kyi bu khyod kyis chos rnams kyi yang dag pa'i tshul so sor brtag par bya'o// rigs kyi bu chos rnams kyi yang dag pa'i tshul kyang gang zhem/ 'di ltar chos thos can kun
301a2('bum): nas nyon mongs pa dang / rnam par byang ba myed pa'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ chos thams can ni ngo bo nyid kyis stong ngo // chos thams cad sems can myed pa srog myed pa gang zag myed pa ste/ sgyu ma lta bu/ rmi lam lta bun brag cha
301a3('bum): lta bu/ gzugs brnyam lta bu'o// rigs kyi bu khyod de ltar chos rnams kyi yang dag pa'i tshul so sor rtog cing chos smra ba'i rje su 'brang bar bya'o// ring por myi thogs par shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'dod pa'i rigs kyi bu la
301a4('bum): gshe zhing myi lta na/ de la yang rigs kyi bu khyod kyis slar brgyal bar myi bya'i// gzhan du na chos don du gnyer ba dang / chos la gus pa dang / sems myi skyo bas/ chos smra ba'i dge slong gi rjes su 'brang bar bya'o// de nas rtag
301a5('bum): par rab tu ngu ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen/ pos sgra de las gdams pa de lta bu thos nas/ shar phyogs ga la ba de/ song // song nas ring po ma lon par yang de 'di snyam du gyu rang to// 
301a6('bum): bdag gis sgra de las bdag ji srid du 'gro dgos zhes ma dris so snyam nas/ des shang phyogs nyid du 'dug ste ngu zhing 'bod pa dang / mya ngan byad de smre sngags 'don cing 'di snyam du sems so// sa phyogs de nyid du
301a7('bum): nyin zhag gcig ga ma/ gnyis sam gsum 'ams bzhi 'am/ lnga 'am drug gam/ nyin zhag bdun 'das par bya ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ma thos kyi bar du lus ngal ba yid la byed pa myi skyedan rmugs pa dang
301a8('bum): gnyid kyis yid la byed pa myi skyed/ za ba yid la byed pa myi skyed/ btung ba yid la byed pa myi skyed/ mtshan mo yid la byed pa myi skyed/ nyin par yid la byed pa myi skyed pa/ grang ba yid la byed pa myi skyed/ do snyam du sems so// rab
301b1('bum): 'byor de 'di lta ste dper na/ myi zhig bu cig pa zhig 'chi dus las 'das te/ sdug bsngal ba dang / yod myi bde ba'i chen po dang ldan par 'gyur te/ de bu'i mya ngan gis bu'i mya ngan las gzhan pa'i yid la myi 'byung ba de bzhin du
301b2('bum): rab 'byor da rtag par rab tu ngu ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos de ltar 'phangs shing 'dug pa'i mdun du de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku byung nas/ rigs kyi bu khyod do skad du smra ba legaso legaso zhes bya ba byin te/ 
301b3('bum): sngon gi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis kyang / sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ji ltar khyod tshol ba de bzhin du brtsal
301b4('bum): de bas na rigs kyi bu khyod kyis brtson 'grus de nyid dang / daspro ba de nyid dang / don du gnyer ba de nyid dang / mos pa de nyid kyis rgyu chag das par shar phyogs su song shig dang / 'di nas dpag tshad lnga brgyan
301b5('bum): spos can zhes bya ba'i grong khyer zhig yod de/ rin po che sA bdun las byas pa ka ra ba rim pa bdun gis bskor ba 'obs rim bdu na gis bskor ba/ shing ta la'i 'phreng rim gis skor ba/ chur
301b6('bum): dpag chad bcu gnyis// zheng du dpag tshad bcu gnyis 'byor cing dang brgyas pa bde zhing skyid pa nyams dga' ba ba myi mang pos gang ba srang gi tshong khang ri mo bris pa lta bu mnyam pa lnga brgya yod pa khyogs dang gzhon pa myi
301b7('bum): dog par 'gro ba'i zam pa dang bcas pa/ grong khyer de'i kho ra khor yug gi rtsig pa yang rin po sna bdun las byas pa// rin po che sna bdun gi rtsig pa de dag gi ra ba yang 'dzam bu na da'i gser las byas pa/ tshad dang
301b8('bum): ldan zhing 'phang mtho ba rim pa de dag re re las kyang rin po snga bdu mig shing gi 'bras bu sna tshogs dang ldan pa rnams skyes te/ 'bras bu de dag thams cad las kyang rin po che las byas pa'i srad bus sbrel ba'i shing
302a1('bum): gzhan dag dang ldan pa sha stag go// grong khyer de dag thams cad kyang gser gi drin bu'i dra bas g.yogs ten gser gi dril bu'i dra ba de dag rlung gis bskyod pa'i sgra snyan cing yid du 'ong ba chags par 'gyur ba dag
302a2('bum): 'byung ste dper na yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i rnga rol mo mkhan mkhas pa rnams tshogs pas bdungs pa'i sgra snyan cing yid du 'ong ba'i la chags par 'gyur ba'i sgra 'byung ba de bzhin du/ dril bu'i dra ba de dag rlung gis sbyong
302a3('bum): pa'i sgra snyan cing yid du 'ong ba chags par 'gyur ba 'byung ngo // sems can de dag kyang sgra de dag gis rtse zhing dga' ba dang yongasu spyod par byed do// grong khyer spos can de'i kho ra khor yug gi 'obs kyang yan lag brgyad dang
302a4('bum): ldan pa'i chus yongasu gang zhig 'bab ste// ha cang yang myi 'grang / ha cang yang myi dro ba'i chu de la rin po sna bdun las byas pa'i gru sems can de dag gi sngon gi las kyi rna bar smind pa las byung ba'i de dag tu sos
302a5('bum): can de dag zhugs nas rtse zhing dga' ba dang / yongs su spyod par byed do// chu de dag thams cad kyang ud pa la dang / pad ma dang / ku mu ta dang / pun ta ri kas pa khyebs pa na gzhan yang me tog
302a6('bum): gi rig sa che zhing gsung zhim pa dag gis khyebs te/ stong gsum gi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gi khams na me tog gi rigs gang yod pa de dag thams cad spos can gi grong khyer na myed pa gcig kyang myed
302a7('bum): grong khyer de'i kho ra khor yug na skyed po tshal lnga brgya yod de/ de dag thams cad kyang rin po che sna bdun las byas pa bzang zhing lha ma sdug pa sha stag go// skyed mo cha la de re re na yang rgyang grags gcig pa'i mcho lnga
302a8('bum): brgya yod de/ mchod dag thams cad na yang rin po sna bdun gi ud pa la dang / pad ma dang / ku mu ta dang / pun tiri ka rba lta na mdzes pa/ sdug pa rnaMs kyis khyabs par 'khod do// ud pA dang / pad ma dang / ku mu
302b1('bum): tadang / mun pa gang dag thams cad kyi zhing tsha 'khor lo tsam na stag ste 'bring ka kha rog mthing kang 'dug pag mthing 'dra'ang mthing yang snang ba ser mal kha dog sor tha par mar 'dran pas po
302b2('bum): sdang ba dmar po la kha dog dmar po/ dra dmar por 'dra zhing dmar por snang ba/ dkar po la kha dog dkar po/ dkar por 'dra zhing dkar por snang ba sha stag go// mchod dag thams cad mi bya dang mo dang / ka ra na dras
302b3('bum): khrung khrung dang / sa ra sa dang / ngur pa'i sgras khyab par sgrog go// skyed ma tshal de dag thams cad kyang bdag gi bya ba myed de yong su bzung ba myed pa sems can dgi gli sprin gi las kyi rno bar spyon pa las byung ba ste/ 
302b4('bum): 'di ltar yun ring por shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa dang / chos zab mo la rab tu mos pa'i rnam par smind pa las byung ba sha stag go// rigs kyi bu spos can gi drong khyer gi mdo'i
302b5('bum): dbus na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyis 'phags pa'i khyim kho ra khor yug tu dpag tsha do gcig yodapa rin po che sna bdun las byas pa/ rin po che sna tshogs kyis
302b6('bum): mdzes par byas pa blta na sdug par nga kha bdud dang / shing ta la phreng ba bdun gis bskor ba'o// khyim ro na khyim gos long spyod du skyed mos tshal de dag re re na yang mche'u brgyad brgyad yod de/ bzang po zhes bya ba
302b7('bum): nga po mchog zhes pa dang / dga' ba zhes bya ba dang / mdaga' mchog ces bya ba dang / bde ba zhes bya ba dang ba bcan las byab da / nges pa zhes bya ba dang / rnam par myi 'bab pa sa bya ba ste// mamatshung rnams kyi
302b8('bum): ga ni gser las byas ngos gnyis pa ni rdul las/ ngos gsum pa ni bye du r+ya las byas/ ngos bin pa'i ni shal las byas nang gi gzhi'i kaM ke ru las byas shing gzhigs dog phyi ma bkrus pa'o// mdze'u ma ral yang 'jan
302b9('bum): nayod te/ rtag par rong tu dgas mAn pa'i skyed kyi tshams/ mya don myed pa zhes byed nga myang na kyil pazhis bya ba dang / me tshon mdzes pa zhes rgyan na skyed mos mad / skye mas
303a1('bum): stobs khri 'phang can brgyad brgyad yod de/ bab stebs kyi ngos kun rin po'i sna tshogs kyi bar du brgyan cing 'bab stebs gi bar thams cad nas/ 'dzam bu mda'i gser gi chu shing dag skyeso// mtshe'u de dag/ 
303a2('bum): thams cad na mye tog ud pa la dang / pad ma dang / ku mu ta dang / pun ta ri ka sna tshogs kyis khyebs shing bya dang mo dang / sa ra sa dang / dur pa'i sgra sgeg so// mtshe'u de dag gi kho ra khor yug na me tog gi shing rdza pa sna tshogs
303a3('bum): skye'o// me tog gi shing de dag rlung gis btab pa'i mye tog rnaMs kyang mtshe'u nang du ltung go// mtshe'u de dag thams cad kyi chu yang tsan dan gi gsung can la kha dog dang / dri dang ro dang / reg baphun sum tshogs pa'o// de na byang
303a4('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis 'phags rtse ba'i sa yod de// de kho ra khor yug tu bcas pa'i bud myed stong phrag drug cu rtsa brgyad dang / lhag cig tu 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga dang ldan zhing 'byor pas de
303a5('bum): nadaga' yongs su spyod do// grong khyer de na gnas pa'i sems can skyes pa 'am/ bud myed gang yin pa de dag kyang rtag par rab tu dga' zhing skyed mos tshal dang mtshe'u rnam su 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga dang / 
303a6('bum): ldan zhing 'byor dpas rtse dga' yongs su spyod do// byang chub sem sa dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyi 'phags pa de 'khor dang bcasabar tha tshigs kyi tsam zhig rtse zhing yongs su spyad nas de'i 'og
303a7('bum): ma dus gsum du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'chang do// grong khyer spos can de na 'khod pa'i sems can gang yin pa de dag kyang grong khyer gi lam mdo'i dbus su/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyi 'phag
303a8('bum): pa'i chos kyi khri 'jugs te/ rkang pa gser las byas pa 'am/ rdul las byas pa 'am/ bye du n+ya las byas pa 'am/ shel las byas pa'i steng shing bal gi stan nam/ 'go li ka'i stan nam/ khong tshangs nan gyi stan nam
303b1('bum): ga shi ka'i gos pashing ba 'phang du rgyud grags phyeng tsam yod pa/ stong gi bar snang las kyang mu tig gis brgyan pa'i thar bres nas phyogs de dag khor khor yug tu yang mye tog la dog rnam pa lngas 'thod mngon par sa
303b2('bum): rab tu 'thor/ rab tu mngon par 'thor/ gdug spos gsum zhim po sna tshogs kyis phyogs de gdug par byed do// de ltar chos la gus pas byang chub sems dpal sems dpa' chen po chos phags pa gang la 'dug nas
303b3('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i chos 'chang po'i la gsung can 'khod pa'i sems can de dag chos la gus pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyi 'phags pa la de lta bu'i chos la gus pa'i rdul
303b4('bum): gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di nyan pa ni/ srog chags da brgya phrag mang po/ srog chags brgya stong phrag mang po rnams lhag par gyur te/ myi dang lha rnams gang nyan pa de dag las kha cig
303b5('bum): ni glog slob/ kha cig ni kha don slob/ kha cig ni yongasu chub par byed/ kha cig ni 'dzin da kha cig ni 'chang / kha cig ni slob/ kha cig na 'dri/ kha cig ni tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'i rje su 'gro'o//

303b7('bum): pa de'i drung bu mang shig dang / de la khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa thos par 'gyur ro// de ni rigs kyi bu khyod kyi yun ring po'i dge pa'i gshes gnyem yin las dge ba'i gshes gnyen ston dpa'o khwam
303b8('bum): sbyang ba yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bskul ba 'debs pa'i gzeng stong bag rab tu spro ba byed pa'o// rigs kyi bu des kyang sngon shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par ltar khyod tshol ba bzhin du bcal/ rigs kyi bu rkyod
304a1('bum): myed pa yang dag par rdzogs nyan mtshan du ngal so ba yid la byed pa myi skyed par song shig dang / ring par myi thogs par shes rab kyi pha rol pa tu phyind pa thob par 'gyur ro// de nas byang chub sems
304a2('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag par rab tu ngu ba de bzhin gshegs pa'i bka' 'di thos nas dga' mgu yid rangs/ rab tu dga' mos shing yid bde bar 'gyur ba 'di lta ste/ dper ma myi zhig dug dang bcas pa'i thug rtsubyug nan nyig #
304a3('bum): 'byin pa'i sman pa'i gang bdag gi zug rngu 'di 'byin cing / gang bdag sdug bsngal 'di las thar par byed pa nam rnyed par 'gyur snyam pa las gzhan pa'i yid la byed pa myi bskyed pa de bzhin du/ byang chub sems dpa' sa
304a4('bum): dpa' chen po rtag par rab tu ngu'i ba yang gang bdag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ston cing / chos gang bdag gis thos nas dmyigs pa dang bcas pa'i rig yid la byed pa spangs par 'gyur ba'i rigs kyi bu na
304a5('bum): mthong bar 'gyur snyam pa las gzhan pa'i chos cung zad kyang yid// la myi byed do// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag par rab tu du bas phyogs de nyid du 'dug cing / chos thams
304a6('bum): la myi gnas pa'i 'du she su gyur to// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i rgyu dang / tshe rabs snga ma goms pas/ ting nge 'dzin gi sgo du ma mngon du gyur pa 'di lta ste/ chos thams cad kyi ngog
304a7('bum): nyid rnam par lta ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzind dang / chos thams cad gi ngo bo nyid myi dmyigs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad lo ye shes 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos bas cad
304a8('bum): la tha dad pa myed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad myi 'gyur ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzind dang / chos thams cad snang ba byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzind dang / chos thams cad mun pa dang bral ba
304b1('bum): zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzinang dang / chos thams cad myinganas pa 'jigs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin da dang / chos thams cad myi dmyigs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin da dang / me tog mngon par mthor ba zhes bya ba'i

304b3('bum): ting nge 'dzind dang / sems can thams cad kyi sgra 'byin pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / sems can thams cad mngon par dga' ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin da dang / sems can gi sgra la mkhas pa'i rjesu
304b4('bum): 'gro ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / sgra dang tshig 'bru sna tshogs mngon par 'byin pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin da dang / ma mnan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rang bzhin gis tha snyad myed pa zhes bya
304b5('bum): ba'i ting nge 'dzind dang / sgrib pa myed pa'i rnam par tha rad pa thob pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzi nad dang / rdul dang bral ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzind dang / mying dang nges pa'i sgra dang tshig dang 'bru zhes bya
304b6('bum): ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad rnam par myi rtog pa zhes bya ba 'i ting nge 'dzind dang / chos thams cad nges pa'i sgra dang tshig dang 'bru zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad myi sgrib pa mthong ba 'i
304b7('bum): bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin da dang / nam mkha' lta bu zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzind dang / rdo rje lta bu zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs kyi rgyal po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rgyal ba thob pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin
304b8('bum): rang phyir myi ldog pa'i myig ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos kyi dbyingasu las byung ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzind dang / dbugs 'byin pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzind dang / seng ge'i sgra sgrogs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin pa
305a1('bum): sems can thams cad zil gis gnon pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzi nad dang / rdul dang bral ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzind dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa myed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / pad mo'i rgyanaces/ 
305a2('bum): bya ba'i ting nge 'dzind dang / the tsom gcod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzind dang / snying po thams cad kyi rje su song ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzind dang / chos thams cad las mngon par 'phags pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /

305a7('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa 'di nyid rab tu ston pa rnams mthong ngo // de bzhin gshegs pa de dag kyang de la legs pa byin cing dbugs phyung nas 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// 
305a8('bum): rigs kyi bu nged kyis kyang sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa rtsal te/ ting nge 'dzind 'di dag rab tu thob pa ni gang da ltar khyod kyis thob pa'o// ting nge 'dzin de dag rab tu thob nas kyang / 
305b1('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa rtog par gyur to// phyir myi ldog pa'i chos la rab tu gnas par gyur da te nged kyis ting nge 'dzind 'di dag gi rang bzhin dang / ngo bo nyid las bltas na snyoms par 'jug pa'i
305b2('bum): ldang ga'am gang byang chub tu spyod pa 'am/ gang bla na myed pa yang dag pa rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par 'chang rgya ba'i chos de lta bu gang yang ma mthong ngo // rigs kyi bu shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'dzim

305b4('bum): bzang po brgya bcu dang / 'od 'dom gang ba dang / sangs/ che rgyas kyi chos bsam gyis myi khyab pa rnams dang / sangs rgyasakyi ye shes dang / sangs rgyas kyi shes rab dang / bla na myed pa'i ting nge

305b6('bum): nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis lta smos kyang ci dgos pa de lta bu'i yon tan gi pha rol tu phyind pa rab tu thob po/ de bas na rigs kyi khu khyod kyis kyang chos 'di dag la gus pa rab tu bskyed par bya'o// lhag pa/ 
305b7('bum): don du gnyer ba dang / mos par bya ba skyed par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu don tu gnyer ba dang / mos par byed pa la bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub myi dkon no// rigs kyi bu khyod kyis dge ba'i gnyis/ 
305b8('bum): gshes gnyen la yang gus pa rab tu bskyed cing dga' bar bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ dge ba'i gshes gnyen gis yongs su zin pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs
306a1('bum): byang chub tu sa dod par 'chang rgya'o// de nas de bzhin gshags par dag la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag par rab tu du bas 'di skad ces gsolar to// bdag gi dge ba'i gags gnyen gang

306a5('bum): gnyis sam sal ba brgya'am/ skal pa stong ngam/ de bas kyang lhag parar sti/ blozhin tu 'gol khyer ram 'a bde ba'i yo byad thams cad byin ne/ stong gsum gi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gi khams nas
306a6('bum): gzugs dang sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg pa ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad byin yang de tsam gis rigs kyi bu khyod kyis de la lan lon par myi 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu de'i mthus khyod 'di lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin
306a7('bum): rnams thob par 'gyur/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin du pa la mkhas par gyur pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa rab tu thob par gyur da pa'i phyir ro// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa stong phrag nyi shu lnga pa las/

306b1('bum): yang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag par rab tu du dbugs phyung nas myi snang bar gyur pa to// rigs kyi bu de yang ting nge 'dzin
306b2('bum): de rnams las langs par gyur te/ langs nas kyang de 'di snyam du de bzhin gshegs pa 'di dag ni gang nas byon/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gang du bzhud snyam sems par gyur to// de bzhin gshegs
306b3('bum): pa dang myi dga' zhing gdung bya chen por gyur te/ 'di snyam du sems par gyur te/ 'phags pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyi 'phags pa de gzungs rab tu thob pa 'a lnga mngon par shes pa
306b4('bum): sngon gi rgyal ba la bya ba byas pa ste/ bdag la phan 'dogs pa bdag gi dge' ba'i gshes gnyen te/ yun ring por des bdag gi don byas pas de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gang nas byon/ de bzhin gshegs
306b5('bum): pa de dgra gar bzhud ces bya ba'i don de bdag gis 'phags pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyis 'phags pa'i drung du nye bar song ste dri bar bya'o// snyam du sems par gyur to// 
306b6('bum): de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag par rab tu ngu ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyi 'phags pa de la dag 'a ba dang / dad pa dang / rjes su dga' ba dang / gus pa skyed nas/ 
306b7('bum): spyan sngar 'di snyam du bsams so// bsti bdag gis sti stang ji lta bu zhig gis 'phags pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyi 'phags pa la bsnyen bkur bya/ bdag kyang dbul bas/ bdag la gos sam
306b8('bum): rin po che 'am/ gAser ram/ mu tig gam/ bye dur+ya 'am/ dung ngam/ man shel la me/ bye ru 'am/ me tog gam/ gdug pa 'am/ spos sam/ phreng ba 'am/ byug pa 'am/ gdugs gang gis 'phags pa byang chub seMs
307a1('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags pa de la sti stang du bya bar 'os pa de lta bu cung zad kyang myed/ bdag de bzhin du 'phags pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chen po chos kyi 'phags pa

315a1('bum): 'di shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la thabs mkhas pa dang ldan zhing / yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba de bzhin du bdag cag kyang thabs mkhas pa dang ldan zhing / yongs su rdzogs par gyur cig/ ces bya
315a2('bum): bya ba de lta bu'i smon la dag kyang thobatib pa/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sos dpa' chen po rtag par rab tu du ba dang / tshang dpon gyi bu mo la sogs pa bu mo lnga rgya po de dag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mchod
315a3('bum): pa byas/ byang chub sems dpa' ses dpa' chen po chos kyis 'phags pa la yang bkur stir byas nas/ byang chub sems dpa' ses dpa' chen po chos kyis 'phags pa'i rkang pa gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te
315a4('bum): zhe sa dang bcas/ rim 'gro dang bcas/ thal mo sbyar nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas byang chub sems dpa' ses dpa' chen po rtag par rab tu ngu bas/ byang chub sems dpa' ses
315a5('bum): dpa' chen po choches kyis 'phags pa la 'di skad ces smras so ta/ rigs kyi bu bdag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshil ba na/ dogan pa zhig nas sgra thos pa/ rigs kyi bu shar phyogs su song shig dang / de nas
315a6('bum): shes rab kyi pha rolang tu phyin pa thob par 'gyur ro// de nas bdag gis sgra de thos pa dang / shar phyogs gang na ba de logs su song ba song ba las/ bdag 'di ste du bdag gis sgra de la bdag ji srid du 'gro
315a7('bum): ngogs pa dang / sus shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa thos shing thos par 'gyur ba dri'o ste du bsams so// de ltar bdag yid mi dga' ba dang / mya ngan chen por gyur cing sa phyogs de nyid na nyin zhag bdun
315a8('bum): bon te/ bdag ji sring cig 'gro dgos/ su mas shes rab kyi sa skad tu phyin pa mnyan du yod ces spa de la ma dris so sa pa shes rab kyi pha ro bang tu phyin pa yid la byed pa/ 'i mya ngan las gzhan
315b1('bum): kha zas bza' ba'i sems kyang ma skyes so// de nas bdag gi mdun du de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku byung nas/ des bdag la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu 'di nas dpag tshad lnga rgyan spos
315b2('bum): can zhes bya ba'i grong khyer zhig med de der song shig dang / byang chub mos dpa' sems dpa' chen gyi chos kyis 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'chad cing 'dug pa deng / khyod kyis mthong
315b3('bum): bar 'gyur ro// de nas bdag de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku bka' stsald pa/ bzhin du/ shar phyogs gang na ba re logs su song song ba las/ rkyang gis 'phags pa chos 'chad cing 'dug pa mthong
315b4('bum): ngo // mtho nas ma thag tu yang dben bsam gtan dang po la mnyam par bzhag pa'i dge slong gi bde ba de lta bu thob par gyur to// bdag dga' zhing bde ba des khyab par gyur nas/ sa phyog
315b5('bum): de nyid nas ma g.yos par khyod shes rab kyi phyi ro ltad tu phyin pa 'chad cing 'dug pa mthong ngo // de nas ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo rgya phrag du skyes par gyur to// bdag de na 'dug pa'i tshe yang sa phyogs bcu
315b6('bum): nas des de bzhin gshegs pa rnaMs bdag la dbugs 'byin pa mdzad cing / rigs kyi bu ting nge 'dzin 'di dag ni shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyin pa las byung ba yin pas legs so legs so// 
315b7('bum): nged kyis kyang de dag la gnas nas sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams yongs su rdzogs par byas so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis bdag la shin tu legs par bstan nas/ mi sdang bar
315b8('bum): gyur to// bdag kyang ting nge 'dzin de las langs nas 'di ste du gyur to// de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gang nas byon/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gar gshegs snyam mo// de nas yang bdag
316a1('bum): du ga/ mags pa grub sems dpa pos rapa chen sa kyis sngags pa den sngon gyi rgyal pas bya byam pa/ dge pa 'phrul pa shesas kyi ba du phyin
316a2('bum): gas pa byung ba pa yi du/ de na gshegs pa dag gang nas spyong dang / ngan gnag de dag meng du byung ba 'dag sa don sgrum mo/ de bas na gas kyi su byung na
316a3('bum): bde dag gang nas spyod/ dbanan gshegs pa dag gang du 'azung ba bdag yi sa rigs kyi chu khyod kyis de bzhin gzigs pa de dag gdabya byon pa dang / gang bathung bcings kyang dag gis sa
316a4('bum): 'gyur ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa mthong bar 'gyur ba de lta bu bdag sa ston cig/ shes rab kyi pa slad du phyin pa byung phyug nyi shA lta ba las rtag par rab tu ngu ba'i le'u ste/ 
316a5('bum): byinag tu dus ni sas ma sgrub so// dgra kyi byur bzhin grashegs parnams ni gang nas kyang mabyo pa/ gang du yang mi btu / de bzhin gshegs pa nims nos gsor ba'o// de bzhin gyid
316a6('bum): gang yin pade/ de bzhin gshegs pa'o// rigs kyi bu skye ba med pa ni/ 'ong ba 'am/ 'gro ba medang skye ba med pa gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'o// rigs kyi bu srang dag pa'i mtha' sa
316a7('bum): 'odra ba'am 'gro ba med de/ yang dag pa'i mtha' gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'o// rigs kyi bu stong pa nyid la ni 'gro ba'am 'ong ba med de/ stong pa nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin gshes
316b1('bum): kyi byed khyod sa ni 'dril babyed/ deshA pa nyid gapa yi byed/ de bzhin su sa rigs kyi bu 'dod drugs dang bral ba ni/ 'ong ba'am 'gro ba med de/ 'dod chag
316b2('bum): de na sa / swAng+ya ga hU~M/ klos ga yin de ni bzhin ga sa ga rnam pa'i kyi
316b3('bum): 'gro d+hA bI / rnam mdza'i ba kris gang yin padon/ de tsun gshegs pa'o/ rdzogs kyi di nas las gzhan pa yang / de bzhin gshegs pa ma yin no// rigs kyi bu chom
316b4('bum): rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de dang // de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ rigs kyi bu de bzhin nyid la bya ni/ rnam pa gnyis su med do// rigs kyi bu de bzhin nyid ni ba
316b5('bum): ste/ gnyis ma yin no// rigs kyi bu/ de bzhin nyid ni/ 'di ltar mang pa'i phyir/ babyung ba las 'das pa'o// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ mi zhig snying zla ba chungs gi nyi ma gung
316b6('bum): chabs rdungs pa na smrig skya g.yol ba mthong ba dang / de dang de dag tu rgyug cing 'dir khrus bya'o 'ding chu btung ngo ste du sems na/ rigs kyi bu de ji ste du sems/ rlung grang nas 'ongs/ shar byas
316b7('bum): kyi rgya mtshal 'am/ lho phyogs dang / nub phyogs dang / byang phyogs dang / kyi rgya mtshob 'am gang nas 'ongs/ 'gro ba gang du 'gro rtag par du bas smras pa/ rigs kyi bu smrig rgyas chu mong ba ma yin
316b8('bum): de la 'gro ba 'am 'ong ba ga la yod/ rigs kyi bu skyid kyi tsha bas rdungs pa'i mi de ni/ smig rgyu ba ma chu med pa la chur ru 'du shes bskyed pas ta byis pa'i rigs shes rab rtul ba'i rigs to// de la nu'i ngo
317a1('bum): snar mngon par zhen nas de bzhin gshegs pa mngon pa dang byung ba zlog pa de dag thams ca ni byis pa'i rig pa// shes brtul pa'i rigs so/ zhes brjod par bya ste/ dpe na/ mi zhig tu yo
317a2('bum): thal chu ru 'du shes bskyed pa bzhin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni chos kyi sku yin pas/ gzugs kyi skur mi lta'o// rigs kyi bu chos nyid ni 'ong ba 'am 'gro ba yang med do/ rigs
317a3('bum): kyi bu de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la'ang byon pa 'am bzhud pa med do// rigs kyi bu dper na sgyu ma mkhan gyis sprul pa'i glang po che'i gzugs so/ rta'i tshogs so/ shing rta'i tshogs sam/ rkang
317a4('bum): tang gi tshogs sam/ 'gro bya'i myed de/ rigs kyi bu de bzhin du de bzhin rgyu gshegs pa la yang byon pa 'am bzhud pa med do// rigs kyi bu dper na/ mi zhig gi rmi lam du de bzhin gshegs pa gcig
317a5('bum): dam de tas mang ba mngong nas sadu ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa gcig kyang ma mthong na/ rigs kyi bu nge sa du sems/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gang nas khyod/ de ba'i gshegs pa rje
317a6('bum): ngan gang du thung / rtag pa rgya tu du bas blas bya rigs kyi bu ma ma ma chos ni gang yang gros su grub pa nyid / ma ma ni 'dun pa yang dag pa ma yin pa'i/ na chos kyis 'thags mi'i sde
317b1('bum): rigs kyi bu de bzhin du chos thams cad ni rmi lam dang 'dra'o zhes de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs te/ rigs kyi bu gang su yang rung ba chos thams cad ni rmi lam dang 'dra'o zhes de bzhin gshegs
317b2('bum): pas bshad pa legs par mi shes pa de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa la ming gi tshogs sam/ gzugs kyi tshogs su mngon par zhen pas/ de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams byon pa dang / 
317b3('bum): bzhud par brtag ste/ 'di ltar chos nyid rab tu mi shes pa'i phyir ro// rigs kyi bu gang de bzhin gshegs pa byon pa dang / bzhud par 'dod pa de dag thams cad ni byis pa so so'i skye bo ste/ 
317b4('bum): de dag thams cad 'gro ba lnga'i 'khor ba dpa 'tshadong 'dod par 'gyur ro// de dag thams cad ni nas rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa/ dang thag ring / de dag thams cad ni sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams dang
317b5('bum): thag ring ngo // rigs kyi bu gang dag de bzhin gshegs pas chos thams cad rmi lam lta bu'o zhes bshad par shes pa de dag ni chos gang yang 'gro ba 'am 'ong bar mi rtog go// gang de bzhin gshegs
317b6('bum): ba'i chos nyid 'di lta bur rab tu shes pa de dag ni/ bla ni med pa yang na dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nye bar gyur to// de dag ni shes rab kyi pha ro lang tu phyin pa la spyod pa'o// de dag ni de bzhin
317b7('bum): gshegs pa'i slob ma ste/ grong khyer gi bsod snyoms don yod pa za'o// de dag ni 'jig rten pa'i sbyin gnas so// karigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ rgya mtsho chen po'i rin bro che rnams ni shar phyogs
317b8('bum): nas kyang mi 'ongs lho phyo gas dang / nub phyogs drang / byang phyogs dang / mtshams rnams dang / stong dang / 'og dang / phyogs bcu gang nas kyang ma 'ongs mod kyi te 'on kyang sems can rnams kyi dge
318a1('bum): pa'i rtsa ba'i rgyus rgya mtsho chen po'i rin po che rnams 'byung ste/ de dag rgyu med pa las 'byung ba yang ma yin gyi/ rgyu dang rkyen rnams la rag lus pa rten cing 'brel pa las byung ngo // rin po che de dag med par 'gyur
318a2('bum): na yang / phyogs bcu gang du yang 'phos te dong ba med mod kyi/ 'on kyang rkyen gang rnams yod pa las rin po che de dag 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i rkyen de rnams med par gyur pa las rin po che de rnams med par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi
318a3('bum): bu de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi sku yongs su rdzogs pa yang / phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gang nas kyang ma byon/ gang du yang mi bzhud do// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi sku de dag rgyu med pa las byung ba yang sa
318a4('bum): yin gyi/ sngon gyi spyod pa yongs su rdzogs pa'i rgyu dang / rkyen tshogs pa la rag lus pa/ rgyu las kun tu byung ba/ sngon gi las kyi rno bar smin pa/ sems can gi dmigs pa dang ldan pa las snang ste/ phyogs bcu gang
318a5('bum): na yod pas ni ma yin gyi/ rgyu dang rkyen gang rnams yod pa las sku yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba'i rgyu dang rkyen de rnaMs med pa dang / yongs su rdzogs par mi 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ pi bang gi 'byung
318a6('bum): ba'i che gang nas kyang ma'ongs/ 'gag pa'i tshe gang du yang mi 'gro/ gang du yang 'pho ba med pa rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba las kyang 'byung / rgya dang rkyen la rag las so// 'di ste ste dper na pi bang gi khog pa
318a7('bum): bags pa dang / yu ba dang / rgyud dang / blang ba dang / sbeng shing dang / mi'i rtsol ba la brten nas pi bang gi sgra 'byung ste/ sna de yang log pa las kyang ma byung / pags pa dang / yu ba dang / rgyud rnams dang / sdeng shing
318a8('bum): las kyang ma byung / blang ba dang / mi'i rtsol ba las kyang ma byung mod kyi/ 'on kyang thams cad 'dus shing ldan pa las sgra 'byung ngo // 'gag pa na yang sgra de gang du yang mi 'gro// rigs kyi bu de bzhin du sangs rgyas brgya
318b1('bum): ldan 'das rnams kyi sku yongs su rdzogs pa yang / rgyu dang byen pa rag lus pa ste/ dge ba'i rtsa ba du mo las yongs su rdzogs pa'o// rgya gcig las ma byung / rkyen gcig las ma byung / dge ba'i rtsa bcig sas sa
318b2('bum): rgyas kyi sku 'byung ba ma yin no// rgyu med pa las 'byung ba ma yin te/ rgyu dang rkyen du ma tshogs pa las byung ba/ de gang nas kyang ma byon/ rgyu dang rkyen tshogs pa med na yang gang du yang mi bzhud do// rigs kyi bu de ltar khyod
318b3('bum): kyis de bzhin gshegs pa de rnam pa byon pa dang / bzhung par bsdu bar bya'o// rigs kyi bu khyod kyis chos thams cad kyi chos nyid kyang de bzhin du rig par bya'o// rigs kyi bu de snar khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs
318b4('bum): bar mam dang / tshis thams cad spyo med pa dang / bzhag pa med pa rab tu shes na/ khyod blan med pa pa das pa rdzog sa pa'i bya chub tu sa par gyur / bkyi pa med tu phyin pa'i thabasas
318b5('bum): sa ches par pyod par 'gyur ro// de bzhin mi shegs pa rnams byon pa dang / 'ashud pa med par ston pa'i chos kyi rnam gras 'di bshad pan/ ma chen poms tu g.yos par gyu / stong gsum gyi saci
319a1('bum): na pa na / so phyin gyi kyang byang chub su se ma can sa kyis 'phags pas 'i matog pa nga 'i bamadun gyi phyis
319a2('bum): ma'i me tog dang / bye ma gzhan dag kyis kyang gtod/ mngon par gtor/ rab tu mngon par gtod nas tshig 'dri skad ces smras so// rigs kyi bu khyod kyi yon tan gis deng bdag cag rnams kyis kyang don da
319a3('bum): las byung ba'i gtam 'jig rten thams cad kyis yid ches par dka' ba 'jig tshogs la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis ma yin par bshad pa thos so// de nas byang chub sems dpa' ses dpa'
319a4('bum): chen po rtag par rab tu ngu bas/ byang chub sems dpa' ses dpa' chen po chos kyis 'a phags pa la 'di skad ces smras so// sa chen po 'di g.yos par gyur pa'i rgyu gang yin rkyen gang yin/ chos kyis 'phags
319a5('bum): bas smras pa/ rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa rnams byon pa med pa dang / bzhud pa med pa bzhad pa 'di khyod la dris/ ngas bshad pa na srog chags brgyad stong mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa rab tu thob par
319a6('bum): gyur to// bye ba phrag brgyad bcus bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do// srog chags stong phrag bcu rtsa bzhi ni rdul med cing / dri ma med par gyur nas/ chos la chos kyi mig
319a7('bum): rnam par dag par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtog par rab tu ngu ba dga' zhing yid rab tu dga' ba rgya chen po dang ldan par 'gyur te/ bdag gis gang shes rab kyi
319a8('bum): rolang tu phyin pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rnas byon pa dang / bzhud pa med pa'i chos ba shad ba 'ang yongs su dris pa las sems can 'di snyed cig gi don byas pa ni bdag gis rnyed pa rab tu rnyed do// bla na mong ba
319b1('bum): gshegs pa dgra bcom sa dag par rdzogs brji zangs rgyas su 'gyur ba la dogs pa med de/ nas/ de dga' zhi rab tu dga' ba dang / yid bde ba de nyid dang ldan pas shi rgya la bdun tsam gyi nam mkha
319b2('bum): la 'phags nas/ shing rta la btsam gyi nam mkha' la gnas te/ 'di ska du bdag 'di ltar bar snang la 'dug pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyis 'phags pa la cis mchod snyam du
319b3('bum): bsems pa dang / de nas lha'i dbang po rgya byin gyis byang chub sems dpa' sos dpa' chen po rtag par rab tu ngu ba nam mkha' la 'phags pa mthong nas de'i sems la yongs su rtog pa sems kyis
319b4('bum): shes te/ lha'i me tog man dar bdag de la byin nas 'dra skad ces smras so// rigs kyi bu khyod me tog 'di dag gis 'phags pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyis bapags
319b5('bum): la mchod pa gyis shig/ rigs kyi bu khyod kyi mthus deng sems can stong phrag mang po rnams kyi don byas par gyur ba'i phyir/ rigs kyi bu khyod la nged kyis phan gdags so// rigs kyi bu khyod kyis ji

319b7('bum): ra rab tu dubs/ kwa'i dbang po rgya byin pa me tog man dang bdag blangs nas/ byang chub sems dpa'i ses dpa' chen tho chos kyis 'phags pa sa gtang/ mngon par gtor / byang chu pos
320a1('bum): dab sems dang chen po chos kyis bdags pas bdug gi sus kyi sa kyang bga'anas/ tshig 'dis sa ga/ rigs kyi spyo kun du gsog bya 'i bye/ bdag gi sus kya zu / 
320a2('bum): shes nas de bar snang bas pab te/ bdag phul nas/ byang chub sems dpa'i ses rapa chen po rgyas kyis 'phags pa'i badrad du pa la ma bye te dug go// des nang dpon gyi bu mo de dang / bram
320a3('bum): dag gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag pa rab tu drugs 'di nang ces smos so// rigs kyi du khyod su bdag cag kyang shing rna nus 'o/ ga sa kyu na ci sa tshun rje
320a4('bum): dag nyid tho par gyur cig/ phyin chad kyang khyod nyid dang lhan cig tu sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnas pa mchong pa byed par gyur cig/ phyin chad kyang khyod dang lhan cig du gnas par gyur cig/ 
320a5('bum): de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag par rab tu ngu bas/ tshong dpon gi bu mo de dang / bu mo lnga rgya po de dag la 'di skad ces smras so// bu mo khyod snying nas kha'i bas pa dang / mthun par byed
320a6('bum): cing / snying nas nga la lus dbul na ni nga yang khyed len to// bu mo ded ga gis smras pa/ khyed la snying nas bsam pa dang mthun par byed cing / khyed ci dgos par bya ba'i phyir snying nas lus dbul po// de nas
320a7('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag par rab tu du ngas tshong/ dpon gi bu mo la sogs pa bu mo lnga rgya bo rnams rgyan thas cad kyis krugs shing rta lnga rgya po de rnams kyang rgyan gyis brgyan nas
320a8('bum): thams cad kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen chos kyis 'phabs pa lu la te/ rigs kyi bu khyod la bu mo 'di rnams dang / shing rta lnga rgya po 'di rjes yongs su spyad pa'i phyir 'bul lo// 
320b1('bum): sa smras so// denas pa'i dbang po rgya byen gyis rigs kyi bu de sa rigs kyi ga segs so/ rigs seMg nas rigs pasbyidan te/ rigs kyi byang chub se ma sa chen
320b2('bum): drug gis de ltar 'dos pa thas cad yongs su da bar byar/ 'dong ba'i sems deg bya dag gis ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams spyar du blan med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu
320b3('bum): mngon par 'chang rgya'o// chos smra ba la de ltar mchod pa byas na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i thabs mkhas pa nyan nus par 'gyur ro// sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
320b4('bum): ba'i sangs rgyas de rnams kyis/ sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe/ gtong ba de lta bu la gnas nas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu kun tu bsgrubs/ shes rab kyi pha
320b5('bum): rimang tu phyin pa'i thabs mkhas pa yang yongs su dros so// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyis 'phags pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag par rab tu ngu ba'i dge
320b6('bum): ba'i rtsa ba yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir/ tshong dpon gyi bu mo las stsogs pa bu mo lnga rgya po de rnams dang / shing rta lnga rgya blangs so// blangs nas kyang rtag par rab tu ngu ba'i rigs kyi bu de nyid la slar byin no/ 
320b7('bum): de nas byang chub sems dpa' ses dpa' chen po chos kyis 'phags pa stan las langs nas bdag gi khyim du song ngo // nyi ma yang nub par gyur to// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag
320b8('bum): bya rab tu ngu ba 'di snyam du sems par gyur to// bdag chos 'dod pa'i phyir 'os la 'dug pa 'om/ nyal ba ni legs pa ma yin la/ bdag gi ma mo yin gyis byeng chub sems dpa' sems dang / 
xa1('bum): bya'o// bdag mnyam pa nyid pas/ chos mnyam pa nyid dang / bdag rnam par dag pas chos rna bar dag pa dang / bdag stong pa nyid pas chos stong pa nyid du yang dag par snyoms par 'jug la gang / 
xa2('bum): de ltar snyoms par 'jug cing yang dag pa nyid du 'jug kyang / nges par yang myi ltung ba 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i yang dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin to// yang dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin gang gis sems kyi skad cig dang ldan na/ 
xa3('bum): shes rab kyis thas cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba 'di ni/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya ste/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i la gi spyod pa yong su dag pa'o// 
xa4('bum): byang chub kyi phyogs kyi spyod pa yongasu dag pa 'di snyan pa na/ lha dang myi srog chags nyan thos kyi theg pa can nges par gyur pa la ma zhugs pa khri drug stong/ bla na myed pa yong dag par rdzogs pa'i rgyu
xa5('bum): nub tu samos skyes// bam po gsum pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi/ sa yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gtsug na/ 
xa6('bum): tha mal bkar stsolang ba/ rigs kyi bu de la byang chub sems dpa'i mngon par shes pa'i spyod ba yongasu dag pa gang zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa'i lha'i myig gi mngon par shes pa yongasu dag pan/ 
xa7('bum): bsngo dang ldan pa yin te// rnam pa lnga gang zhen/ 'di lta ste phyogs bcur rnam par lta bas snang bathob pa de ni lha'i myig yin// phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas thams cad la yang dag pa lta bas mun pa mun nag dang dras
xa8('bum): de ni lha'i myig yino// sems can gi 'chi 'pho dang / skye ba la yang dag par lta bas shi nad tu nges par brtags pa de ni lha'i myig yin// phyogs bcu'i gzugs snang ba dang / kha dog dang / mtshan dang / dbyibs la
